description:
Waikiki Beach Tower #2302 – 2470 Kalakaua Ave.

This spacious, centrally air-conditioned two-bedroom, two-bath condo (1025 square feet plus large lanai) has a breathtaking unobstructed panoramic ocean view! Photos do NOT do this beautiful vacation rental justice! Sleeps Max 6 Guests (including children 3+ years old).

The space
Waikiki Beach Tower is in the heart of Waikiki; an easy stroll to many casual and fine dining restaurants, shopping and entertainment. Water sports and equipment rental equipment can be found just across the street at world famous Waikiki Beach which has a seawall that forms a giant, wave-free pool (excellent for small children).

LIVING AREA:
– 46" Smart TV with Free Netflix!
– Queen sleeper sofa
– Indoor Dining area for 4
– Central A/C throughout
– Convenient in-unit Washer/Dryer
– Large private Ocean View lanai/balcony with table and chairs for outdoor dining!

KITCHEN:
– F
neighborhood_overview: The beaches in Waikiki are right across the street (!) and shopping, restaurants and entertainment venues in Waikiki are all easily accessible.
host_about:
ALOHA! E komo mai and mahalo for choosing to stay with Captain Cook Resorts!

Captain Cook Resorts proudly manages over 170 privately-owned vacation rentals in Waikiki (a district of Honolulu on the island of Oahu). Everyone on the fun and energetic CCR team works hard to offer great accommodations, great service, and has a passion for sharing all that Oahu has to offer our guests!

We appreciate that you're on vacation, and we ask that you let us know if there's anything we can do to make this visit stand out as one of your best!

ALL CAPTAIN COOK RESORTS RENTALS INCLUDE:
– Bath towels, Beach towels, Bed linens
– Dishes, Silverware, Cookware (including tea kettle & rice cooker)
– Beach chairs, Hair dryer, Iron/Ironing board
– Start-Up Supplies: coffee filters, laundry detergent, dish soap, dishwasher soap, bar soap, paper towels, toilet paper, tissue, basic cleaning supplies, and travel size (2 oz.) shampoo, conditioner, body wash, body lotion
– NOT PROVIDED: beach umbrellas, beach toys, aluminum foil, Ziploc bags, coffee, condiments/seasonings, cooking oil, fabric softener, or bleach. This private vacation rental does NOT include resort services such as daily housekeeping, replenishment of towels or toiletry supplies, or hotel front desk services.

Please let us know if you have any questions!

Mahalo!

description:
Main house is 3 bed & the Ohana has 1 bed. Great views, see the coast all the way to town! Take a dip in the pool. Pick fruit from the trees. Smart TV downstairs and a large TV upstairs with an Amazon Fire Stick and Internet Close to great Keauhou shopping center. Go for a walk, nice quiet neighborhood. Beach toys available, so is a grill. 7 minute drive to Kahalu'u beach, great snorkeling

The space
This house has a main house with 3 bedroom 2 bath as well as a Ohana of 1 bedroom and 1.5 bath downstairs. ( Note: Access to the Ohana is a separate entrance and is not accessible from inside the main upstairs house). Maybe the kids need their own space, you can put them downstairs where there is 1.5 baths, bedroom , TV and kitchenette. You can also just rent the entire upstairs or just the downstairs. Please see the other listings ( 1 bed Awesome Ocean Views airbnb .com/rooms/41457053 listing and 3 bed Hillside Paradise airbnb
,com/rooms/46487141 li
neighborhood_overview:
Quiet residential neighborhood, great for walks. Keahou shopping center is 5 minutes by car. Many restaurants, grocery store, longs drugs, shops and movie theatres. Try Peaberry Coffee and Crepes. Real good crepes! Mexican, Thai, Pasta, Pizza, Steaks, Burger and more at the center. On Friday nights at 6pm, enjoy a free Hula dancing performance, on Saturday there's a farmers market. Snorkeling is fantastic at Kahalu'u State Beach. There is a marina near by that offers water tours and don't miss Manta Ray tours at night.

We are a mature, fun loving couple who live and work in the high tech industry in Silicon Valley. We enjoy traveling the world and meeting new people. Hawaii is one of our favorite destinations as well as Australia and the Caribbean.
We also enjoy listening to live music and trying new restaurants.
We are respectful of other's space and things and hope that other's would be as well.

An open bar serves guests throughout the evening.

Embark on a personalized island-wide tour, where you are able to pick your destinations in a small and friendly group setting. This highly-rated family owned and operated business is proud to show guests around the Big Island and have plenty of tours available to choose from.

description:
Located on Keawakapu Beach, one of Maui’s best swimming and snorkeling beaches, with unobstructed ocean views to the outer islands and beyond, this third-floor condo sets a spectacular tone for your ultimate Maui beach adventure. One of only two condo properties on locals-favorite Keawakapu Beach, Hale Hui Kai 313 is an air-conditioned, tastefully renovated oasis positioned a one-minute beach stroll from one of the most vibrant snorkeling reefs on Maui’s south shore.

The space
Hale Hui Kai 313 is truly one of Maui's gems. There is no better way to experience this area than a direct ocean front unit sitting 3 stories above the spectacular Keawakapu beach. Enjoy the sounds and sights of the surf on your own private lanai with captivating views of Molokini Crater and Kaho‘olawe.

Hale Hui Kai is a low-density, low-profile (four floors) laid-back property, with only 40 units, and only 12 of those directly front the beach. This unit’s coveted front-row v

Our office is within a few minutes of all of our properties, and we respond immediately to guest issues. We’re partnered with the largest Real Estate brokerage in the country, Keller Williams; we advise on and sell Maui investment condos, based on the best possible ROI.

description:
The Fairways at Mauna Lani is a luxury gated community located in the prestigious Mauna Lani Resort located on the sunny Kohala Coast of the Big Island. There are 2 Golf Courses, 6 Tennis Courts, Spa & Sports Fitness Club, & Private Beach Club.

The space
The Town home is 1631 square feet on the North Course and is very private. It was furnished by an interior designer with a tasteful island feel and the kitchen has everything you would need to cook as this is our second home and have it stocked for entertaining. There is a Viking gas barbecue and wet bar on the lanai with a table and 4 chairs overlooking the golf course. The dining room can seat up to 8 guests and there are 3 Bar Stools.

The Master bedroom is very spacious with a lovely sitting area with a chaise, private lanai overlooking the golf course, large master bath with whirlpool tub, separate toilet room, separate roomy walk in shower, double sinks with granite counter tops, and plenty of clo
neighborhood_overview:
The moment you drive into Mauna Lani you will feel a sense of serenity and see the beauty of our amazing island. There are many beautiful white sand beaches near Mauna Lani and Hapuna is a favorite for body surfing and boogie boarding which is only 10 minutes away. The private Beach Club has some of the best snorkeling on the island, and it is great for young children because it is a bay without waves, and paddle board and kayak rentals are available. The Beach Club has a wonderful restaurant, Napua, that serves lunch and dinner. Enjoy the self guided walking tour, featuring archaeological sites with petroglyphs, historic park land, and the Kalahuipuaa Fishponds.

Due to Covid-19 some of the information may not be up to date as to what is open and available for use. It is constantly changing.

It is an easy walk to the Fairmont Orchid which has several dining options; Brown's Beach House and a more casual restaurant which is a great spot to have a cocktail and wat
host_about: This was the house my kids grew up in however it has been completely remodeled in 2015. I live close by in Truckee and love to ski, golf, play tennis, hike, kayak, & paddle board.  I also spend a lot of time at our other vacation rental home in Mauna Lani on the Big Island of Hawaii. I like to travel and take a couple big vacations most years.

Every consideration to detail and sophistication has been thought through for your convenience. This house was built very eco-conscious. There was a lot of attention to building the home green with very environmentally friendly building materials including flooring, paint, doors, etc. Almost all the cleaning and laund

host_about: I am originally from the east coast and now I spend most of my time in Hawaii...this island is an amazing adventure.  I have been through 5 lava flows in the 12 years I have lived here!

Please note that while this complex does include elevator access, you must climb one flight of stairs to access this penthouse unit. This top floor condo has a great open-floor concept with the main living area that sees into the bright, airy

Based in Brooklyn, New York, KOALA wants to transform the way people take vacations. Our goal is to make it easier for travelers to book beautiful resort stays at surprisingly low prices, while helping timeshare owners cover expenses for a space they can’t use. It’s a win-win!

Mike is the cofounder and CEO of KOALA. His mission is to make it secure and easy for travelers like you to access space and resort amenities at affordable prices.

description:

description:
Enjoy spectacular ocean views from all rooms. Located on famous KonaZona Coffee Farm & Tiki Village. Only 4 miles from the heart of tourist activities in Kailua-Kona and beaches. This large upper apt in Plantation House is surrounded by lush gardens.

The space
The Ocean View at the KonaZona Coffee Farm & Tiki Village is a large one bedroom private apartment on the upper story with spectacular views. The KonaZona is one of the oldest and most historical Coffee Farms in Hawaii. The Tiki Village is being created to share our Hawaii with as many travelers as possible by offering very low costs. We could charge double, but we would rather have new friends than more money. We have enough money, but we can never have enough friends.
The large living room, with high ceiling and huge picture window that fills the space with light and ocean views. The Bedroom features two large closets and a Queen size bed. You will spend more time in the covered lanai, your outs
neighborhood_overview: You will only have to walk two blocks to the quaint, historic town of Holualoa. It's old historically protected buildings are now mostly arts and craft galleries. No tourist T-shirts here. Just incredible art from the resident artists. There are two restaurants and an old fashioned Mom and Pop general store. Check out our little Holualoa village on the internet at HolualoaHawaii.
host_about:
KonaDave is a coffee farmer and world traveler!  His great, great, great uncle brought the first coffee plants to Kona in 1828, the rest is coffee history.  

He was born in Seattle, Washington and when not traveling the world splits his time between homes in Kona, Hawaii, and Edmonds, Washington. He travels over 100 days a year. He grew up (friends say he never grew up) in Seattle and graduated from the University of Washington before a career in the newspaper business and advertising. He worked for a Washington Post company and the San Francisco Chronicle. 

He "retired" from the newspaper business when his daughter was born in 1987. When she was three months old KonaDave started traveling the world.  His daughter left dirty diapers in 24 countries before she was three. KonaDave has explored over 100 nations and states around the world. Italy is his favorite to visit.   He also runs a real estate investment company between travels.  

He loves to show people Hawaii's hidden treasures and his KonaZona Coffee Farm, Art  Gardens and Tiki Village.  Come visit him at the farm and he will let you pick all the coffee, fruit or flowers to take back to the condo.  He will share and cup of Kona Coffee or Mai Tai in his backyard Tiki Bar.  If you are lucky one of his famous parties will happen when you are in town.  They are legendary!!  The KonaZona is only 4 miles and 100 years away in historic Artist filled Holualoa town.  KonaDave  and the famous KonaZona Coffee Farm, Art Garden and Tiki Village  are easy to find on the internet. Check it out on your internet explorations of the Big Island!

description:
Style & ease define this ground floor suite with lanai fringing the resort’s beautiful lawns. Keep it homey with WiFi, flat screen, open kitchen, washer/dryer, DVD, A.C., ceiling fans & upgraded bath. Sleeps 4 in 1 Queen & 1 Queen Murphy bed.

The space
Slip into island mode in this 818sf ground floor suite with lanai fringing manicured lawns. Homey perks include WiFi, open-design kitchen, washer/dryer, private bedroom, upgraded bath, flat screen, air conditioning, ceiling fans, & cool tile & hardwood floors. Sleeps 4 in 1 Queen & 1 Queen Murphy bed.

On 15 tropical acres across from Kamaole Beach Park III, our one- two- and three-bedroom suites feature full kitchens and washers/dryers. Stay active with tennis courts, a swimming pool, jet spas, and barbeque grills.

Other things to note
Pricing does NOT include the following fee and will be collected directly upon check-in:

- One-time resort fee or $40, plus tax of 4.17
host_about:
Vacationing in Maui doesn’t get better than Kamaole Sands, a condo resort built on 15 acres of gardens, waterfalls, and ponds. Live like you’ve always wanted to in an individually furnished condominium suite directly across from Kihei’s popular Kamaole Beach Park III. Defined by its laid-back vibe and tropical beauty, South Maui is a true Hawaiian paradise.

Our dreamy Kihei location near Wailea Resort and Makena Resort puts you in the midst of golf, spas and ocean recreation.

- Learn to surf at Kamaole Beach Park III
- Tee off at Maui Nui or Wailea golf clubs
- Stay on trend at The Shops at Wailea
- Snorkel amid the pristine waters of La Perouse Bay
- Indulge in spa treatments at Wailea Resort
- Sample craft brews at Maui Brewing Company

The best plan for your day is often no plan at all. Maybe you’ll start your morning with a swim in the Pacific or in our pool. You might mingle amid traveling kindred spirits at your resort’s Wednesday Mai Tai Party, and then grill a fresh catch with your new friends at the property’s public barbecue area. Or step out for a sunset dinner at one of Kihei’s fantastic cafes or bistros. Need to stay connected? We offer complimentary WiFi in the lobby, pool area, and all rooms.

Since 1993, Castle Resorts & Hotels has specialized in innovative hotel and resort management. We manage properties throughout the Hawaiian Islands, including Kauai, Oahu, Maui, Molokai, and Hawaii Island, as well as Auckland, New Zealand. Accommodations range from full-service hotels to resort condominiums and combines value, convenience, and authentic experiences.

description:
Under new ownership and refreshed with a brand new master bed, Westin Heavenly Mattress and more! We've taken great care to make this your ideal home for your trip to Maui. Our guests will love the direct 4rd floor ocean views of the blue Pacific Ocean, Molokai and Lanai - imagine yourself relaxing on our large patio, hearing the waves crash while enjoying the sunset.

The space
Our home has been upgraded to be the ideal vacation rental for your stay in Maui. We believe our 1 bed / 1 bath home (550+ sq. feet) is best suited for couples or families with children wanting a quiet, romantic stay with honeymoon worthy views, or any other occasion to enjoy a relaxing Maui vacation.

Key Reason to book our home - the views and large patio to enjoy it from! While many condos have partial or ground views of the water and try to hide it in their listing photos, our home truly has unobstructed 4rd floor ocean views and a large balcony! You may find yourself schedul
host_about: I grew up in Los Angeles, lived in New York, Las Vegas and now Tokyo though always considered Maui a second home - am happy to share our piece of paradise with everyone!

host_about:
Vacation Rental Management, Property Management, Asset Management, Real Estate Sales and Financial Analysis on  real estate.

We give our pledge to you to make your vacation on Maui as easy and pleasurable as possible. We understand that vacationing with your family and friends is a time for memories, rest, and vital rejuvenation.

We provide the support and peace of mind for your ultimate vacationing experience on Maui.
Link to all our listings:  https://airbnb.com/users/15820446/listings 

We are especially empathetic for our Vacationers.  We are not perfect but we do try hard.  We are all local to Maui and try to represent the Aloha Spirit.

We have discovered for ourselves the pleasure of vacationing in this paradise called: Maui.  All of us came here many years ago, drawn to the mystique and spectacular beauty of the Island. This is truly a marvelous business, and we give thanks each day for this wonderful opportunity.

description:
Maui Kamaole #J-211 is an upstairs 2 Bd 2 Bath ocean view condo. Equipped with a full kitchen, cable TV/DVD, high speed Wi-Fi, a washer and dryer, and beautiful panoramic ocean view. Unit is fully air conditioned and can sleep up to four guests.

The space
Maui Kamaole #J-211 is a 2 bedroom, 2 bath, second floor condo with an amazing sweeping ocean view. It is equipped with a full kitchen, three cable TVs, air conditioning, and a washer/dryer. Complimentary wireless is provided as is a telephone for local calls. The master bedroom is an air-conditioned suite with a California King bed, a TV/DVD, and an en suite with a shower. The second bedroom also has a CA King bed, a TV, and air conditioning. The second bath in Maui Kamaole #J-211 has a walk-in shower. The living room is air-conditioned and is furnished with a queen sofa bed, a large flat-screen TV, and a blue-ray player. For your outdoor enjoyment, the owner supplies beach chairs, beach towels, and sand toy
host_about:
Rentals Maui Inc. is a locally owned & managed Vacation Rental management company located in Kihei, Maui. We've been doing business on Maui for the past 20 years and we are fully licensed by the State of Hawaii, insured, and bonded.

We currently manage over 300 properties in South Maui, which is also where our office is located, making it convenient should guests need assistance day or night.

description:
Kahala 712 at Poipu Kai Resort - Delight in this lovely remodeled two-bedroom, two-bath condominium offering partial ocean views and an amazingly lush courtyard that presents the sensory joy of fragrant blooms and soothing bird songs.
*Maximum occupancy and sleeping arrangements for 4 guests.

The space
You will fall in love with the tastefully updated island furnishings, new tile flooring, and selective art pieces that provide a serene interior. The well-equipped kitchen is garnished with beautiful granite countertops, ligneous cabinetry, and stainless-steel appliances for preparing a delectable meal to enjoy in the charming dining area or alfresco on the lanai. The master bedroom delivers peaceful slumber with a comfortable king-size bed and standing air conditioning, while the powerful ceiling fans enhance the refreshingly cool Poipu trade winds for your cooling comfort. Bring your family or friends who can appreciate their privacy in a separate guest bed
neighborhood_overview: Poʻipū Beach Park is located in the community of Poʻipū on the southern coast of Kauaʻi island in Hawaii. The beach is a park has lifeguards provided by the county of Kauaʻi.
host_about:
Suite Paradise – The gateway to island living.

Suite Paradise in sunny Poipu Beach on Kauai is home to hundreds of vacation rental properties, amenable to any sized group and any specifications you could think of. With the highest level of service and a wide range of vacation rental options, Suite Paradise can ensure that your stay is as seamless as Kauai’s lifestyle.

Choose from luxurious beach resorts, each with multiple pools and spas within walking distance and top-of-the-line amenities, including, but not limited to, full membership to Poipu Beach Athletic Club for the duration of your stay. Poipu Kai consists of 70 acres of lush tropical foliage and some of Kauai’s most sought-after vacation rentals. One complex is literally located nestled in a verdant and extinct volcano crater – you can’t get more immersed in the island lifestyle than that! From mauka (mountain) to makai (sea), Suite Paradise has something for you!

Kahala – A popular complex that is home to mostly one- and two-bedroom units. Kahala is only a short walk from the beach, and closest to Poipu Kai’s tennis courts and Kalapaki Joe’s sports bar. With the option of both mountain and ocean views available dependent on the unit, Kahala’s location is perfectly situated with proximity to Poipu Road as well as the Poipu Kai greenbelt.

Makanui – Two- and three-bedroom units perched across from Poipu Crater, with stunning mountain views, distant ocean views, and a short walk to the greenbelt path.

Manualoha –Less than a mile from the beach, although the complex pool is practically attached to the Pacific Ocean! With units sleeping four to six, easy access to the greenbelt pathway, and hues of purple bougainvillea draped throughout the complex.

Poipu Sands – One- and two-bedroom units with incredible ocean views, spacious lanais, and a short walk to Shipwreck’s Beach.

Regency – Larger units, spacious enough to accommodate up to 10 guests. Many of these units are newly remodeled and offer AC. Regency and Kahala sit right next to each other.

Regency Villas – Luxury units with central AC. Regency Villas often feature a loft and sleep up to five guests. Situated near the greenbelt for easy access to many resort amenities, and centrally located for a short walk to Brennecke's Beach, or access to the Grand Hyatt Kauai Resort.

Nihi Kai Villas - A comfortable and quiet beach resort with 70 condos to choose from. Located right across from the ocean.

Poipu Crater – Just as the name says, Poipu Crater is nestled in a verdant an extinct volcano crater, which makes the foliage truly breathtaking. With 30 condos to choose from, sleeping four to six guests, the choice is yours! Enjoy the tropical gardens and central location to all that Poipu has to offer.

Lawai Beach Resort - Luxurious oceanfront condos located directly across from arguably the best snorkeling spot on the island. Enjoy a short stroll to five-star dining at The Beach House or enjoy the view from Lawai Beach, as the surfers paddle out for a sunset session. With room to sleep up to six, Lawai Beach Resort has it all!

Poipu Kapili - A beautiful and peaceful resort located on five acres of meticulously landscaped oceanfront property.

Pili Mai - This is Kauai’s newest resort development of luxury condominiums, nestled among a championship golf course.

neighborhood_overview:
Waikoloa Beach is an area located on the South Kohala coast on the island of Hawaii. Approximately 25 minutes north of the Kona International Airport (KOA). The Waikoloa Beach Resort is very family and pedestrian friendly. Most properties are within a 10-15 minute walk (3-5minute drive with ample parking) to ʻAnaehoʻomalu Bay, also known as A-Bay. A-Bay is a shallow water bay located within the resort. ʻAnaehoʻomalu is best known for its sunsets, snorkeling and historic royal fishponds.
The Queens’ MarketPlace and Kings’ Shops provide convenient dining and shopping options.
host_about:
Aloha!
We have had the pleasure of hosting thousands and thousands of guests since 2006. We have built beautiful relationships with our returning guests and love to share the "aloha" with all of our guests.
We look forward to building our relationship with Air BnB!

description:
TVNC-5168
24/7 on Island contact: Layna Larot
(Phone shared with check in info)

A restful rustic retreat from the noise ...the news and concerns that surround us.

Wake up to the sound of surf and jungle fowl.
--
450 sq ft/42 sq m

The one bedroom Cottage is a block from the beach & surf of Hanalei Bay.
Rustic in its simplicity, the cottage was designed in the single wall construction popular in the 1930’s; has been lovingly restored with ceiling fans in each room and a outdoor lanai.

The space
Caveat Emptor!

Surfs Up...Heads Up!

Before you go further or register to book, know that our Hanalei property is located in a tsunami evacuation zone.

In case of tsunami or any other natural disaster here are the steps in seeking higher ground.

host_about:
Born in Cuba at an early age and have spent most of my life in these tropic latitudes.

e.g. Cuba, Puerto Rico, Hawaii and  somehow floated up to Alaska.

I grew up in Puerto Rico where I learned to surf and how  and the why I ended up in Hanalei.

In 1984 started Kayak Kauai with my brother and so have been lucky to have a foot in the water in every respect.

See you on the trail or in the water.

Aloha y Saludos,

Micco (alias Miguel)

description:
(30 day minimum rental) Studio Tropics is a beautiful studio located on the main island of Oahu, in a quiet neighborhood away from the hustle and bustle of Waikiki. Offering privacy, comfort and elegant charm of the topics. And only minutes away from beaches, hiking, entertainment and shopping.
Host may also offer a car for rent during your stay for an additional charge of $50/day. It's a 2009 BMW 335i convertible, it runs great and has a/c. Inquire with host.

host_about: Carolina & Ray are lifetime residents of Hawaii.  We love to share about our island home.  We are accessible to guests, but usually will honor your privacy and make sure you are comfortable.

description:
This quaint beach house sits on one of the most beautiful beaches in the state of Hawaii - Kailua- miles of white sand, with water sports, dining, sunrise and sunset beach walks. Just bring yourself, and your personal items.

The space
The property will be made exclusively available to the renter for a full period of 30 days and no one else may occupy the property during that period. The 30-day rental period will be communicated to guest upon booking. All rates quoted will be based on a 30 day period. If you have any questions please feel free to contact me.

In compliance with the Revised Ordinances of the City & County of Honolulu, the Property will be made available to you for your use and occupancy for a period of thirty (30) days. If you do not stay for the full 30 day period and stay for your scheduled dates the property will remain vacant through the end of the scheduled 30 day period.

GE W20144888-0

The condos at Sea Village Kona have expansive ocean views providing spectacular sunsets and views of luxurious tropical gardens. The pool area is located beside the sea wall, so guests can enjoy a peaceful swim just steps away from the crashing surf.
Hot tub and tennis courts available for you!

It's VERY safe, well lit and VERY secure (my condo)

host_about:
Hola,

My name is Take (pronounced Tah-Kay). I'm originally born and raised in California, but have spent lots of time traveling around Europe & SE Asia having lived in Japan/China/Singapore. I moved to Honolulu in 2014 on a gut feeling and have been loving it since!

description:
30-Day Rental. Message us for details. GE-088-190-7712-01/TA-088-190-7712-01R. Located in Makaha Valley Resort District, perfect for 5 to 8 guests. Walk out the gate onto the famous Makaha Surfing Beach. We have 2 Bungalows on our property. Each bungalow is 700 sq ft with 2 air-conditioned BRs, 1 BR, LR, and a fully equipped kitchen. Boogie boards, snorkel gear, beach chairs, and umbrellas, are all available in the cabana. Snorkel with the sea turtles right off the beach. Sunsets...Perfect!

The space
Makaha Beach is truly the hidden jewel of Oahu. We do not use the Airbnb calendar so please message us for availability. We are only 35 miles northwest of Honolulu airport away from all of the crowds. Makaha Beach is famous for surfing dating back to the '50s but we also have great snorkeling and just plain lying on the beach in the sun. Located in the Makaha Valley Resort District which has two golf courses. Currently closed, the North Course will be redesigned
neighborhood_overview:
This is really "local" Hawaii. The Makaha Country Club is 1.5 miles away for golf and there is great deep sea fishing out of the Waianae Harbor 2.5 miles away.

Made famous as a beach locale by an article in National Geographic, our neighborhood remains free of tourists and crowds. This is the relaxed side of Hawaii.
host_about: Makaha is our favorite place in the whole world and we have traveled to many, many places. Until we are able to retire to our lovely beach, we just hope that others can enjoy our wonderful community and lifestyle here on Westside Oahu

description:

Each Plantation at Princeville condo is in like-new condition, offering all the finest upgrades.

The space
The Parrish Collection is a locally owned and based real estate management company that specializes in vacation rentals on Kauai and Maui. Our collections of rentals are professionally managed by in-house staff with a commitment to personalized service, fine attention to detail and a true sense of Aloha. description:
Pack Your Bags...! You found a Gem. Quiet and Private. Nestled at the End of a Cul-d-Sac and on the Edge of the Bluff. 180 Degree Views of the Mountains, Waterfalls, Jungle Valley, Blue Ocean, Sunsets, Humpback Whales and Albatross (when in season). Fully Equipped Kitchen - Eat inside or on the Balcony. An ideal setting for Special Occasions. The Grassy Courtyard below is wonderful for Yoga or Quiet Meditation. Large Chairs are on the Bluff for Taking in the Views. Note: No A/C

neighborhood_overview: Centrally Located in the Heart of Princeville - Minutes Drive to Beautiful Beaches, Restaurants & Shopping

Aloha...! 

We have a lot of Gratitude for living on the beautiful island of Kaua'i. 

We Embrace the Diversity of our Global Community. We warmly welcome travelers from all parts of the world and all walks of life. Our goal is for your stay to be Most Enjoyable!

description:
Our Studio offers a clean & comfortable home base during your adventure on Oahu's North Shore. Located in Kahuku. Private entrance and shared parking space right off of the road outside of studio. Kitchenette has a mini fridge, basic utensils and microwave. Enjoy wifi, flat screen mounted cable TV & AC. Full bathroom has basic toiletries, hair dryer & towels. 15min drive to North Shore famous spots and lots to eat on the way. We definitely recommend renting a car as everything is a drive away.

The space
The spacious studio is located on the 1st floor corner of a 2 story home. You have your own private entrance to the studio. Your parking spot is right outside of your front window. There are shared walls, on the opposite walls of your kitchenette and bathroom which are living areas of our home so potential for noise w/kids & babies. Clean, comfortable amenities and we are available to help as needed as we live on property on the opposite end. Please note we are
neighborhood_overview: Neighborhood is a small suburban town in Kahuku.  A bit crowded(lots of Aloha though, try and throw a shaka _,,,/ and your almost guaranteed one back to you lol) Lots of cars especially after 4pm when everyone returns home from work so please drive carefully. A 5 minute drive down the street and there are a plethora of eateries to indulge in from the famous Kahuku shrimp, Thai, Korean bbq, Mexican, vegan options, the options are endless. Happy to share w/you our fav spots if it'll help you out. You can guarantee a good meal every time it’s time to eat. There are beaches just a drive away for swimming, kayaking, snorkeling, SUP, surfing, etc. The Polynesian Cultural Center is just a 10min drive away for a great experience of a luau. Waimea Valley about a 15min drive for a great experience of Hawaiian culture, beautiful gardens of native Hawaiian flowers and plants, as well as their Toa luau. So much to see and do. *Please note there are some places still closed since COVID.
host_about: Our family of 8 love our new home we built in 2019 and are excited to share one of our guest studios with you. We love to travel, experience new things, learn about different countries and ways of living. During our spare time we love to hike, try out new eateries and building projects around the house.

description:
Spacious 2 bed/2 bath guest house is located adjacent to our home. Located on roughly 2 acres, 1500ft in elevation on the slopes of Hualalai in the desirable coffee town of Holualoa. This 1100sqft fully equipped home overlooks Kailua Bay (KONA). 10 minutes from the airpot, downtown Kona, and Magic Sands Beach. Perfect temperatures year round! You're in for magical sunsets. Full size W/D. No smoking or pets.

The space
If you’re looking for immaculately clean, and comfortable, this is the place for you.

This isn’t your normal vacation rental in Kona. This full size guest house is located within a 2 acre orchard facing the ocean and sunsets.

This 1100sqft house has a master bedroom with a king size bed and a full size bathroom. The second bedroom has a smart tv and its own full private bathroom and a tub. If you like to cook, there’s a fully equipped kitchen with anything you would need plus a grill just outside the kitchen door. Imagine barbe
neighborhood_overview: We are located in Holualoa. A small coffee-farming village situated 1,400 feet above Kailua-Kona. The town is primarily a single road called Mamalahoa Highway and along it are several galleries exhibiting the works of local artists, as well as coffee shops brewing Kona coffee that has been grown right here.
host_about: Aloha, we're Gabe & Andrea, the hosts of this awesome retreat home. Gabe is crafstman and builder, an expert waterman and licensed charter boat captain. Andrea is a fitness health coach and entrepreneur. We love the outdoors, especially surfing and exploring. We live in the main house on the premises, and look forward to meeting awesome people to share and enjoy our beautiful property.

description:
Adjacent Condos, 3 Bedrooms + 2 Convertible Beds, 2 Baths, (Sleeps 6-10)

The space
Maui Resort Rentals is proud to present this new one-of-a-kind 3 bedroom offering at The Honua Kai Resort on Kaanapali North Beach.

This tandem package combines a large 2 bedroom interior courtyard partial ocean view suite with a 1 bedroom partial ocean view suite located directly across the hall. This package offers value-minded guests a fantastic alternative to the higher priced 3 bedrooms found at Honua Kai.

These suites provide a perfect opportunity to gather, reconnect, and celebrate. The combined suites offer 2000+ sq ft of interior living space and can accommodate up to 10 guests in three king-sized beds and two queen-sized convertible sofa sleepers. For added flexibility one of the king-sized beds can be split into two XL twins at no charge.

Relax on the combined 370 sq ft of balcony space or lounge inside and get swept away into the lovely
neighborhood_overview: With a prime beachfront location on West Maui's Ka'anapali North Beach, The Honua Kai Resort and Spa was recently recognized as one of the top resorts in Hawaii by Conde Nast Traveler for 2016. Should you wish to explore the area, several prominent shopping and dining destinations are within a short drive–including the world-famous Front Street in Lahaina and the upscale beachside mall at Whaler's Village.
host_about:
The Ohana (Family) at Maui Resort Rentals has been helping vacationers "Make Maui Reality" for over 50 cumulative years on the shores of West Maui.  Inspired by the Maui lifestyle, we aim to provide incredible vacation experiences at a curated collection of premier resort residences.

For your convenience, our warehouse and offices are located in Kaanapali North Beach, just minutes from all of the West Maui resorts.

Our Ritz-Carlton and Marriott trained staff are here to serve. Your guest experience is our highest priority. The privilege to host your precious Maui vacation is ours. 

As an added benefit, our exclusive Maui Resort Rentals courtesy shuttle offers free guest transportation between our West Maui resorts a number of West Maui locations - including Lahaina, Kapalua, and Whaler's Village.

www.airbnb.com/p/mauiresortrentals

description:
Aloha! Welcome to Colony Villas! We are located on the beautiful Kohala Coast in the Waikoloa Beach Resort. Our townhouse is perfect for families, couples, and friend groups looking for space and quiet. Enjoy breath taking views of Mauna Kea and the 1st tee of the King's Golf Course. Pristine Anaeho'omalu Bay (A-Bay) a family friendly beach is just down the road. Colony Villas offers two pools, a tennis court and a gym. We have stocked the home with everything you need for your Hawaii get away.

The space
This home has 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The Master bedroom is upstairs with a king bed, closet and bathroom attached. Downstairs has a living room, bathroom, kitchen, dining area and the second bedroom with two twin beds. A cot is available for a third child. There is a lanai with golf course and Mauna Kea views. We’ve stocked the kitchen with absolutely everything you could ever need. We’ve also supplied beach chairs, beach umbrella, noodles, tennis rackets an
neighborhood_overview: Waikoloa Beach Resort is home to many condo communities and two large hotel resorts. Queen's and King's shops are home to a variety of shops and restaurants.
host_about: Aloha, my family and I spend our time between Alaska and Hawaii. I’m really enjoying hosting on Airbnb. My goal is to provide our guests with everything they need for their Hawaii vacation.

description:
Desirable location close by many beaches, a tropical oasis awaits you: Surrounded by birds in song, gardens, lime/papaya trees, lemongrass, oregano and an ocean view. Enjoy a nap in a hammock. Upgraded with a house water filtration system, fresh paint, new vinyl plank flooring, appliances and 2 spacious decks-good for dining, work, or yoga. Something for everyone. 10 minute walk to beach. Surfing, markets, and dining minutes away. Private, relaxing, easy environment. HI taxes additional.

The space
The space is clean and uncluttered, recently remodeled, and was designed with remote working guests in mind. Covered lanais to enjoy all day/night. Many functional kitchen amenities provided including a bbq outside. Great central location for whole island exploration. Safe, low key, friendly neighborhood. Fast speed wifi and utilities included. Three working spaces, hammock, and a streaming tv (no cable.) Great indoor/outdoor functional living space. Outdoor ho
neighborhood_overview:
This neighborhood is a great location for walking or running.
Off the street trail nearby - can walk to it from the property. Or walk down to the coastline for a sunset stroll. I recommend having a car while here for shopping, dining, exploring the island. So many beautiful things to see and enjoy!
host_about:
Fun, easy going, thoughtful, and in gratitude for all the wonderful people I have met along the way. These are some of my traits.
I have owned properties since 2000.  Hosting travelers is not new for me, and I understand from experience what most travelers need to feel comfortable and at home.  My home rental is stocked with starter sets of generally the following: bathroom soaps/shampoo & conditioner/laundry soaps/zip lock baggies/foil/herbs for cooking/disinfectant sprays.  I like to supply travelers with these items so that they can begin their vacation with ease. 5 things I can't live without: My family, my pets, my swim gear/ surfboard/running shoes, and KTA lilikoi malasadas!  I love movies and I collect them!  One of my favorite things to do is to run with my dog in the rain. * note: she is here only part time, very friendly, and gated separately from the rental accommodation. To have me as a host: You can expect to have your privacy, a disinfected accommodation, and my help or a referral should you need assistance.  Additionally, the accommodation for rent is solely for renters, and therefore it is not cluttered with my personal belongings.  Experience 5 Star cleanliness while also enjoying some coziness and amenities of home.  Referrals and recommendations to friends are important to me, and I would appreciate your review following your visit.
Mahalo!

description:
Beautiful modern open home located near Sunset Beach and V-land. Just a two minute walk to the beach with snorkel gear and beach chairs to get you going. Relax with A/C and Netflix available in the living room.

No charge for extra people (within max occupancy 6 adults & 2 children).

** Located in a quiet neighborhood. If you plan to have any loud music or parties at anytime, this will not be the home for you. **

The space
Enjoy the uncrowded beach across the street, eat at iconic Ted's Bakery just a 7 minute walk or unwind at the home watching Netflix on our 65" Tv.

Amenities include super fast Wi-Fi, outdoor shower, TV's in three rooms with two connected to Netflix, Air conditioning in the main living space, beach towels, washer and dryer, snorkel gear, beach toys and baby crib.

Maximum occupancy is 6 adults and 2 children/babies. There is no extra charge for having extra people within the max occupancy.

Candace,

description:
1600+ Sq Ft Deluxe Oceanview Residence, 3 Bedrooms, 3 Bathrooms, Sleeps 10, Ocean Views from Every Room

The space
Maui Resort Rentals is proud to offer another exceptional brand new listing from the Honua Kai family of resort residences on Kaanapali North Beach!

This exquisite three bedroom ocean view residence offers fantastic 5th floor views of the Pacific Ocean as well as the exotic tropical foliage of the interior Konea Tower courtyard. The views are abundant throughout and even continue into all 3 luxurious bedrooms. Get swept away into the lovely Maui sky after folding away the glass doors and allowing the interior to blend seamlessly with the outdoors.

This residence affords a perfect opportunity to gather, reconnect, and celebrate. There is ample room to accommodate up to 10 guests. Each of the two master bedrooms offers a sumptuous king-size bed and the guest bedroom is furnished with two queen size beds. For additional sleeping f
neighborhood_overview:

Enjoy quick easy access to fresh pool and beach towels on demand because this suite comes with access to Honua Kai's convenient in-lobby and poolside towel kiosks.

The Ohana (Family) at Maui Resort Rentals has been helping vacationers "Make Maui Reality" for over 50 cumulative years on the shores of West Maui.  Inspired by the Maui lifestyle, we aim to provide incredible vacation experiences at a curated collection of premier resort residences.

For your convenience, our warehouse and offices are located in Kaanapali North Beach, just minutes from all of the West Maui resorts.

Our Ritz-Carlton and Marriott trained staff are here to serve. Your guest experience is our highest priority. The privilege to host your precious Maui vacation is ours.

description:
Trifecta of locations! Quiet complex, view of Mt Haleakala, & close enough to walk to the beach, grocery & restaurants. Modern & comfortable!

Washer/Dryer in Kitchen.

Bedroom 1 has a flexible setup EITHER with 2 twin beds or 1 king bed. 2nd bedroom is a Queen Bed.

Portable A/C in each bedroom & living room & several fans.

GE/TA-188-625-9200-01

Other things to note
This is a quiet complex and several of our neighbors reside here full-time and work daytime hours. It is incredibly important to us that our guests agree to practice aloha and respect and adhere to the quiet hours of 10pm-8am and keep the doors closed during that time if need be. Mahalo for being great neighbors and avoiding any noise complaints that could include a fine!

390180020096, TA-188-625-9200-01

Short walk to the beach (6 minutes, door to sand!), restaurants and shopping!

**Construction in the lot next door as of Fall 2022 with noise permit hours of Mon-Fri 7a-6p, Sat 9a-5:30p. This can consist of back up beeps and other equipment noise. So far the start time and type of noise varies and if you are up with the sunshine and out and about, it's not an issue. If you need more quiet, closing the windows and turning on fans/AC will assist.
host_about:
We love the beauty of our mountains and the outdoor adventures we get to enjoy in Alaska.  But in the winter, we love to go to Maui to thaw out and relax. 

We rent out our place so others have a comfortable place to call home while on island enjoying the sights, sounds, smells and flavors of Maui.  We desire our guests to treat our place with extra good care, to respect our neighbors and the quiet of the complex.

We also love to find new restaurants.  Ask us for suggestions on Maui!

description:

Enjoy your stay in our newly remodeled ocean & mountain view condo with direct access to the beach. Enjoy BBQs in the backyard with lounge chairs. Jump in the pool or take a dip in the ocean without driving! Long walks on the beach will take you to Ma'alaea. Walking distance to a bakery, ABC store, and Uluani's Shave Ice, 30mins to Lahaina, 15mins to Wailea, and 15mins to Kahului.

The space
Enjoy your stay in our new and completely remodeled home located on the fifth floor with ocean and mountain views! Our fully equipped kitchen with NEW stainless steel appliances is the only open-concept kitchen in Nani Kai Hale and it includes dishes, glasses, utensils, cookware, bakeware, mixing bowls, knives, outdoor dishware...etc. The bedroom is equipped with a NEW Cal King mattress and 43in Smart TV. We also provide towels, shampoo, conditioner, soap, and ev
neighborhood_overview: Nani Kai Hale is located on the Sugar Beach.  Sugar Beach is the perfect place to enjoy the water or long walks all the way to Ma'alaea. North Kihei is centrally located.  Approximately 15 mins from Kahului/Airport, 15 mins from Wailea, 20 mins from Paia, 30 mins from Historic Lahaina. Walking distance to Ululani's Shave Ice, Sugar Beach Bakery and ABC store.

host_about:
Hi! We’re Evolve, the hospitality team that helps you rest easy when you rent a private, professionally cleaned home from us.

We promise your rental will be clean, safe, and true to what you saw on Airbnb or we'll make it right. Check-ins are always smooth, and we're here 24/7 to answer any questions or help you find the perfect property.

description:
Spacious newly remodeled immaculately clean 1,100 sq. ft. end unit Townhome. A very private remote quiet location away from crowded hotels and resorts. Your island getaway has an amazing view of Hanalei mountains. Close to secluded walking trail to capture the view of Bali Hai, Hanalei beach, and Puu Poa beach.

The space
3 bedrooms 2 full baths for 6 guests: (1 king, 1 queen, and 1 queen) with 1,100 sq. ft. of relaxing atmosphere Townhome, Beautiful foliage and mountain views from every window, a mile stroll to a secluded lush and green year round trail to capture the breathtaking views of Bali Hai, 5 minutes short drive to the town of Hanalei for surfing, SUP, kayaking, snorkeling, hiking, sun bathing, fishing, and many delicious restaurants from which to choose. Or just around the corner for fine dining, golfing, biking, and walking to enjoy the beautifully tropical landscape of Princeville neighborhoods.

Hello and ALOHA!
    I discovered Kauai over 30 years ago and have been celebrating my Birthday there almost every year. I always hoped that someday I could own a piece of this beautiful paradise. Kauai has always been my happy place.  I've finally made it happen and can't wait to share it with you.  I hope my place helps you to celebrate any special occasions and that you enjoy it as much as I have.
Thank you and MAHALO!

description:
You'll get amazing sunsets, ocean views, and privacy at our guest home! The street is quiet and lined with tropical plants. Birds and frogs singing make you feel like you're in a rainforest. Enjoy a full kitchen and free washer/dryer/parking. The bedroom has a comfy queen bed. In the living room there is a queen pull-out couch, a cute "bunk" bed, an armchair that folds into a bed, and a 55" TV. Occasional sounds from our family upstairs :) Magic Sands Beach: 6min, Kona Town: 9min, Airport: 20min

The space
Your parking spot is right in front of the house in the driveway. It is out of the way of the main driveway so you're never in the way of anyone! You have to walk up a short stairway to the level of the Ohana apartment.

Inside, you will walk right into the kitchen and dining room. The full kitchen will have everything you need to cook and prepare meals! There is a full fridge, stove/oven, dishwasher, microwave, coffee maker (with coffee bar and
neighborhood_overview: Tropical trees and plants line our quiet street. Enjoy a walk through the neighborhood and you can spot many different fruit trees. There is little traffic and no highway noise. You will hear song birds during the day and at nightfall it will turn into a chorus of rainforest animals. Our home sits at 750 feet above the ocean on the way up the volcano. You get some amazing views from up here of the oceans and sunsets. The temperature is usually a perfect 75 degrees up here with cool nights. You don't really need AC like you do down at lower elevations.
host_about: Our family moved to Hawaii in 2022.  We are easy-going and hands-off so you won't hear from us unless you need something then we are always right on it!

description:
This ocean view villa welcomes you with living room, open gourmet kitchen, lanai and master bath. A dishwasher, central air conditioning and laundry room add additional convenience and comfort.

The space
This elegantly-designed, air-conditioned villa offers a lanai with ocean views, gourmet kitchen and sleeping bliss in three bedrooms with flat screens. The master bath appeals with double sink vanity and walk-in shower. Also enjoy high-speed Internet, ceiling fans and laundry room. Amid 29-acres stretching along Waikoloa’s Beach Course and the Pacific, Hali`i Kai indulges with a cascading pool, restaurant and fitness cabana. Enjoy Waikoloa Resort’s ocean excursions, hiking trails, shopping, dining and beautiful sunsets.

A 3-night minimum is required for arrivals from January 3 - December 25. A 5-night minimum stay is required for arrivals from December 26 - January 2.

Other things to note
Daily $20.00 Resort Fee, plus taxes of 4
host_about:
Tempting at every turn, Halii Kai at Waikoloa Resort welcomes you to discover the beauty and bliss of the Big Island’s sunny Kohala Coast within the world-famous Waikoloa Resort. You’ll love the easy lifestyle in this exclusive resort community where the best days are spent doing nothing at all.

Our beautiful coastal location between Kailua-Kona and Waimea’s upcountry puts you in the heart of Hawaii Island’s exciting recreation. Whether you’re into golf and spas or sport fishing and sailing, you’ll find your passions fulfilled.

 - Tee off on Waikoloa’s King’s and Beach courses with special guest rate
 - Catch a morning snorkeling excursion from Kawaihae Harbor
 - Explore ancient rock art in the Anaehoomalu Petroglyph Field
 - Catch monthly “Movies Under The Stars” at Queens’ MarketPlace
 - Melt into a Hawaiian lomilomi massage in an ocean side cabana
 - Horseback ride through the pastures of Kahua Ranch

Halii Kai’s spacious two, and three bedroom vacation villas and town homes are thoughtfully designed so families and friends have the perfect mix of privacy and open living spaces.

 - Privacy for parents and children 
 - Separate rooms create private space to spread out and relax.
 - Fully equipped kitchens 
 - Access to a kitchen reduces stress, saves time and cuts costs.
 - In-room washers and dryers 
 - Save time, pack less, save on baggage fees and stay fresh.
 - All the comforts of home 
 - But with daily housekeeping and amazing views.

Castle Resorts & Hotels was founded in 1993 and is a wholly owned subsidiary of The Castle Group, Inc. Headquartered in Honolulu, Castle manages a broad portfolio of guest accommodations including value/economy hotels, full-service hotels and spacious all-suite condominium resorts and luxury villas in the Hawaiian Islands on Oahu, Maui, Molokai, Kauai and Hawaii, and in New Zealand on the North Shore of Auckland.

description:
Enjoy our home in Wilhelmina Rise, a quiet and breezy neighborhood nestled on a hillside in Kaimuki, Honolulu! Our house is an ideal retreat for visitors who want easy access to all that Oahu has to offer but without being inundated by the hustle and bustle of the city. In addition to being a brief drive away from most notable attractions, there are several great restaurants just 5 minutes away.

3rd bedroom is set up as an office; can convert to bedroom with a twin mattress.

29-night minimum.

The space
Our house has an old school, minimalist style and is nestled in the end of a quiet cul-de-sac. We have very comfortable beds and a bright living room with a couch, chairs, and a TV. There is a full kitchen with appliances, and a dining table. Our backyard has two large mango trees, pleasant greenery, and an outdoor shower. There is a washer and dryer out back. Two private parking spots in the front.

The beds will be made with fresh
neighborhood_overview: Wilhelmina Rise is one Honolulu's hillside neighborhoods that has great views of the ocean, Diamond Head, Kahala, and most of Honolulu.
host_about: From Hawaii, currently living in New York. I'm a friendly and respectful guy who enjoys using technology to produce music and art.  I leave every place I rent in great shape, and I am respectful of neighbors and rules.

description:
Awesome Kauai beach resort hotel room with few beautiful ocean front pools, and most yummy restaurant at the resort. My room also has upgraded hardwood floors and a standard size refrigerator and will guarantee to save you some money on either water, snack, salads, and some left-over lunch or dinner.
Beautiful resort and the beach and the wave and the sunset, sunshine will be guaranteed to make your day smooth and relaxed.
Easy check in at front desk.

The space
Save a bunch of money by booking my place (as a private owner) instead of going through the resort directly. My suite in the main building is a convenient location to access to lobby and the restaurants. It gives easy access to the front desk, restaurants, elevator, and parking. The room size is 307 square feet, and the balcony is 58 square feet.

King bed sleeps 2 adults, and chaise lounge is good for a child about 5-10 years old.

host_about: I am a chinese girl from Malaysia..love to travel and find good deals and having fun.

description:
Aloha **** For those displaced by the wildfires and first responders, please message us directly for a local rate. **** Mahalo

Aloha, if you are looking for the perfect place to call home in Maui, you just found it! Located on 5 acres of lush tropical grounds, with open grassy spaces and private walk paths, one of the only heated pools on Maui, private tennis courts, bocci ball court, ping pong, and the ocean directly across the street, Koa Resort is a private oasis in central Kihei.

The space
Come stay in Maui, in your own private get-a-way!

At over 1,000 sq ft with vaulted ceilings, our owner-managed (no dealing with unresponsive property managers), 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom family friendly beach condo feels more like a home than a condo. Our condo is on the second level, up a single flight of stairs.

Hale Alohilani's extremely spacious floorplan offers a comfortable and relaxing space for you to call home on Maui. Look across th
neighborhood_overview: Kihei is located on the island of Maui, full of amazing natural wonders, including the Hale'akala National Park and the Wai'anapana Black Sand Beach. Enjoy the local beach of the Koa Resort, or head out to adventure around the island. In Kihei, enjoy the local Hawaiian cuisine at the world-class restaurants or partake in the local "food truck" culture behind Azeka Plaza.
host_about: Aloha, I am your host, Lily! I look forward to hosting you at our condo in Kihei, Hawaii.  We love to welcome guests to enjoy the beauty and culture of Maui and the islands. We hope you enjoy your visit to our condo and island. Mahalo! Lily

description:
Sip a cup of tea out on the spacious lanai and look out over the secluded courtyard in the shade of a towering Banyan tree. The serene feel of this small, tranquil complex is reflected in the neutral tones and ocean-inspired art at this cool condo.

When you book with me I am available to answer any questions or concerns you may have and happy to help you with ideas to prepare before you arrive to maximize your stay.

The space
This is a 5 star quality ground floor one bedroom condo comparable to any Wailea resort hotel room, with homestyle amenities, custom furniture and finishings at a fraction of the cost.

Kihei Garden Estates is my 2nd home and I spared no expense making it a very unique island/beach style condo: Hues of soft white walls and ceiling, soft grey porcelain wood grain tile floors, sea foam green/blue custom cabinets with calcutta quartz countertops.

The bedroom is furnished with a hotel grade Queen size mattress (pr
neighborhood_overview: Kihei Garden Estates is in the central area of Kihei. The complex is very close to grocery stores, restaurants, Kamaole beaches, and golf courses, with Maui Nui straight up the hill and Wailea golf courses a 10-minute drive away.
host_about:
Born and raised in Alaska I work on the waterfront during the summer. During the winter I travel for business and pleasure. My family and I started up a non-profit in memory of my son Taylar - Taylar Young Memorial Foundation - that supports the first ever baseball park built at a HS in Alaska, youth baseball and provides 3 scholarships for student/athletes.

Recently purchased 1-bedroom condo in Kihei, Maui. I love Hawaii have been coming here for over 40 years and without a doubt one of my favorite destination places.

When I travel I appreciate enjoying life by getting out to explore by doing a walk about for an afternoon or all day. Find those little places most don't know unless they know somebody that knows somebody!

Vacation activities: live sporting events, concerts, golf, walking/running, pool/beach, skiing, great food and even better wine or fine rum.

Destinations (In the know): Seattle, Portland, San Francisco, So California, Vegas, Phoenix, Chicago, NYC, Boston, Washington DC, Charlotte, Hilton Head, Dallas, Tuscaloosa, Nashville, Atlanta, Miami, Orlando, Hawaii, Vancouver/Whistler, Cabo, Cancun, Puerto Vallerta, Reykjavik, London, Paris, Florence, Venice, Casablanca, Tamarindo/Papagayo, Panama.

Destinations (To come): Colorado, Toronto/Montreal, Germany, Austria, Scotland, Australia, South Africa, French Polynesia.

description:
The space
Hale Kamaole 136

Hale Kamaole is a South Maui condominium complex located across the street from Kamaole Beach Park III, one of the most popular, family-friendly, and lifeguarded beaches on Maui. Enjoy spectacular sunsets from your private lanai or head to the beach for a romantic evening stroll along the shoreline under a canopy of starlight. These spacious rentals, set in beautifully landscaped grounds, are an ideal setting for a relaxing sun-soaked vacation. Catch some rays next to one of two pools on the property, choose to play some tennis at the on-site tennis court, or toss a Frisbee around on the sprawling grass lawns. All condos also have free WiFi access. The outdoor barbeque areas are a must for grilling the perfect dinner, and you'll love indulging in a night out at a large selection of nearby restaurants in Kihei or Wailea. Also choose to shop at a variety of stores located along South Kihei Rd or at the boutiques showcased at the Shops at
host_about:
Vacasa unlocks the possibilities of how we enjoy vacation homes. We take care of managing our homeowners’ vacation houses so they can have peace of mind (and their home when they want to). And our guests book vacations confidently knowing they’re going to find exactly what they’re looking for without any surprises.

Each vacation home is always cared for by our professional local teams who implement our high cleanliness and maintenance values, while the hands-off tasks of vacation rental management--marketing, filing taxes, and maintaining a website--are handled by a specialized central support team. Our passion and focus remains true: to empower our homeowners, guests, and employees to invest in vacation.

description:
Deluxe Ocean and Diamond Head View Waikiki Condo, Free parking & Wifi

Relax in this high level deluxe ocean view condo suite only one block from world-famous Waikiki Beach. has a kitchen and bathroom that feature granite counter tops, modern cabinetry, and stainless fixtures. From the lanai (balcony) there is a stunning view of the ocean as well as Diamond Head. You also have the opportunity of checking out the activities on the recreation deck before leaving your room.

The space

Enjoy a fully-equipped kitchen and comfortable seating in the living room. Kitchen includes refrigerator, range, microwave, rice maker, coffee maker, and other kitchen wares. Plus, this unit has a dishwasher because, after all, you are on vacation! There is an island with seating for four people.

The unit is carpeted throughout all living areas. Convenient
host_about:
Hosted by RedAwning Vacation Rentals

Welcome to RedAwning, a whole new way to travel. We make staying in a unique home or apartment easier than staying at a hotel. By partnering with local homeowners throughout North America, we provide you with the largest collection of vacation homes in the most destinations. Every stay includes our experienced 24/7 customer assistance by text, chat, email and phone, and access to all your travel details via our free mobile app. We offer consistent terms and flexible cancellation policies, and we include accidental damage protection for every stay with no security deposits and a best rate guarantee. Wherever you want to go, RedAwning is here to make your journey easier!

Built on a hillside, these contemporary two-story Mediterranean style condos offer superior accommodations at the entrance to famed Wailea. You can seek out an adventure by hiking or biking at the nearby trails. host_about:
The Outrigger Way

Developed in 1993 with Hawaiian scholar and historian Dr. George Kanahele, the Ke 'Ano Wa'a process was designed to advance the company's corporate culture and fundamental business strategies. The values-based process intricately connected three core elements of the hospitality industry:

HOST + GUEST + PLACE

It also deepened Outrigger's understanding and appreciation of the local host culture, a distinct hospitality style that is recognized across the globe.

host_about:
Aloha, I have lived in Hawaii for over 11 years, mostly in Puna on Big Island, but moved to O’ahu in March, 2021. I love hosting people from around the world that come to check out the most active volcano on the planet or the Playground of the Pacific, aka, Honolulu. I work full time as a carpenter and realtor. I actively study German and Japanese and love languages. I have enjoyed playing the piano and singing since I was very young. I was a massage therapist for 10 years, and a farmer. I have a strong interest in architecture and agriculture, utility systems, business and engineering. Looking forward to traveling and myself getting massages for a change! I hunger for knowledge, experience and truth.

description:
Hale Honu is my home and furnished with the world traveler in mind for a relaxing stay. If you are searching for quiet with few nearby neighbors and the sound of tropical palms blowing in the tradewinds, you have found your authentic Hawaiian retreat. 840 sf house with vaulted ceiling and mature landscaping.

The space
A captivating garden with some edibles and great south views toward the ocean mean you may have trouble leaving the lanai (porch). The property is a sanctuary for relaxation and rejuvenation with a 2 person soaking tub. The location is central to the Puna coast with easy access to seeing the 2017 lava flow and fissures, a nearby black sand beach, and local Hawaiian culture. Highway 137 is open up to and including Isaac Hale State Park with its warm ponds for soaking and the opened Highway 132 allows you to view the vast lava river from 2017.

Guest access
Hale Honu is located about 20 minutes by car from Pahoa with its excellen
neighborhood_overview: Said to be one of the most beautiful coastal roads in all of Hawaii, Seaview sits in the middle of this 14 mile stretch of Highway 137, locally known as 'The Red Road'. This lush, coastal road is punctuated with stunning shoreline views and numerous fishing spots. A variety of folks live in Seaview Estates including a diversity of lifestyles--queer, retirees, transplants, artists, families and also some folks who are quite poor. The community association maintains three parks for your enjoyment and one includes a covered picnic area as well as volleyball court and tetherball. The seaview park is popular for its view, and Sunday music and drum jams. There are also yoga classes offered down the street by excellent teachers.
host_about: I live on the Big Island in Puna after living in Oakland for 30 years. My home is the kind of place I most enjoy when traveling myself: cozy, comfortable, clean and casual. I want to help my guests experience the aloha spirit that is so abundant here in the people and land of Pele, the revered goddess of fire, lava and perpetual change.

description:

Secure property, fully fenced with dual automated gates, circular driveway with ample free parking at the bottom of the front steps. Open floor plan with views, only 5 minutes from the ocean with room for everyone. Fully stocked kitchen, spacious outdoor area with large hot tub, and centrally located in the middle of all East side adventures.

The space

Hand built, stonewall along the front of the property with an electric gate (code provided in check-in details of your reservation) and fully fenced. A circular driveway large enough for up to four vehicles with a large, grassy and very tropical center for the kids to play and even pick some fruit. Ask us what is fruiting! Our covered l
neighborhood_overview: Welcome to Hawaiian Paradise Park, one of the largest subdivisions in the country with almost 9,000 one acre properties and also one of the fastest growing areas on island. You’ll enjoy a peaceful, safe, and quiet neighborhood with privacy and a great tropical environment. We have our own grocery stores, churches, convenient stores, gas stations, fire department and more right here in our private subdivision. Friendly neighbors that enjoy morning walks and talking story. Only 10 blocks from the ocean cliffs and several different hiking trails. 45 minutes to Volcano Village which has a fun Thursday evening night market, 30 minutes to the hot pods (Isaac Hale Park), Kalapana, MacKenzie State Park, Kehena Beach (can be nude), the famous Sunday afternoon market and music circle in SeaView on the lawn, 20 minutes to Hilo, Carl Smith Beach (great for snorkeling), Richardsons Beach and tide pools, Onekahakaha (super safe keiki beach with retaining wall and white sand), Volcano National Park a
host_about: Hi! We are Levi & Shakti. We're pretty easy going and down to earth. Always up for an adventure and exploring new areas. We hope you enjoy the space we've made for you! Aloha,

My husband, Woody, and I have been living and working on Maui for over 10 years now and we love to be able to share the Aloha spirit. 
We lived in many places both in the US and Europe and feel more at home here than anywhere else.
It is a privilege to be able to share the unique island culture with our guests.

Both my husband and I enjoy traveling which we do extensively and we never get tired to explore new places, cultures, food and people.

The space

1. Oceanview. Enjoy a full wall of windows that directly faces the ocean, lagoon, and Waikiki beach.

2. Spacious lanai. There is a large balcony facing the ocean where you can relax on outdoor furniture and enjoy the ocean waves.

3. Comfy beds. You'll have a king bed with a very comfortable mattress (trust me!) and second queen sofa bed if you're sharing the room.

4. Full kitchen. Refrigerator, sto
neighborhood_overview: Waikiki is one of Hawaii's most iconic destinations. It's a vibrant neighborhood in Honolulu that is best known for its popular surf beach. The long white sand beach and turquoise blue water is paradise for surfing, swimming, and snorkeling. Waikiki is full of designer shops, restaurants, and cocktail bars. Our condo is located on the quieter northwest end of Waikiki and is a quick walk to Kalākaua Avenue. Waikiki is safe, walkable, and a great basecamp for exploring Oahu.
host_about: From Wisconsin/Minnesota. Working in tech. Traveler. Movie-goer. Avid reader. Long-distance runner. Full-time dreamer. Stay hungry, stay foolish.

Tastefully furnished, this unit makes for a wonderful short-term vacation rental. The kitchen includes top-of-the-line GE Profile appliances, granite countertops, and cherry cabinets. The bathroom includes a vessel onyx sink and a walk-in marble shower with multi-shower heads. It also includes Toto Washlet with a heated water bidet. Crystal chandeliers in the dining area and bathroom. Blue LED lights under cabinets illuminate the marble flooring in the kitchen and bathroom creating an innovative mood lighting. An in-room safe is provided. The living room has a Samsung 55-inch LED TV with Bose music system and Blu-ray. Additional TV in bedroom.

host_about:
Kona Coast Vacations hosts over 5,400 reservations a year with the help of knowledgeable management, proficient team members and trusted home owners. Open 7 days a week, we strive to help with each visitors’ every need. Sharing Aloha from the first contact whether it is phone or email, we are here to assist by making the booking process as seamless as can be. We pride ourselves on providing hands on assistance whenever it is needed, whether it is reservation details, maintenance issues, or even booking activities! 

Kona Coast Vacations is fortunate to team up with great property owners which is instrumental in providing exceptional homes for our new and returning guests. With over 240 vacation rentals from oceanfront homes, ocean view condos and private estates, we are here for your every need, open seven days a week to take care of our guests and owners. With two locations in Kailua Kona and Mauna Lani we have dedicated specialists in guest services managing reservations, maintenance, and property checks alongside our accounting, support and marketing specialists. We are proud to be Airbnb members since 2001 and now are Superhosts with over 1070 reviews.
We hope to host you Hawaii and help create a memory to last you a lifetime. We are your “’Ohana” (family) on the Big Island of Hawaii, please do not hesitate to utilize our listed resources and book activities thru Kona Concierge.

description:
Kanaloa at Kona by Outrigger is situated on 16 acres of a secluded oceanfront lava flow overlooking beautiful Keauhou bay. Kona sunsets are enjoyed right from your oceanfront coastline. Tropical gardens and lush flower filled landscape, embraces the serenity of Kanaloa at Kona by Outrigger. These spacious, breeze cooled condos are perfectly suited for the warm, sunny climate of the Kona coast.

The space
• Full kitchen features stovetop, oven, refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, coffeemaker, blender, disposal, cookware and tableware
• Private balcony with wet bar
• Master bedroom with 1 king bed or 1 queen bed and private bathroom with tub/shower
• Guest bedroom with 2 twin beds
• Queen sofa bed in living area
• Guest bathroom with tub/shower

neighborhood_overview:
Deep seafishing is a must in this town, therefore, the catch of the day might be your special in one of the Pacific Rim restaurants nearby.

On-site tennis courts, swimming pools, and table tennis are just some of the ways to relax. For your shopping convenience, Keauhou Shopping Center is located just a few minutes away and a few miles to the historic village of Kailua-Kona with many historic sites from Hulihee Palace to Kealakekua Bay. Make Kanaloa at Kona by Outrigger your next escape for a relaxing and adventure filled vacation.
host_about:
The Outrigger Way

Developed in 1993 with Hawaiian scholar and historian Dr. George Kanahele, the Ke 'Ano Wa'a process was designed to advance the company's corporate culture and fundamental business strategies. The values-based process intricately connected three core elements of the hospitality industry:

HOST + GUEST + PLACE

It also deepened Outrigger's understanding and appreciation of the local host culture, a distinct hospitality style that is recognized across the globe.

Enjoy world-class shopping, dining, and nightlife at the International Marketplace, stroll the beachfront of Waikiki for surf lessons and sunset watching, or take in a hike at the nearby Diamond Head for an overview of Honolulu’s magnificent coastline. Whatever adventure abound, the location and the value at Aqua Aloha Surf Waikiki are unmatched.

Waikiki has been home now for over 18 years and we love it!   

The ocean, Waikiki Beach and beautiful parks make for a lovely lifestyle.   And in the evening it is just easy to stroll around and pick up local food around the corner. 

Located only five minutes from the surf, we enjoy the outdoor life Hawaii has to offer.  As well, we are very lucky in that there is always a place to go to in Waikiki whether it is casual food or fancy dining, and no shortage of nightlife. 

An opportunity came along so we picked up a second unit in this prime location.   The AirBnb experience has been a great one and has enabled us to meet so many interesting people and make so many new friends.

Located in Napili point, Napili beach is just moments walk, and the property is tucked away in an amazing
neighborhood_overview: Napili Bay is a classical crescent-shaped bay with a sandy beach, located at the northwest "corner" of Maui. The bay is quite secluded and still preserved with the natural beauty and charm of a tropical beach. Napili Bay is "old school" Hawaii; at the oceanside, one doesn't see high rises, strip malls, or tour vans. Both Napili and Kapalua seem removed from the bustle of other parts of Maui--serene and low key.

description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space. Our Ohana is just 1 mile up from town. Perfect oasis for a couple looking for a break from the hustle & bustle! Located just minutes away from beautiful beaches, restaurants and shopping.
Tucked away in a friendly, family neighborhood in a small cul-de-sac with a beautiful view of Mount Hualalai!.

The space
The space is a private Ohana studio attached to our main home. It has a private entrance. The Ohana is equipped with AC, a stereo, WIFI, smart TV, cooking and eating utensils, 2 burner stove, microwave, coffee, coffee grinder, food storage containers, convection toaster oven and refrigerator/ freezer. There is also a serving of complimentary coffee, tea and sugar.

I have a built in water filter system for healthy drinking water.

There is free onsite parking available for guests renting from us and a shared laundry room.

We provide sheets, towels, toilet paper, shampoo,

host_about: I am a full time resident of Hawaii with my primary residence located on the property. I am available to you throughout your stay. I have lived in the Islands for 20 years; I can make solid recommendations and offer suggestions for exploring, relaxing, and anything in between!

description:
A classic single-story, semi-renovated, beach cottage just steps from your own, private sandy beach. A real chance to experience an authentic Hawaiian getaway, in an old sugar plantation neighborhood away from the tourist mobs of Waikiki. We're on the south shore of Oahu, about 30 minutes west of downtown Honolulu & Waikiki.

The space
Tucked away from the tourist traps of Waikiki, our West Oahu abode is a renovated plantation-style home with several modern updates.

-On a private/gated lane with key code access
-Exclusive access to a secluded beachfront, no tourists in sight!
-A revitalizing beach all to yourself, for sunrise and sunset.

Our property is a hidden gem that brings back the raw aloha spirit, local style living on the west side that no hotel/resort can replicate. If you are searching for a touristy, resort experience or are not comfortable with the true essence local style living, we ask that you kindly not book with us.
neighborhood_overview: A historic plantation neighborhood representative of "Old Hawaii". Many young families, seniors and military residents now inhabit the neighborhoods where sugarcane crops once were.
host_about: Born in Hawaii and grew up in Northern California. I’m based in Hawaii now and  I love traveling, especially with my family.  I am a mom to a toddler. I love trying new restaurants, being in nature, and meeting people!

host_about:
Kona Coast Vacations hosts over 5,400 reservations a year with the help of knowledgeable management, proficient team members and trusted home owners. Open 7 days a week, we strive to help with each visitors’ every need. Sharing Aloha from the first contact whether it is phone or email, we are here to assist by making the booking process as seamless as can be. We pride ourselves on providing hands on assistance whenever it is needed, whether it is reservation details, maintenance issues, or even booking activities! 

Kona Coast Vacations is fortunate to team up with great property owners which is instrumental in providing exceptional homes for our new and returning guests. With over 240 vacation rentals from oceanfront homes, ocean view condos and private estates, we are here for your every need, open seven days a week to take care of our guests and owners. With two locations in Kailua Kona and Mauna Lani we have dedicated specialists in guest services managing reservations, maintenance, and property checks alongside our accounting, support and marketing specialists. We are proud to be Airbnb members since 2001 and now are Superhosts with over 1070 reviews.
We hope to host you Hawaii and help create a memory to last you a lifetime. We are your “’Ohana” (family) on the Big Island of Hawaii, please do not hesitate to utilize our listed resources and book activities thru Kona Concierge.

The beaches in Waikiki are just a short walk away (just 3-5 minutes) and shopping, restaurants and entertainment venues in Waikiki are all easily accessible.

Great shopping at the International Marketplace is right down the street and of course, all the beauty of Hawaii! Surf, hike or stroll along the ocean - it's all just steps away. Captain Cook Resorts proudly manages over 170 privately-owned vacation rentals in Waikiki (a district of Honolulu on the island of Oahu). We appreciate that you're on vacation, and we ask that you let us know if there's anything we can do to make this visit stand out as one of your best!

ALL CAPTAIN COOK RESORTS RENTALS INCLUDE:
– Bath towels, Beach towels, Bed linens
– Dishes, Silverware, Cookware (including tea kettle & rice cooker)
