– Start-Up Supplies: coffee filters, laundry detergent, dish soap, dishwasher soap, bar soap, paper towels, toilet paper, tissue, basic cleaning supplies, and travel size (2 oz.) shampoo, conditioner, body wash, body lotion
– NOT PROVIDED: beach umbrellas, beach toys, aluminum foil, Ziploc bags, coffee, condiments/seasonings, cooking oil, fabric softener, or bleach. This private vacation rental does NOT include resort services such as daily housekeeping, replenishment of towels or toiletry supplies, or hotel front desk services.

Please let us know if you have any questions!

Mahalo!

description:

The two bedroom, one bath condo offers a private lanai for outdoor seating and a full kitchen to prepare fresh foods that can be picked up from the local farmers market daily. Come and enjoy scenery that will take your breathe away!

The space
This is the perfect unit to have as a touching in point between adventures. There is a sectional sofa, bar dining, outdoor seating, and appliances to offer you the comfort of home. The unit has gas stove top and oven and microwave. The unit does not have a dishwasher. Washer and Dryer are on site, however not in the unit itself and are coin or app perated. The two bedroom unit is equipped with one AC unit in the main living area and bedroom ceiling and stand

The unit lies close to the complex entrance, located on the famous Aliʻi Drive, creating a convenient place to call home.

Aloha,

We are excited to share our condo with those looking for an authentic Hawaiʻi experience that is environmentally aware, culturally curious and respectful of the beauty that  Hawaiʻi has to offer. Avid surfers, food enthusiasts, and deeply rooted in respect for the land and all persons and cultures; we welcome you to The Big Island of Hawaiʻi. Please feel free to reach out to us with questions and over the course of your stay.

Other homey comforts include a washer/dryer, air conditioning, DVD, WiFi and ceiling fans. Sleeps 4 in 1 Queen & 1 Sofa bed.

On 15 tropical acres across from Kamaole Beach Park III, our suites feature full kitchens and washers/dryers. Stay active with tennis courts, swimming pool, jet spas, barbecue grills and weekly Mai Tai party.

host_about:
Vacationing in Maui doesn’t get better than Kamaole Sands, a condo resort built on 15 acres of gardens, waterfalls, and ponds. Live like you’ve always wanted to in an individually furnished condominium suite directly across from Kihei’s popular Kamaole Beach Park III. Defined by its laid-back vibe and tropical beauty, South Maui is a true Hawaiian paradise.

Our dreamy Kihei location near Wailea Resort and Makena Resort puts you in the midst of golf, spas and ocean recreation.

- Learn to surf at Kamaole Beach Park III
- Tee off at Maui Nui or Wailea golf clubs
- Stay on trend at The Shops at Wailea
- Snorkel amid the pristine waters of La Perouse Bay
- Indulge in spa treatments at Wailea Resort
- Sample craft brews at Maui Brewing Company

The best plan for your day is often no plan at all. Maybe you’ll start your morning with a swim in the Pacific or in our pool. You might mingle amid traveling kindred spirits at your resort’s Wednesday Mai Tai Party, and then grill a fresh catch with your new friends at the property’s public barbecue area. Or step out for a sunset dinner at one of Kihei’s fantastic cafes or bistros. Need to stay connected? We offer complimentary WiFi in the lobby, pool area, and all rooms.

Since 1993, Castle Resorts & Hotels has specialized in innovative hotel and resort management. We manage properties throughout the Hawaiian Islands, including Kauai, Oahu, Maui, Molokai, and Hawaii Island, as well as Auckland, New Zealand. Accommodations range from full-service hotels to resort condominiums and combines value, convenience, and authentic experiences.

The villa also offers a range of amenities for guests to enjoy, including a pool, hot tub, and barbecue area. And with its convenient location near downtown, you'll be just minutes away from shops, restaurant

host_about:
My name is Tiare Dutcher (RB-22030).  My main profile picture shows the Tiare Tahiti, a flower also called the Tahitian Gardenia.  It smells great...   One of my favorite flowers

I'm an artist with an MFA from the University of Hawai`i, but I became a real estate broker in order to support my disabled husband of 60 years, who passed away in July 2022.

I manage thirteen one bedroom condos in the Waikiki Skytower (three short blocks from the beach), one two bedroom, two bath condo in the Fairway Villa,just three blocks from Waikiki beach and one block to the International Marketplace, and one legal vacation rental studio at the Waikiki Grand Hotel, just a half block from the beach. I own a small real estate company, DW Realty LLC (RB-22573), located at 1123 11th Avenue #403, Honolulu, HI 96816, so if you want to buy something here on Oahu, I can help with that too.  My son is also a real estate broker and property manager, and we have helped a lot of people find their special place.  

My son and I both love helping people find a great place to stay on their vacation.

I love living in Hawai`i, and I live in Waikiki, so I'm close to the rentals I manage.  I'm almost always  available...

For three years, in the 1960s, before GPS, my husband and I sailed around the South Pacific on our 38' sailboat--no kids then, just our cat.  Finally, we came to Hawai`i, and we have pretty much been here ever since.  Both our kids were born here.  All of us are Hawaiians at heart.

description:
Your Hawaiian home-away-from-home awaits, nestled into a quiet, private cul-de-sac with fabulous mountain views, surrounded by Princeville’s stately Norfolk pines. Complete with three bedrooms and three bathrooms, this beautifully updated north shore Kauai vacation rental home provides walkable access to beaches, golf, restaurants, shopping, and a grocery store.

The space
The great room at Kaiana Villa features an airy-but-cozy living area and a dining area for six, both of which flow into a clean and bright kitchen with stainless steel appliances, a farm sink, and a large island with bar seating. Ideal as a gathering place for your group, the space also includes a charming breakfast nook with tropical garden views. The living area opens to a covered lanai, another perfect spot for a leisurely breakfast in paradise.


Each peaceful, comfortable bedroom at Kaiana Villa has split air conditioning, high ceilings, and its own gorgeous, modern full bath

host_about:
The complex is located directly across from Kamaole III State Beach Park, which is known as one of the most beautiful and safest beaches in the Islands.  It is perfect for swimming, snorkeling, sunning, jogging, picnicking, kite flying, and especially enjoying amazing sunsets and whale watching.

Each unit has a private lanai that faces the interior of the complex, offering views of the expansive lawns, pools, and lush tropical landscape of palm trees, hibiscus, birds of paradise and plumeria trees.  Most lanais also offer views of the beautiful Pacific Ocean and spectacular sunsets.  

There are two pools, a covered pavilion, and a full size tennis court on the property.  Every evening the outdoor barbecue area is a popular spot to socialize while grilling the perfect dinner and watching as the Hale Kamaole conch shell band performs their nightly sunset ritual.

You will find world class golf courses, fantastic snorkeling and diving, many Maui activities, abundant shopping and delicious fine and family dining all within minutes of Hale Kamaole.

description:
Located on Maui’s western shore just minutes from downtown Lahaina. Relax in the pool, set among lush landscape and calming waterfalls, or sip your morning coffee at the on-site open-air café. With an on-site restaurant and convenience store, you’ll have everything you need to make the most of your Maui vacation. Enjoy either ocean or mountain views from your private balcony, and reconnect with your loved ones in the spacious accommodations.

The space
Discover comfort in our beautifully appointed accommodations featuring a king size bed, sofa bed with Tempurpedic mattress, and full bathroom complete with garden bath and walk-in shower. Enjoy the convenience of the partial kitchen equipped with a refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher and coffee maker among many other modern appliances. Additional in-room amenities include internet, cable television, DVD/Blu-ray player, telephone and a balcony/lanai.

Accommodation Details
• Maximum Occupancy: 4
host_about: We are a family owned property management business that love to travel!

If needed, we can place a queen air bed and twin air bed in the living room/house.

You will get to enjoy the outdoor dining space and rocking chairs on the lanai (aka porch). Plus: there is a fire pit with chairs all included in the fenced in yard.

neighborhood_overview:
Kihei Resort is located in central Kihei, just across the street from the beautiful Keaka beach, and next to Kalepolepo beach park and historic fish pond (great for watching turtles sunbathing on the rocks). You could see whales play in the distance - peak season typically runs between mid-January and March.

The 64-unit complex sits on just over 2 acres, comprised of 5 two-story buildings. The complex is designed in the shape of rectangle bordering S Kihei Road. Beautifully landscaped and meticulously maintained lush gardens courtyard area gives you a true tropical Hawaiian experience. The unit is set away from the road making it especially quiet. For those that enjoy beach walks, the nearly 4 mile long Sugar beach is a short walk north of the complex.

The complex is located in a great location to take advantage of what Kihei has to offer as dining, shopping, and entertainment are minutes down the road.
host_about: Our family loves hosting guests in our recently acquired island getaway. We hope you will enjoy our island home as much as we do!

description:
Relax and recharge in a tropical modern bungalow set on a 5 acre avocado farm. Our central location is the perfect home base to explore the Big Island. Close to four beaches and some of the best snorkeling spots on the island and only an hour from the active volcano! Watch the sun set over the ocean from your lanai with expansive views of the Kona coast. Leave the crowds behind, and experience the real Hawaii.

The space
This listing is for the BUNGALOW + GUESTHOUSE (4 BR / 2 bath). The bungalow has 3 bedrooms and 1 full bath, and the detached guesthouse is a few steps away with a fourth bedroom and a second full bath. If you would like to rent the BUNGALOW ONLY (3 BR / 1 bath), see our other listing.

This historic 1920s home was once owned by the Mayor of Hawaii and has been newly renovated to offer modern amenities with classic Hawaiian charm. The layout provides plenty of room for family or couples. The bungalow has 3 bedrooms and 1 full bath, a
neighborhood_overview: Close to 4 beaches & the best snorkeling: Pebble Beach (5 min), Ho'okena Beach (15 min), City of Refuge/Two Step (18 min), Kealakekua Bay (25 min) , Downtown Kona (45 min), Green Sands beach & Black Sands Beach (60 min), Hawaii Volcanoes National Park (70 min). Cute local restaurants/cafes are minutes away, and grocery stores, post office, gas, hardware store are all within a 15 min drive in Captain Cook.   We are 1 hour drive from the Kona (KOA) Airport and 2 hour drive from the Hilo (ITO) airport.

neighborhood_overview: Kulalani is a wonderful gated community with a 2 acre recreation complex including a quiet adult lap pool and a large family pool along with a fitness center and 2 spa hot tub pools.  Also enjoy free access to the private Mauna Lani Beach club.

From the initial three homes to now over forty (40) homes all equipped to the same high standards they have never lost their attention to detail.     While they have added team members they remain directly involved with each and every guest.    They treat every guest like their trip to Hawaii is their life long dream fulfilled.   They love being part of helping families create amazing memories.  Come try the Paradise in Hawaii experience!

description:

The beach width may vary with tide conditions and season. Just within walking distance is also Pohaku Beach, a wonderful sandy beach! The resort features a heated pool and BBQ area and there are no resort or parking fees.

The space

description:

The space
** Enjoy peace of mind staying here with enhanced cleaning and disinfecting protocols. PRIVATE ENTRANCE (no shared door handle) along with OPEN AIR OUTDOOR WALKWAY to your condo.**

Centrally located in the heart of Kaanapali at the Maui Eldorado. Enjoy this spacious and chic Hawaiian decor surrounding this one bedroom, one bathroom suite. Hawaiian hip elegance surrounds this beautifully decorated condo. Tile flooring, gourmet kitchen, granite counter tops, Koa wood cabinets, deluxe marble shower and bathroom. Comfortable lanai furniture. Alfresco outdoor dining on glass table.Total style, excellence and first class comfort! BONUS: New glass sliding doors! Tastefully decorated indeed. Enjoy walk t
neighborhood_overview:
The condo is located in the heart of Kaanapali beach resort area framed by Kaanapali Golf Course, flowering plumeria trees and palm trees. Next door starts the ocean boardwalk – enjoy sunset walks or morning strolls along the boardwalk. Enjoy a short walk (12 mins) to Whaler’s Village shops, restaurants and major hotels from the Hyatt to Sheraton. The Kaanapali Trolley stops by our hotel and services the major hotels in the Kaanapali Beach Resort area.
Walk to Kaanapali Beach or our exclusive beachfront clubhouse with full kitchen, 2 outdoor showers, beach towels, chairs, recliners and ice machine. Or if you don’t want to walk to Kaanapali beach, enjoy a courtesy golf cart ride to from Front Desk to beachfront clubhouse, getting to beach never got easier or quicker – how easy is that!
Grocery store is a few miles either direction from the resort. Downtown Lahaina is a 5 minute drive heading east and Kapalua is 10 minute drive heading west.
host_about:
Raising the Standards at the Maui Eldorado for Over 20 Years

We're world travelers who first visited Maui over 20 years ago and have been in love with this special island ever since. As hospitality specialists, we have international experience at top hotels and restaurants in Asia. Beginning as condo owners at the Maui Eldorado, we were the first company to raise the standards, invest in quality, and begin upgrading condos. Since then, we’ve grown naturally to suit the needs of our owners and our guests. 

Pride in Everything We Do

From our background in food services, where we’ve won numerous awards, we know how to take care of our guests. We take pride in everything we do. Kaanapali Beach, and the west side of Maui, holds a special place in our hearts and we look forward to sharing our passion with you. 

Personal Guest Service - From Beginning to End
Based on-island, right in West Maui, we offer complete customer service throughout your Hawaiian vacation. From the moment you begin planning your trip to the time you leave, we’re here to help. We’ll be sure you find the perfect condo for your group and connect you with Maui’s top activities and attractions. 

Offering  privately-owned studios,  1 and 2 bedrooms at the Maui Eldorado Resort located on Kaanapali beach surrounded by Kaanapali golf course. Exclusive beachfront clubhouse with full kitchen on the beach!

As a host, customer satisfaction is our #1 priority, as we know you have choices. Let us help make MAUI memories last!!

description:
ALOHA, After the devastating fires we are now welcoming guests to Ocean View 1 bedroom condo and Ocean Front property at Papakea Resort. With respect to the people of Lahaina. Putting people back to work. Enjoy all Maui has to offer. Everything you need for your vacation in our Beautiful Ocean View Condo. King Size Bed, complete kitchen, washer/dryer. Lanai with high top table and ocean view from the 2nd floor, corner unit. Ceiling fans and a/c.
Papakea is fully operational.

The space
We have an Ocean View One Bedroom Suite and a also a Large, Deluxe Ocean View Studio Suite available at Papakea Resort on Maui.

Your home away from home, One Bedroom ocean view condo is located on the 2nd floor, premium corner unit of Papakea Resort, very bright and airy. Enjoy the great view of the ocean, putting green, swimming pool and ponds from the second floor. Additional large side window, light and airy with a view of bamboo trees and tropical foliage
neighborhood_overview:
Your home away from home. The tropical feeling, the ocean, palm trees, watching the sunset with our favorite beverage, it's great! Relaxing out by the ocean under a palm tree, looking out over Lanai and Molokai, reading or watching whales in season. We like to take walks on the beach which starts at the property. Having breakfast, lunch or dinner outside on our lanai is wonderful. We have great view from the lanai and room. The putting greens are fun and we participate in the Sunday putting tournament. The swim and Yoga classes are good exercise.
Weekly Mai Tai Party is great!
Walk to Farmers Market, organic market, shopping, restaurants and grocery store.
Blue Hawaiian concierge in lobby to help plan trips.
host_about: Aloha, we went to Maui and stayed at Papakea on our Honeymoon and loved it so we went back and bought our condo.  We enjoy the beautiful grounds with the ponds, palm trees and flowers.  Maui nō ka ‘oi,  means Maui is the best in Hawaiian.  Our condo is like our home away from home with everything we need to relax and take in all the beauty Maui has to offer.

description:
Visit Hale Luco and appreciate the truly SPECTACULAR views of the mighty Pacific ocean and Poipu coastline from this one-of-a-kind property near the top of Poipu Crater. Stand in awe at the splendor of the beautiful Hawaiian vista as the sun rises and sets with Ni'ihau Island in the distance.

The space
This luxurious vacation home will exceed all expectations with its lavish furnishings, a fully equipped dream kitchen, two master suites, a guest bedroom, split-level air conditioning, and comfortable beds in every room. If this wasn’t enough, step out onto the huge lanai and enjoy your private pool while making unforgettable memories with family and friends in paradise!

Experience superb snorkeling, surfing, swimming, and bodyboarding just a short walk away at the iconic Poipu, Brennecke's, and Shipwreck beach, or get in a complete workout not far away at the Poipu Beach Athletic Club, located at 2290 Poipu Rd. with a state-of-the-art gym, pool, and cou
host_about:
Suite Paradise – The gateway to island living.

Suite Paradise in sunny Poipu Beach on Kauai is home to hundreds of vacation rental properties, amenable to any sized group and any specifications you could think of. With the highest level of service and a wide range of vacation rental options, Suite Paradise can ensure that your stay is as seamless as Kauai’s lifestyle.

Choose from luxurious beach resorts, each with multiple pools and spas within walking distance and top-of-the-line amenities, including, but not limited to, full membership to Poipu Beach Athletic Club for the duration of your stay. Poipu Kai consists of 70 acres of lush tropical foliage and some of Kauai’s most sought-after vacation rentals. One complex is literally located nestled in a verdant and extinct volcano crater – you can’t get more immersed in the island lifestyle than that! From mauka (mountain) to makai (sea), Suite Paradise has something for you!

Kahala – A popular complex that is home to mostly one- and two-bedroom units. Kahala is only a short walk from the beach, and closest to Poipu Kai’s tennis courts and Kalapaki Joe’s sports bar. With the option of both mountain and ocean views available dependent on the unit, Kahala’s location is perfectly situated with proximity to Poipu Road as well as the Poipu Kai greenbelt.

Makanui – Two- and three-bedroom units perched across from Poipu Crater, with stunning mountain views, distant ocean views, and a short walk to the greenbelt path.

Manualoha –Less than a mile from the beach, although the complex pool is practically attached to the Pacific Ocean! With units sleeping four to six, easy access to the greenbelt pathway, and hues of purple bougainvillea draped throughout the complex.

Poipu Sands – One- and two-bedroom units with incredible ocean views, spacious lanais, and a short walk to Shipwreck’s Beach.

Regency – Larger units, spacious enough to accommodate up to 10 guests. Many of these units are newly remodeled and offer AC. Regency and Kahala sit right next to each other.

Regency Villas – Luxury units with central AC. Regency Villas often feature a loft and sleep up to five guests. Situated near the greenbelt for easy access to many resort amenities, and centrally located for a short walk to Brennecke's Beach, or access to the Grand Hyatt Kauai Resort.

Nihi Kai Villas - A comfortable and quiet beach resort with 70 condos to choose from. Located right across from the ocean.

Poipu Crater – Just as the name says, Poipu Crater is nestled in a verdant an extinct volcano crater, which makes the foliage truly breathtaking. With 30 condos to choose from, sleeping four to six guests, the choice is yours! Enjoy the tropical gardens and central location to all that Poipu has to offer.

Lawai Beach Resort - Luxurious oceanfront condos located directly across from arguably the best snorkeling spot on the island. Enjoy a short stroll to five-star dining at The Beach House or enjoy the view from Lawai Beach, as the surfers paddle out for a sunset session. With room to sleep up to six, Lawai Beach Resort has it all!

Poipu Kapili - A beautiful and peaceful resort located on five acres of meticulously landscaped oceanfront property.

Pili Mai - This is Kauai’s newest resort development of luxury condominiums, nestled among a championship golf course.

neighborhood_overview:
Waikoloa Beach is an area located on the South Kohala coast on the island of Hawaii. Approximately 25 minutes north of the Kona International Airport (KOA). The Waikoloa Beach Resort is very family and pedestrian friendly. Most properties are within a 10-15 minute walk (3-5minute drive with ample parking) to ʻAnaehoʻomalu Bay, also known as A-Bay. A-Bay is a shallow water bay located within the resort. ʻAnaehoʻomalu is best known for its sunsets, snorkeling and historic royal fishponds.
The Queens’ MarketPlace and Kings’ Shops provide convenient dining and shopping options.

host_about:
The Outrigger Way

Developed in 1993 with Hawaiian scholar and historian Dr. George Kanahele, the Ke 'Ano Wa'a process was designed to advance the company's corporate culture and fundamental business strategies. The values-based process intricately connected three core elements of the hospitality industry:

HOST + GUEST + PLACE

It also deepened Outrigger's understanding and appreciation of the local host culture, a distinct hospitality style that is recognized across the globe.

description:
Enjoy a high class experience at this centrally-located condo downtown Honolulu. This villa style codo is like staying at a resort with the pool and hot tub right outside your front door and a jacuzzi tub in your en-suite bathroom. The designer features will make you feel like your on vacation while you call it home. Relax and dine on the large lanai which is a rare find. Downtown has many great places to dine. One free parking stalI in the parkade is included. Your prime downtown condo awaits.

The space
Make yourself at home in this beautiful resort style downtown Honolulu condo. The large lanai, tall ceilings, large windows and designer features are a rare find and we are excited for you to enjoy them during your stay! This stylish privately owned condo is in the Executive Center.

Walk into a large entry way that leads you down three stairs to the open concept living room, dining area and kitchen. The living room has a couch that folds down into a qu
neighborhood_overview:
This condo is in downtown Honolulu in the Executive Center. This is the food hub of the island with many great restaurants, pubs and clubs to choose from, walking distance from the condo. There is a Ross in the same building and Walmart across the street. Visit the Lolani Palace, or Aloha Towers. Take a quick 10 min drive or bus to Ala Moana Beach Park or 15 min. drive to Waikiki. The airport is only 15 min. drive from the condo. and the location is central.
Please check out my downtown guidebook for recommendations.

*Please note: Just like any city, we have homeless people in the area
host_about:
I love to travel and meet people from all around the world. I travel a lot for business using airbnb and love being an airbnb host. 

I am originally from Canada but now call paradise home. I coach new and existing vacation rental owners how to create a successful BADA$$ airbnb! I specialize in interior design and property management. For free airbnb tips & tricks find me on IG @bnbeready.

I enjoy interior design (as you'll see if staying at my house), gardening, SUP and exploring the islands. If you need recommendations on how to make your trip to Oahu the best, I am happy to help!

description:
Kau on the Big Island. We live on 20 acres on Road to the Sea, which has a remote black - green sand beach. We call our slice of paradise, Honua Laa (a sacred place). At the end of our road is a beautiful black and green sand beach, a huge tide pool. Rent a four-wheel-drive to get there. WE RECOMMEND a 4WD to get to our place, or a high clearance SUV, not a convertible or sedan which is low to the ground! You must have clearance and go slow.... the road is rocky and bumpy.
This is a cabin.

The space
Off the grid. Rustic, but fun. If you are a Eco tourist or seeking adventure, you will love our spot!
The silence is golden and the stars are amazing. The lovely red Lehua flowers bloom In May and October.
Don't expect a hotel...this is upcountry glamorous camping. GLAMPING!

Shared bathroom (see photos) about a 80 feet away. Outdoor kitchenette i10cludes a propane single burner, ice chest, NO FRIDGE. NO OVEN. We have an outdoor fire pit,
neighborhood_overview:
It's one-of-a-kind! Most of the parcels are 20 acre parcels around… But a few smaller parcels across the road. Anything goes for living quarters here… a treehouse, a yurt, a shed, a tipi ... you name it!
We have nice neighbors who keep an eye on things.
host_about: David and I have 11 grown children and 14 beautiful grandchildren…. but we are young at heart and healthy.     This is a “hosted” vacation rental, as required by County law.  we have a studio adjoining the house with a separate entrance,  but, my husband and I go to our place at the south end of the island while you visit our  Beach house.

Stroll in cute little shops while trying some local shave ice. You wil
neighborhood_overview: The house is right where the action is—the park, beach, restaurants, shops, and fresh market are all close by. Walk down the street to a friendly cafe for breakfast. Stroll along the shore watching carefree turtles and determined surfers.

Close to town, just 2 miles from the airport close to shopping and restaurants. We are in a busy area and there is noise but the location is convenient and the house is well equipped.

The space
Waterfront, brackish ponds and a park. This house was newly renovated by a long time Hilo family. This is a two bedroom house with a very large lanai area for entertaining family and friends.

Guest access
You may access the whole house. There is a laundry room downstairs which you may use.

Other things to note
We do not have any cameras on the property but we do have to fake cameras on the outside of the house to deter people from the park wandering into our yard. They look real but are not real.

Registration number
TA-098-470-5024-01

host_about: We are all caterers that have a successful restaurant business on Oahu.  This house in Hilo is our vacation space and we love it. We love to get away and chill on the ice pond next door. Hilo is a quaint little town we hope you will think so as well.

neighborhood_overview: Kamaole Beach Royale is located across the street from Maui’s most pristine beaches, Kamaole I. Just steps from the complex you will find restaurants, shopping, health food stores, snorkel rentals and a surf school. Maui’s unique and varied terrain offers a multitude of activities. From relaxing on some of the world’s most beautiful white sand beaches to the more adventurous undertakings of zip-lining and paragliding. Kamaole Beach Royale's location is such that there are many activities and attractions right at your fingertips. Some of Maui’s top attractions are: Maalaea Harbor; many boats leave from Maalaea on snorkeling trips, deep sea fishing, scuba diving, whale watching (in season), sunset cruises, and more. It is much faster to leave from Maalaea Harbor than Lahaina Harbor when taking trips to Molokini Crater and Turtle Town. Other attractions include Maui Ocean Center, Haleakala Volcano, Shops at Wailea, Iao Valley, Wailea Golf Club, King Kamehameha Golf Club, Maui Tropical Pla

Maui Nō Ka ‘Oi, (Hawaiian for “Maui is the best")

description:
Recently remodeled, with central air conditioning, comfortably sleeps 6. Very close to Princeville shopping center, 3-minute walk to the Westin resort and right next to the path to Anini beach.

The space
The large common area and lanai offer lots of gathering space. 3 bedrooms and bathrooms also allow for privacy when traveling with friends or multiple generations. The condo comes with a well-equipped kitchen and is fully stocked with fresh towels and linens. The interior is spacious and new. Large picture windows offer garden views, a glimpse of the ocean. Excellent breezes. There are two primary bedrooms with an ensuite bath. The third bedroom has 2 twin beds which can be made into a king. This room also has its own bath but it is shared with the common area. The Mauna Kai complex has a large swimming pool and multiple BBQs for guests. The condo is a short walk to the Westin Resort and Princeville Shopping Center. Golf and tennis are also in the resort.

description:
Beautiful Hanalei home just steps from the beach with Kauai greenery around the property. With a large grass park as your backyard in front of one of Kauai's most famous beaches, spend your vacation frolicking in the ocean, in the sand and on the grass where some of the most remarkable sunsets occur. Enjoy a relaxing vacation as you wake up and walk straight to the beautiful Hanalei Bay.

The space
This beautiful home is the perfect location for a visit to the Garden Island. To access the beach, there is a short walk through the Pine Trees beach parking as well as a large grass park that is perfect for picnics, barbecuing, or simply getting some sun if you're not in the mood for salt and sand. This open concept home has a lovely kitchen, a beautiful lanai with seating and stairs that lead you to beach access, and a relaxing outdoor shower to rinse off after a long day at the beach.

Please note, this home is located in a tsunami evacuation area.
neighborhood_overview: Ka Ehu Kai is located in famous Hanalei -- an idyllic beach town that offers shopping, restaurants and a long stretch of beach, one of the most beautiful in the world.
host_about: Aloha, I'm Lisa!! I am the owner of Stay Kauai.  We are a boutique vacation rental company located on the North Shore of Kauai and our specialty is creating unparalleled vacation experiences.  Our goal is for you, the guest, to have the best vacation ever... to live with a true sense of A-L-O-H-A!

description:
Centrally located in Plantation Hale Suites, just steps from the ocean & in the same complex as the shops and restaurants in the popular open air Coconut Marketplace! Situated beside the Ke Ala Hele Makalae path that runs along 5 miles of turquoise ocean, minutes from amazing beaches & breathtaking hiking trails, there's no better location on the island to experience all that Kauai has to offer. Your newly remodeled and comfy a/c cooled condo with luxury bedding & decor is awaiting your stay!

The space
Welcome to your little slice of the paradise that is Kauai!

This 1 bedroom condo is located in Plantation Hale Suites just steps from the ocean and in the same complex as the recently upgraded open air Coconut Marketplace with all its unique stores, restaurants and twice a week Farmer’s Market. They also host regular hula shows, magicians and monthly movie nights so there’s something for everyone!

The activities nearby are too many to
host_about: We're avid travellers who love music, living well and having fun.  We recently moved from Kelowna, BC, Canada to the amazing island of Kaua'i, HI where we make and sell handmade products on Etsy and Amazon.  We also hosted an AirBnB in Kelowna starting in 2015 and loved it so we can't wait to continue doing just that in our beautiful new condo here on The Garden Island.  We love meeting new people both those who stay with us, and when we travel to stay with other hosts!

description:
Penthouse Beach Tower 10th Fl (1003) - Steps from the Ocean. Escape to a Hawaiian Paradise at the Beach Villas Palekaiko on Oahu! Sleeps up to 6.

The space
Maintenance Work Notice: The Beach Villas is undergoing some scheduled maintenance work. The exterior building is getting a fresh new coat of paint. This will not affect your access to our lanai.

The Palekiko welcomes you to paradise from the moment you walk in the door with all you need to relax and rejuvenate during your stay. This villa is 1,400 square feet and has 2 bedrooms and 2 baths. Custom contemporary decor and upgraded appliances give a 5-star feel. Enjoy the spectacular sunset and ocean views every day from our penthouse 10th floor lanai.

This luxury condo is ideal for a romantic getaway or a family vacation. Located just 45 minutes from Honolulu.

Guest access
Onsite fitness center
Beach Bar
Beach Toys
High Chair and Pack n Play are avai
neighborhood_overview:
Spend your days basking in the sun on Ko Olina Beach, just steps from the Palekaiko, or in one of the four lagoons, perfect for swimming and snorkeling. For those with an adventurous side, play a round at the 18-hole championship golf course, embark on a whale-watching tour from the marina or see the many sites the island has to offer. The Palekaiko is located just 45 minutes from Honolulu and Waikiki Beach, and 45 minutes from the North Shore.

The Beach Villas Resort is one of 4 beach front resort properties on Ko Olina. You are within walking distance to the Disney Aulani, Marriott Ko Olina Timeshare, and the soon to be Four Seasons Hotel.
host_about:
Aloha! My husband Duke and I run an online business. We have two beautiful children. We love to travel (whenever we can), eat, and revel in great company.  

We purchased this condo so that our family can enjoy a piece of paradise. Although we'd love to live in Hawaii, we call Huntington Beach, California our home.  We take great pride in creating a memorable experience for our guests.  We hope you will find our condo your home away from home.

description:
Nestled among a championship golf course, Pili Mai is set in an ideal location on the island of Kauai’s south shore in Poipu Beach. This is Kauai's newest resort development and has a choice of two, three, and four bedroom luxury condominiums.

The space
This central Poipu location offers ocean, golf course, and mountain views and is within walking distance to additional dining, shopping, and entertainment at Poipu Shopping Village and a short distance to world famous Poipu Beach.

description: Take a break and unwind at this peaceful oasis. description:
みんなでワイキキに格安で泊まるのにおすすめの小さなワンベッドルーム！生活に必要な物は全て揃っているので、まるでハワイで生活しているようなカジュアルスタイルのアパートです。便利な室内洗濯機！フルキッチン！お友達やご家族との旅行に最適です。

ワイキキビーチ :２ブロック・徒歩６分
バス停：徒歩３分
コンビニエンスストアー：徒歩３分

*There is no parking available in the building*

•Ala Wai Canal
Get there early and you may find free parking along the Ala Wai Canal (no parking Monday or Friday from 8:30am to 11:30am).

•You can rent a space 2 buildings ahead of the apartment.
$20/ day, the space is limited, Please make a reservation through me.

The space
2階建アパートの1階のお部屋です。専用の玄関があります。

Guest access
アパートの敷地には、手前に２階建て、奥に３階建てのアパートが２件建っています。入り口はゲートがあり、セキュリティフォブがないと入れません。ご利用いただくのは、２階建てアパートの１階の１世帯です。１階に２世帯、２階が１世帯に分けられています。

Other things to note
現地のロコの方がアパートに住んでいます。日本語&英語バイリンガルのキッズなど、まるでハワイで生活しているようなステイをお楽しみください。アパートの住民とお会いしたら笑顔で「ALOHA！」とご挨拶くださいね(^O^)

Just steps from your front door to the beach to dig in the sand, play in the tide pools, watch the whales go by, enjoy the turtles, catch some waves, and enjoy breathtaking, unobstructed views of the sunset!

The space
We renovated our town home in 2022 to include a brand new kitchen with quartz countertops, brand new appliances including a stacked washer/dryer and dishwasher. Both full bathrooms were gutted and redone-upstairs bath has a tub/shower combo and double vanity, while the downstairs has an enclosed walk in shower and single vanity. Fresh paint in the entire unit, including ceilings, and a few new windows. There in an ocean and sunset view in the primary queen bedroom upstairs. One smart TV downstairs and one smart T
neighborhood_overview: This little pocket of sunshine neighborhood, as I call it, is located in Keauhou at the south end of Ali'i Drive.  There is a shopping center up the hill, within walking distance, where there is a local KTA grocery store, Longs Drugs (CVS), a movie theatre, cute shopping boutiques and multiple restaurants with amazing views.  In the other direction less than a mile away is a very popular snorkeling beach as well as beginner surfer beach called Kahalu'u Beach Park, also walking distance so as to not fuss with parking.

neighborhood_overview: The Honua Kai resort is located on the magnificent North Kaanapali Beach on the west side of Maui near Lahaina town. This resort has seven pools & numerous hot tubs you can enjoy during your stay, including a water slide! In each tower lobby there is a shop you can get snacks, drinks, amenities & more from. There are two plush
host_about: The Big Island is officially known as the island of Hawaii and received this nickname for a good reason: it is the largest island of the United States. It’s one the most popular travel destinations, attracting between 1.5 and 1.7 million travelers each year. Boasting some of the world’s most beautiful beaches, the island is as diverse as it is gorgeous, with lush green forests, black lava fields at the base of volcanoes, and the mighty Pacific Ocean serving as your playground. Magical Hawaii is truly a travelers dream and a must-have on your bucket-list. Outdoor adventurists who love being in nature will be awed by the majestic overlooks, hidden waterfalls, and snorkeling with sea life.

neighborhood_overview: Poʻipū Beach Park is located in the community of Poʻipū on the southern coast of Kauaʻi island in Hawaii. The beach is a park has lifeguards provided by the county of Kauaʻi.
host_about:
Suite Paradise – The gateway to island living.

Suite Paradise in sunny Poipu Beach on Kauai is home to hundreds of vacation rental properties, amenable to any sized group and any specifications you could think of. With the highest level of service and a wide range of vacation rental options, Suite Paradise can ensure that your stay is as seamless as Kauai’s lifestyle.

Choose from luxurious beach resorts, each with multiple pools and spas within walking distance and top-of-the-line amenities, including, but not limited to, full membership to Poipu Beach Athletic Club for the duration of your stay. Poipu Kai consists of 70 acres of lush tropical foliage and some of Kauai’s most sought-after vacation rentals. One complex is literally located nestled in a verdant and extinct volcano crater – you can’t get more immersed in the island lifestyle than that! From mauka (mountain) to makai (sea), Suite Paradise has something for you!

Kahala – A popular complex that is home to mostly one- and two-bedroom units. Kahala is only a short walk from the beach, and closest to Poipu Kai’s tennis courts and Kalapaki Joe’s sports bar. With the option of both mountain and ocean views available dependent on the unit, Kahala’s location is perfectly situated with proximity to Poipu Road as well as the Poipu Kai greenbelt.

Makanui – Two- and three-bedroom units perched across from Poipu Crater, with stunning mountain views, distant ocean views, and a short walk to the greenbelt path.

Manualoha –Less than a mile from the beach, although the complex pool is practically attached to the Pacific Ocean! With units sleeping four to six, easy access to the greenbelt pathway, and hues of purple bougainvillea draped throughout the complex.

Poipu Sands – One- and two-bedroom units with incredible ocean views, spacious lanais, and a short walk to Shipwreck’s Beach.

Regency – Larger units, spacious enough to accommodate up to 10 guests. Many of these units are newly remodeled and offer AC. Regency and Kahala sit right next to each other.

Regency Villas – Luxury units with central AC. Regency Villas often feature a loft and sleep up to five guests. Situated near the greenbelt for easy access to many resort amenities, and centrally located for a short walk to Brennecke's Beach, or access to the Grand Hyatt Kauai Resort.

Nihi Kai Villas - A comfortable and quiet beach resort with 70 condos to choose from. Located right across from the ocean.

Poipu Crater – Just as the name says, Poipu Crater is nestled in a verdant an extinct volcano crater, which makes the foliage truly breathtaking. With 30 condos to choose from, sleeping four to six guests, the choice is yours! Enjoy the tropical gardens and central location to all that Poipu has to offer.

Lawai Beach Resort - Luxurious oceanfront condos located directly across from arguably the best snorkeling spot on the island. Enjoy a short stroll to five-star dining at The Beach House or enjoy the view from Lawai Beach, as the surfers paddle out for a sunset session. With room to sleep up to six, Lawai Beach Resort has it all!

Poipu Kapili - A beautiful and peaceful resort located on five acres of meticulously landscaped oceanfront property.

Pili Mai - This is Kauai’s newest resort development of luxury condominiums, nestled among a championship golf course.

description:

Prepare home-cooked meals in our fully renovated kitchen, boasting custom granite countertops, new cabinets, stainless steel appliances, and tile flooring all throughout the unit. Enjoy breakfast, lunch, and dinner with ocean views, at your dining table in the comfort of your condo.

The master bedroom has a Cal-king bed, and features a large closet for each guest, on either side of the bed.

host_about:

Quam Properties Hawaii, Inc. is conveniently located in West Maui at Napili Plaza Shopping Center. We provide a variety of services to West Maui and the neighbor islands. Our services include Luxury Vacation Rentals and Concierge Service, Property Management, Association and Project Management, Long Term Rentals, and Real Estate Sales. Our office is open Monday through Friday from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM and Saturday from 8:00 AM to 4:00 PM Hawaiian time.

description:
In the heart of Niumalu, a rural neighborhood near the Huleia River and Nawiliwili Harbor in Lihue, sits a completely remodeled historic "motel" known as Motel Lili. Thoroughly modernized and renovated to accommodate a single traveler or couple traveling to Kauai on a budget, there are six attached studio apartments on a spacious stream side lot.
Hawaii Transient Accommodation Tax TA-202-363-4944-01

The space
Each of the 6 attached studios has a comfortable queen bed, ceiling fan, a bathroom with a tiled shower, a closet, and a small kitchenette with a sink, full size refrigerator, toaster & coffee maker. While there are no cooking facilities in the studios, there is a shared BBQ grill located by the stream side common area with a large picnic table, for outdoor dining.

Each themed suite features artwork that reflect an aspect of Hawaiian life and culture. If you've visited Kauai before, you know how much surfing is a part of our culture. Thi
neighborhood_overview: Central island location is near Nawiliwili small boat harbor and close proximity to Kalapaki Beach (10 minute walk), Huleia River,  Menehune Fish Ponds, shopping, dining and the airport.   The Hoary Head and Kipu Mountain Ranges tower in the backdrop of this charming location, where its not uncommon to see Peacocks and chickens roaming freely.    Kauai Beach Boys beach concession located on Kalapaki Beach offers surf and beach rentals and instruction.  Learn how to surf or paddleboard or just rent the gear and experience the fun waves at Kalapaki  Bay.  Also in close proximity are Waterfall Rappel and kayak adventures, and sunset boat cruises.
host_about:
Born to a Lebanese father and French mom; Fluent in French, English and Arabic.  U.S.C.G. Licensed Ocean Operator,  Founder True Blue Charters & Kauai Beach Boys. 

Moved to California in 1978 from Aix-En-Provence with a  sailboard shipped to San Pedro from Marseille.  Moved to Kauai a year later, to Surf, Sail, Fish and Dive. Also a , Jazz Manouche aficionado, and amateur guitarist (a work in progress). 

Since 1983,  Kamal's main business “KAUAI BEACH BOYS” is Kauai’s longest running outdoor outfitter. Ask your host for advice on anything to do in, on, or under the water during your stay. If you're a musician, ask for a jam or,  borrow a guitar for your stay :)

Welcome and Aloha!

The Aqua Aloha Surf Waikiki is located just a block from the International Marketplace and two blocks to the beach
neighborhood_overview:
barbeque grills is included in all stays.
The Aqua Aloha Surf Waikiki is located just a block from the International Marketplace and two blocks to the beachfront of Waikiki. Short driving distance will take you to Downtown Honolulu, the University of Hawaii, and historic experiences like Pearl Harbor and Iolani Palace.
Enjoy world-class shopping, dining, and nightlife at the International Marketplace, stroll the beachfront of Waikiki for surf lessons and sunset watching, or take in a hike at the nearby Diamond Head for an overview of Honolulu’s magnificent coastline. Whatever adventure abound, the location and the value at Aqua Aloha Surf Waikiki are unmatched.

Points of Interest:
• Waikiki Beach – 2 blocks
• Royal Hawaiian Center – 3 blocks
• International Marketplace – 0.3 mile
• Honolulu Zoo & Kapiolani Park – 6 blocks
• Hawaii Convention Center – 1 mile
• Ala Moana Center – 1.5 miles

From traditional island favorites to gourmet delights, you'll enjoy a diverse range of flavors served in dramatic venues - including oceanfront settings with stunning views of the Maui sunset.

neighborhood_overview: The Royal Coconut Coast is aptly named, not just because of the amazing stands of large coconut trees that cover the landscape, but also because much of the area was originally reserved only for the ali’i or royalty in the Hawaiian kingdom. Today, beautiful white sandy beaches, lush green mountains and valleys, and consistently warm weather all year round attract travelers from all over the world. The Royal Coconut Coast has become a popular tourist destination because of its central location, beauty, rich history and culture, and variety of activities available for the whole family. From Wailua to Kealia, the east side of Kauai offers accommodations for both the budget traveler and those wanting a more full-service resort experience. The whole family can find something to do here, from a leisurely day at the beach or spa, to biking, hiking, kayaking, or golfing, there are many options of how to spend your time on Kauai’s Royal Coconut Coast
host_about: I live and work on Kaua’i. I Love this Hawaiian Paradise, and Love sharing it with Others.

Premier Kauai Vacation Rentals is owned by Cindy Plemer. Cindy is Hawaii-born and raised, waking up every day to the privilege of calling one of the most beautiful places in the world home: the Garden Isle of Kauai.

My passion has been connecting the land I love to guests, owners, sellers, renters and visitors throughout the world, turning dreams of Kauai into an attainable, magical reality.

By living the spirit of aloha, creating moments of a lifetime on Kauai for those around me, deep knowledge of the Kauai market, and real estate sales expertise, I have been successful in many areas of real estate. Beginning as a Resort General Manager for some of the world's largest hoteliers to property management experience and real estate sales, I've been entrusted to care for assets exceeding well over $50,000,000.

Whatever the occasion, if we may be of assistance, we are happy to be of service to you here on Kauai.

The unit also has double pane windows that block the street noise. Blackout blinds in all rooms. Living room has a 55 inch 4K TV, and each bedroom also has a 55 inch 4K TV. Go

The space

Enjoy breakfast on the lanai to the sounds of swaying palms. Cook gourmet meals in our fully stocked kitchen. Move into the spacious and comfortable bedrooms (1 queen size bed, and 2 twin size beds). Brand new sofa in living room opens to an additional queen size bed (with hotel quality mattress). But remember, you didn't come all the way to Maui to spend all day inside! Across from Kamaole Beach III, one of South Maui’s world-famous beaches, you’ll be steps away from snorkeling, swimming, and strolls through soft, white sand. The Kamaole Sands property has many luxurious amenities, including a large pool, a baby pool, and fitness facility, 2 Jacuzzi hot tubs, four tennis courts, and several propane grills for your convenience. description:
This small cozy apartment has distinctive "Hawaiian vintage" decor. Right in Kapa'a town, close to the ocean, restaurants, stores and the amazing bike path - but a "world away"!

The space
Whether you are visiting Kauai for a few days, a few weeks, or even a few months, this small and cozy plantation-style 1BR apartment surrounded by tropical vegetation and whimsical statues and art objects is a hidden right in Kap'aa but surrounded by open space. It’s part of a small and friendly residential community full of Aloha spirit. You can arrive, move in, unpack and unwind -- or head straight to the beach.

The Space:

The apartment works well for two people. It’s compact but cute and comfortable - fully furnished and equipped, and artistically decorated with granite counter top, etched glass mirrors, indirect lighting, and marble floor inserts that might remind you of Italy.

The kitchen, living room/dining area is open-plan with plantat
neighborhood_overview: This isn't a luxury "resort";  rather, it's a low-rise plantation-style apartment community  built in 1946 (before Hawaii became a state).  We have extensively renovated it over the years, but kept the feel of Old Hawaii.  It's right in town, but hidden well away from the highway, and many long-time residents of Kapa'a don't even know it's there!  The location and approach might surprise you at first since it's adjacent to a shopping center and school bus location, within easy walking distance to shops, restaurants, the post office, and hardware store - but it has a rural feel since there is a large field at the rear and it borders on to agricultural open space.
host_about: There is no place on earth quite like Kauai for natural beauty, outdoor activities, and the relaxed tropical island way of life.    We love travel, but we love staying home too.   We offer you a fully furnished tropical Hawaiian-style  apartment as your “home from home” during your vacation, in a friendly community – right in town yet away from it all – close to beaches and attractions but with local ambiance.

description:
Hana Camp Gear has just what you need for overnight camping at Wai'anapanapa State Park in Hana! The Package includes: 1 Two-person Tent, 2 sleeping bags, 2 pillows, and 1 LED lantern with batteries. The $65 rate excludes Hawaii taxes. We provide only the camping gear.

YOU MUST OBTAIN YOUR CAMPING PERMIT ONLINE FOR WAI'ANAPANAPA STATE PARK BEFORE RESERVING OUR CAMPING GEAR!

The space
Hana Camp Gear provides only the tent packages. To camp at Wai'anapanapa you must secure a camping permit online from the State of Hawaii. Search for Waianapanapa State Park Camping. When you open the site, click "Browse for Availability". At the bottom of the list you will see "Undesignated Campground". Search for the date on which you wish to camp and it will show the number of campsites available on that date. If you wish to secure a permit, click the "Reservation" tab and follow the procedures.

After you have downloaded the permit, we can approve your req
host_about: Our family has lived on Maui for many years. We love living in Hana and enjoying the food from our gardens, fruit from our abundant banana, papaya, mango, lime, lemon, and avocado trees, and eggs from our hens. We look forward to your stay with us!

The space

host_about:
Hawaii-based and locally operated out of Kapalua Resort, The Parrish Collection Maui is a full-service vacation rental management company proudly overseeing 50 privately owned homes in the Bay Villas, Golf Villas and The Ridge Villas.  

Originally formed in 2007, Aloha Vacation Villas is now part of The Parrish Collection group of companies.  Based on Kauai, The Parrish Collection LLC manages over 350 properties on both Maui and Kauai.

JP Parrish is the Owner and Principal Broker of The Parrish Collection LLC, originally formed in 1984 that is now the largest independently owned vacation rental company on Kauai.  

Headquartered at Poipu Beach, Kauai and operating owner and guest services’ desks at three major Kauai resorts, The Parrish Collection LLC offers easy access to owners and guests. 

Its dedicated team has worked together for many years and offers an unequaled commitment to personal and professional service, attention to detail, and the highest quality standards all balanced with a true sense of Aloha.

description:
With the best views on the island, this 1-bedroom bottom-floor condo with bedroom A/C is located in the Pali Ke Kua resort, on a bluff facing the ocean and the landmark north shore mountain, Bali Hai. Watch gorgeous ocean sunsets from your private lanai. Walk from your lanai to a private, paved path down to the secluded Hideaways Beach to snorkel with turtles, surf, or sunbathe.

The space
The master suite provides a king bed, a full bathroom with laundry, and A/C (a rarity on the island!). The living room and bedroom both have TVs with cable and there is high-speed wifi throughout the condo. Enjoy the Pali Ke Kua resort pool, hot tub, and restaurant, Hideaways Pizza Pub.

Guest access
Guests have access to the lush Pali Ke Kua grounds, with beautiful tropical gardens and views.

Other things to note
Please take care to respect our neighbors and be aware that there are strict quiet hours between 10pm and 8am. The condo
neighborhood_overview:
Our condo is located in the Pali Ke Kua resort in Princeville on the north shore of Kauai. The resort includes access to the pool, hot tub, and restaurant (Hideaways Pizza Pub), and a private paved path to Hideaways beach. The condo is also located next to the Makai golf course, great for walks or runs.

Princeville Center is located 2 miles away and provides shopping, restaurants, and a grocery store.

The beautiful historic town of Hanalei is located 5 miles away and provides shopping, restaurants and bars, grocery stores, and access to Hanalei Bay, with 2 miles of sandy beaches where you can swim, surf, and boogie board, all while enjoying stunning mountain and waterfall views. Paddle board or kayak down the Hanalei river or hike in the Hanalei National Wildlife Refuge.

Ten minutes in the opposite direction is the Kilauea lighthouse and wildlife refuge.
host_about: Hi! I’m PNW native now in Half Moon Bay, California. I love exploring the U.S. and beyond and am often in Kauai enjoying the amazing outdoors and sea life! I love sharing this stunning island with guests.

Our Ritz-Carlton and Marriott trained staff are here to serve. Your guest experience is our highest priority. The privilege to host your precious Maui vacation is ours.

description:
Nestled high in the cliffs of Princeville, this Kauai resort blends natural and man-made pleasures into magnificent harmony. Take the opportunity to enjoy a meditative retreat at the on-site spa, or use the resort as a basecamp for your many Hawaiian adventures.

The 1 bedroom unit includes a King bed in the bedroom, and a Queen sleeper sofa in the living area. There is a full kitchen, 1 full bathroom, and a washer and dryer. Air conditioning is available for a small daily fee.

Husband and wife with two littles under the age of 8.  We love to travel, love the outdoors, and love to share other parts of the world and our country with our children.  

We both believe vacation and traveling is so important, and that carries over into how we take care of the people who book vacations with us!

description:

A bike path directly across the street & a 5 minute drive to Haleiwa Town! I also have a car that is available for rent with the condo :).

host_about: Hi I'm a young working professional, I work in Design & travel a lot for work, I love being outside, surfing & seeing new places. I've loved the accessibility of AirBnB & the places I've gotten to visit through it! Looking forward to the next adventure.

description:
KEEP IT REAL:
This is a cozy smaller complex with a family feeling. It's not a fancy resort.
View: This is NOT an ocean view unit. The unit faces a wooded area.
Noise: You can hear waves, island roosters, and occasional cars. This is a condo, so potentially. You can hear the other tenants.
Bugs: We are on a tropical island. Occasionally you will see ants and bugs around.

Want to wake up to the sound of the waves crashing less than 100 yards away? The condo is across the street from the ocean

The space
-Located between Kona downtown and Keauhou harbor. Centrally located to everything Kona
-Tucked away behind the Alli Dr. in a family-oriented complex. Close to the action yet quiet to relax
-Water access and popular surfing spots(Banyan beach and Lyman's beach) across the street
-2 min walk to local store Banyan Mart
-4 min walk to the best Poke place on the island
-1 mile from the famous Magic sand beach
neighborhood_overview:
-Cross the street from local popular surfing/snorkeling spots: Lyman's Surfing Beach and Banyan's Surfing Beach
-Short drive(2 miles) to Kahalu'u Bay, one of the best snorkeling spots, White Sands Beach, Pahoehoe Beach Park, and Magic Sands Beach Park
-3 miles to downtown Kona
-Local convenience store within 2 min walk.
host_about:
We're a family of three from San Jose, CA.   When our son was 5, we took our first family trip to Hawaii, and it was pure magic. There is something in the Hawaii air that is very healing, and we fell in love with the islands.  From then on, we took family trips to Hawaii many times and tried every Hawaii island. 

Of all the Hawaii places, Kona fits us like a glove. Kona has become, for us, our own cherished spot of paradise. It's perfect because it's not crowded and feels very relaxed with that small-town feel.  The three of us love snorkeling (even though I can't swim far without a noodle :)). Practically every spot along the shore we have tried has had something to see like tropical fish, and of course, there are sea turtles everywhere! We think the advantage of the lava beach is it keeps the island from becoming too crowded and makes everything more scenic and beautiful...and there are plenty of great sandy beach spots for swimming, tanning, and surfing.  
 
The Big Island has become a big part of our lives forever, and we hope you find it as magical and healing as we do.

You'll have a great time at this comfortable place to stay.

description:
Come enjoy pasture views and rain forest plants in this newly renovated 1 bed/bath! This private suite is attached to our home with a separate coded entry. It is equipped with a KING size bed, kitchenette and strong WiFi. Historically, Mountain View is where Hawaiian Kings and Queens would stopover on their horseback journey to Kilauea - Volcanoes National Park. We are a 20 min. drive to the park and 25 min. to Hilo. This is the perfect location for peace and convenience for your stay in Hawaii!

008-377-2928-01
neighborhood_overview: Our home is located in a small plantation era neighborhood with majority plantation style homes. There is a park across the street and public playground on the opposite side of the park. There is a bakery, coffee shop, convenient store and food trucks within a 10 minute walking distance.
host_about: Aloha, I’m Ayla and I host our guest suite with my husband Manny! We are both high school teachers and we love to surf and play board games! I paddle wa'a (outrigger canoe)  competitively and coach swim team!

description:
Hilo's best location is at Richardson's Beach Park on south Hilo bay. Best snorkeling on this side of the island across the street. Enjoy free kayaks, stand up paddle board, biking, snorkel gear, boogie boards. 3.5 miles from Downtown Hilo on south Hilo bay. Search hilovacationhomes for additional information on all my Hilo homes and a complete list of Hilo activities. I own 4 homes next to this house all across from the Beach Park. Prompt response!
STVR: 19-365609, NUC: 19-14485

The space
One of only a handful of 4 bedroom homes in Hilo. With the use of two day beds with 2 trundle beds (standard twin mattresses) and a queen fold out couch the house can sleep 15. Tankless water heater for unlimited hot water.
The house has everything you need. Complete kitchen with newer appliances, both upper and lower decks with tables and chairs to enjoy the view and entertain. Available BBQ on front deck.
Storage room behind house has a couple kayaks,
neighborhood_overview: Hilo is unlike any town on any of the Hawaiian islands.  It is the second largest town behind Honolulu!  A distant second of course, but large enough to have big down amenities like a Walmart, Target, Safeway, small mall, modern movie theatre.  It also has a real, historic, downtown that fronts the ocean.  There are NO resorts here.  Even the hotels are pretty bad.  This is why vacation rentals are the preferred method of stay.  There is more to see and do in the Hilo area than any town on any of the Islands, it just isn't well publicized.  My hilovacationhomes site has a Hilo Activities tab for a complete list of places to visit.
host_about: Extensive real estate background in building and managing rentals, especially vacation rentals.  Owner of 5 rentals in Hilo, Hawaii.

description:
Maui County License: STPH2014/0003
3 bedroom, 3 bath home with spectacular ocean views and always changing sunsets. Aka'ula means red sunset which can be enjoyed every day from this private and gated property on a hill side in Ha'iku. The house is furnished in modern style with island accents, a very comfortable home away from home. The pool area is situated on the lower area of the property with a pool house and BBQ facility.

The space
The one level home offers a lot of space for families or friends traveling together. All bedrooms have great views and ceiling fans. The twin beds in the guest bedrooms can be converted to king beds.

Guest access
Guest have access to the entire home and garden and pool areas accept the garage.

Other things to note
The Hale Aka'ula property is a licensed vacation rental with Maui County.
Maximum occupancy is 6 guest including children 2 years and older.
Use of the prope
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood  is agricultural and rural in character. Most homes are occupied by residents. Hai'ku town center is only 5 min. away by car  with some great restaurants, grocery store, post office, gym and yoga studio, hardware store and some great food trucks offering different ethnic foods or styles of cuisines.
host_about:
Born and raised in Germany, moved to Maui in 1990. Established my vacation rental business in 1991. I love to be a host and accommodate guests from all over the world. We moved recently our office from Paia town to  Haiku and are available by appointment Monday to Friday 9am - 4pm. We have a wonderful team working together for a long time.  AJ is our reservation manager, Terry manages the properties and you will find Margit mostly in the office.
My special interest is my family and pets,  Hawaiian Culture,  Hula, History, Music and Language, hiking, birds and plants of our islands.

description:
K B M Resorts: Napili Point NAP-C43; The Best Ocean Front 2 Bedroom Beautifully Remodeled!

The space
* Special Offer - Book any KBM Resorts villa in Hawaii for 6 nights or more with a checkin date on or before December 15, 2023 and receive a 4-door rental car from one of our major rental car agency partners. The car is complimentary, you pay only $12/day airport tax. Pick up and drop off are from the airport, and vehicles may be upgraded for a nominal fee, inquire to learn more.

Villa C43 is a prime oceanfront second level location at Napili Point with very close proximity to Napili Bay, offering striking ocean views. The lanai is the perfect spot for turtle and whale watching. Fabulous snorkeling is just steps away. Nestled above shimmering Honokeana Bay, Napili Point is a 115-villa low-rise resort where every villa has an incredible ocean view. In the distance, the islands of Moloka'i and Lana'i rise from the warm waters of the blue Pacific, silho
host_about:
KBM Resorts caters to those who appreciate the size and comfort of a fully equipped property but don't want to sacrifice the convenience and amenities of a 5 star hotel. KBM Resorts blends these two worlds together by providing beautiful, full-size residences with hotel-style features and amenities you have come to expect from the finest hotel resorts. Each KBM Resort property features Fully-equipped kitchens, complimentary L'Occitane bath and body lotions, housekeeping and concierge teams, personal grocery delivery, personal greeters and more.

Each KBM Resorts location is fully-staffed with local Guest Ambassadors, Concierge Agents, Activities Desk, Maintenance and Housekeeping teams, Quality Control Inspectors, Laundry facilities and more. If your family ever needs assistance or service our staff is just steps away and ready to help. We employ only dedicated local professionals who believe in our community, deeply care for our Homeowners and Guests, and are genuinely excited to share local expertise to deliver your family a dream vacation.

All KBM Resort locations feature beautiful distinctive residences, professional cleaning and sanitization, fully-equipped kitchens, 24/7 Guest Support teams, complimentary high-speed WiFi, and a seamless checkin process. You and your family are always a call, click, or text away from our local Guest Ambassadors whose sole mission is to deliver your dream vacation.

description:
Private & tranquil setting, set away from the busy hotels & condos with sunny outdoor seating areas. An ideal place to come home to while traveling, whether you’re here to visit family & friends, on business, explore the island, or just relax.

Great central island location to Mauna Kea, Volcano National Park, Hilo, or Waimea
-5 mins to grocery store, post office, gas station & coffee shop
-15 mins to beaches & restaurants
-30 mins to Kona Airport (KOA)

The space
Your door opens to a living room area with a couch, table with 2 chairs, microwave & mini-fridge, with organic coffee & tea provided

Down the hall is a bathroom with shower/tub & vanity that is well stocked with bath towels, beach towels, shampoo, conditioner, and soaps

Past the bathroom is the main guest bedroom with a comfortable queen size bed & AC, ample closet space and windows looking out to the local plants & garden

Sleeping arrangements: w
neighborhood_overview:
We are in a lovely & safe cul-de-sac, within walking distance (just under 1 mile) to post office, grocery store, gas station & coffee shop. When driving in & out of our place, please be mindful that many neighborhood kids play & bike around these streets. There is no need to speed here.

The Waikoloa Village Golf Course is a 5 minute drive away, with restaurant/bar, pool and tennis courts. We provide guest amenity cards so you can enjoy these features!
host_about: Born & Raised in Hawaii, love the land & ocean! Happy to help with any tips to make your stay more enjoyable

description:
We are traveling for a few months and would love to find the right family to stay at our home!
Our beautifully decorated and recently renovated house is located at Sunset Beach, on Oahu’s North Shore, and it's very close to the beach.
It is a 3 bedroom house, but only 2 bedrooms are available.

Please send us a message and tell us a bit more about your family traveling plans, before booking.

The space
Newly renovated , the house is clean, bright and airy, equipped with double pane windows and modern quiet fans for a very comfortable night’s sleep!

Kitchen is fully equipped.
Bicycles and beach gear are also available during your stay!

Parking is free by your front door.

2min walk to the beach & Ted's Bakery.

Hot water outdoor shower.

Wake up to the sound of birds, walk to V-land or Sunset Beach for a refreshing morning swim and come back to a nice cup of coffee overlooking the lush b
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located at a very quiet private road, in a family-oriented safe neighborhood and away from highway noise.

Wake up to the sound of birds every morning.

Drive slow and be mindful of neighbors and children playing in the street.
host_about:
After graduating in Graphic Design, I went on to travel the world and found a new passion for surfing which brought me to Hawaii 30 years ago.

My daughter and I love to surf, travel and spend good times with friends and family!

description:
Available February 20, 2023.

We think we have what you're looking for!

This spotlessly clean executive home (completely private and separate top floor) has everything you need for your Hawaii vacation.

Located in Waialae Nui Ridge/Kahala in Honolulu with private lanai & sweeping view of ocean & 2 volcano craters & your own garaged parking. Perfect for snowbirds or someone relocating. It has it all.

The space
Sweeping ocean views from Diamond head crater to Koko head crater! You can see 2 from our vacation home!

It's also on a ridge and you can see other islands on a clear day as well as whales breaching during whale season. It's great!

Wood floors, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, an additional office where you can work as well. AC in master bedroom. 3 HD TVs, (Samsung's 82 inch living room and 60 inch master bedroom). And Peloton bike.

High-end furniture throughout. A beau
neighborhood_overview:
We are one mile up Waialae nui Ridge in Honolulu. It stays a little cooler up here and commands some of the best views of Diamond Head and the Ocean.

You'll like the private ridge view we have because no one can see in from the other ridge because there is a ridge between ours and the next one that has no houses which is rare in Honolulu.

You are close to golf courses, Kahala beach, surf, Whole Foods, Starbucks and coffee shops, Kahala Mall and a movie theatre just a few minutes away without the hustle and bustle of being in Waikiki. (You can see Waikiki from the house and about 10 mins away)

Think you will love it here! Please see what others are saying in our reviews.

We have many who have came back again and tell us they wouldn’t go anywhere else. Mahalo!
host_about:
ALOHA! We are Nick and DeAnna Batchelor.  Just a little about us...We love meeting people from around the world.  We are easy going and honest, trustworthy people. We live by principles and do volunteer work to help our community each month. Our life motto is:  It's nice to be important but more important to be nice. 

We've used Airbnb while traveling ourselves so we know what you are looking for.  

You can call or text us if you have a question or something you need anytime. We mean it!  Please enjoy staying at our relaxing vacation home for cleanliness, decor and location. Oh yeah, the view is not that bad either. :) 

Mahalo nui loa! 

Nick and DeAnna

LIVE LOVE ALOHA

description:
Neighboring Condos, 4 Bedrooms + 2 Convertible Beds, 4 Baths, (Sleeps 8-12)

The space
Maui Resort Rentals is proud to present this one-of-a-kind 9th floor 4 bedroom offering at the popular Honua Kai Resort on Kaanapali North Beach.

This tandem package combines 2 neighboring two-bedroom suites to create a 4 bedroom package that offers stunning ocean views in addition to views of the majestic West Maui Mountains.

These neighboring suites provide a perfect opportunity to gather, reconnect, and celebrate. The combined suites offer 2495 sq ft of interior living space and can accommodate up to 12 guests in four king-sized beds and two queen-sized convertible sofa sleepers. Get swept away into the lovely Maui sky after folding away the glass doors and allowing the interior to blend seamlessly with the outdoors.

We encourage you to express your culinary creativity in each fully appointed kitchen. We have provided every appliance & utensil
neighborhood_overview: Honua Kai sits beachfront in North Kaanapali so you’ll literally be just steps away from the tranquility of Maui’s shoreline. An “Ohana Play Package” including Tommy Bahama beach chairs, an umbrella, BBQ equipment, and a portable cooler is provided complimentary.
host_about:
The Ohana (Family) at Maui Resort Rentals has been helping vacationers "Make Maui Reality" for over 50 cumulative years on the shores of West Maui.  Inspired by the Maui lifestyle, we aim to provide incredible vacation experiences at a curated collection of premier resort residences.

For your convenience, our warehouse and offices are located in Kaanapali North Beach, just minutes from all of the West Maui resorts.

Our Ritz-Carlton and Marriott trained staff are here to serve. Your guest experience is our highest priority. The privilege to host your precious Maui vacation is ours. 

As an added benefit, our exclusive Maui Resort Rentals courtesy shuttle offers free guest transportation between our West Maui resorts a number of West Maui locations - including Lahaina, Kapalua, and Whaler's Village.

www.airbnb.com/p/mauiresortrentals

description: The pictures represent the quality of the resort only, the pictures are not the actual room. The rooms are assigned to our guests at the time of check-in by the front desk.  This resort charges an additional hotel tax of $12.99 a day paid to the resort at the time of check-in.
host_about: I’m a man of faith, adventurous, and I enjoy helping people, especially in traveling so that they will have a great vacation experience.

description:
On Baby Beach in Lahaina Maui. 5br 4.5 ba 3,500 sqft Perfect for families - Sorry our Home burned to the Ground in the Lahaina Fires

The space
Our Home Burned to the Ground!

This top quality 5 bedroom, 4.5 bath vacation home with more than 3,500 square feet of interior living space, set directly on 'Pu`unoa' Baby Beach in the heart of Lahaina. This is 'Your Own Private Paradise' on Maui.

Each room has new flat panel televisions, with cable. Of course there is also a state-of-art wireless high-speed internet service.

The kitchen is very well equipped, with brand new dishwasher and refrigerator/freezer combo, with a full array of supplies and equipment, including a coffee maker, coffee grinder, and many other luxury grade amenities.

The master suite has a newly remodeled large private bath, separate tiled walk-in shower, dual vanities. The master suite has its own separate private deck with view of the ocean.
neighborhood_overview: Walk to old Lahaina town for shopping and restaurants.
host_about:
Mark and Karen Stevens live in San Diego and have 7 grandkids which we like to visit. We bought the refuge to share with others when we are traveling. 

We also have a home on Baby Beach in Lahaina HI that we manage.

description:
Altho the fires of Lahiana are devastating, Maui businesses need your support. Please visit! The rest of the island is open & just as beautiful as always!!

Let your Hawaiian vacation begin.
Maui Vista is walking distance to all of your immediate needs and the Kihei weather can't be beat. Simply walk across the street and you will find Charlie Young Beach which is known for being one of the best & longest beaches in Kihei.

**Ask us about renting the condo right next door - perfect for families

The space
The health and safety of our guests, homeowners, and employees is our number one priority. Our vacation rentals minimize person-to-person contact with private amenities and entry via lockboxes. After each reservation, our condos are sanitized and disinfected with expert cleaning in line with current CDC guidelines.

Let this condo be your home away from home. I have tried to think of everything you would need for a fun-filled,
neighborhood_overview:
Nothing can beat this location! Walk to everything! If you want to get away from the high-priced Kaanapali area and get more of a local feel you have to try Kihei. The weather is known to be better than Kaanapali and there is plenty of shopping, snorkeling, sigh-seeing, golfing, water sports to go around! This area is laid back and affordable...not pretentious or high priced like other popular areas of Maui. Come check it out!!
Maui Vista is in the heart of Kihei. Wailea is a 5 minute drive. Lahaina a 30-45 minute drive depending on weekend traffic, walk outside your Lanai to the pool. Being a ground floor unit there is no need to carry groceries, luggage or kids very far. We are just steps away from parking and the main walking street along the beach. All that you need is steps away...
host_about:
I am a firefighter that LOVES to travel/vacation. After traveling the world I found Maui to be a little slice of heaven that I kept returning to again and again. With retirement on the horizon, I decided it was time to purchase a piece of paradise which I are happy to be sharing with all of you!
As a budget traveler, I have tried to provide you with all the comfort and requirements to make your vacation one to remember without busting the bank. I truly hope you love this place as much as I do. Mahalo

description:
Perfect, central location. No need for a car if you plan to just hang in Kihei
INDOOR LAUNDRY
The Cove surf beach and Kalama park is a block away, Charlie Young directly across the street, and Kamaole1 is just to the left of Charlie Young Beach
ABC sore has everything, food, drink, toys, clothes, EVERYTHING steps away
Bars a block away
