Bus stop nearby..less than a block away
printer add fee

The space
Close to everything. Good, central location.Computer work can be done at the dining table or there is a nice spot at the bar area. There is not a desk. The wifi is great. A packnplay for a child

Guest access
The keyless entry code, pool code, and parking space # will be given 24 hours prior to your stay.

Registration number
390180020014, TA-128-326-6560-01
neighborhood_overview:
Great location! across from Charley Young beach and Kamaole 1 beach. A block from the Cove surfing beach. Kalama Park is right next to the Cove and is a huge park next to the ocean. it has a volleyball court, kids park, roller rink, skateboard park, tennis courts, baseball field and soccer field, fishing, AA meetings under a shade tree at 5:30pm everyday, and a beautiful walking path along the water. The bars and eating places and gift market all are across the street from Kalama Park and Food land is there too. all that is only a block or 2 away from the condo..an easy walk.
ABC store and a great bar and food place is a black away from condo as well. Maui Coast and the wyndam timeshare is also a block away. Bus stop close too.
host_about: I used to be a flight attendant and fell in love with Maui which is now my home.

description:
Newly listed gorgeous one bedroom condo at the legendary Ilikai in Waikiki and overlooking the Ocean. This condo is simply amazing! Offering a gorgeous kitchen, spacious living area, two comfy, full-sized beds, and an extra large lanai that overlooks the ocean- this is Wakiki living at it's finest!

The space
Located on the 19th floor of the Ilikai Hotel in Waikiki, this condo offers the most breathtaking views of the ocean, beaches, and Friday firework showit is so amazing, you may never want to leave! Featuring a beautifully updated kitchen, with granite counters and breakfast bar, this is the perfect vacation spot. While eating out in Hawaii is fun, it can also be expensive, and its great to have a full kitchen to have the stay at home and cook option. We have had many meals out there on the lanai, overlooking everything...so peaceful!
The living area has a comfy couch and a large flat screen tv, and a built in desk.
There are two comfy full sized
neighborhood_overview:
Beaches, water sports (rentals including surfboards, stand up paddle boards, etc, are down by the lagoon) fishing, movies etc!
Fabulous location,
host_about:
Hello!

I live in California and have spent many summers "growing up" in Hawaii- i love the Ilikai, and it is my second home....I love Waikiki, and feel there is no better beach, anywhere! 

I work full time selling Real Estate in the Bay Area and hope to have the opportunity to travel more in the near future.

description:
"Bliss on the Bay" at the Wailua Bay View

The space
Ocean front views from this Wailua Bay condo. Your gaze will get lost on the horizon of the Pacific Ocean and swaying coconut trees. Comfy Oceanfront Hawaiian Style living is yours to enjoy from this second floor condo for you to blissfully enjoy. Wailua Bay View #207 is located on a small bluff overlooking the expansive white sand beaches of Wailua Bay View. Enjoy strolls on the beach! Watch the colorful sunrise and romantic moon rise over the ocean at Wailua Bay.

Unit Amenities Include:

Full Kitchen
Glass Slider Doors Open to Large Private Lanai
Flat screen television in Living Room
A/C in Bedroom
King Size Bed
Ceiling Fans in Living Room & Bedroom
Washer/Dryer in Unit
FREE Wi-Fi Wireless Internet
Small Outdoor Cooler and (2)Beach Chairs
2nd Floor- Sorry No Elevator
FREE parking
host_about:
Premier Kauai Vacation Rentals is owned by Cindy Plemer. Cindy is Hawaii-born and raised, waking up every day to the privilege of calling one of the most beautiful places in the world home: the Garden Isle of Kauai.

My passion has been connecting the land I love to guests, owners, sellers, renters and visitors throughout the world, turning dreams of Kauai into an attainable, magical reality.

By living the spirit of aloha, creating moments of a lifetime on Kauai for those around me, deep knowledge of the Kauai market, and real estate sales expertise, I have been successful in many areas of real estate. Beginning as a Resort General Manager for some of the world's largest hoteliers to property management experience and real estate sales, I've been entrusted to care for assets exceeding well over $50,000,000.

Whatever the occasion, if we may be of assistance, we are happy to be of service to you here on Kauai.

description:
Bliss for family and friends, this oceanfront retreat elevates Waikiki style & luxury. Indulge with an open-design living area where gorgeous Diamond Head & Pacific views flow through floor-to-ceiling windows. High-end touches include a gourmet kitchen for preparing meals to share on the private lanai, washer/dryer, air conditioning, ceiling fans, WiFi, flat screens, DVD & double-vanity bath.

The space
Paradise found in this two-bedroom two-bath space! Enjoy the Pacific blues from this captivating unit located in the heart of Waikiki. Guests can begin the day with Hawaiian coffee on their private lanai, living room, or dining space.

After a day of exploring Oahu, you’ll love coming home to sheer luxury. Additional inclusions are wheelchair accessible, tasteful tropical décor & artwork, one King Bed and two twin beds, cool tile floors, lanai off the master bedroom, double vanity bath(s), ceiling fans, washer/dryer, flat screens, cable, WiFi & DVD.
host_about:
This exquisite condominium is located on Waikiki Beach just next door to Fort DeRussy Park and one block from bustling Kalakaua Avenue. Each studio, one- and two- bedroom suite features kitchenette or full kitchen, and in-room washer/dryer.


Since 1993, Castle Resorts & Hotels has specialized in innovative hotel and resort management. We manage properties throughout the Hawaiian Islands, including Kauai, Oahu, Maui, Molokai, and Hawaii Island, as well as Auckland, New Zealand. Accommodations range from full-service hotels to resort condominiums and combines value, convenience, and authentic experiences.

description:
Just across South Kihei Road from famous Charley Young & Kamaole I, II, and III Beaches, this 2nd floor condo welcomes you to Island Style comfort. Dual zone AC, well-stocked kitchen, 46" smart TV plus audio, washer-dryer. Private bedrooms, no loft. Elevator. View of Haleakala from lanai. Clean pool, hot tub, and barbecues in quiet, well-maintained complex. *CDC-approved sanitizing in place.*

The space
This unit is furnished as a treasured second home with all Island Style furniture. Queen beds with high quality, firm mattresses in both bedrooms, plus queen sleeper sofa with memory foam mattress in the living room. The dining table seats 5. Both bathrooms have tiled full-size tub showers. Gorgeous tumbled travertine floors, granite countertops, bamboo cabinets, and carefully chosen art reflect the natural beauty of this island paradise.

Fully equipped kitchen with full-sized fridge and dishwasher, large stove with convection oven, microwave. The water
neighborhood_overview: Kama'ole I (Charley Young), Kam II, and Kam III are all in a row--great for morning walks. Walk to surf or stand-up paddleboard at famous Cove Park just a tenth of a mile away, with lessons available every day. Short walk to groceries, restaurants, shops, snorkel rentals, and beach parks with lawns, lifeguards, beach volleyball. Wailea is just a 5 minute drive, with golf, more beaches for snorkeling, swimming, fishing, and body-surfing, plus high-end shops and restaurants.
host_about: I'm a native Northern Californian. I visited Maui in my early 20's and fell in love with everything about it--the land, the water, the sea creatures, the soft air, and especially the people and their gift of aloha. It all felt beautiful and right to me. Now I am fortunate enough to have a home on the island and to travel between Maui and West Marin county. I enjoy sharing my Maui home with others, and I trust that my guests will live aloha and help take care of this beautiful island.

description:

host_about: I am a small business owner.  The houses I list on airbnb are either on a 20 acre farm that I use for events, and to grow food and flowers or are within a timeshare that I own.  Timeshares are available most any time, and the houses on the farm are typically available from Sunday to Thursday, March to November and most anytime from mid-November to mid-March.   The farm is a farm, with gravel roads, some hills, etc.  The timeshares are high end options, exquisitely kept up, and offered a well below market value.  We take pride in offering high quality and reasonable accommodations with friendly service on our part.

neighborhood_overview:
Colony One at Sea Mountain resort is one of the most serene resorts on the Big Island. Perfect for those who want to get the true Hawaiian experience. Colony One at Sea Mountain Condos are located on the South end of the Big Island only 60 minutes from Hilo and 80 minutes from Kona and 25 minutes from Volcano National Park. The two closest towns are Na’alehu (7 miles South) and Pahala (5 miles North).
Walk to the world famous Punalu’u Black Sand Beach, and swim with the green sea turtles which bask on the beach all day long. All short drives from the resort: Green Sands Beach, South Point Cliffs, Kilauea Volcano, Ka’u Coffee Mills, and so much more. Greens Sands Beach is the only natural beach in the world that encompasses beautiful green sand made out of olivine crystals. South Point cliffs are the most southern point in the United States and are world renowned for its amazing views and cliff jumping excitement. In the other direction, Kilauea constantly spews out lava in the Vo

Our services here at The Land Office, LLC offer Buyer and Seller Representation for Vacant Parcels, Large Acreage and Farms, Single Family Homes, Bed & Breakfasts, Condominiums and Small Commercial Properties.  We also provide Property Management of Short Term and Long Term Rentals.  We assist many organizations, federal, state and local level employees, medical professionals, contractors, along with travelers and guests to our area to find the perfect property to meet their needs.

"Continuing education within the Sales and Management areas I specialize is critical to my ability to stay current on the issues affecting my industry," she believes.

Whether you are an owner, looking to sell or rent or a traveler to the area needing short or long term accommodations, she is ready to assist you.   Contact her today!

neighborhood_overview: Poʻipū Beach Park is located in the community of Poʻipū on the southern coast of Kauaʻi island in Hawaii. The beach is a park has lifeguards provided by the county of Kauaʻi.
host_about:
Suite Paradise – The gateway to island living.

Suite Paradise in sunny Poipu Beach on Kauai is home to hundreds of vacation rental properties, amenable to any sized group and any specifications you could think of. With the highest level of service and a wide range of vacation rental options, Suite Paradise can ensure that your stay is as seamless as Kauai’s lifestyle.

Choose from luxurious beach resorts, each with multiple pools and spas within walking distance and top-of-the-line amenities, including, but not limited to, full membership to Poipu Beach Athletic Club for the duration of your stay. Poipu Kai consists of 70 acres of lush tropical foliage and some of Kauai’s most sought-after vacation rentals. One complex is literally located nestled in a verdant and extinct volcano crater – you can’t get more immersed in the island lifestyle than that! From mauka (mountain) to makai (sea), Suite Paradise has something for you!

Kahala – A popular complex that is home to mostly one- and two-bedroom units. Kahala is only a short walk from the beach, and closest to Poipu Kai’s tennis courts and Kalapaki Joe’s sports bar. With the option of both mountain and ocean views available dependent on the unit, Kahala’s location is perfectly situated with proximity to Poipu Road as well as the Poipu Kai greenbelt.

Makanui – Two- and three-bedroom units perched across from Poipu Crater, with stunning mountain views, distant ocean views, and a short walk to the greenbelt path.

Manualoha –Less than a mile from the beach, although the complex pool is practically attached to the Pacific Ocean! With units sleeping four to six, easy access to the greenbelt pathway, and hues of purple bougainvillea draped throughout the complex.

Poipu Sands – One- and two-bedroom units with incredible ocean views, spacious lanais, and a short walk to Shipwreck’s Beach.

Regency – Larger units, spacious enough to accommodate up to 10 guests. Many of these units are newly remodeled and offer AC. Regency and Kahala sit right next to each other.

Regency Villas – Luxury units with central AC. Regency Villas often feature a loft and sleep up to five guests. Situated near the greenbelt for easy access to many resort amenities, and centrally located for a short walk to Brennecke's Beach, or access to the Grand Hyatt Kauai Resort.

Nihi Kai Villas - A comfortable and quiet beach resort with 70 condos to choose from. Located right across from the ocean.

Poipu Crater – Just as the name says, Poipu Crater is nestled in a verdant an extinct volcano crater, which makes the foliage truly breathtaking. With 30 condos to choose from, sleeping four to six guests, the choice is yours! Enjoy the tropical gardens and central location to all that Poipu has to offer.

Lawai Beach Resort - Luxurious oceanfront condos located directly across from arguably the best snorkeling spot on the island. Enjoy a short stroll to five-star dining at The Beach House or enjoy the view from Lawai Beach, as the surfers paddle out for a sunset session. With room to sleep up to six, Lawai Beach Resort has it all!

Poipu Kapili - A beautiful and peaceful resort located on five acres of meticulously landscaped oceanfront property.

Pili Mai - This is Kauai’s newest resort development of luxury condominiums, nestled among a championship golf course.

neighborhood_overview: You can take a walk to many nice restaurants, shops, movies & grocery stores.  Kalama Village has souvenir shops, dress shops, restaurants, shaved ice, and snacks; and is close to the grocery stores.  They have a craft fair there, and periodic fair nights.  You can do a brisk walk of half a mile, take a short drive, or take the bus.  It is also close to a park, with surfing lessons nearby.  One of the best beaches on Maui-- Charley Young (or Kamaole I)-- is just across the street.  The condo is in a great location, close to many activities.  There is a Jack in the Box north on Kihei, not far away, a Taco Bell is north of Jack in the Box (at the Azeka shopping center), and McDonalds is just north of there.  Foodland grocery store is close.  You can eat a nice breakfast or meal at nearby Maui Coast Hotel,  just south of condo, on Kihei Rd., or at Moose Macgillycuddy's or Fred's (less than a mile). It is also a popular place to get a drink, and enjoy ocean watching.  You can grab a bite t

The space

neighborhood_overview:
Upcountry Maui is all about ranching and farming. You will be only 8 min from the historic Paniolo (Hawaiian Cowboy) town of Makawao with
stores and restaurants. 20 minutes from the town of Paia or Haiku and 30 minutes to Baldwin beach park. The Shops of Wailea are 60 min. and the nicest (in my opinion) beach is Makena (Big Beach) only 75 min.
There are hiking trails 2 minutes up the road and a mountain bike rental shop in Makawao renting bikes to explore the trails in Makawao Forest.

Mahalo nui loa!

The space

There is a work desk that can be converted from the dining table and a desk chair can be provided upon request. The cottage is a great spot for a couples get-away, accommodates small families, friend get-aways, or in-l
neighborhood_overview: We are located in a quiet neighborhood and within walking distance from Nani Mau Gardens, a beautiful botancial garden with lunch services and a cute gift shop for memorabilia. Most attractions are within a 10-30 minute drive and having a car is suggested.  With most activities being spread across the town and island and to experience them leisurely, a car is highly recommended.  An array of books provided to educate cultural awareness and safety measures to ensure a great trip if visiting our islands.
host_about:
Aloha!  I am Marvellee and am happy to share my culture and beauty of the Pana'ewa area of Hilo where I was born and raised.  It is a secluded paradise rainforest yet very close to major stores, restaurants and attractions.  Traveling should be stress free and fun as I like to experience it to be as well, and it is what I intend to provide with allowing you a very clean and sanitized place of rest and comfort.  I enjoy entertaining, meeting new people, and offering and sharing help and tips when needed to ensure a safe and memorable visit to our island.  I also take sanitation and cleansing very serious and offer you a safe and clean cottage to relax in. 
I especially enjoy gathering with my family and friends which is why I have opened the cottage to extend the aloha spirit to others!

host_about:
Aloha! 

A warm welcome to Hawaii! We look forward to being your host in the land of rainbows. Let's treat you to an unforgettable Airbnb experience as you enjoy Waikiki, which is really a place like heaven on earth.

My name is Jason and I host different units on Airbnb. Each unit has a different theme to showcase different stories, memories, and adventures. All our units are newly renovated and designed to appeal to our guests' liking.

As a Super Host, I believe that trust is a strong foundation in building relationships with guests like you. Our goal is to make your stay here in Hawaii feel like paradise. Allow us to treat you to something you truly deserve: an unforgettable Airbnb experience that best fits royalty. One that will make you want to come back—or even make you wish you’d never leave! 

See you soon! Mahalo nui loa!

description:
Come enjoy your dream Kauai vacation at our newly remodeled Studio in Princeville! Minutes from the Anini Beach walking trail, Queens Bath, the Makai Golf Course and a 7 minute drive to world famous Hanalei Bay! Our beautiful unit boasts an AC unit, outdoor lanai, California King bed, Duel use Washer and Dryer, Mini Fridge, Microwave, beautiful pool and hot tub walking distance from your stay! Mahalo for your interest in our home!

The space
Our Studio is spacious and fully stocked with coffee machine, washer dryer combo to maximize space, large mini fridge and beautiful desk for space for a comfortable stay. In addition you'll have a walk out lanai to enjoy your morning coffee or to walk out to the pool walking distance away!

Other things to note
Power on the island occasionally goes out. In the event of a power outage, the breaker box is in the closet in the back bedroom of the A Side, which may or may not be occupied by other guests durin
neighborhood_overview: Princeville is a beautiful place with  foodland grocery store, shopping, dining, golf, sunset walks, Lappert’s Ice Cream (a must!) and everything you could want for your stay. Hanalei Bay and Anini Beach are both 5-10 minutes away as well!
host_about: Aloha! My name is Ryan Morrison and my family and I live in Colorado. My family and I love the north shore of Kauai and truly consider it a home away from home! Our goal in owning homes in Princeville was to have homes that we could share with the Airbnb community to enjoy time away in paradise and to make some great memories with their friends and family!

description:
Great family friendly condo, remodeled and in small boutique property with only 54 units located within expansive lush landscaping. The condo complex is an oceanfront property and our condo is within steps of the ocean. Shady and quiet lanai with outdoor dining. The condo is well equipped with everything to make your home away from home! You are at the base of North Kaanapali and a short drive to the town of Lahaina.

The space
The condo is well equipped to make meals and has a wide array of cooking items. This is a first floor condo and great for seniors and families. The condo was remodeled from top to bottom with modern and tropical decor.

440010520051, TA-171-324-0064-01

We are at the base of North Kaanapali and a 5 minutes walk to the board walk.  You are within walking distance to many restaurants, coffee shops, grocery stores, shopping and food trucks.  The fun town of Lahaina is a short car ride away.
host_about: We are proud Superhosts and love sharing our condo with our guests!  My husband and I live in Las Vegas and travel frequently to our vacation homes in Maui.  We started visiting Maui more than 25 years ago and fell in love with the island.  Napili is our favorite part of Maui, with some of the most beautiful beaches and miles of hiking and biking trails. We have four grandkids and enjoy spending time with them exploring Maui.

Our home is very functional and designed for families. The kids room has a beautiful rainbow mural with a bunk bed that consist of 2 single beds and 1 full bed and the parents room has a big king s

The master bedroom suite has direct beachfront views, private balcony, king-size bed, walk-in closet, and an exquisite marble bathroom with soaking tub. The guest bedroom suite is located near the entrance of the condo, providing complete privacy and features a quee
neighborhood_overview: Hapuna Beach Residences is in the Mauna Kea Resort.  Mauna Kea resort has two glorious beaches (Hapuna and Mauna Kea).  Optional Hotel amenities provide full guest privileges to both Mauna Kea Beach Hotel and Hapuna Westin including golf, pools, fitness centers, beach chairs, and charging privileges (additional daily cost applies).
host_about: Jeff & Suzanne have been hosting guests in their luxury vacation rentals on the Big Island of Hawaii for the past several years.   Their company Paradise in Hawaii Luxury Homes consists of a large team of passionate, dedicated individuals focused on helping guests have amazing holidays.    From the initial three homes to now over forty (40) homes all equipped to the same high standards they have never lost their attention to detail.     While they have added team members they remain directly involved with each and every guest.    They treat every guest like their trip to Hawaii is their life long dream fulfilled.   They love being part of helping families create amazing memories.  Come try the Paradise in Hawaii experience!

description:
Awhalecrossing Vacation Rental is located in the rural countryside, yet only 3 miles from Hawi Town. Walking distance to the ocean with hiking trails to historical sites, King Kamehameha's birth site, Mo'okini heiau and more. Grandma's Cabin House is 2 story, 2 bedroom, (sleeps 5). Downstairs has 1 queen bed. Upstairs has 1 king bed & 1 twin bed in same small room. 1-bathroom downstairs, full kitchen. Great ocean & sunset views.

The space
We call it a Hawaiian Experience. Very Private. Handicap accessibly.
Awesome ocean views, sunsets. Screened in porch, wrap around deck where you can see the whales jumping & cruzin by during whale season November thru April. We can hear theirs tails flappin' and sometimes hear their song VERY SPECIAL!

Guest access
Washer Dryer
Full Kitchen
Private deck with screened in porch
Gas BBQ
Parking in yard next to house

Other things to note
neighborhood_overview:
Very Private. There're only two houses on this road. One mile down bumpy road from Akoni Pule Hwy to our place on Old Coast Guard Road. We're surrounded by 850 acres of Bishop Estates pastureland. Beautiful sunsets over the ocean. Walking distance to the ocean and historical King Kamehameha birth site and Mo'okini Heiau. It's a "special place". We call it a Hawaiian Experience.
PS: We have 2 Golden Retrievers & 2 Golden Doodles.. Very friendly :)
host_about:
My husband, Marty and I have lived on the Big Island for 35+ years.  
Awhalecrossing is a "special place",  We call it a Hawaiian Experience.

description:
Wake up in paradise! This is a lovely little cabin on a 15 acre nature sanctuary with a lush private lawn and incredible panoramic ocean views. There is a porch/ lanai which serves as a kitchen and dining area with a breathtaking ocean view and fresh ocean breezes. The cabin is screened in on three sides keeping you close to nature. In addition to the amazing ocean view you can see our main gardens, pond and statues from this cabin. In the morning you will awake to the sound of morning birds.

The space
There is a queen size bed, new high quality mattress with nice linen and a kitchen equipped with an electric kettle, French-press coffee maker, full stove & other kitchen equipment.

Enjoy strolling through our beautiful 10 acres with expansive ocean views, 2 ponds and many gardens featuring flowers, orchids, medicinal plants, fruit trees, chickens (free eggs!), outdoor cats and more. Visit our 50 foot circular mandala flower garden featuring a custom
neighborhood_overview:
Sundari Gardens is located in one of the most pristine and unspoiled areas of Big Island. Only minutes from the famous Red Road that offers a rolling scenic view of tropical forest and turquoise blue sea shore. You will be amazed by these raw powerful landscapes and rhythmic waves crashing against rugged lava coastlines.

The "Red Road" takes you through lush coconut & mango groves, tropical rainforests, tranquil ocean side parks, plantations and lava fields. You won't see any corporate resort and tourist stores on this road. Time stops here and mother nature opens you to an old Hawaiian dream of wild beauty and grace. Within a short drive, you can reach some lovely black sand beaches including the new beach at Isaac Hale park as well as Kehena beach. There is a gathering on this beach on Sunday afternoons if you are looking to hang with the locals. There are also awesome hot springs near the ocean and plenty of unique natural places to explore such as Kilauea volcano, green
host_about: We visited the Big Island of Hawaii in 2017 and fell in love with a beautiful piece of land. For the next four years we worked creating a beautiful landscape with gardens, fruit trees, ponds and comfortable buildings for people to come stay in. To rest and renew. We are happy to share this magical space with you!

description:
This house is at a cool elevation high above Kona Airport. The coastline dominates the view. The mature tree canopy around our deck provides privacy, and greenery.

Matsuyama Market for sundries and deli items is nearby. Downtown Kona is 15 to 20 minutes by car. The Holy Rosary Catholic church is one of the two churches less than a mile from our house.

The bottom half of the house may or may not be occupied while you are there. We have a coded entry so you won't need a key for access.

Guest access
Guests have full access to the upstairs house and full use of the laundry which is located behind the house. Guests are welcome to park at the open parking area alongside the house at the top of the driveway. There is ample room for two vehicles although the driveway is a bit steep. The street parking is first come first served and has gotten more congested recently.

Other things to note
Downstairs may have occupants.
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is pretty quiet.  Our street is very short and gets little traffic.  We are on the steep slopes of Hualalai Volcano which overlooks Kona Airport on the west side of the island.  Turkeys, chickens, and a few other varieties of wild game birds are daily transients through the grounds along with the resident neighborhood cats and leashed dogs walking with their owners.  We are a working class neighborhood of considerate neighbors who enjoy their weekends with gatherings of friends and family.  It's a nice place to live and a comfortable place to visit.
host_about:
Married to Sherrie Gaudino for about 20 years now.  I would say that we are active retirees.  This was the first home Sherrie built in Hawaii after arriving from California in the 1970's.  I recently retired from a flying career with Hawaiian Airlines.  Sherrie was a Flight Attendant with Northwest Airlines among many other things.  We met when we got the last two available seats out of San Francisco to Honolulu on a fall day in 2001 shortly ofter 9/11.  We discovered that we both love the Ocean and and Hawaiian Lifestyle.  We were married a few months later and have been in Hawaii ever since.

We have no children, but on Oahu, we have a parrot, several cats, many fish ponds, and an old pig hunting dog that Sherrie kidnapped from the pig hunters.  Later we were told by the pig hunter that we could keep her.  She apparently wasn't a very good pig hunter.  They all comprise our family and actually keep us very busy every day.  

We have fruit trees and an extensive garden with banana and papayas on Oahu where we spend most of our time.  We sell our seasonal fruit to the sellers at the farmers markets on Oahu.  The Eluna House has a nice avocado tree, a coconut palm, a productive guava tree, and a Hayden mango tree that supplies the whole neighborhood with mangos it seems some summers.  We love our trees.

The Eluna house always has nice cool mornings.  And it is often comfortably cooler than the coast on those sunny Kona afternoons.  There are probably a hundred Jackson Chameleons in our shrubbery and trees.  If you want to see them, early in the morning when the sun starts warming things up they will start moving towards the light.  You can't really see them until they move.  When they start moving though, they are easy to spot.

We get to travel free on Hawaiian as part of our retirement benefits which has allowed us easy and frequent access to Kona for work and play.

description:
Welcome to Hale Luna our unique just built tropical plantation house in the heart of Poipu. Steps beautiful beaches . Open concept gourmet kitchen for easy family time. Lovely 3 bed 2 bath with romantic mosquito netting beds and well-appointed tropical décor. Outdoor shower to watch the stars and 2 porches ideal for meals, napping or enjoying the large back yard with fruit trees. The quaint neighborhood is perfectly positioned to explore the amazing local restaurants and nearby shopping center.

The space
Hale Luna is a one of a kind tropical plantation home, custom designed by host with comfort and family living in mind. This home hearkens back to old Hawaii, Ohana, and a slower time. Living and dining rooms lead to covered lanai, wonderful for partaking, outdoor dining or relaxing naps enjoying the gentle trade winds of the south shore.
Large yards are ideal for laying on a blanket and stargazing from the serenity of the middle of the Pacific. Total peace a
neighborhood_overview:
Our neighborhood has restricted street lights to as to minimize impact on shearwater bird habitat. This leads to extraordinary star gazing!
Walking distance to beaches, shopping center, health food store, restaurants and many resort amenities.

neighborhood_overview:
Located oceanfront on Maui’s Kaanapali Beach, Aston Kaanapali Shores rests on 10 acres of tropical gardens and merges the comfort of spacious suites with hotel-caliber services.

The Magic of West Maui Known for dramatic landscapes of deep valleys and native forests, West Maui’s natural beauty is a dream destination for nature lovers and adventure seekers. Aston Kaanapali Shores is just a short drive from the charming town of Lahaina where you can find art galleries, local shops, and popular restaurants. The resort is also conveniently located across from the Honokowai Marketplace that offers a supermarket, shops, and dining.

All suites include a fully equipped kitchen, a private balcony, and Wi-Fi internet access to stay connected. Rooms feature an in-room washer and dryer. Guests enjoy convenient on-site resort amenities including an activities desk, oceanfront restaurant and bar, fitness center and spa, two pools and jet spas, free introductory SCUBA lessons, a
host_about:
At Maui Condo and Home, LLC we continue to serve our owners and guests with the same Aloha Spirit that we shared over 20 years ago. Though our business has changed through expansion and growth to include properties beyond Maui -- on the islands of Oahu, Hawaii and Kauai --  our values and sense of Aloha remain. We have implemented new business strategies and have remained at the top of the Property Management industry on Maui. We are excited to continue to serve our current owners and return guests, as well as welcome new owners and guests to Maui Condo and Home.
Click here to view all  of our listings: www.airbnb.com/p/mauicondo

description:
Have everyone ready to relax in this peaceful retreat overlooking the garden and pool at of Maui’s premier destination resorts. Flexible to also accommodate a small family, this spacious one-bedroom/two-bathroom unit is loaded with perks and conveniences to create your very own home away from home in the tropics. Whatever speed or mode of vacation you choose, Kamaole Sands has options to meet your needs. Sleeps four guests in a queen and sofa bed.

The space
Kamaole Sands unit #5306: This charming 818 square-foot-unit provides guests a spacious and simplistic retreat after a day of adventure. Refresh in this space with cool tile flooring, two ceiling fans, and air-conditioning that will keep you comfortable year-round. All you have to do is decide the temperature ideal for everyone.

Sit back and unwind in the living room space featuring floor-to-ceiling windows, local-inspired artwork, and a warm color palette throughout. Matching rattan furniture offe
host_about:
Vacationing in Maui doesn’t get better than Kamaole Sands, a condo resort built on 15 acres of gardens, waterfalls, and ponds. Live like you’ve always wanted to in an individually furnished condominium suite directly across from Kihei’s popular Kamaole Beach Park III. Defined by its laid-back vibe and tropical beauty, South Maui is a true Hawaiian paradise.

Our dreamy Kihei location near Wailea Resort and Makena Resort puts you in the midst of golf, spas and ocean recreation.

- Learn to surf at Kamaole Beach Park III
- Tee off at Maui Nui or Wailea golf clubs
- Stay on trend at The Shops at Wailea
- Snorkel amid the pristine waters of La Perouse Bay
- Indulge in spa treatments at Wailea Resort
- Sample craft brews at Maui Brewing Company

The best plan for your day is often no plan at all. Maybe you’ll start your morning with a swim in the Pacific or in our pool. You might mingle amid traveling kindred spirits at your resort’s Wednesday Mai Tai Party, and then grill a fresh catch with your new friends at the property’s public barbecue area. Or step out for a sunset dinner at one of Kihei’s fantastic cafes or bistros. Need to stay connected? We offer complimentary WiFi in the lobby, pool area, and all rooms.

Since 1993, Castle Resorts & Hotels has specialized in innovative hotel and resort management. We manage properties throughout the Hawaiian Islands, including Kauai, Oahu, Maui, Molokai, and Hawaii Island, as well as Auckland, New Zealand. Accommodations range from full-service hotels to resort condominiums and combines value, convenience, and authentic experiences.

description:
This newly remodeled 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom 638 square foot unit is located just steps from the glittering Pacific Ocean. The Kauhale Makai complex is conveniently located. The fully upgraded condo comfortably accommodates up to 2 guests.

The space
For the latest COVID-19 travel rules, we invite you to visit the Hawaii COVID-19 website. Please feel free to ask for details.

Pala Hinu Cleaning Services (our cleaning contractor) is dedicated to ensuring that your rental is safe and sanitary. We have evaluated our cleaning practices with the onset of COVID-19 to make sure that we are using the proper chemicals and techniques. Rest assured, we have implemented new procedures that include frequent disinfecting of high-touch areas, linen sanitization, and we have given our staff robust training to ensure that our standards are one of the highest in the industry. We have also received certifications for Cleaning for COVID-19 by the Care Academy and the VRH
neighborhood_overview: Maui’s unique and varied terrain offers a multitude of activities. From relaxing on some of the world’s most beautiful white sand beaches to the more adventurous undertakings of zip-lining and paragliding. Kauhale Makai's location is such that there are many activities and attractions right at your finger tips. Some of Maui’s top attractions are: Maalaea Harbor - 6 miles - Many boats leave from Maalaea on snorkeling trips, deep sea fishing, scuba diving, whale watching (in season), sunset cruises, and more. It is much faster to leave from Maalaea Harbor than Lahaina Harbor when taking trips to Molokini Crater and Turtle Town. Other attractions include Maui Ocean Center, Haleakala Volcano, Shops at Wailea, Iao Valley, Wailea Golf Club, King Kamehameha Golf Club, Maui Tropical Plantation, and the Whale Sanctuary. The town of Kihei is a quant, laid-back beach town boasting some of Maui’s most pristine stretches of white sand and turquoise waters. South Maui is fun for couples and families

My team consists of talented Guest Experience Specialists who care about your experience, and are available to assist you 24/7.   We offer travel insurance, discounts on rental cars, and professional, resort quality services to all of our guests; it would be our pleasure to host you for your next Maui vacation!
Maui Nō Ka ‘Oi, (Hawaiian for “Maui is the best")

description:
One of the best locations on Kauai’s lush North Shore fronting the white sands of Hanalei Bay with amazing views of tropical sunsets, lush green mountains and the sparkling blue waters of the Pacific Ocean.

The space
These Kauai condos are located on over 22 acres of Hawaiian paradise, featuring mature tropical gardens with endless flowers, trees and other flora, cascading pools and lava rock waterfalls, and is steps to one of Hawaii’s most beautiful white sand beaches.

Not only is the Hanalei Bay Resorts’ pool one of the best on Kauai, the views from the one, two and three bedroom condo suites are amazing. Beautiful sunsets, Hanalei Bay, the Na Pali Coast and Bali Hai are just some of the views that the individually owned condos can provide. Our guests enjoy full access to all of the resort amenities, including the two swimming pools, eight tennis courts, bell & shuttle service as needed, resort concierge, front desk and more.

Hanalei B
host_about:
Jonathan Parrish, or "JP" as he is referred to by friends, family, and colleagues, is actively involved with the day to day activities of The Parrish Collection Kauai.  

My personal goal is to ensure that we are exceeding the expectations of all our guests! 

Explore our unique collections of extraordinary Kauai vacation rentals, then match your style with the largest variety of properties available including the Kauai’s most popular resorts and widest selection of oceanfront homes in Poipu Beach.

description:
500sf custom built shipping container home with comfort & peace in mind on a 5 acre permaculture farm and botanical garden. DSL internet for Zoom & remote work. The screened in patio surrounded by tropical flowers & fruits trees will connect you with nature & Hawaii. Learn how to cultivate, harvest, & care for the land & animals. Sample honey apple bananas, white guava, citrus, avocados, etc when in season. With no city lights, the moon, stars and milky way are phenomenal when the sky is clear.

The space
The large enclosed/screened patio captures wonderful views of exotic flowers & fruit trees. The location of our farm captures our love for life, nature, peace, and a safe caring neighborhood. Or as a friend described the area "Fairy land", she is too cute. All this to help you rejuvenate and appreciate life just a bit more. Hawaii Vanilla Farm nearby along with Honokaa Town with restaurants, local shops, and groceries.
The suite also has:
- DSL Wifi ac
neighborhood_overview: Paauilo Mauka(mountain side) is about 2,100 feet elevation.  It is a unique area that provides a good balance of rain and sunshine for plants to thrive.  With cool breezes and average day temperatures of about 75 to 82 degrees ºF and night temps of about 58 to 68 degrees ºF. No air conditioning needed.  I love the beach, however, I value my sleep and can't sleep in the heat and humidity of the west side, Kona and Hilo at night. Stargazing is spectacular when the skies are clear. No vog so you can breath easy. The Hawaii Vanilla Farm, Mauna Kea Tea Farm, local organic produce, local eateries, Tex for famous Malasadas, and great scenic hiking trails and activities along the amazing Hamakua Coast.
host_about: Aloha! Everyone just calls me T or Mr. T.  I value family happiness(especially my wife & daughter), love of life, happiness of others, and access to good food, air, and water.  My wife(better 99%) and I are blessed to have a loving daughter, family, and friends.  We enjoy cooking, watching movies, the beach, free diving, helping the community , and creating a Botanical garden & exotic fruit farm.  We respect your privacy and opinions.  Hopefully we can inspire you to enjoy tasty foods and create your own homestead life.

Second floor means easy access to tropical gardens and the ocean beyond. Quiet location features large private view deck and renovated interior. Doesn't get any better.
+E3

PLUS large private view deck looking out towards ocean. Beach chairs, pool towels, full size appliances including air conditioning and washer dryer.
Really, just hit the grocery store and you are set for the week!

host_about:
Kaha Lani Resort vacation rentals in Lihue are one of Kauai’s best-kept secrets!

Our condominiums bring you prime views of Kauai’s oceanfront. Think swaying palm trees, fine white sand, and dreamy ocean blues. Spend your days sun-kissed at our heated swimming pool and sundeck or snorkel at Lydgate Beach Park. At Kaha Lani Resort you can sunbathe at the sandy beach, challenge a friend to a tennis match, and then summon your family for a barbeque as the sun goes down.

With these Lihue condo rentals, you get all the benefits of resort-style Kauai accommodations in a place as comfortable as home. We have laundry facilities, DVD rentals in the lobby, and free parking, making it easy to come and go as you please for as long as you like.

Since 1993, Castle Resorts & Hotels has specialized in innovative hotel and resort management. We manage properties throughout the Hawaiian Islands, including Kauai, Oahu, Maui, Molokai, and Hawaii Island, as well as Auckland, New Zealand. Accommodations range from full-service hotels to resort condominiums and combines value, convenience, and authentic experiences.

The unit is fully equipped with everything you need for a comfortable stay. Amenities include dinnerware, cookware, silverware, TV/Wi-Fi, full bathroom w/walk in shower, linens, towels, beach chairs and more. a window A/C is in the unit. Coin operated laundry room on property.

neighborhood_overview: Property is centrally located on the East coast of Kauai. It is about equal distance to both the Princeville and Poipu areas. It is walking distance to downtown Kapaa where you have many nice restaurants and shops. The resort sits right on the ocean and has many amenities on site such as tennis courts, mini golf, croquet, shuffleboard, board games, basketball, fitness center, and much more... the resort also has a 4 mile walking trail right in front of the property which goes along the ocean. Large unit, great location, and great value...
host_about:
From our first visit to Kauai we made it a goal to one day own a piece of this paradise. As our family has grown over the years we've been able to create awesome memories on the island that will last forever. Excited to share our home with others who are looking to create their own unique memories.

We enjoy sharing our love of the island with others and hope that our guests feel at home in our Pono Kai community.

description:
Beautiful one bedroom condo directly across from the amazing Kamaole Beach park III. Close to the pool. Well stocked. Feels like you have your own private yard.

The space
Enjoy the ocean view from this ground floor unit. Directly across from the beach. Enjoy watching the sunset from inside your unit as well as out on the lanai. You will love and enjoy your vacation while staying in this wonderful one bedroom, one bath ground floor end unit that is the closest unit in the complex to the beach. It has incredible unobstructed views of the ocean from the enormous 4ft by 8ft dining room window and its lanai. The unit has a fully-equipped kitchen and washer and dryer. There are two flat-screen TVs, a DVD player, telephone with long distance to the continental US and Canada, and free Wifi. In the bedroom is a queen bed, large window unit A/C, ceiling fan, TV, and alarm clock. The living room features two recliners, queen sofa bed with a 4-inch padded mattress topper, TV
host_about:
The complex is located directly across from Kamaole III State Beach Park, which is known as one of the most beautiful and safest beaches in the Islands.  It is perfect for swimming, snorkeling, sunning, jogging, picnicking, kite flying, and especially enjoying amazing sunsets and whale watching.

Each unit has a private lanai that faces the interior of the complex, offering views of the expansive lawns, pools, and lush tropical landscape of palm trees, hibiscus, birds of paradise and plumeria trees.  Most lanais also offer views of the beautiful Pacific Ocean and spectacular sunsets.  

There are two pools, a covered pavilion, and a full size tennis court on the property.  Every evening the outdoor barbecue area is a popular spot to socialize while grilling the perfect dinner and watching as the Hale Kamaole conch shell band performs their nightly sunset ritual.

You will find world class golf courses, fantastic snorkeling and diving, many Maui activities, abundant shopping and delicious fine and family dining all within minutes of Hale Kamaole.

Aloha! My name is Jess and  my Airbnb experience started with my husband Chris and I  renting out our couch for a year! We met the coolest  people from all around the world and we were absolutely hooked! Fast forward 9 years later we are now managing 20+ units on Airbnb. We love it and love to travel ourselves! neighborhood_overview: The most popular beach on the South Shore is Poipu Beach, which is fronted by Poipu Beach Park, and a few resorts. Poipu Beach was named America’s Best Beach by The Travel Channel, ranking top among the 10 “best” beaches selected nationwide. This beach is a series of golden sand crescents, strung together where beach-goers will find snorkeling, swimming, a natural ocean wading pool, boogie-boarding and surfing.
host_about: Kauai Exclusive Management. A locally owned and operated company since 2008. Growing our collection of luxury homes and condos from Hanalei to Poipu! With now over 100 properties & a dedicated full time team to Airbnb.  We strive to host our Kauai Exclusive guests with professionalism and aloha. We are always available at 877GOKAUAI and happy to help in any way we can. We look forward to hosting you!

description:
Book one of our cottages on our small permaculture farm on the hills of the Hamakua Coast. The cottage is small with small kitchenette to facilitate light cooking and heating of items and attached bathroom. The outdoor Sunrise Viewing And Whale watching Deck is perfect for morning meditations or having a meal in an a natural outdoors setting with ocean views. Papaaloa Country Store & Cafe is just down the road for grabbing necessities, restaurant, bar & live music. Local Waterfall Hike!

The space
Welcome to Hamakua Sunrise Farm Cottages.

We are small family permaculture farm focused on regenerative farming. We currently have some chickens, grow coffee and various fruit trees. We also offer farm to table meals to our guests depending on availability (please book in advance).

Our humble Tiny cottage is cute and efficient for a cozy stay in natural settings. Be prepared to be in nature and experience little bugs & critters. Geckos are everyw
neighborhood_overview: Papa'aloa is a beautfiul & quiet town only 30 minutes outside of Hilo. There are a lot of tourists attractions nearby including the Big Island waterfall zipline, 2 botanical gardens & the famous Akaka Falls. Papa'aloa Country Store in only 5 minutes walk away, where you can enjoy a nice meal, live music or drinks at the bar. It is absolutely family friendly too.
host_about: Helicopter Pilot by profession and farmer by choice, improving our little patch of Hawaii little by little, every day.

description:

An excellent location for affordable lodging. A great choice for exploring the Big Island &close to town if you don't plan to spend alot of time in the condo. Choose Kona Shores for low rates, do be aware it is an older building. No ocean view from the unit, beautiful ocean front pool. Car for rent on request

The space
Kona Shores is an older, small, quiet oceanfront complex just one mile south of Kona Town. Cozy (600 sq ft) 2 bedroom/1 bath. Our remodel was completed in early June 2023 and includes new living room furnishings; kitchen now has granite countertop, new refrigerator and new cabinets; bedrooms have new soft goods; bathtub and shower have been cleaned and refinished; and more. The unit is clean & comfortable though the complex is older and basic. An affordable g
neighborhood_overview: Oceanfront condo complex located  just 1 mile south of Kona Town on Ali'i Drive.  The unit itself does not have an ocean view, the complex pool is oceanfront with beautiful views.  There is a small deli/market within walking distance.  We highly recommend a car rental during your stay and have one for rent, inquire if interested.

neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is quiet, views spectacular, watch the whales go by from your lounge chair! Near small markets and close to the canoe club. Oceanview from lanai is on the side of the condo and you always see the West Maui Mountains and foliage.Maui welcomes all visitors a with a negative covid19 test 72 hours of entering island.
host_about: I am a retired educator who loves to travel when not hanging out with my funny and  entertaining parrot! My dream is to live in Maui but when I am not there I want others to share the ease of living in my condo on the sweetest beach there! I love the chill factor, the calming music or the crazy slack key guitar music of Willy K. Make sure you see him when he is in town! Keep positive thoughts flowing! Love to travel to Italy, Florida ,NY and San Francisco. I am relearning playing piano in my spare time and cooking for others keeping laughter in my life!

description:
Located on the windward (eastern) side of Hawaii island. We are on 1 acre in the town of Keaau. You will be staying in a private ohana (cottage separate from the main house) and have access to all amenities on the property. Relax in the pool or lay on the sun deck. Enjoy fresh fruit when in season.
There is much to see and do on this side of the island. The windward side is a different Hawaii and an experience you will not soon forget.

The space
Whether you just want to chill out or go exploring there is plenty to do here. The big island is a special place.
We are close to the ocean (3 miles), a volcano, amazing waterfalls, and so much more.
On Sunday we have the Maku'u farmers market with a plethora of local vendors
We are 20 minutes from Hilo town and all that it has to offer.

Guest access
You will have full access to the entire property except the main house. This includes the pool, sun deck , 2 covered patio areas
neighborhood_overview:
It's very country here. Quiet and peaceful.
We are close to the ocean and many activities. There are tide pools for snorkeling. Awesome cliffs overlooking the ocean, great for hiking. Unique beaches of Hilo.
Do as much or as little as you wish. Just enjoy.
The big island is a special place and we hope you will love it as much as we do.
host_about:
Along with my beautiful wife Barb we are retired and living the dream in this tropical paradise. We are truly blessed to have found this beautiful property that we now call home. 
We love meeting new people and sharing our good fortune.

description:
Aston Ka’anapali Shores one-bedroom garden view condo. Located Oceanfront, the Aston Ka’anapali Shores offers a one-bedroom, one bathroom, garden view condo. The condo includes a king or queen bed in the bedroom and a sofa-bed in the living room.

Guest access
Ka'anapali Shores offers a 24/7 front desk. Guests will be assigned a room upon check-in based upon room size and view reserved. Valid Credit card required to check-in ($300 security desposit)

neighborhood_overview:
Located oceanfront on Maui’s Kaanapali Beach, Aston Kaanapali Shores rests on 10 acres of tropical gardens and merges the comfort of spacious suites with hotel-caliber services.

The Magic of West Maui Known for dramatic landscapes of deep valleys and native forests, West Maui’s natural beauty is a dream destination for nature lovers and adventure seekers. Aston Kaanapali Shores is just a short drive from the charming town of Lahaina where you can find art galleries, local shops, and popular restaurants. The resort is also conveniently located across from the Honokowai Marketplace which offers a supermarket, shops, and dining.

• Kaanapali Beach - on the beach
• Honokowai Marketplace - directly across
• Kaanapali Golf Courses - 2 miles
• Whalers Village - 2.1 miles
• Lahaina Cannery Mall - 4 miles
• Lahaina Town - 5 miles
host_about:
At Maui Condo and Home, LLC we continue to serve our owners and guests with the same Aloha Spirit that we shared over 20 years ago. Though our business has changed through expansion and growth to include properties beyond Maui -- on the islands of Oahu, Hawaii and Kauai --  our values and sense of Aloha remain. We have implemented new business strategies and have remained at the top of the Property Management industry on Maui. We are excited to continue to serve our current owners and return guests, as well as welcome new owners and guests to Maui Condo and Home.
Click here to view all  of our listings: www.airbnb.com/p/mauicondo

host_about:
We love Maui and our favorite spot is Kihei.  Why?  We think Kihei is pretty laid back place that attracts tourists who want a sunny tropical island experience near the beach. We've been visiting the island for almost 20 years and we are proud to own this little slice of paradise.  My goal is to make sure your vacation is a wonderful and affordable experience. We love this Maui destination so much, we added another unit to our portfolio in the same complex.  Consider this for small groups or multiple families/couples looking for great accommodations - A202 and C204 are getting great reviews. Mahalo!

We also have an opportunity to host you at Copalis Beach, WA -   This is a cozy cottage located in secluded area in a gated community across from Copalis Rock.  Only two minutes by trail to the beach!  We love this cottage because of the glorious views.  It brings guests back to simple things and building memories!  Maluhia on the Washington coast.

We will be offering a home in Suncadia very soon.  It's on 1:45 minute from downtown Seattle and offers a wide variety of activities and local amenities.  We hope to be online around the first of September 2022.

 "Life... Be In It!"  Mahalo!

Enjoy ocean and Kaanapali golf course views at unit A210 at Maui Eldorado Resort! Enjoy a fresh and modern stay with a newly remodeled kitchen, bathroom, flooring and furniture. Located in the heart of Kaanapali. Voted #1 Kaanapali beach by Conde Naste, exclusive access to the ONLY beachfront clubhouse with full kitchen on Maui. A210 faces Kaanapali North golf course with ocean views!! Spacious studio for 2 ADULTS ONLY. Full kitchen, washer and dryer, ac and King bed.

**Payable at Front Desk upon checkin: $60 check in fee and $
neighborhood_overview:
The condo is located in the heart of Kaanapali beach resort area framed by Kaanapali Golf Course, flowering plumeria trees and palm trees. Next door starts the ocean boardwalk – enjoy sunset walks or morning strolls along the boardwalk. Enjoy a short walk (12 mins) to Whaler’s Village shops, restaurants and major hotels from the Hyatt to Sheraton. The Kaanapali Trolley stops by our hotel and services the major hotels in the Kaanapali Beach Resort area.
Walk to Kaanapali Beach or our exclusive beachfront clubhouse with full kitchen, 2 outdoor showers, beach towels, chairs, recliners and ice machine. Or if you don’t want to walk to Kaanapali beach, enjoy a courtesy golf cart ride to from Front Desk to beachfront clubhouse, getting to beach never got easier or quicker – how easy is that!
Grocery store is a few miles either direction from the resort. Downtown Lahaina is a 5 minute drive heading east and Kapalua is 10 minute drive heading west.
host_about:
Raising the Standards at the Maui Eldorado for Over 20 Years

We're world travelers who first visited Maui over 20 years ago and have been in love with this special island ever since. As hospitality specialists, we have international experience at top hotels and restaurants in Asia. Beginning as condo owners at the Maui Eldorado, we were the first company to raise the standards, invest in quality, and begin upgrading condos. Since then, we’ve grown naturally to suit the needs of our owners and our guests. 

Pride in Everything We Do

From our background in food services, where we’ve won numerous awards, we know how to take care of our guests. We take pride in everything we do. Kaanapali Beach, and the west side of Maui, holds a special place in our hearts and we look forward to sharing our passion with you. 

Personal Guest Service - From Beginning to End
Based on-island, right in West Maui, we offer complete customer service throughout your Hawaiian vacation. From the moment you begin planning your trip to the time you leave, we’re here to help. We’ll be sure you find the perfect condo for your group and connect you with Maui’s top activities and attractions. 

Offering  privately-owned studios,  1 and 2 bedrooms at the Maui Eldorado Resort located on Kaanapali beach surrounded by Kaanapali golf course. Exclusive beachfront clubhouse with full kitchen on the beach!

As a host, customer satisfaction is our #1 priority, as we know you have choices. Let us help make MAUI memories last!!

description:

State of Hawaii requires us to collect ADDITIONAL transient accommodation tax (TAT10.25%), County of Maui TAT (3%), and General Excise Tax (GET4.1666%). These are NOT INCLUDED IN THE DAILY RATE.

The space
Our condo is thoroughly deep cleaned and vacant for at least 1 day prior to checking in for maximum safety. The master bed is California King sized and the sofa bed is full sized. neighborhood_overview: Should you wish to explore the area, world-class shopping and dining at Whaler’s Village is just a 10 minute stroll up the scenic beach path, and numerous activities can be enjoyed right off the beach, including surfing lessons, snorkel charters, sunset sails, and parasailing (May 16-Dec 14). Excellent snorkeling can also be had right off the beach at Black Rock a little further up the beach path, and if you want to attend a luau there are numerous choices within a short walk. If you want to hop in the car, the Hyatt is about two miles from historic downtown Lahaina with world-class dining and shopping and approximately 2 miles from luxurious Kapalua with its magnificent golf courses.

The guest bathroom comes with a combination shower/tub unit and single vanity. The main pool comes attached to a children's pool area, which comes with a sandy, beach-style entrance and waterslide for fun. The property also provides games, sports, and crafts for families to explore the Hawaiian culture. You can take hula lessons, create a lei from flowers, or take ukulele classes for fun. There are plenty of adventures for thrill seekers too. Take a hike at the nearby mountain, kayak in the ocean, or take a helicopter tour of Maui. The resort also offers multiple restaurants and bars that highlight the Hawaiian farmer's influence on the culture. Experience fresh Kona Lobster and grilled pineapples straight from the farmers' markets. After your adventure, come to our sister property (Westin Ka'anapali) and experience the Heavenly Spa Helani to indulge in relaxation. This resort community is home to the Aulani Disney Resort, the JW Marriott Ihilani Resort and Spa, the Marriott Beach Club, Ko Olina Golf Course and the Ko Olina Marina. You are located just steps from the beach and within walking distance of all of the numerous amenities offered throughout this vacation community. The Ted Robinson designed Ko Olina Championship Golf Course is home to the LPGA Lotte Championship. There are three full service spas located in Aulani, the Ihilani and the Marriott Beach Club. There are numerous fine dining options located throughout the resort community. The world-class Ko Olina Marina offers a selection of sports fishing, coastline cruises and water activities, from seasonal whale watching and dolphin sails to snorkeling among Hawaiian sea turtles and dramatic sunset cruises. The
host_about: My husband and I have been living in Hawaii for more than 18 years. We invested in KoOlina 12 years ago. The Beach Villas was our home residence for many years before our family started growing and we needed more space.  At that time we decided to share our beautiful beach villa with you.  I am originally from Venezuela, educated in Germany with a degree in Economics. I have been a Realtor in Hawaii for more than eleven years.  I also have extensive expertise in luxury vacation ownership with the two leading companies in the hospitality industry, Marriott and Hilton.  I am very lucky to have joined Island Living Homes to manage our clients' investments properties.   We absolutely love the KoOlina resort community and we can truly say that this resort is a 'place of joy'!

You will awake to the sites and sounds of the beautiful surf from your loft sleeping suite. Perk some Kona coffee and start your day Maui style, slow and easy. A morning walk along the ocean will take you as far away as Black Rock on beautiful Kaanapali Beach or as close as the off shore reef.

Papakea has 13 acres of lush gardens with tropical koi ponds. The tennis courts, putting greens and pools/hot tubs make your time as relaxing or as busy as you chose. The space

After a busy day, unwind with a relaxing soak in the garden tub and apprec
neighborhood_overview: Poʻipū Beach Park is located in the community of Poʻipū on the southern coast of Kauaʻi island in Hawaii. The beach is a park has lifeguards provided by the county of Kauaʻi.
host_about:
Suite Paradise – The gateway to island living.

Suite Paradise in sunny Poipu Beach on Kauai is home to hundreds of vacation rental properties, amenable to any sized group and any specifications you could think of. With the highest level of service and a wide range of vacation rental options, Suite Paradise can ensure that your stay is as seamless as Kauai’s lifestyle.

Choose from luxurious beach resorts, each with multiple pools and spas within walking distance and top-of-the-line amenities, including, but not limited to, full membership to Poipu Beach Athletic Club for the duration of your stay. Poipu Kai consists of 70 acres of lush tropical foliage and some of Kauai’s most sought-after vacation rentals. One complex is literally located nestled in a verdant and extinct volcano crater – you can’t get more immersed in the island lifestyle than that! From mauka (mountain) to makai (sea), Suite Paradise has something for you!

Kahala – A popular complex that is home to mostly one- and two-bedroom units. Kahala is only a short walk from the beach, and closest to Poipu Kai’s tennis courts and Kalapaki Joe’s sports bar. With the option of both mountain and ocean views available dependent on the unit, Kahala’s location is perfectly situated with proximity to Poipu Road as well as the Poipu Kai greenbelt.

Makanui – Two- and three-bedroom units perched across from Poipu Crater, with stunning mountain views, distant ocean views, and a short walk to the greenbelt path.

Manualoha –Less than a mile from the beach, although the complex pool is practically attached to the Pacific Ocean! With units sleeping four to six, easy access to the greenbelt pathway, and hues of purple bougainvillea draped throughout the complex.

Poipu Sands – One- and two-bedroom units with incredible ocean views, spacious lanais, and a short walk to Shipwreck’s Beach.

Regency – Larger units, spacious enough to accommodate up to 10 guests. Many of these units are newly remodeled and offer AC. Regency and Kahala sit right next to each other.

Regency Villas – Luxury units with central AC. Regency Villas often feature a loft and sleep up to five guests. Situated near the greenbelt for easy access to many resort amenities, and centrally located for a short walk to Brennecke's Beach, or access to the Grand Hyatt Kauai Resort.

Nihi Kai Villas - A comfortable and quiet beach resort with 70 condos to choose from. Located right across from the ocean.

Poipu Crater – Just as the name says, Poipu Crater is nestled in a verdant an extinct volcano crater, which makes the foliage truly breathtaking. With 30 condos to choose from, sleeping four to six guests, the choice is yours! Enjoy the tropical gardens and central location to all that Poipu has to offer.

Lawai Beach Resort - Luxurious oceanfront condos located directly across from arguably the best snorkeling spot on the island. Enjoy a short stroll to five-star dining at The Beach House or enjoy the view from Lawai Beach, as the surfers paddle out for a sunset session. With room to sleep up to six, Lawai Beach Resort has it all!

Poipu Kapili - A beautiful and peaceful resort located on five acres of meticulously landscaped oceanfront property.

Pili Mai - This is Kauai’s newest resort development of luxury condominiums, nestled among a championship golf course.

Not far from many of our Maui home rentals is Haleakalā National Park, an amazing destination for beautiful views, complete with a visitor center for educational information. Also near all of our Maui home rentals are a number of great shops and delicious restaurants for refueling after a long day at the beach. All of our Maui home rentals offer you all the comforts of home with the addition of luxurious amenities. Book one of iTrip Vacations' many beautiful Maui home rentals today for the trip of a lifetime!

host_about:
Aloha! My name is Jess and  my Airbnb experience started with my husband Chris and I  renting out our couch for a year! We met the coolest  people from all around the world and we were absolutely hooked! Fast forward 9 years later we are now managing 20+ units on Airbnb. We love it and love to travel ourselves! We are so thankful to live in such a beautiful place and can’t wait to share it with you. We love for all our guests to feel comfortable and welcomed. Looking forward to hosting you!
Mahalo!

Another passion of ours is saving animals so by booking with us you are directly helping us support Lucky Paws Animal Foundation!  Search:
Lucky paws Hawaii 

-Jess

description:
Enjoy the tranquility and seclusion of Makaha Valley. Breathtaking Ocean views and 360 degrees of valley views. Brand new home - your home away from home. Master bedroom downstairs separated from remaining bedrooms giving it more privacy, 2 other bedroom upstairs with shared bathroom. An enclosed yard and a gazebo for entertaining and enjoying the beautiful Hawaiian weather. BBQ grill available for use, just a few minute drive to Makaha beach and gorgeous Yokohama. Golf course just 1 min away.

The space
The house has 3 bedrooms, 2.5 baths, 2 car garage, and a full kitchen with new appliances. Enjoy fully equipped, preparing meals around family with plenty space to entertain.

This house is located in a safe and quiet gated community in the Makaha Valley, majestic mountain views and partial ocean views. Your home away from home is brand new and so is everything in it:)

We supply guests with one set of beach and bath towels per guest and start
neighborhood_overview:
The town's main attraction is Makaha Beach, mainly among surfers - it's one of the most popular beach in the world.However, there
are plenty of other beautiful and more calm beaches suitable for swimming and snorkeling of all levels. Every year surf events take place here, such as the Town and Country Pro, the Buffalo's Big Board Classic and the Rell Sunn's Menehune Surfing Championships. It's an ideal spot for surfers of all skill levels. Wave heights reach anywhere from 2 feet just behind the reef to 30+ feet at the so-called Makaha Bowl. Some of the biggest waves ever have been ridden here, including Greg Noll's famous ride during the huge swell of 1969 when waves were between 40 to 50 feet high.

The beach is wide and is also a nice spot for sunbathing and swimming. The best area for going into the water to just play and swim is the center of the beach, where there is no reef. The waves are calmest during the summer when there may be no surf at all. The high waves us

host_about:
The complex is located directly across from Kamaole III State Beach Park, which is known as one of the most beautiful and safest beaches in the Islands.  It is perfect for swimming, snorkeling, sunning, jogging, picnicking, kite flying, and especially enjoying amazing sunsets and whale watching.

Each unit has a private lanai that faces the interior of the complex, offering views of the expansive lawns, pools, and lush tropical landscape of palm trees, hibiscus, birds of paradise and plumeria trees.  Most lanais also offer views of the beautiful Pacific Ocean and spectacular sunsets.  

There are two pools, a covered pavilion, and a full size tennis court on the property.  Every evening the outdoor barbecue area is a popular spot to socialize while grilling the perfect dinner and watching as the Hale Kamaole conch shell band performs their nightly sunset ritual.

You will find world class golf courses, fantastic snorkeling and diving, many Maui activities, abundant shopping and delicious fine and family dining all within minutes of Hale Kamaole.

description:

host_about:
Vacasa
Vacation Home Management

Vacasa unlocks the possibilities of how we enjoy vacation homes. We take care of managing our homeowners’ vacation houses so they can have peace of mind (and their home when they want to). And our guests book vacations confidently knowing they’re going to find exactly what they’re looking for without any surprises.

Each vacation home is always cared for by our professional local teams who implement our high cleanliness and maintenance values, while the hands-off tasks of vacation rental management--marketing, filing taxes, and maintaining a website--are handled by a specialized central support team. Our passion and focus remain true: to empower our homeowners, guests, and employees to invest in vacation.

host_about: I’m enjoying the beautiful weather and spectacular scenery that Hawaii has to offer. I like to build and repair things and I love to spend time with my 2 dogs hiking the ridges and swimming at the beach. They have been keeping us very busy!

description:
Paulele is a beautiful Hawaiian-style home just across the street from breathtaking Hanalei Bay!
You’ll enjoy spectacular ocean, mountain, and waterfall views from many areas of the home and the world-renowned Hanalei Point surf break is in full view from the convenience of your front lanai! With a short path to the beach very near our home, you're 100 yards from the bay and an easy walk to Hanalei town. You'll find everything you need for a perfect tropical vacation!

The space
There are two identical primary suites, each with king beds, spacious bathrooms, as well as private entrances and lanais. The third bedroom has two twin beds, which can be converted to a king, and full bath with tub, while the lower level fourth bedroom has a king bed, shower bath, and private entrance.

For your comfort and convenience, there is an outdoor bamboo enclosed hot water shower, laundry room, covered shuffleboard court, and covered hammock, as well as lots of be
neighborhood_overview: Hanalei Bay is one of Hawaii’s most beautiful and pristine beaches, with only private homes, no hotels or condos, built on the beach. With Paulele, you’ll have the pleasure of walking to the beach any time of day, from the solitude of sunrise to the glory of a Hanalei sunset, while having all the comforts of home. And unlike those in Princeville and other parts of the island who have to drive to the beach at Hanalei, you’re already there! We love our Hanalei home and trust that like guests before you, you will too! We are happy to answer any of your questions and look forward to hearing from you soon to help plan your tropical getaway! Aloha
host_about:
Hi there,

My family has owned our beautiful Hanalei home for over twenty years and I was lucky enough to spend a good part of my childhood growing up there. I am now happy to help you realize a dream vacation on Kauai!
We are here to answer any questions you may have, and hope to exceed your vacation expectations. 
While we are relatively new to Airbnb, reviews for our home speak for themselves and you can find many more on the other popular vacation rental by owner site.

host_about:
Hawaii. Costa Rica. Jamaica. Bahamas. Yellowstone Park, etc... At the end of one trip, I'm just counting until the next excursion somewhere exciting.  I can't live without traveling. It's in my nomadic nature to roam and never stay in one place.  From food to culture to natural wonders, I love and desire the flavors of the world on my tongue, I love and desire to be immersed in a wholly different culture, and I want to see, hear and feel the natural wonders that surround us. With my loving husband and my two boys we travel at every opportunity and we enjoy snowboarding, surfing, sightseeing. We are fond of Hawaii and have been to three of the islands (Oahu, Maui, Kauai) more times than we can count. 
As a Host on AirBnb, we offer where we go and where we have been so we know what our Guests might experience during their stay. As a result, we have the highest confidence that our Guests' stay will be a truly wonderful experience. 

Aloha and Mahalo,
Abby Heo

description:

host_about:
Premier Kauai Vacation Rentals is owned by Cindy Plemer. Cindy is Hawaii-born and raised, waking up every day to the privilege of calling one of the most beautiful places in the world home: the Garden Isle of Kauai.

My passion has been connecting the land I love to guests, owners, sellers, renters and visitors throughout the world, turning dreams of Kauai into an attainable, magical reality.

By living the spirit of aloha, creating moments of a lifetime on Kauai for those around me, deep knowledge of the Kauai market, and real estate sales expertise, I have been successful in many areas of real estate. Beginning as a Resort General Manager for some of the world's largest hoteliers to property management experience and real estate sales, I've been entrusted to care for assets exceeding well over $50,000,000.

Whatever the occasion, if we may be of assistance, we are happy to be of service to you here on Kauai.

neighborhood_overview: Ko Olina is one of the most luxurious resorts in all of Hawaii, and is host to our ocean front Beach Villas, the Disney Aulani Hotel, the new Four Seasons Resort Hotel and Spa (opening March 2016), and Marriott Beach Club. host_about: My husband Ron and I have managed luxury condos at the Beach Villas at Ko Olina since 2008, and other US and European locations over the last 30 years.  We make every renter our first priority.  We love travel, exploring, friendship, meeting new and interesting people, Hawaii, California, Italy and SE Asia!  We have more than 1000 5-Star reviews from our guests for our various properties, including many who return year after year to the Beach Villas to let go, relax in luxury, and leave their worries behind.  Come visit us, meet the turtle family in the adjoining lagoons, and fall in love with Ko Olina.

description:

The space
Lay back and relax in this cute island-style two-bedroom two-bathroom oceanfront suite. Take in views of the vast Pacific Ocean from your furnished lanai with a wet bar—the perfect spot to entertain friends and family. You’ll also love the modern features of this unit, like the upgraded kitchen with granite countertops, ceramic double sink, and track lighting. There is also cozy breakfast nook with a dark wicker dining table for two. There is a large dining area with a table for six that looks out to the lanai. The living area is spacious, offering a beautiful wicker seating area, large flat screen television, and detailed wood furnishings. One bedroom has two Twin size beds with Mānoa-style bedding, a dresser, closet, and private lanai. The master bedroom
host_about:
Kanaloa at Kona by Castle welcomes the hopeless romantics, the thrill-seekers, and those who just want to have fun. Our resort feels secluded, but is close to charming shops, restaurants, and sits upon the dramatic lava rock coast. You’ll enjoy year-round sailing, snorkeling, and fishing, dine among spectacular Kona sunsets, and fall asleep to the sound of crashing waves.

Since 1993, Castle Resorts & Hotels has specialized in innovative hotel and resort management. We manage properties throughout the Hawaiian Islands, including Kauai, Oahu, Maui, Molokai, and Hawaii Island, as well as Auckland, New Zealand. Accommodations range from full-service hotels to resort condominiums and combines value, convenience, and authentic experiences.

description:
The Volcano Forest Escape is for people who want more out of life than the busy side of the island. It's within a 5 minute drive to the Volcanoes National Park, and 40 minutes to the famous black sand beach. House is full of beds, upgrades & charm.

The space
Spread out and enjoy this 3 BR/2BA house on a 1/2 acre. This is a great way to beat the heat and enjoy summertime in Hawaii or come during winter to see snow at the tops of Mauna Loa and/or Mauna Kea. This house is at a 3,700 foot elevation, with cool temperatures and in the middle of a native Hawaiian forest full of blossoming Ohia trees and giant fern trees. Just a mile from Volcanoes National Park, you'll find this park to be one of the most unique national parks with many displays, hiking trails, lava tubes, steam & sulfur vents. You can see how fresh lava covers the land and the process of nature and plants taking it back. There's a multitude of things to do within a 30-45 minute drive of this house - se
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is friendly and very quiet since homes are spaced fairly wide and in a forest type setting.
host_about: I love living in Hawaii and enjoying everything there is here. The culture, the people, the land and living aloha. It's been a fabulous 34 years so far. I like to entertain friends and family at home, at the beach or out on the town. I enjoy cooking (love to BBQ), being active in sports and other social activities.

Cheers Donna & Kevin
