Private, Ocean, and Maui Views on a three-acre farmstead await you. So much privacy that it feels like you are on thousands of acres.

Executive Suite for the price of a studio. Enjoy the spirit of Aloha in this private setting wi

host_about:
We are privileged to have Vacation Rental Property  in
Hawi Hawaii 

We love what we do, and our guests truly enjoy this magnificent place. So whether your travel plans take you to either destination, we hope you will choose one of our lovely properties.



HAWI HAWAII PROPERTY
We love what we do, and enjoy our guests! 

With years of experience in entrepreneurship, starting several successful businesses, and enjoying them all, we have focused on the things we loved best from all our endeavors and incorporated them into this new venture.  
We enjoy interacting with our guests and sharing the beauty of the Island with them. 

Always In Season is your home away from home. 
The Hawaii Farmstead is loaded with fruits and vegetables!. Our greatest joy is hosting a culinary class or retreat for those choosing to incorporate more health in their lifestyle.  Our wellness library is for lending, and we encourage our guest to take advantage of it.  

While Kevin is busy managing the farmstead, I have a health and wellness coaching practice.  I specialize in helping social and ecologically responsible business people and health practitioners expand their businesses while balancing a healthy lifestyle. 

We also offer a week-long Culinary Healing Arts Retreat Package where you're immersed in a whole foods diet and exercise program with daily culinary classes.  Our retreat packages offer you the option to go on several guided excursions to places that resonate with you. We guide you to get the most out of your retreat. This Island is full of secret places that nurture your body mind and spirit. We can share more with you when we speak. 

 “Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food”—Hippocrates

host_about:
I fell in love with the living energy of the Big Island the first time I was here and I love sharing that energy with visitors.

I worked for Cirque du Soleil as a Stage Manager for over a decade and lived in Japan for two years before moving back to Oahu with my husband and two kids.  I now own and run a coffee shop on Oahu, make jewelry, paint and work for Hawaii Opera Theatre. 

I'm honored to share the aloha spirit with all who choose to welcome it and I aim to provide a quiet, peaceful and relaxing home to stay in during your visit.

KBM Resorts caters to those who appreciate the size and comfort of a fully equipped property but don't want to sacrifice the convenience and amenities of a 5 star hotel. KBM Resorts blends these two worlds together by providing beautiful, full-size residences with hotel-style features and amenities you have come to expect from the finest hotel resorts. Each KBM Resort property features Fully-equipped kitchens, complimentary L'Occitane bath and body lotions, housekeeping and concierge teams, personal grocery delivery, personal greeters and more.

Each KBM Resorts location is fully-staffed with local Guest Ambassadors, Concierge Agents, Activities Desk, Maintenance and Housekeeping teams, Quality Control Inspectors, Laundry facilities and more. If your family ever needs assistance or service our staff is just steps away and ready to help. We employ only dedicated local professionals who believe in our community, deeply care for our Homeowners and Guests, and are genuinely excited to share local expertise to deliver your family a dream vacation.

All KBM Resort locations feature beautiful distinctive residences, professional cleaning and sanitization, fully-equipped kitchens, 24/7 Guest Support teams, complimentary high-speed WiFi, and a seamless checkin process. You and your family are always a call, click, or text away from our local Guest Ambassadors whose sole mission is to deliver your dream vacation.

host_about:
Kona Coast Vacations hosts over 5,400 reservations a year with the help of knowledgeable management, proficient team members and trusted home owners. Open 7 days a week, we strive to help with each visitors’ every need. Sharing Aloha from the first contact whether it is phone or email, we are here to assist by making the booking process as seamless as can be. We pride ourselves on providing hands on assistance whenever it is needed, whether it is reservation details, maintenance issues, or even booking activities! 

Kona Coast Vacations is fortunate to team up with great property owners which is instrumental in providing exceptional homes for our new and returning guests. With over 240 vacation rentals from oceanfront homes, ocean view condos and private estates, we are here for your every need, open seven days a week to take care of our guests and owners. With two locations in Kailua Kona and Mauna Lani we have dedicated specialists in guest services managing reservations, maintenance, and property checks alongside our accounting, support and marketing specialists. We are proud to be Airbnb members since 2001 and now are Superhosts with over 1070 reviews.
We hope to host you Hawaii and help create a memory to last you a lifetime. We are your “’Ohana” (family) on the Big Island of Hawaii, please do not hesitate to utilize our listed resources and book activities thru Kona Concierge.

description:
The Blue Door on Church Street. This beautiful two bedroom villa boasts gorgeous views of Haleakala.

The space
The Blue Door on Church Street (@bluedoormaui) is the perfect home for your Maui adventures. Get out of the hectic hotel zones and experience Hawaii in relaxed, luxurious accommodations. We are nestled below beautiful I'ao Valley in historic Wailuku Town. Walk to shops, restaurants, coffee, yoga, theatre, food trucks, and more. A short drive from I'ao Valley, Whole Foods, beaches, the MACC, and only 15 min from the airport. Marvel at views of Haleakala from the deck and sleep deeply on new Nectar mattresses.

The Blue Door is a large 1930's plantation home which has been meticulously renovated to create an unforgettable experience for you and your guests. We are centrally located on Maui, which means that all the island has to offer is at your fingertips! This 2 Bedroom villa includes parking for 2 vehicles. There is a King Nectar mattress in
neighborhood_overview: Historic Wailuku is convenient and a lot of fun. Walk to Wailuku Coffee Company or Maui Juice Co to grab your morning beverage before heading out for your adventures. Hike the Waihe'e Ridge, explore I'ao Valley, or check out the historic Ka'ahumanu Church, built in 1876! See what's playing at the historic (and haunted) 1920's I'ao Theatre, and head to dinner at 808 on Main or the HI Thai Food truck, all within a short walk. Grab a high-end tropical drink at the Esters Fair Prospect, hear live music at the Way Bar, and have an unforgettable meal at the Mill House at the Maui Tropical Plantation. Drive to Hana for the day, check out the shops and beaches of Paia, head up to Haleakala for the sunrise, or zip out to old Lahaina town... the central location makes it all possible.
host_about:
Avid surfer, student of life, meditation enthusiast, traveler. East coast born and raised, fell in love with Maui in 2005. 

The Blue Door on Church Street is my passion project and I am excited to finally share it with you. My team and I want to make your stay on Maui exceptional in every way.

Lydgate Beach Park and Smith's Tropical Paradise are also worth visiting. Looking to get your feet wet? Kayaking, water skiing and sailing adventures can be found near the property.

neighborhood_overview:
The Aina Nalu is located in the heart of historic old Lahaina Town. Day or night, a short walk will bring you to Front Street where you can stroll through art galleries, sample the local fare at restaurants or hunt for treasures in quaint shops. During the day - the beach, snorkeling, or learning to surf or paddleboard are convenient for you to enjoy. Lahaina is also the main harbor town if you’d like to embark on a whale watch, dolphin sightings, scuba dive or all the other marine opportunities to surrounding areas.
A boutique-style resort set on 9 acres of lush landscaping is an oasis of tranquility; an alternative to the Lahaina hotels on the busy waterfront, the perfect place to relax and enjoy the “Aloha” Spirit.

neighborhood_overview: The Royal Mauian is located on Maui’s most pristine beaches, Kamaole I and II. Just steps from the complex you will find restaurants, shopping, health food stores, snorkel rentals and a surf school. Maui’s unique and varied terrain offers a multitude of activities. From relaxing on some of the world’s most beautiful white sand beaches to the more adventurous undertakings of zip-lining and paragliding. The Royal Mauian's location is such that there are many activities and attractions right at your finger tips. Some of Maui’s top attractions are: Maalaea Harbor; many boats leave from Maalaea on snorkeling trips, deep sea fishing, scuba diving, whale watching (in season), sunset cruises, and more. It is much faster to leave from Maalaea Harbor than Lahaina Harbor when taking trips to Molokini Crater and Turtle Town. Other attractions include Maui Ocean Center, Haleakala Volcano, Shops at Wailea, Iao Valley, Wailea Golf Club, King Kamehameha Golf Club, Maui Tropical Plantation, and the Wha

description:

Other amenities include a washer/dryer, cable, high-speed Internet,
host_about:
Kanaloa at Kona by Castle welcomes the hopeless romantics, the thrill-seekers, and those who just want to have fun. Our resort feels secluded, but is close to charming shops, restaurants, and sits upon the dramatic lava rock coast. You’ll enjoy year-round sailing, snorkeling, and fishing, dine among spectacular Kona sunsets, and fall asleep to the sound of crashing waves.

Since 1993, Castle Resorts & Hotels has specialized in innovative hotel and resort management. We manage properties throughout the Hawaiian Islands, including Kauai, Oahu, Maui, Molokai, and Hawaii Island, as well as Auckland, New Zealand. Accommodations range from full-service hotels to resort condominiums and combines value, convenience, and authentic experiences.

description:
This beautiful, newly remodeled home is the closest you can get to a resort , only without all the hassles of a large public facility. 3200 sq feet of lovely tropical decor, with all natural fabric tropical design bedding and furniture. ,.....Natural fabrics on all beds, books and DVD's, the "Ultimate "Hawaii Tour guide book in every room ,Ocean views ,an acre of tropical garden. Six types of tropical fruit, a gorgeous lap pool and hot tub, with sand pool for kids. Close proximity to sites.

The space

All bedrooms and main living areas have air conditioning units

neighborhood_overview: Honomu Place is located in the Hamakua Heritage Coast area of Hilo. Honomu town is a quaint old style Hawaiian town with a famous bakery, gift stores, churches and the famous Zip Line attraction. Akaka Falls lies within minutes of the house. The remarkable 4 mile scenic coast route is minutes down the road, and roughly halfway through, the Hawaiian Botanical Tropical Gardens can be visited. There's no place like this in all the Islands!!!
host_about: I am a family man. My wife and I enjoy traveling and have learned about what makes a person feel very special when they stay in a vacation rental or hotel. Our favorite destinations are China, England, Australia, Canada, but our top of the list place is still Hawaii. We love being with old and new friends, we love simply being alive and appreciating what we have. We like to cook and eat good food, Watching movies, reading a good book, hosting a special dinner and a walk on the beach are things that give us special pleasure. I enjoy playing and listening to music and watching a beautiful sunset. We appreciate our guests  and do everything in our power to make them feel at home and that we care they have a unique and memorable vacation.

neighborhood_overview:
Located just across the street from Kalepolepo Beach Park, guests enjoy a short walk to the ocean. Also nearby, you will find two grocery stores, as well as many other shops and restaurants. Need coffee? Starbucks is less than a mile away.
Want some fresh island fish? One of our favorites, Eskimo Candy Seafood and Deli, is also located about 1 mile from the property. Here you can take advantage of all that the ocean has to offer, including Ono Fish and Chips, Seared Ahi Wrap and their amazing chowder.
host_about:
We run a professional property management company, Great Rentals On Maui, since 2007.

Kelli is licensed real estate broker for Maui Kama'aina Real Estate and Micheal holds an active Hawaii real estate license. We consider it an honor to be able to help others plan their Hawaiian vacation to this beautiful island and consider ourselves so lucky to call Maui home. We've also assisted many with finding their very own vacation home on Maui!

Some of our favorite things to do on Maui:  Snorkel with the turtles (honu) at Turtle Town, Stand-up paddle  (especially during Whale Season when we get to enjoy the awe-inspiring presence of the Humpback Whales during their migration), Maui sunsets, and hanging out with friends and family at our favorite South Maui beaches.

Don't hesitate to ask us about our favorite dining establishments and activities!

description:

With breathtaking views and close proximity to the complex pools, tennis courts, and pathway leading straight to Poipu Beach, you could not ask for a better location.
*Maximum occupancy and sleeping arrangements for 4 guests.

The space
View the lovely garden and courtyard landscapes upon entry and be taken back by the gorgeous bright blue Pacific Ocean visible from the lanai, dining area, and kitchen! You will surely appreciate the open and airy interior space that boasts a large living room, a well-equipped kitchen with a separate dining room, sizable bathroom with tile shower, and the fun island themed décor throughout. This home away from home has everything you need to make your dream island vacation come true.

Property Amenities
*AC Unit in Master Suite Only; Liv
neighborhood_overview: Poʻipū Beach Park is located in the community of Poʻipū on the southern coast of Kauaʻi island in Hawaii. The beach is a park has lifeguards provided by the county of Kauaʻi.
host_about:
Suite Paradise – The gateway to island living.

Suite Paradise in sunny Poipu Beach on Kauai is home to hundreds of vacation rental properties, amenable to any sized group and any specifications you could think of. With the highest level of service and a wide range of vacation rental options, Suite Paradise can ensure that your stay is as seamless as Kauai’s lifestyle.

Choose from luxurious beach resorts, each with multiple pools and spas within walking distance and top-of-the-line amenities, including, but not limited to, full membership to Poipu Beach Athletic Club for the duration of your stay. Poipu Kai consists of 70 acres of lush tropical foliage and some of Kauai’s most sought-after vacation rentals. One complex is literally located nestled in a verdant and extinct volcano crater – you can’t get more immersed in the island lifestyle than that! From mauka (mountain) to makai (sea), Suite Paradise has something for you!

Kahala – A popular complex that is home to mostly one- and two-bedroom units. Kahala is only a short walk from the beach, and closest to Poipu Kai’s tennis courts and Kalapaki Joe’s sports bar. With the option of both mountain and ocean views available dependent on the unit, Kahala’s location is perfectly situated with proximity to Poipu Road as well as the Poipu Kai greenbelt.

Makanui – Two- and three-bedroom units perched across from Poipu Crater, with stunning mountain views, distant ocean views, and a short walk to the greenbelt path.

Manualoha –Less than a mile from the beach, although the complex pool is practically attached to the Pacific Ocean! With units sleeping four to six, easy access to the greenbelt pathway, and hues of purple bougainvillea draped throughout the complex.

Poipu Sands – One- and two-bedroom units with incredible ocean views, spacious lanais, and a short walk to Shipwreck’s Beach.

Regency – Larger units, spacious enough to accommodate up to 10 guests. Many of these units are newly remodeled and offer AC. Regency and Kahala sit right next to each other.

Regency Villas – Luxury units with central AC. Regency Villas often feature a loft and sleep up to five guests. Situated near the greenbelt for easy access to many resort amenities, and centrally located for a short walk to Brennecke's Beach, or access to the Grand Hyatt Kauai Resort.

Nihi Kai Villas - A comfortable and quiet beach resort with 70 condos to choose from. Located right across from the ocean.

Poipu Crater – Just as the name says, Poipu Crater is nestled in a verdant an extinct volcano crater, which makes the foliage truly breathtaking. With 30 condos to choose from, sleeping four to six guests, the choice is yours! Enjoy the tropical gardens and central location to all that Poipu has to offer.

Lawai Beach Resort - Luxurious oceanfront condos located directly across from arguably the best snorkeling spot on the island. Enjoy a short stroll to five-star dining at The Beach House or enjoy the view from Lawai Beach, as the surfers paddle out for a sunset session. With room to sleep up to six, Lawai Beach Resort has it all!

Poipu Kapili - A beautiful and peaceful resort located on five acres of meticulously landscaped oceanfront property.

Pili Mai - This is Kauai’s newest resort development of luxury condominiums, nestled among a championship golf course.

host_about:
Passionate about happy & healthy for all. An alternative medicine, holistic healing arts proponent I believe all healing comes from the inside out. Ecstatic to have the opportunity to share this magnificent location with guests. 

The macadamia nut orchard boasts 200 actively producing trees for your tasting pleasure along with a variety of other tropical edible fruit. We have figs, bananas, guava, papaya and even pineapples growing here!

Our pool is refreshing and the panoramic ocean view can be seen from the tennis court and a peek from the lanai also. Check our progress on the tiny treehouse with ocean views and the flyarium (7200 ft of open flight for parrots). Visit with the on site macaws and don't miss chicken river!

We have so much fun experiencing the natural wild Hawaii here and hope you will too! Green Sand beach is so worth a visit and so is the South Point diving cliff... ask us how to get there for tips only locals know :) 

Mahalo (thanks)

neighborhood_overview: Should you wish to explore the area, world-class shopping and dining at Whaler’s Village is just a 10 minute stroll up the scenic beach path, and numerous activities can be enjoyed right off the beach, including surfing lessons, snorkel charters, sunset sails, and parasailing (May 16-Dec 14). Excellent snorkeling can also be had right off the beach at Black Rock a little further up the beach path, and if you want to attend a luau there are numerous choices within a short walk. If you want to hop in the car, the Marriott Maui Ocean Club is about two miles from historic downtown Lahaina with world-class dining and shopping and approximately 2 miles from luxurious Kapalua with its magnificent golf courses.

description:

Just 33 minutes to Waikiki * 30 minutes to the North Shore, this newly renovated executive home has split AC & heat in every room * fitness gym * large covered patio for BBQ * modern kitchen * ensuite master bedroom & a porte-cochere that will welcome you to the convenience of island living."

The vaulted ceiling in the living room with its lure between the dining and kitchen area will unite any family on stay. Just steps away, a separate studio with its own bathroom is part of this unique property.

description:
Located about 30 minutes' drive from the Kona airport (KOA), this special property is an updated home in the old Kona style, with tropical decor in a casual, comfortable setting, situated diagonally across the street from Honl's beach. You can walk into Kona town or stay home and dine on the private roof deck overlooking the blue Pacific, watching the sun set. The property has a spacious lawn, with lots of shade from large banyan and monkeypod trees on one end and a rubber tree on the other.

The space
This is not a luxury rental but is very comfortable, and the location can't be beat. Though the property is within easy walking distance to town, it offers a private setting, with a lovely lawn and large shade trees. neighborhood_overview:
The location of this home is truly ideal if you're looking for a property that isn't a cookie cutter condo but still gives you easy access to Kona town and it's dining options and night life. It's a 10 to 15 minute walk to town, and Honl's beach is across the street to the right, about a minute away.

The "KONA TROLLY " is a great way to take a relaxing tour of Kona Town, or a rest while walking around.

We are a globe trotting retired couple who are excited to share our Kona home.

A 2 minute walk gets you on miles of beach known as Sugar Beach due to the sugary sand. Maui, the way it should be experienced. Koa Resort.

We are directly across the street and the walk will only be a minute or two till you are on the beach. If you walk to the right you will find Sugar Beach. This beach is called this because of the sugar-like soft sand. Sugar Beach stretches on for miles.
host_about:
No Ka'Oi or "The Best" - Maui is simply the best. If you traveled the world, you'll be hard pressed to find better than the island of Maui. 

A few things I love about Maui are the health, clean air and aloha spirit. We enjoy slowing down on Maui, eating in season local fruit, attending Farmer's markets, dipping our toes in the ocean and relaxing. I hope you love your stay in Maui and we are grateful to be a part of it.

This condo is located at the Club Wyndham Kona Coast Resort, it is nestled along the scenic Kona coastline of Hawaii’s Big Island, this resort is just a few miles away from pristine Keauhou Bay, the Hulihee Palace, and two historic national parks. host_about: Hello! After many years of vacation club and property ownership, we have had the opportunity to appreciate how extremely convenient and comfortable these style stays can be for all types of travel. As our family has grown, we've found that we have more than we need and are able to utilize every year which lead us to start offering our properties at a great deal to others! With years of experience, our knowledge has allowed us to help others enjoy their vacations and make life long memories. We've been able to grow the services we offer into a business that now also manages multiple different owners with various types of ownerships!  We are happy to be in a place where we can help both owners and vacationers, so don't hesitate to ask for what you need - even if it is not directly listed! We can often book multiple units and/or offer nearby locations. Booking multiple condos at one of our resorts is one of our favorite ways to get family and friends together. Whether you are celebrating or simply spending time together with friends or family, book with us for your next vacation -  Traveling only expands one's horizons!

description:
The 'Auwai Suite is a lovely, self-contained apartment at the back of our historic Waimea Guest House built in the 1800's. This suite is named for the 100-year-old Hawaiian irrigation canal that runs through the property.

It has a full kitchen, dining area, beautifully tiled bathroom, bedroom with queen bed and two window seats, a shared back lanai, and a private outdoor table and chairs.
This is a most popular suite in Waimea Guest House and is great for extended stays.

The space
The ‘Auwai Suite is a lovely, self-contained apartment at the back of Waimea Guest House. It has a full kitchen, dining area, and beautifully tiled bathroom, as well as a large bedroom - with high vaulted ceilings, a queen bed, and two window seats - that opens out onto a shared back lanai.

To find the entrance to this unit, guests follow the traditional Hawaiian ‘auwai (irrigation ditch) that runs along the property towards the back. The most private of th
neighborhood_overview: We are located on the "sunny side" of Waimea, just off the Kawaihae Road.  Our home is tucked into a quiet residential neighborhood at the base of the Kohala mountain range.
host_about: Lea, born and raised on the Island of Hawaii, just returned with her husband, Pat. We think Waimea is the very best place to live -- central, a little cooler and surrounded by an adorable town.  We offer Hawaiian hospitality to travelers who are looking for an authentic island experience.  We love the Big Island and know it well. The best part of hosting is getting to share tips and tricks with our guests and make sure they see the real deal while staying with us.

description:

The space

Maluhia ma ka Honua means "Peace on Earth" and that is what you will find in this beautiful house located just a 40 second walk to the ocean and just four houses from famous Brennecke's Beach in Poipu Beach Park.

The question everyone asks themselves as they leave the airport and drive to Poipu is “Did I rent a good house?” Just before you arrive at Maluhia ma ka Honua, your first thought will be “WOW! The ocean is really close!” As you turn up Nalo Road you can't really see the house well because the beautiful white Plumeria trees are in bloom and they hide the house front a bit. You open the front door, remove yo
neighborhood_overview:
Driving to Poipu, people always wonder “Did I rent a good house?” Drive just 200 feet from the ocean to reach Maluhia ma ka Honua. Your first thought will be “WOW! The ocean is really close!” The best place to park your car is on the street right in front of the front door. Walk up the meandering walk to the front porch, remove your shoes and step into the entry of this Hawaiian plantation style home and you immediately begin to see the great decorating and furnishings.

Poipu is a wonderful place. Sophisticated yet down-home. This house is located wind shadow of a small extinct volcano cone (there are condos built down in the cone) that creates a wonderful micro-climate. There are plenty of trade winds that keep the house cool but it seems like most of the rain skirts the house and falls a few houses farther west.

This house is located in single-family neighborhood as close to the ocean as you can possibly imagine. The closest beach is a two minute stro

neighborhood_overview: Environmental Disclosure. Guest acknowledges that the State of Hawaii is exposed to environmental hazards including, but not limited to, tidal waves, hurricanes and floods. Please refer to the local phone book for information pertaining to evacuation procedures. In the event of an emergency, the State of Hawaii utilizes a warning alert system (emergency sirens are tested on the first working day of every month at 11:45 a.m.). Guest is responsible for using their best efforts to familiarize themselves with property, its location, and surroundings. Some of the properties are in a remote location. As such, what would be considered normal response time for public services in an urban area may not be available in this location, i.e., police, fire, and emergency services. neighborhood_overview:
Activities:
There is more to do in and around Hilo than any town on any of the Islands. It just isn’t well advertised because there aren’t resorts to promote the area. Please visit http://hilovacationhomes.com/hilo-activities/ for the best organized site - showing activities by driving direction.
These include:
*Historic Downtown with shops and restaurants on the Bay.
* Waterfalls right in town. Rainbow Falls and Boiling Pots.
* Akaka Falls just 25 minutes North of Hilo
* Volcano National Park, just 35 minutes above Hilo
* Hawaiian Botanical Gardens.One of the nicest gardens you will find.
* Hilo Farmers Market. Everyday but largest on Wednesday and Saturday.
* Liliuckalani Gardens at Hilo Bay including Coconut Island.
* Lyland museum for historic information and geologic rocks.
* Tsunami museum housed in a historic bank
* Wine tasting at the Volcano Winery
* Beer tasting right in town at Hawaii Nui Brewe

description:
Gorgeous and unique indoor/outdoor oceanfront estate living in a private gated home.
Offers pristine views of Holualoa Bay and lush area landscaping that accentuate the native Ohia wood and Balinese style throughout this very private, resort-style guest suites.
Located just by Keolonahihi State Historical Park an ancient site, where Hawaiian warriors would come to practice their skills. also, known for the canoes that were hand crafted where a temple for surfers was constructed.

The space
Open floor plan. The three private guest-suite 'pods' and main house are built around a deck, offering indoor/outdoor living. Hear the ocean breezes and the sound of the surf while luxuriating around the infinity pool...with the ocean just a few steps away. Tranquil, fun and beautiful, this home is unique in every way!

In Hawaii, There are mandatory GE and TA taxes of 14.5%,
at this time, Airbnb doesn't collect the state tax separately, to avoid th
neighborhood_overview: Hale Ohia is located behind the private gates of a very tiny oceanfront community, along the popular and scenic Ali'i Drive. Just a short drive to the heart of downtown Kailua Kona, markets, white-sand beaches, and outdoor activities.
host_about:
First came to Kailua Kona Hi, to compete in the Ironman Triathlon competition, fell in love with the Islands, and stayed. 
Kundalini Yoga teacher, lover of sports: cycling, swimming, running but most of all surfing.
The Big Island of Hawaii -  is a place of great beauty, excellent weather, and many fun activities.
Honolulu offers all city advantages with little noise and pollution. 
The greatest surf breaks are found on the Islands of Hawaii as well as Kite & wind surfing, Golfing, snorkeling, diving, paddling and amazing hikes. 
The Islands of Hawaii are some of the most precious gems on our planet and so is the culture of the 
Hawaiian people their wisdom and knowledge, I feel that It is a great privilege to live here.

We have oceanside gas grills for our guests to enjoy and a heated pool. Free wi-fi and free parking are included. Minutes away from Lahaina and Kaanapali in beautiful Honokowai. Clean and quiet. Minutes away from restaurants, grocery stores, shops ,golfing, horseback riding and of course all water activities you might want to enjoy. You can swim and snorkel right out front of our condos. We have a reef break about 100 yards out that keeps the water calm and family friendly. Your own little slice of heaven awaits. Come enjoy the best of Maui's west side at affordable prices. Mahalo!

At the beach you will find the Napua Restaurant with delicious entrees, a full bar, and an incredible beach view. Just a short distance away (approximately a 5 min drive) are the Shops at Mauna Lani, where you can dine and shop. Restaurants include the Tommy Bahama Restaurant & Bar, Shiono (sushi), Ruth's Chris Steak House, and Pele's Wok. The Shops also has the Foodland Farms grocery store where you can pickup delicious and fresh poke.
neighborhood_overview: The Mauna Lani has just undergone a massive renovation and is now the premier location on the Kohala Coast.  All the best beaches are close by as well as shops, restaurants, golf, diving and whales (November through March).  You can't beat it!

The space

Review our calendar for your desired dates. If not showing available, please make an inquiry and we will happily double-check for you! Enjoy our early checkin time of 11am so you can make the most of your vacation!
neighborhood_overview:
Surrounding area - Captain Cook is a small town just 15 minutes south of Kailua-Kona. There is a grocery store and restaurants near by. A few minutes down the mountain is Kealekakua Bay (Captain Cook's monument) and some of the best snorkeling and kayaking in the world; Pu'uhonua o Honaunau National Historical Park better known as the City of Refuge; and Volcano National Park is just 90 miles south.

Beach access - Pu'u Mahana is located on the mauka (mountain) side of the highway and is just 15 minutes from City of Refuge and Kealakekua Bay (amazing snorkeling). In Kona visit Magic Sands and Kahalu'u, a short 20 minute drive from our property. The most pristine golden sand beaches on the island are located north of the airport and take just 45 minutes; Hapuna State Park, Kua Bay, Beach 69, and Kekaha.

It's just a quick 5-minute stroll to the beach, as well as an array of restaurants, and shopping centers. To make your stay even more enjoyable, free parking and Wi-Fi are included!

host_about:
Welcome to Midway Realty, we are a licensed full-service real estate management company and Travel Agency specializing in high-quality destination vacation rentals in Waikiki on the beautiful island of Oahu and also in Maui.

Our objective is to help you create a memorable vacation where you and your Ohana (Hawaiian for family) will make new memories… rejuvenate, relax and refresh relationships by providing you with a complete Hawaiian experience and atmosphere full of quality time in Hawaii Nei (beautiful Hawaii).

description:
The Glamper is a DEAL: vehicle AND a room at an amazing bargain!

This Glamper van works great to get back and forth to the beach!
It has a small quirk in that it takes two times turning the key to start van.
We desire transparency with our guests and we want to reassure you that it is still a very comfy and well maintained Glamper van.

View our 2 min promo vid on YouTube for this epic adventure!
Search: "The Glamper Just Made Vacations Better | Hotels Are So Yesterday"

The space
Amenities included:

Sleeping arrangements include:
8” Memory foam bed w/ sheets, pillows & comforter
2 Burner Stove w/gas and assorted cooking gear
Sink and water reservoir w/shower
Yeti cooler

host_about:
Hi, Aloha our family was inspired to start this business a year ago. Hotels are so last year! A rental van and a place to sleep all in ONE! Hawaii has become a second home to us. We moved here from Southern California. We love going to the beach with our family, hiking and exploring the beauty of the island. We wanted to give the same amazing beach front stay and rental car experience at an affordable exceptional cost to others traveling to our Beautiful Island of Oahu Hawaii. You get a rental van and a place to stay for less money then it cost to rent a car in the island’s.  
May God Bless You! 
We Hope to see you soon! Aloha enjoy

description:
Welcome to the Hale Lani o Aloha (Heavenly House of Love)!
Kick back and relax in this peaceful and lovely ohana (Hawaiian guesthouse) after a fun full day of exploring the beautiful Big Island. It is centrally and conveniently located near the airport between the Kona downtown/restaurant zone and Waikoloa hotel/beach zone, tucked in the quiet hillside community, where beautiful lush surroundings and ocean breeze welcome you.

* To book for 3 guests, please read below & contact me first. Mahalo!

The space
This tastefully designed and upgraded and beautifully furnished place is a home away from home that welcomes you with much Aloha. This bright and airy oasis is perfect for a couple looking for a cozy, peaceful, and beautiful accommodation that is fully equipped with everything you need for your perfect & romantic vacation.

Although our ohana is the best for a couple and priced accordingly, we do, however, welcome one more guest, totall
neighborhood_overview:
Beautiful and peaceful neighborhood high above airport (at 1,450 feet high), centrally and conveniently located between the Kona downtown/pier and Waikoloa hotel zone. We are 10 minutes away from the Kona airport, but you don't hear the planes at all.
If you want to experience true Big Island living surrounded by lush greens, this is where you want to be amongst the long time local residents. After a fun day around the island, relax and wind down at our quiet, cool breezy ohana (Hawaiian guesthouse)
host_about:
We are truly blessed to be able to host guests in our beautiful ohana/guesthouse. 
Both my husband and I were born in Pennsylvania but spent many years living in California before moving here to serve/volunteer for the community and youth in need. We were avid travelers in the mainland, but now that we are here, our focus is our volunteer/mission work in the poverty stricken areas of the island and other remote islands of the South Pacific.

description:
Get the most from your magical Hawaiian experience in this cozy unit located just blocks from the shores of Waikiki. With resort-style amenities and a prime location, you’ll have everything you need to maximize your tropical getaway. This climate-controlled vacation home features an open concept floorplan with a charming island aesthetic & handsome hardwood flooring throughout. Gaze at that Hawaiian blue sea with your morning coffee or an evening cocktail from your private lanai.

The space
This 11th floor 463 square foot unit is a 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom suite that offers city and mountain views. It is furnished with a large cozy sofa and a spacious King bed with fresh linens to ensure a peaceful rest for up to four guests. The suite also has a flat screen TV and Wi-Fi to keep you entertained. The bathroom has a vanity and full tub for relaxing after a day of exploration. The bathroom countertops offer a modern feel in a locally-themed suite. For all of our busines
host_about:
Bamboo Waikiki Hotel features a selection of moderately priced guest rooms, studios, and suites in a “tropical-urban Zen” atmosphere that makes you feel relaxed and refreshed. All accommodations offer a private lanai, WiFi access, air conditioning, flat screen LCD TV, iDock, laptop-compatible safe. While all rooms include at least a microwave, coffee maker, and mini-refrigerator, select rooms include a kitchenette or full kitchen.

You’ll love Bamboo Waikiki Hotel’s easy access to the golden sands of Waikiki Beach and the International Market Place. Embrace the action that makes Waikiki the world’s most famous urban resort. Then retreat to your tranquil oasis away to unplug and revive.

Since 1993, Castle Resorts & Hotels has specialized in innovative hotel and resort management. We manage properties throughout the Hawaiian Islands, including Kauai, Oahu, Maui, Molokai, and Hawaii Island, as well as Auckland, New Zealand. Accommodations range from full-service hotels to resort condominiums and combines value, convenience, and authentic experiences.

description:

description:
The Seaside Zen Cottage is a casually comfortable 3 BR, 3 bath cottage literally fronting the ocean about 2.5 miles south of Kailua town. A comforable living room, fully equipped kitchen & large lanai. An ideal place for couples to get away with families & friends. Queen beds & high thread count sheets, combined with the sound of the ocean waves guarantee a great night's sleep. Enjoy our large lawn, hammock & beach for relaxation & fun.

The space
The Seaside Zen Cottage is a casually comfortable 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom cottage located about 2.5 miles south of Kailua-Kona and fronting a sandy beach and a sheltered lagoon.

Living and dining share space on the first floor. The living dining space is an excellent example of ‘mauka – makai‘ (mountain-ocean) design. Daily sea breezes and evening mountain air cools the space. There is a bookcase in the corner, where over the years we have collected a lot of “airplane books.” Find your favorite author and
neighborhood_overview:
We are located in a residential neighborhood. We ask that noise level that can impact our neighbors stop no later than 9pm.
The beaches are "closed" at 9pm - if there are people on the beach disturbing you please notify our on-site caretaker and they will deal with it for you.
host_about: I have lived here in Kona most of my life and enjoy sharing the beauty of the islands with everybody! I look forward to helping you plan to get the most out of your visit and hope you will return again and again. Aloha, Lisa

description:
Top Floor "Penthouse" Partial Oceanview Suite, 1 Bedroom, 1 Bathroom, Sleeps 4, Pacific Ocean and West Maui Mountain Views

The space
Maui Resort Rentals is very proud to present another brand new offering from the Honua Kai family of suites on Kaanapali North Beach!

This beautifully appointed top floor "penthouse" 1 bedroom, 1 full bathroom suite has partial ocean views and majestic views of the West Maui Mountains. Additionally, this suite has a southern exposure which equates to more sun and less direct wind. This generates the perfect balance for Hawaiian air conditioning in addition to the central a/c.

The kitchen is fully appointed with stainless steel Bosch appliances and granite countertops, as well as our commercial grade Vitamix blender for use with smoothies or libations of your choice. One of the hallmarks of this suite is its southern exposure which offers morning sunshine shelter from the northeast trade winds. All of the crea
neighborhood_overview:
Honua Kai sits beachfront in North Kaanapali so you’ll literally be just steps away from the tranquility of Maui’s shoreline. An “Ohana Play Package” including Tommy Bahama beach chairs, an umbrella, BBQ equipment, and a portable cooler is provided complimentary.

Enjoy quick easy access to fresh pool and beach towels on demand because this suite comes with access to Honua Kai's convenient in-lobby and poolside towel kiosks.
host_about:
The Ohana (Family) at Maui Resort Rentals has been helping vacationers "Make Maui Reality" for over 50 cumulative years on the shores of West Maui.  Inspired by the Maui lifestyle, we aim to provide incredible vacation experiences at a curated collection of premier resort residences.

For your convenience, our warehouse and offices are located in Kaanapali North Beach, just minutes from all of the West Maui resorts.

Our Ritz-Carlton and Marriott trained staff are here to serve. Your guest experience is our highest priority. The privilege to host your precious Maui vacation is ours. 

As an added benefit, our exclusive Maui Resort Rentals courtesy shuttle offers free guest transportation between our West Maui resorts a number of West Maui locations - including Lahaina, Kapalua, and Whaler's Village.

www.airbnb.com/p/mauiresortrentals

description:
The Whaler #1102 is a beautiful spacious 2 bedroom, 2 bath Direct Ocean Front condo. This very sought after home is located on the north side of Tower I on the 11th floor, offering unobstructed views from the West Maui Mountains, down to Kaanapali Beach and out to the neighbor island of Molokai. A comfy King bed in the master bedroom, 2 twin beds in second bedroom.

The space
All units at The Whaler feature full kitchens, full baths, central air conditioning, and a large private lanai (balcony). Free WiFi. King size bed in the master bedroom, 2 Twins in the second bedroom (can be made into a King, with notice). Located right on the famous Ka'anapali Beach nestled between Whalers Village and Black Rock. Imagine walking right out of your resort to some of the best restaurants on the island. Only a short walk from Black Rock where you can snorkel and swim with the giant Hawaiian Green Sea Turtles and Maui's colorful fish. Board the Teralani or Gemini Charters ri
neighborhood_overview: You will be within walking distance to shopping, restaurants, daytime activities and excursions, including two golf courses.  From Whalers Village you can take a bus to Lahaina every hour.  Only steps away from great snorkeling, stand-up paddling, surfing, swimming and taking pictures of Hawaii's giant green Sea Turtles that favor Black Rock. Come enjoy Maui's favorite ocean front resort!
host_about: We are passionate about several things; the islands we call home,  family and sharing our island home with others. We are  a vacation condo property management company for Monte D. Fitts, Realtors.  Our company has been servicing Maui for over 30 years and offers some of the finest condos  on the island. We love smiles and laughter and assisting in making dreams come true.  We hope that you feel like part of our Maui ohana and keep in touch even after you return back to your mainland home.

description:

Nohonani is a favorite of Honeymooners.

The space
TVNCU-1037
Remarkably panoramic views fill the generous windows and screened-in lanai of this serene plantation-style home.
Nohonani is a favorite of Honeymooners. Experience sweeping vistas of beautiful Wainiha Valley, the 5,000-foot volcanic mountain peaks of Hanalei and their waterfalls, the northern slopes of the misty ridges of Koke’e, early morning rainbows and evening moon rises. Nohonani’s screened-in wrap-around lanai overlooks a 2 ¼ - acre private estate of palms, tropical flowers and fruits. The interior boasts vintage furnishings, hardwood floors, vaulted ceilings, lauhala mats, and antique collectibles suggesting romantic Hawaii.
There is an outdoor Hot and Cold shower, for rinsing off after a trip to the nearby beaches or a hike down the Na Pali coast trail. King

description:
Maui County License: BBPH2018/0004
Honu cottage is is part of the Kuach Beach Place B&B located just outside of Paia Town on a small lane and walking distance to Tavares Beach. The cottage is independent from the B&B with it's own parking and outside sitting area. An enjoyable beach for relaxing, swimming, surfing and watching the honu (sea turtle) resting on the beach. Your host Rob is available for any questions and lives in the main house.

The space
The cottage is private from the main house with it's own outside sitting area and parking. Wood stairs are leading to bedroom in the loft area. The ground floor has a kitchenette (no stove), living room area and bathroom. We can accommodate 2 adults and 2 children up to 17 years old. The garage offers a ping pong table and laundry. The outside shower is a great amenity when coming home from the beach. Your host Rob lives in the main house and offers a couple of B&B rooms in his home.

Guest acc
neighborhood_overview: Tavares Bay is just a few minutes walk away. This bay is known by local surfers and our honu (sea turtle). A great place for morning walks, sunbathing, some snorkeling  and surfing in the winter time. The property is at the end of a small private lane which makes this place so private and peaceful.
host_about:
Born and raised in Germany, moved to Maui in 1990. Established my vacation rental business in 1991. I love to be a host and accommodate guests from all over the world. We moved recently our office from Paia town to  Haiku and are available by appointment Monday to Friday 9am - 4pm. We have a wonderful team working together for a long time.  AJ is our reservation manager, Terry manages the properties and you will find Margit mostly in the office.
My special interest is my family and pets,  Hawaiian Culture,  Hula, History, Music and Language, hiking, birds and plants of our islands.

description:
Enjoy watching the surf, sunsets and a view of Hanalei Pier from the deck of this great family-friendly oceanfront home.

The space
TVNCU-1105
Enjoy watching the surf, sunsets and a view of Hanalei Pier from the deck of this great family-friendly oceanfront home.
There are only a few homes that front directly onto Hanalei Beach, and this is one of the best. This two story plantation style home has four bedrooms/ two baths on the ground floor and two bedrooms/one bath on the second floor. There's a comfortable living room on one side of the house and a TV room/den on the other side, separated by a spacious and open kitchen. Dine at the long family dining table, on the deck, or under the stars. Enjoy a taste of Hanalei's past. Best value on Hanalei Bay. There's also an outdoor shower- perfect for rinsing off when you come up from the beach. Hanalei Bay is unsurpassed as a vacation destination. Everything you could possibly dream of is here. neighborhood_overview:
For those new to the island, chickens and roosters are part of the beautiful landscape. In addition, geckos, which are harmless to humans, assist with insect control throughout the island. Hawaii legends say that geckos (Mo'o) are the messengers of good luck. Consider them your Hawaiian friend.

This is a residential neighborhood please be respectful to neighbors when coming and going from the unit and when utilizing exterior areas.
host_about: Love to travel and have enjoyed being hosted in many beautiful homes around the country. Now my passion is being able to share the hosting experience with other travelers to beautiful Kaua'i.

neighborhood_overview:
We are situated conveniently for you to enjoy all the luxuries of life on the north shore and right off the main hwy should you need to head to Costco (20 min drive) or to enjoy shopping and the Honolulu night life (45 min drive). We have a bike path around the corner that goes for about a 2 mile stretch if interested in going for a run and leads to empty beaches. If you choose to not rent a car, our place is perfect for you! We have a bus stop about a 1 minute walk away. Keep in mind that the bus on the North Shore arrives every hour, sometimes it can be late. It isn't most ideal to not rent a car if you plan to explore.

7-11, McDonalds and food trucks are our neighbors, less then 5 min walk. We are just 15 min drive to famous beaches such as Waimea Bay and Pipeline.

description:
Located on the Hawaii Island’s west coast next to the 10th fairway of the Waikoloa Beach Golf Course is Waikoloa Colony Villas, a private gated community that boasts stunning views of Mauna Kea and the "Big Island’s" notorious lava fields

The space
Located on Hawaii Island’s west coast next to the 10th fairway of the Waikoloa Beach Golf Course is Waikoloa Colony Villas, a private gated community that boasts stunning views of Mauna Kea and the "Big Island’s" notorious lava fields surrounding the area. An ultimate leisure retreat, guests enjoy two full-sized pools, a fitness center, and barbecue grills. In addition to world-class golf, nearby activities include shopping, dining, beachfront, and ancient petroglyph fields

This two-bedroom, 2 story vacation home is situated next to the 10th fairway of the Waikoloa Beach Golf Course, this resort is a golfer's paradise. The vaulted ceiling in this condo also allows for natural sunlight to brighten up your Haw
neighborhood_overview:
Waikoloa Colony Villas is situated within the exclusive Waikoloa Resort area. Located next to the 10th fairway of the Waikoloa Beach Golf Course, this resort is a golfer’s paradise. The villas offer stunning views of Mauna Kea and Hawaii Island’s notorious lava fields of the surrounding area.
Located on the South Kohala coast of the island of Hawaii, the Waikoloa area is rich in ancient Hawaiian history and culture that stand side-by-side with modern full-service resorts. The rugged and undeveloped coastline is lined with scenic valleys, lava fields, and golf courses. Step back in time, by strolling the ancient pathways that lead to petroglyph fields and traditional fishponds, head to the beach to experience the crystal-clear waters of Hapuna Beach State Park or the jet-black shores of Punaluu Beach, or shop and dine at the numerous shops and restaurants in the resort area.
host_about:

host_about:
Like you, I love to travel, including cruising. I love to help people. I love to be hospitable. I love to read, especially about the places I am about to visit in my travels and adventures.  My husband and I have visited most of the European countries, north and south, as well as: Turkey, Israel, Greece. Southeast Asia, and the Western Rockies of the United States and Western Canada. We have also visited the western shores of South America.

"What you know is a function of whom you choose to believe." This is my husband's (Ph.D.) saying. Of course, I believe it.

I just retired after thirty (30) years with one company. Now, I am enjoying sharing our  luxurious vacation resort (which has properties around the world and within the USA). Name any place on this globe, and I will try to help you make your dream vacation or travel experience come true. 

I am looking forward to hearing from you.

Thank you,

Lorie

description:
Escape to a beautiful oasis with stunning views of the mountains at this 2-bedroom villa. Located in a quiet and peaceful complex, this unit offers everything you need for a comfortable and relaxing stay.

The condo features a fully equipped kitchen with all the necessary appliances, a comfortable living room with a large TV, and 2 cozy bedrooms. The bathroom is clean and modern, and towels and toiletries are provided for your convenience. Complimentary parking is available on site for guests.

The space
The kitchen is fully equipped with all the necessary appliances and cookware, so you can cook your favorite meals during your stay. Our condo is perfect for families, friends, or couples who want to explore the city while still having a comfortable and relaxing home base. neighborhood_overview:
Located on the south shore of Honolulu, the world-famous neighborhood of Waikiki was once a playground for Hawaiian royalty. Known in Hawaiian as "spouting waters," Waikiki was introduced to the world when its first hotel, the Moana Surfrider, was built on its shores in 1901.

Today, Waikiki is Oahu’s main hotel and resort area and a vibrant gathering place for visitors from around the world. Along the main strip of Kalakaua Avenue you'll find world-class shopping, dining, entertainment, activities and resorts.

Waikiki is within walking distance of the space, which offers a variety of restaurants for everyone’s style and taste!

Food & Restaurants
These restaurants are located within 5 minutes walking of the space:
✔ The Chart House (Ilikai Marina Lobby)
✔ The Harbor Pub (Ilikai Marina Lobby)
✔ The Grove Restaurant & Bar (The Modern Honolulu Hotel)
✔ 100 Sails Restaurant & Bar (The Prince Waikiki Hotel)
✔ Katsumidori Sushi

A big nerd with a bit of edge.

I get alot of joy from interacting and getting to know my guests. I'm honored to be a part of their Hawaii experience and I want it to be a life-long memory. 

The interactions here are important to me and therefore I am selective with who I allow into my space. To me, this is more than hosting. I have been so grateful for all the great connections and lovely feedback I have been receiving and it fuels me in all parts of my life. Because of that, my guests have made all the difference.

neighborhood_overview:
Located 14 miles outside of the town of Pahoa, the neighborhood of Seaview Estates is a secluded community located along the famous "Red Road", and just up the way from the old town of Kalapana. The town itself was taken by Lava in the 1980s, but is still worth a stop to take a quick hike to the coast, learn a bit of local history and grab a smoothie or drink at the bar.

The Lava Hale itself is located within a walking distance from Kehena Black Beach, an amazing natural beauty located just below the lava formed cliffs, and the perfect spot to watch the sunrise , and if you're lucky playful spinner dolphins or whale too!

The Seaview community has a private seaside lawn where neighbors spend their evenings gathering with friends or having dinners under the stars.

*Our community, and the town of Pahoa is known for its laidback and hippy-like vibe, so we ask that guests read in detail about our town and our local beach prior to your stay. Weekends can br
host_about: My name is Grace and I am originally from Europe.   I came to Hawaii in 2003, and right then I knew that the Hawaiian islands are my home.  My favorite islands are Oahu and Big Islands.   My ex husband was in the military back then, and I had to leave Hawaii, but deep inside I knew that I will spend the rest of my life here.   I am an esthetician by trade, and I work at Honolulu Spa & Wellness.   If you are on Oahu you should stop by.

neighborhood_overview:
Tucked away on Lahilahi Beach (or Turtle Beach), Makaha is the perfect place for the ultimate relaxation vacation. Get away from the "tourist" Hawaii and come experience the "untouched" local side that visitors rarely get to experience. Listen to the waves crashing right outside your door as you watch the sun set into the ocean.
We suggest stopping by a grocery store on your way up to the unit to stock up on groceries so you don't have to disturb your relaxation once you get to the unit. There is a Costco & Safeway in Kapolei, or the local grocery store is Tamura's or Sack&Save in Waianae. There is a Long's convenient store 1 minute away from the unit for last minute items or snacks.
*Please note that the current on the Westside can tend to be strong and there is no lifeguard on duty at Turtle Beach. If you are not a strong swimmer, please take caution when swimming. If "strong current" signs are on the beach, take them seriously.

neighborhood_overview: The Honua Kai resort is located on the magnificent North Kaanapali Beach on the west side of Maui near Lahaina town. This resort has seven pools & numerous hot tubs you can enjoy during your stay, including a water slide! In each tower lobby there is a shop you can get snacks, drinks, amenities & more from. There is valet parking & bellhops  to assist you as well as self parking available. Duke’s restaurant is onsite & offers  breakfast, lunch and dinner along with pool service at the 3 main pools. There are BBQs throughout the resort for your use & easy access to the beach. The A'ina gourmet market in the Hokulani lobby & the Whalers General store in the Konea lobby provide everything from a bottle of milk to a bottle of fine wine. Take a stroll down the beach path & enjoy snorkeling at airport beach or soak in a sunset over the water.

description:

Your view out of the bedroom windows will allow for breathtaking sunrises over traditional Hawaiian kalo fields and the stars at night are bright, perfect for stargazing. It's location makes it easy to commute to the many amazing sights, famous surf breaks, restaurants and shops on the North Shore as well as quick access to other parts of the island.

The space
Our home is easy walking distance to the heart of Haleiwa (10 mins) with it's shops and restaurants and located just around the corner from some of the best food trucks in town. The beach is one mile from the house making it easy to get to the beach and enjoy your day in the sun, waves and surf! The unit has it's own private entrance, kitchenette, living room, bedroom and bathroom. We provide a coffee maker/coffee, microwave, dual hot plate, and toaster oven in the kitchenette. Th

description:
Kahala 321 at Poipu Kai Resort - Lounge on the comfortable window seat, sit and relax on the private lanai, or simply kick back on the wrap-around couch and catch a movie in this stunning Kahala unit in Kauai’s renowned Poipu Kai Resort.
*Maximum occupancy and sleeping arrangements for 6 guests.

The space
A large green lawn punctuated by palm trees, blooming plumerias, vibrant bougainvilleas, and Bird of Paradise plants surrounds your personal outdoor space. The master bedroom has a Cal King, with two twin beds and another bathroom in the guest suite (loft style), while the kitchen is fully equipped and doing in-house laundry is a breeze. Furnished and decorated in a tranquil island style that encourages relaxation, this luxurious 1150 square feet unit is within walking distance to the resort restaurant, Poipu Kai swimming pool and Jacuzzi, and famous beaches like Brennecke and Poipu Beach.

Property Amenities
*AC Unit in Master Suite Only;
neighborhood_overview: Poʻipū Beach Park is located in the community of Poʻipū on the southern coast of Kauaʻi island in Hawaii. The beach is a park has lifeguards provided by the county of Kauaʻi.
host_about:
Suite Paradise – The gateway to island living.

Suite Paradise in sunny Poipu Beach on Kauai is home to hundreds of vacation rental properties, amenable to any sized group and any specifications you could think of. With the highest level of service and a wide range of vacation rental options, Suite Paradise can ensure that your stay is as seamless as Kauai’s lifestyle.

Choose from luxurious beach resorts, each with multiple pools and spas within walking distance and top-of-the-line amenities, including, but not limited to, full membership to Poipu Beach Athletic Club for the duration of your stay. Poipu Kai consists of 70 acres of lush tropical foliage and some of Kauai’s most sought-after vacation rentals. One complex is literally located nestled in a verdant and extinct volcano crater – you can’t get more immersed in the island lifestyle than that! From mauka (mountain) to makai (sea), Suite Paradise has something for you!

Kahala – A popular complex that is home to mostly one- and two-bedroom units. Kahala is only a short walk from the beach, and closest to Poipu Kai’s tennis courts and Kalapaki Joe’s sports bar. With the option of both mountain and ocean views available dependent on the unit, Kahala’s location is perfectly situated with proximity to Poipu Road as well as the Poipu Kai greenbelt.

Makanui – Two- and three-bedroom units perched across from Poipu Crater, with stunning mountain views, distant ocean views, and a short walk to the greenbelt path.

Manualoha –Less than a mile from the beach, although the complex pool is practically attached to the Pacific Ocean! With units sleeping four to six, easy access to the greenbelt pathway, and hues of purple bougainvillea draped throughout the complex.

Poipu Sands – One- and two-bedroom units with incredible ocean views, spacious lanais, and a short walk to Shipwreck’s Beach.

Regency – Larger units, spacious enough to accommodate up to 10 guests. Many of these units are newly remodeled and offer AC. Regency and Kahala sit right next to each other.

Regency Villas – Luxury units with central AC. Regency Villas often feature a loft and sleep up to five guests. Situated near the greenbelt for easy access to many resort amenities, and centrally located for a short walk to Brennecke's Beach, or access to the Grand Hyatt Kauai Resort.

Nihi Kai Villas - A comfortable and quiet beach resort with 70 condos to choose from. Located right across from the ocean.

Poipu Crater – Just as the name says, Poipu Crater is nestled in a verdant an extinct volcano crater, which makes the foliage truly breathtaking. With 30 condos to choose from, sleeping four to six guests, the choice is yours! Enjoy the tropical gardens and central location to all that Poipu has to offer.

Lawai Beach Resort - Luxurious oceanfront condos located directly across from arguably the best snorkeling spot on the island. Enjoy a short stroll to five-star dining at The Beach House or enjoy the view from Lawai Beach, as the surfers paddle out for a sunset session. With room to sleep up to six, Lawai Beach Resort has it all!

Poipu Kapili - A beautiful and peaceful resort located on five acres of meticulously landscaped oceanfront property.

Pili Mai - This is Kauai’s newest resort development of luxury condominiums, nestled among a championship golf course.

I love taking my family on those same adventures now and would be so excited to help you plan out some of yours! Bedroom: Queen Bed

Molokai is ideal for couples looking for a relaxing getaway with few crowds and ample opportunities to explore outdoors. For unhurried, 1 or 2-week stays, there is plenty to do on Moloka’i! Explore numerous pristine beaches, hike through scenic parks and reserves, or simply unwind with a loved one!

Enter this picturesque upper floor condo and marvel at the views of the ocean through the expansive glass doors and windows, the spacious open plan with cathedral ceilings, a
neighborhood_overview:
Take a scenic 3/4-mile stroll to Papohaku Beach for golden sand and crashing waves. The beach stretches for 2 miles - the longest and widest sandy beach in Hawaii – virtually empty of people. If you want to hang out on a sunny day, do consider taking a shade umbrella. The surf and undertow on this beach can be dangerous, so if you're looking to swim or snorkel, you should check out several other nearby beaches - described in our manual in the condo.

Kalaupapa Historical Park is a great place to learn about the history of the island. Take the Damien Tour and hear about the selfless lives of Father Damien de Veuster and Mother Marianne Cope who traveled to this area to tend to Hawaiians that were suffering from leprosy. For a unique journey through the historical park, visit Kalaupapa Mule Tour. This guided tour takes 3.2 miles through the park on the back of a pack mule.

Drive for 2-hours to the lush East end of the island, visiting quite beaches on the way. Her

neighborhood_overview: Hawaiian Paradise Park (also known as HPP) is located in the Puna District of East Hawaii, approximately 15 miles southeast of Hilo. This subdivision fronts State Highway 130 and stretches 4 miles to the Pacific Ocean and is 3 1/2 miles wide. The community is close to shopping, dining, and cultural activities in Hilo, Volcano, and Keaau. Of all the subdivisions in lower Puna, HPP is closest to Hilo, meaning shorter commute times to Hawaii’s second largest city – the business heart of east Hawaii.

Enjoy nearby restaurant dining, or shop at the local farmer’s markets and make yourself at home in your roomy kitchen. Relax by the pool, overlooking the Pacific Ocean and losing yourself in the beauty of Hawaii’s Big Island. This one bedroom one bath unit comfortably sleeps 4 with all the comforts of home. We welcome you to Hawaii!

One Bathroom One Bath Unit in Wyndham Royal Sea Cliff Resort ~ Sleeps 4

One Bathroom
Lanai with Dining Table for 4

Fitness Center

description:
The Cowboy House at Puakea Ranch is a historic cottage built in the late 1800's. The house is comfortable and a great place to relax after a day the beach. Three bedrooms offer sleeping for 6. The cottage is right in front of the garden, giving you a pretty view from your kitchen window to the pineapples, vegetables and flower available to all our guests to pick and enjoy. The kitchen if fully equipped. Rates include Hawaii TAT TAX not charged by Airbnb.

Other things to note
Please enjoy walking the grounds, the garden and friendly animals.
neighborhood_overview: This is a private large property with no other homes close by.
host_about: I'm the creator of Puakea Ranch in Hawi, HI.  We purchased the ranch in 2006 and restored all the historic homes and brought the property back to life. Now people can enjoy a more authentic and unique Hawaiian vacation. My vision was to create a relaxing, comfortable & eco friendly environment in this rugged Hawaiian landscape.  We are a great fit for adventurous travelers who also appreciate life's little luxires, like pressed sheets, sharp knives and farm fresh eggs.

description:
Amazing newly constructed home-has all that you will need. Great open living space, huge stacking doors for inside/outside Hawaiian living. A/C to cool you down after a long beach day. Awesome, fully-enclosed playhouse and play ground in the back yard-adults can relax while kids play. Excellent garage gym for beach body workout. Located right between world famous Waimea Bay and Laniakea aka Turtle Beach. You’ll have the whole place to yourself. Enjoy everything North Shore Oahu has to offer.

The space
All the amenities of a nice home with full kitchen, spacious Master suite, WiFi, gym, lanai, driveway for parking, multiple baths and showers, garage gym, outdoor playhouse and park. Walking distance from many of the best beaches in the world. 7 min drive to historic Haleiwa town. Right by Waimea Bay, Sunset Beach, Pipeline Beach, etc. Enjoy close proximity to great restaurants, bars, hiking trails, and other adventures.

Guest access
Entire H

At Maui Condo and Home, LLC we continue to serve our owners and guests with the same Aloha Spirit that we shared over 20 years ago. Though our business has changed through expansion and growth to include properties beyond Maui -- on the islands of Oahu, Hawaii and Kauai --  our values and sense of Aloha remain. description:
Waikiki Banyan #612-T1 – 201 Ohua Ave.

You'll love the large lanai for outdoor living and peek-a-boo ocean view! Just renovated, this beachy condo has 2 queen beds, queen sleeper sofa, Washlet, AC, washer/dryer, FREE parking, Wi-Fi, pool, hot tubs, sauna and BBQ area, and it's just a block to Waikiki Beach!

CLICK "Show more" FOR ALL THE DETAILS ON THIS UNIT!

The space
You'll love the beachy/Hawaiian feel of this newly renovated 6th floor 1-bedroom suite, with its 533 square feet of interior living space, plus an extra large, partial ocean view lanai! The condo features a full kitchen, in-unit washer/dryer, AC, 2 Queen beds and 1 Queen size sleeper sofa, free Wi-Fi, and free onsite parking for 1 vehicle. Guests can also enjoy Waikiki Banyan's shared resort amenities including swimming pool, hot tubs, outdoor BBQ grills, onsite convenience store, coffee shop, and more. A repeat guest favorite!

OCCUPANCY: Max 4 Adults (18+) & Up to 2

host_about:
ALOHA! E komo mai and mahalo for choosing to stay with Captain Cook Resorts!

Captain Cook Resorts proudly manages over 170 privately-owned vacation rentals in Waikiki (a district of Honolulu on the island of Oahu). Everyone on the fun and energetic CCR team works hard to offer great accommodations, great service, and has a passion for sharing all that Oahu has to offer our guests!

We appreciate that you're on vacation, and we ask that you let us know if there's anything we can do to make this visit stand out as one of your best!

ALL CAPTAIN COOK RESORTS RENTALS INCLUDE:
– Bath towels, Beach towels, Bed linens
– Dishes, Silverware, Cookware (including tea kettle & rice cooker)
– Beach chairs, Hair dryer, Iron/Ironing board
– Start-Up Supplies: coffee filters, laundry detergent, dish soap, dishwasher soap, bar soap, paper towels, toilet paper, tissue, basic cleaning supplies, and travel size (2 oz.) shampoo, conditioner, body wash, body lotion
– NOT PROVIDED: beach umbrellas, beach toys, aluminum foil, Ziploc bags, coffee, condiments/seasonings, cooking oil, fabric softener, or bleach. This private vacation rental does NOT include resort services such as daily housekeeping, replenishment of towels or toiletry supplies, or hotel front desk services.

Please let us know if you have any questions!

Mahalo!

description: The Waiohinu Motel is located on the Big Island of Hawaii. This motel is located in the quiet and peaceful little town of Waiohinu nestled on the slopes of Mauna. Vacationing in Hawaii doesn't have to be stressful and expensive. Waiohinu is a typical plantataion style community that has changed very little over the decades. The Waiohinu motel is set in a tropical location away from the crowds, yet convenient to dining, shopping, hiking and historic places of interest.

Gorgeous top floor Penthouse Suite featuring two-bedrooms and two bathrooms, breathtaking oceanfront 270 degree views from the spacious 50 foot wrap-around lanai. Enjoy turtle, whale, and sunset watching at its best! Open the screened front door and windows to enjoy mother earth's natural air conditioning with tropical trade winds and cross ventilation.

The space
Each bedroom features ceiling fans as well as the living room.

host_about:
KBM Resorts caters to those who appreciate the size and comfort of a fully equipped property but don't want to sacrifice the convenience and amenities of a 5 star hotel. KBM Resorts blends these two worlds together by providing beautiful, full-size residences with hotel-style features and amenities you have come to expect from the finest hotel resorts. Each KBM Resort property features Fully-equipped kitchens, complimentary L'Occitane bath and body lotions, housekeeping and concierge teams, personal grocery delivery, personal greeters and more.

Each KBM Resorts location is fully-staffed with local Guest Ambassadors, Concierge Agents, Activities Desk, Maintenance and Housekeeping teams, Quality Control Inspectors, Laundry facilities and more. If your family ever needs assistance or service our staff is just steps away and ready to help. We employ only dedicated local professionals who believe in our community, deeply care for our Homeowners and Guests, and are genuinely excited to share local expertise to deliver your family a dream vacation.

All KBM Resort locations feature beautiful distinctive residences, professional cleaning and sanitization, fully-equipped kitchens, 24/7 Guest Support teams, complimentary high-speed WiFi, and a seamless checkin process. You and your family are always a call, click, or text away from our local Guest Ambassadors whose sole mission is to deliver your dream vacation.

description:
Our spacious 1,500 square foot suite is the only beach-front penthouse available for rent at the prestigious Beach Villas Resort in Ko Olina and the only privately rentable condo with panoramic ocean views from every room.

The space
Decades in the making, Ko Olina is Hawaii’s most luxurious resort destination. Historically considered the playground of Hawaiian royalty, Ko Olina is truly the ultimate vacation haven. A mesmerizing refuge on Oahu’s most picturesque beach, Ko Olina’s temperate year- round climate offers a soothing and calming escape. Surrounded by pristine lagoons and the crystal blue waters of the Pacific, the Beach Villas Resort features endless amenities for your pleasure and comfort. The resort grounds abound in the uniquely colorful foliage and fauna of Hawaii.

Our two bedroom two bath penthouse is within fifty yards of the water’s edge and offers panoramic ocean views. It features three spacious lanais and a gourmet kitchen designed

host_about: My family has been vacationing in Hawaii for three generations.  We saw the Ko Olina resort area being developed over many years and fell in love with the lagoons, vistas and laid back lifestyle. We were the first in line to purchase and, as a result, got the very best suite -- true beach front. We've had folks from all over the world stay at our place and pride ourselves in running a very smooth booking experience.  Up until now we've booked only through our own website and Flipkey; we're now taking the plunge to try airbnb.

description:
This exceptional oceanfront condo is located on the sunny south shore of Hawaii's Garden Island in Poipu. The beautifully remodeled condo is just 30 feel from the ocean's edge. Imagine sitting on the lanai watching the sun come up as you sip your coffee, or watch the turtles swim below you every afternoon. Drift off to sleep listening to the sound of the waves. Premier surfing and snorkeling spots are directly out front of your lanai. This is the ultimate vacation spot!

Registration number
260050140064, TA-050-350-7456-01
neighborhood_overview: Poipu Beach has numerous beaches to snorkel, surf or boogie board.  Kukuiul'u Shopping Center is within walking distance of coffee shops, great restaurants and shopping.
host_about: I love to travel, hike and eat good food.  I've got vacation rentals in Kauai, Breckenridge and Lodo (Lower Downtown Denver).

description:
Lush gardens surround you, with avocado, papaya, mango, and bananas. Kitchen has a full-size fridge for your beach picnic supplies. Full bath with all amenities, plus a walk-in closet. A wonderful garden oasis / patio for outdoor dining, or just some needed chill time.

The space
The studio apartment is one large bedroom (see images) with an attached kitchenette + coffee bar, a large closet, and a full bath and shower. Out the ocean side is a big beautiful patio space surrounded by avocado and papaya trees. This is where you'll want to dine, and spend a lot of time.

Guest access
The key to the slider entry will be in a lockbox for you to gain access to the unit. Most times I will be available with a friendly aloha greeting, and to get you all acquainted with your vacation home.

Other things to note
You have a private garden setting on the first level. There is almost no road or air traffic. In the morning you w
neighborhood_overview:
You can stay in town with all the other tourists or stay 15 minutes away from the crowds, and so much closer to adventure, including Kealakekua Bay and 2 Step for amazing snorkeling, diving, hiking, viewing the whales and spinner dolphins, and manta rays.... and it's just one road all the way to Volcano National Park.
My favorite poke', taco truck, and jambalaya are just 5 minutes away (see my guidebook), and Kona Boys will hook you up with a kayak or snorkel gear. Keauhou Bay is less than 10 minutes away and a great spot to ride a standup paddle board or kayak. Or you can just sunbathe all day if you'd like on one of the many white sand beaches all along the Kona and Kohala shores.
The neighborhood is very quiet, beautiful birds chirping in the morning, and then it's only 10-20 minutes to snorkeling, cliff diving, hiking, and gorgeous warm white sand beaches year round!
host_about:
My name is Scooter, real name is Michael but there are way too many of those, so I go by my nickname Scooter.  I’m loving my new home on The Big Island of Hawaii, just south of Kona in the town of Kealakekua.
I enjoy long walks on the beach. I also enjoy short walks, it all depends on how much time I have.

description:
Relax and sip cocktails in this beautifully updated condo with full air conditioning at Kona Reef in the heart of Kailua-Kona. Enjoy amazing ocean views and year round sunsets from the lanai (balcony). You can take advantage of the ample beach gear (towels, chairs, snorkel gear, coolers, etc.). Oceanfront pool, hot tub and BBQ area. High speed WiFi, digital cable, and access to streaming services like Netflix. Washer and dryer in unit. Rates include all Hawaii taxes (see other details).

The space
Fully updated and remodeled, AC in bedroom as well as living area (rare upgrade at Kona Reef). Queen Tempurpedic bed, queen memory foam pull out, open living space, washer/dryer in unit.

Guest access
Guests will have the entire condo to themselves as well as access to the pool, hot tub, lawn area, and beach right next door.

Other things to note
Rates include 10.25% Hawaii Transient Accommodations Tax, 3% Hawaii County Transie
neighborhood_overview: Right in the heart of beautiful Kailua-Kona village. Steps from dining, drinks, and local shopping as well as a beach right next door.
host_about:
Married in Hawaii and made it our second home. We love the atmosphere of the island, from the people to the surf to the way the air smells. I love to spend time in the water, diving, snorkeling, boating, I'm happier in the ocean. 

We believe being on vacation should be about relaxing and not worrying about the logistics of packing. We strive to make sure our condos are comfortable and have all the amenities needed for a vacation in paradise.
