Pohaku is close to shopping and restaurants, farmers markets and local fish catch vendors.

Close to the Volcanoe Village, lava tree park, lava chain of craters road, ocean drives, and if course not at all far from Hilo, a very lovely Hawaiian town with souvenirs shops, restaurants, pharmacy, stores, fish market,farmers market, museums, waterfall sites, gorgeous ocean side drives and close to the giant Prince Kuheo Mall sporting movie theatre and major department stores

From one side of the house you can see the ocean and from the othet side, the mountains
host_about: I am a family man. My wife and I enjoy traveling and have learned about what makes a person feel very special when they stay in a vacation rental or hotel. Our favorite destinations are China, England, Australia, Canada, but our top of the list place is still Hawaii. We love being with old and new friends, we love simply being alive and appreciating what we have. We like to cook and eat good food, Watching movies, reading a good book, hosting a special dinner and a walk on the beach are things that give us special pleasure. I enjoy playing and listening to music and watching a beautiful sunset. We appreciate our guests  and do everything in our power to make them feel at home and that we care they have a unique and memorable vacation.

description:
The space
Mana Kai Maui Resort 201C

Swim, lounge, and snorkel at the fabulous Mana Kai Maui Resort, the jewel at the end of one of Maui’s best beaches! The Mana Kai Maui Resort uniquely offers all the advantages of a condo vacation, but with the added amenities of a resort hotel. Choose from condominium or hotel-style accommodations. The condominiums include one and two-bedroom suites, complete with well-equipped kitchens and private lanais. In-room safes and free high-speed WiFi access are also available.

Comfortable hotel-style suites with full baths are also available just steps away from the ocean. You'll also have access to two gas grills and laundry facilities available on the property. While our amenities do not include poolside towel service, our condo and hotel suites are equipped with beach towels for use at the pool and beach. Take advantage of the resort atmosphere with special features including free parking, a pool, open air dining with l
host_about:
Vacasa
Vacation Home Management

Vacasa unlocks the possibilities of how we enjoy vacation homes. We take care of managing our homeowners’ vacation houses so they can have peace of mind (and their home when they want to). And our guests book vacations confidently knowing they’re going to find exactly what they’re looking for without any surprises.

Each vacation home is always cared for by our professional local teams who implement our high cleanliness and maintenance values, while the hands-off tasks of vacation rental management--marketing, filing taxes, and maintaining a website--are handled by a specialized central support team. Our passion and focus remain true: to empower our homeowners, guests, and employees to invest in vacation.

description:
MHS 403 Ocean & Mountain Views from Your Own Lanai & Easy Beach Access

The space
Menehune Shores 403 is the prefect spot for your next Maui family vacation. Beautifully remodeled and updated with modern furnishings and decor, our Maui condo offers all the comforts of home with wonderful ocean, beach and sunset views and plenty of space for your entire family to enjoy. With easy elevator access to the tropical grounds, beach, pool, BBQs and other resort amenities you'll have to make amazing Maui memories.

Condo Highlights:
-2 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom, Sleeps 6 guests
-Split system AC units in living room and both bedrooms
-Oceanview lanai accessible from both the living room and the master bedroom
-Master bedroom with king bed
-Second bedroom with queen bed
-Sleeper-sofa in living room
-Internet streaming TVs in living room and master bedroom
-Fully equipped kitchen

host_about:
Vacation Rental Management, Property Management, Asset Management, Real Estate Sales and Financial Analysis on  real estate.

We give our pledge to you to make your vacation on Maui as easy and pleasurable as possible. We understand that vacationing with your family and friends is a time for memories, rest, and vital rejuvenation.

We provide the support and peace of mind for your ultimate vacationing experience on Maui.
Link to all our listings:  https://airbnb.com/users/15820446/listings 

We are especially empathetic for our Vacationers.  We are not perfect but we do try hard.  We are all local to Maui and try to represent the Aloha Spirit.

We have discovered for ourselves the pleasure of vacationing in this paradise called: Maui.  All of us came here many years ago, drawn to the mystique and spectacular beauty of the Island. Our satisfaction grows each time we are able to provide that special place our vacationers have worked for and dreamed of for so long. This is truly a marvelous business, and we give thanks each day for this wonderful opportunity.

description:
Forget your worries in this spacious serene space. Private one bedroom cottage located on a 6 acre farm that is home to many rescued animals. Have as little or as much interaction as you wish.
A fully equipped kitchen with a gas stove, full bathroom, a comfy bedroom a spacious living room w Smart TV and separate dining area. Wifi is also provided. Bikes available for two - neighborhood perfect for quiet walks.
An 8 minute drive to the town of Hāna.

The space
Your own private space, surrounded by nature. Located in a 6 acre parcel surrounded by fruit trees, palm trees and farm animals. Your only regret will be you didn’t stay longer!

Guest access
Guests will have access to the entire property only excluding the owners residence.

Other things to note
We are a rescue farm for neglected/abused animals -- currently with horses, miniature goats, cattle, pig, chickens, dogs, ducks and a cat. None are ev
neighborhood_overview: Located in a agriculture area we are a quiet neighborhood.  Nice for biking and casual evening walks.  We are located approx 10 minutes from Hāna town.  Very close to Wainapapa State park.
host_about: Aloha-  Welcome to Beautiful Hana!  JJ’s Hale is a 1 bedroom cottage, conveniently located near idyllic Hana town and it’s tiny Hana Airport on 6 verdant acres (turn left near the 31 mile marker on the legendary Hana Hwy). My husband and I have both lived on Maui for over 40 years, and live full time on the property, dedicating a large portion of it as a sanctuary for neglected animals. All are tame and very friendly. We encourage our guests to feel comfortable, enjoying their company…There is so much to do here - hiking, ocean activities, biking, etc.  But Hana's also a great place to kick back and relax....I enjoy just sitting around and listening to the beautiful sounds of nature....We've been told many times, there's a very strong mana to our property....Hana is a very special "Hawaiian" place...E komo mai...Checkout our website for more information:  https://www.jjshanahale.com

description:
Mauna Kea Sunset at the Mauna Kea Resort Kumulani complex has stunning views of golf, ocean and mountains. This two bedroom upper-level unit is surrounded by amazing views of the Hawaiian coast. Start your day off right on the large covered lanai with your morning coffee and then enjoy the day exploring the Kohala Coast and the fantastic Mauna Kea Resort.

The space
This home is in one of Hawaii's best resort complexes which has two of the best beaches in all of Hawaii. There is nothing better than having an entire private home equipped with everything you would need for a wonderful vacation.

Fast WiFi with great coverage included!

We know our Guests look forward to an exceptional experience from the moment you start planning your Big Island vacation. We’ve incorporated all of our vacationing experiences from Hawaii and around the world, to ensure you have an exceptional stay. 

We love friends & families 

Big Island is s
neighborhood_overview: Kumulani is a wonderful gated quiet community at the Mauna Kea Resort. Mauna Kea resort has two glorious beaches (Hapuna and Mauna Kea). With the optional daily resort fee you can use the chairs and towels at the hotel beaches, pools, tennis courts and golf courses.
host_about: Jeff & Suzanne have been hosting guests in their luxury vacation rentals on the Big Island of Hawaii for the past several years.   Their company Paradise in Hawaii Luxury Homes consists of a large team of passionate, dedicated individuals focused on helping guests have amazing holidays.    From the initial three homes to now over forty (40) homes all equipped to the same high standards they have never lost their attention to detail.     While they have added team members they remain directly involved with each and every guest.    They treat every guest like their trip to Hawaii is their life long dream fulfilled.   They love being part of helping families create amazing memories.  Come try the Paradise in Hawaii experience!

90/TVU-1003 1990/NUC-0728

Two blocks from the public library and a botanical garden and a short distance to Diamond Head Theater or the Saturday Farmer's Market at Kapiolani Community College.

description:
Located in the area regarded by King Kamehameha as one of the most beautiful spots on the Big Island, this resort is an ideal destination for your island paradise vacation. And it's close to all that Kailua-Kona has to offer. Venture out to explore or indulge in sweet relaxation.

Guest access
Guests must check in at the front desk. Present valid photo i.d and credit card for incidentals. If you are going to check in after hours please notify your host in advance. If you need a late check out please ask your host the day before check-out.

Other things to note
All reservations are subject to Hawaii's Transient Accommodation Tax upon check-in
host_about: AIRBNB Host & Property Manager for multiple locations, On Point-Travel! I’m available 24/7 @365 anytime you need me I will be there to help you in any way I can.  Fast response times! Whether it's beaches or ski resorts I have locations everywhere. Let me be your personal travel agent! Im a very responsive and promise to answer all of your questions!

description:
Awesome light and bright unit! All guests say it is lovelier in person than in photos. Large, high-quality, high comfort, sunny, spacious, private studio with AC , large bathroom, balcony, kitchenette in 2nd room.

We are just a ten minute drive to Hilo's beaches and 25 minutes to Volcano National Park. Just 2 miles from town; Not near public transport. Car required.

For covid 19 safety...Spacing between guest stays is a minimum of five days for excellent sanitizing.

Local goodies provided

The space
Treasure! Studio Suite is a large, bright, spacious, sunny, comfortable studio, a great choice for budget travelers who want to stay in a quiet, quality neighborhood, and within two miles of Hilo town and it's amenities. The unit is like the second unit of a duplex…. Attached to the other unit, but separate. Fully private, with private entrance.

This is a quiet area, and might not delight those of you who want to be n
neighborhood_overview:
Unit is in a beautiful, quiet, secluded neighborhood, and there are no streetlights, therefore, it is quite dark. Please consider having a flashlight app on your phone.

Most neighbors are quiet, friendly, with pet dog(s).

All services, necessities, shops, and entertainment are a minimum of 2 miles away.
host_about:
Hilo and the surrounding area is great to explore. It is the essence of nature at its fullest. It’s wonderful for photography, ocean sports such as swimming, surfing, kayaking, as well as other activities such as hiking, bird watching, or just enjoying peace and quiet. 

My partner and I  are frequent snorkelers, and will happily give you recommendations for a nice spot. 

We enjoy hosting, and offering guests a quiet, private space in the rain forest.

Enjoy waking up to sprawling views of the electric blue Pacific Ocean. Spend the day lounging by the pool with a Mai Tai in-hand. Unwind while you watch the sunset and grill the local catch of the day! The experience here is perfect for families, groups and romantic couples.

description:
A tropical retreat in an unbeatable exclusive location, our home is a 2min stroll to famous Baby Beach, great for young swimmers. The L-shaped house envelops a lush courtyard with a small pool, outdoor dining & lounge seating, 3BD/3BA with gorgeous views of the pool, golf course & Haleakala Crater. Spreckelsville is Maui’s premier north shore oceanfront community, minutes from Paia’s excellent dining and Maui’s activities. Recommendations are our specialty; we can’t wait to welcome you!

The space
When planning a trip to Maui with your family or friends, you deserve to have the best dining and activities on Maui’s north shore at your fingertips - spectacular oceanfront dining, walking on the beach, swimming and spending time together in nature. We’re long-time residents and Airbnb hosts, and our family’s home in the upscale enclave of Spreckelsville is a two-minute walk to Baby Beach, perfect for young swimmers. Baby Beach leads to Baldwin Beach State Park, with m
neighborhood_overview: An unbeatable location is the start to a magical vacation: our gorgeous home is nestled in the upscale enclave of Sprecklesville, a two minute walk to the island's famous Baby Beach, and only a 10 minute drive from Maui Kahului airport.  The house overlooks the peaceful and serene golf course, with sweeping views of Haleakala crater.  Our beach oasis is five minutes to Paia Town's fantastic restaurants and shopping, and we'll be happy to send you recommendations so you can start planning as soon as you're ready!
host_about: We're both Swiss citizens, living on Maui for 35 years. We both keep loving and enjoying Maui every single day again and again.

description:
This large, spacious condo has it all! Located on a knoll, it captures the tradewinds in the summer. The open view of flowers, the wetland, bay, ocean and spectacular mountains will remind you that you are in paradise. Count the waterfalls on the mountain after a rain and enjoy the whitewater view. Snap a photo of a double rainbow from the lanai. Sitting on the lanais taking in the scenery is a pleasure - no condo obstructing your view,
with a choice of a 1, 2 or 3 bedroom set up.
Up to you...

The space
When you open the front door, you'll see a beautiful newly tiled floor, large living room with new leather furniture, island style dining room and big flat screen TV. A well appointed kitchen with side-by-side frig, stove with glass top, new dishwasher and micro makes cooking pleasant. You will find books, games, CDs and puzzles in the TV cabinet.

You will wake up to a beautiful view from each bedroom.
There are king beds in two of the
neighborhood_overview:
BBs Biz E HBR is located in PRinceville, Hanalei, Kauai on an exquisitely kept golf course on the cliffs over looking Hanalei Bay and the majestic mountains of Kauai. We are 5 min from Princevill Shopping Center where "everything" is and have views that will knock your socks off!Shopping
• Princeville Center--Foodland Supermarket sells good fish (use Makai card on key to save $), TikiIniki, good value food court, postal & stores. Deli at Foodland with good variety of items. Gas station has great breakfast burritos, burgers and slices of pizza.
• Hanalei—Big Save grocery, restaurants, shave ice, variety of stores and equipment rentals. The Farmers Market held on Sat. by green church at 9:30 also has crafts.
• Kilauea--Kong Lung center on way to lighthouse has Bistro restaurant, great bakery (best pizza and soup), Kilauea Fish Market has fresh fish and Mexican food. Sat. farmers market is good.
• Kapaa--Numerous shops, services, restaurants, Safeway and Lon
host_about:
Sorry we are closed till May 3rd at this time.
Aloha~ Welcome! 
I am the proud new owner of HBR 4104/5/6! as of the end of April 2019! Having recently retired from my career, I love to stay busy, and boy am I with BBs Biz E HBR! Some may recognize me from TV & films I have done, others may know me as the originator of BB's Kids Acting School, or may know my watercolors and art work. But I simply grew up on the racetracks of Southern California, the daughter of a quite famous jockey, & spent the first 3rd of my life either on horseback or in the ocean. The love of both brought me to Kauai originally in 1979 which has now truly become my Spiritual home away from home. This is a dream come true, being able to share this magical Island with you. Come & see why it becomes nearly impossible to leave... Hope to see you soon!

description:
Located at Papakea Resort, unit K307 is on the third floor featuring stunning ocean views, AC in the living room along with a fully stocked and upgraded kitchen! This one bedroom, one bathroom condo comfortably sleeps 4 guests with the living room sleeper sofa. With its prime location in Honokowai, this area stays cooler than Lahaina but does not see as much rain and clouds as Kapalua.

The space
Additional Description:

With gorgeous views throughout the day and into the evening you’ll be sure to unwind and feel at home here.

Walk in and experience Maui luxury at its finest! With a private lanai, you’ll be able to enjoy incredible views and even spot some whales breaching during the winter months. Inside, you’ll stay cool with an AC system located in the main living area. With its superior location within the resort, you’ll enjoy the views but not the afternoon heat!

The main living area is the perfect spot to relax after a

description:
Welcome to Hale Hui Kai 202, a stunning garden view condo located just seconds from Keawakapu Beach. This luxurious two-bedroom, two-bathroom unit offers a peak of the ocean from your lanai and oasis-like garden views from the kitchen and living room.

The space
Inside, you'll find a beautifully appointed living space that's designed for relaxation and comfort. The unit features a fully equipped kitchen, a spacious living room with a flat-screen TV, a cozy primary bedroom with a king-size bed, and two twin beds in the second bedroom. A sofa sleeper in the living room is a great place for kids allowing hosting of up to 6 guests in consummate style.

The kitchen is replete with every necessity, including blender, coffee maker, and cooking/serving implements to create your own island feast should the desire strike. The kitchen remodel blends the warmth of golden bamboo and stunning granite, embracing the high-end Hawaiiana theme of the unit. The privat
neighborhood_overview: South Kihei
host_about:
Vacation-Maui is a top-rated vacation rental agency, representing clean, well-equipped beach condos in the sunny resort area of Kihei, Wailea, and Makena. With hundreds of online reviews, our focus is on the best possible guest experience. 

Our office is within a few minutes of all of our properties, and we respond immediately to guest issues. We’re partnered with the largest Real Estate brokerage in the country, Keller Williams; we advise on and sell Maui investment condos, based on the best possible ROI.

description:
Our bright 1 bdrm unit at Hale Kamaole sleeps 2 in the king bed and up to 2 on the pullout bed in the living room.
We have a lovely ocean view and are on the ground floor, so we walk directly out from the spacious lanai onto the open, landscaped grounds, in 1 minute to the beach. The unit has 800 sq ft indoors
We provide beach towels, beach chairs, sun umbrella and a cooler.
Kitchen is fully equipped, the unit has a washer/dryer and quick wifi.

The space
Hale Kamaole has two swimming pools, one tennis court/pickle ball (free), large open green spaces for kids and adults to congregate, and open barbeque areas where guests often gather to cook and socialize in the evenings. It’s a truly magical place where families, newly-weds and friends come for vacations.

Guest access
I have owned this condo for many years and visit regularly. I am continually updating the unit to ensure that it’s a bright, clean and comfortable place to v
neighborhood_overview: Hale Kamaole is in South Kihei, without question the sunniest part of Maui and with the most beautiful beaches. Just across the street in either direction you can walk for miles along beach after beach. Additionally, the Kihei boat ramp, from which snorkeling, whale watching or scuba trips can be arranged, is a 5 minute walk. Restaurants and local shopping are within walking distance as well. The resort area of Wailea, popular for golf, shopping, eating and beach visits is only a 5 minute drive. The airport is approximately 25 minutes away.
host_about: We're from Vancouver, lived in Honolulu some years ago, love swimming in the ocean, tennis and being out of doors

description:
Superior Deluxe Ocean View Condo recently remodeled. New bedroom furniture & Sleeper sofa with memory foam mattress, FULLY equipped kitchen, with all appliances and utensils, condiments and spices, coffee maker, toaster. Beach towels,chairs, umbrella, mats, and some beach toys. Washer/dryer in the unit, Everything you will need for a carefree vacation! Unobstructed view of the beach, right across the street. This is a corner unit as well.

The space
Deluxe Ocean View Unit #200. Our condos are very clean and upgraded and all-inclusive, we don't charge extra for A/C, etc as most owners do. We also have a washer/dryer in the unit, we include FREE calling anywhere in the US and Canada & Mexico since most cell service either drops calls or goes to Roaming near the beach. We have a California King Nova Foam VERY comfortable mattress in the bedroom, Queen size pull-out sofa in the living room with a memory foam mattress, and a futon mattress for the 5th small person o
neighborhood_overview: You can walk to 13-14 different restaurants with Mexican, American, French, Greek, Chineese, Japaneese, Hawaiian menues. Shopping next door with a lot of little shops.  Kamaole II white sand beach is across the street, Wailea, one of the most expensive parts of teh island is 1/2 mile away, lot of PGA Golf courses near by.  Also snorkeling, boating, fishing and other tours offered next door.
host_about:
My husband Gerry and I owned travel agencies & Real Estate companies and are very tuned in to travelers and their intricate needs.  We go to Maui, Hawaii  and Waynesboro, PA at least 2 times per year to  update/freshen up our units.  Gerry is a licensed building contractor and he likes to update and work on properties;) And I like to decorate, stage properties, plant & design flower gardens.  

  For travelers coming to Los Angeles, we have 2 homes on Beachwood Dr. in Hollywood Hills that can accommodate from 1 to 14 people very central to Hollywood, Universal Studios and lots of tourist areas! Also a single unit that can accommodate 1 to 5 people in the Miracle Mile, very central to LAX Airport, Beverly Hills, Hollywood, Down Town Los Angeles, etc. And near Pasadena, CA  in Altadena, CA 

Plus 3 condos across from the Beach in Maui, Hawaii in S. Kiei near Wailea. 2 have direct ocean views.

 A 7,500sf Mansion in Waynesboro, PA  listed under “Beautiful Mansion in the Country”, which is also a Wedding Venue, we are licensed to host up to 32 people overnight and up to 120 for events.  Look us up when your travels call for these areas of the world. We look forward to hosting you and your family & friends.

    By the way, I also Speak Arabic and Amharic (Ethiopian language, which is not on the Airbnb language charts, I don't read or write Arabic, but speak it fluently).

    We love hosting people and making sure our guests are comfortable and happy:)

description:
BEACHFRONT. Highly upgraded and completely renovated. Enjoy a unique open floorplan. Direct oceanfront views! Tastefully done with state of the art appliances, teak wood cabinets and the finest touches. The condo is sparkling clean!

Our condo does not operate as transient quarters. Per Honolulu County laws, we may only book one rental per 30 day period. Our minimum requirement is 7 nights. We hope to hear from you soon. Aloha!

The space
Enjoy top of the line refrigerator, cooktop, convection oven/microwave, dishwasher, washer/dryer.

Equipped with beach chairs, beach towels, coolers, umbrella, snorkel equip, boogie boards, canopy, beach tent, beach cart and free unassigned gated parking.

Guest access
Gated and secure property and parking lot offers a pool, jacuzzi, rec room with ping pong, gas grills in grassy picnic area, outdoor showers and more. General Manager available during the day with 24-hour on-site
neighborhood_overview:
Home to many islanders dating back to the origins of the islands where petroglyphs are found, Makaha offers you a truly unique vacation experience. Dine at one of the many local restaurants, or enjoy fine dining at the Ko'olina 5 Star Resorts just before the Princess. The new city of Kapolei on the way to the Princess offers theaters, many big box retailers and just about every shopping and dining opportunity including a recently finished Ka Makaha Alii' shopping mall.

The nearby Waianae Harbor (just before the Princess) offers deep sea fishing, whale watching, swimming with dolphins and diving/snorkeling tours. Rent paddle boards, surf boards and more right in your neighborhood. Pokai Bay around the corner offers surf/paddleboard lesson as well.

The world famous surf beach at Makaha is located just past the Princess. Yokohama Bay and Kaena Point Reserve are just a short drive past the Princess, offering great views, tide pools, caves, hiking and more. Th
host_about:
Aloha! 
This unique condo unit has completely redesigned interior with an open floor plan and state of the art appliances. We like to keep our place well outfitted with everything you will need to make the most our of your stay.  The Hawaiian Princess Resort is in a fabulous location with views galore! This is where I host my family and friends for our staycations and where I reside for part of the year.  The condo is compliant with all TAT, GET, Property and Income taxes.  Send me a message should you wish to stay.  There is also a timeshare office at the Princess with many different choices to meet your needs.  

Mahalo,
Tess & Will

description:
This condo is in Waikiki near the harbor and is 4 bedrooms, with 3 full bathrooms. There are three separate entrances 2/1, 1/1, and 1/1. It is perfect for a family or multiple couples traveling together. The beach is 5 minutes walking distance as well as great bars and restaurants. The condo is located in the heart of Honolulu and in close proximately to several attractions including Ala Moana mall, Honolulu Zoo, Honolulu Convention Center and the Blaisdell.

The space
3 queen beds and 1 full bed.

There is street parking (may take up to 10 minutes to locate an available spot), paid parking is also available in the area. There are two paid lots you can find on the internet.

There are beach chairs, snorkel gear, body boards and surf boards available for use to maximize our guest's experience! :)

Guest access
Electronic door codes for entry into condo rooms and a lockbox onsite for condo door entry at check-in.
neighborhood_overview: The condo building is across the street from the beach and surrounded by several cute restaurants, perfect for sunset cocktails. Waikiki is a walkable area with many attractions nestled throughout the streets. Every Friday night the Hilton Hawaiian Village (3 minute walk from condo) hosts a firework show!
host_about:
Hello Airbnb- I am an outgoing business professional. I enjoy short trips to fun destinations. Anything outdoors is great, my favorite being water. I am a country style sort of cook, and enjoy grilling and sports.

My style of travel is pack light, move fast and do some fun activities. I will leave a place better than I received it. I prefer a host who is friendly, and who knows the local spots to hit up during my stay.

Life motto: Seize the Day.

Thanks All!
Cole

host_about:
Hi, my husband and I grew up and live in Los Angeles, CA. We have 1 son with autism. Our goal was always to introduce our son to new places and things to try and help him grow leaps and bounds. What we found was traveling was the most effective. So since then, we have immersed him into many different environments on our journey of growing as a whole family. We love helping others grow and enhance their love for life through travel. Please before booking confirm with us the dates you are looking to travel as the Airbnb calendar sometimes has issues updating itself.

Our Warmest Wishes, Happy Travels!

description:
みんなでワイキキに格安で泊まるのにおすすめの小さなワンベッドルーム！生活に必要な物は全て揃っているので、まるでハワイで生活しているようなカジュアルスタイルのアパートです。便利な室内洗濯機！フルキッチン！お友達やご家族との旅行に最適です。

ワイキキビーチ :２ブロック・徒歩６分
バス停：徒歩３分
コンビニエンスストアー：徒歩３分

*There is no parking available in the building*

•Ala Wai Canal
Get there early and you may find free parking along the Ala Wai Canal (no parking Monday or Friday from 8:30am to 11:30am).

•You can rent a space 2 buildings ahead of the apartment.
$20/ day, the space is limited, Please make a reservation through me.

The space
2階建アパートの1階のお部屋です。専用の玄関があります。

Guest access
アパートの敷地には、手前に２階建て、奥に３階建てのアパートが２件建っています。入り口はゲートがあり、セキュリティフォブがないと入れません。ご利用いただくのは、２階建てアパートの１階の１世帯です。１階に２世帯、２階が１世帯に分けられています。

Other things to note
現地のロコの方がアパートに住んでいます。日本語&英語バイリンガルのキッズなど、まるでハワイで生活しているようなステイをお楽しみください。アパートの住民とお会いしたら笑顔で「ALOHA！」とご挨拶くださいね(^O^)
neighborhood_overview:
ワイキキ中心部！沢山のレストランやショップで大賑わい。ワイキキビーチまで、わずか２ブロック！バス停は１ブロック！ABCストアーも１ブロックの好立地！！！
アパートのすぐお隣は、ワイキキサンドヴィラホテル。１階のレストランは、朝6:30〜深夜3:00の営業なので、小腹が空いた時に便利です。
インターナショナルマーケットプレイス／ワイキキショッピングプラザ／ロイヤルハワイアンセンター／Ｔギャラリアハワイなども近場です。
host_about:
ALOHA！ハワイ在住のエミコです。
ハワイアンジュエリーのデザイナー兼オーナー。

description:
30 night minimum stay required. A private home located just one house from Waimanalo Beach.... 5 miles of white sand. This becomes your Beach House in Hawaii. Waimanalo is a small town on the east side of Oahu. Relax and enjoy your vacation in Hawaii. We have boogie boards, snorkel gear, beach chairs, beach towels, BBQ, etc.

The space
Just one house from Waimanalo Beach, newly remodeled, bamboo floors, full kitchen open to the dining area and living room, two bedrooms each with queen bed, full bathroom. This comfortable and intimate house becomes your Beach House in Hawaii.
Walk out the front gate, across the small residential and down the beach access. Before you know it, you're lounging on the white sands of Waimanalo Beach. Comfortable outside table and chairs and bbq area. Relax in the back yard grass area.

Guest access
This is a private residence and once you enter the gated yard; the space is your private area.

Oth
host_about: I have lived in Waimanalo for about 25 years. I love to swim daily in the ocean, sail, walk each morning on Waimanalo Beach with our dog Poki, travel and read. We have vacation rental homes in Waimanalo and Kailua. My husband is a woodworker in Waimanalo and builds furniture using Hawaiian hardwoods: koa & monkey pod. We have two daughters who ride horses, surf, do tae kwon do, and generally enjoy the Hawaiian lifestyle.

description:
Sleep to the sound of the lapping surf on the shore below Maalaea Banyans 411, which features forever, spectacular penthouse level ocean views from the living room and lanai. Located beach front adjacent to picturesque Maalaea Harbor, this property has a stretch of soft, sandy beach and a vibrant snorkeling reef right out front. Watch turtles and whales (in season) meander by, and enjoy a refreshing fresh-water swim at the ocean front pool.

The space
Ideally and centrally located between Kihei and Lahaina, this property creates a totally immersive ocean experience, steps from the elevator. The condo features cable, AC in the living room, and WiFi, a kitchen set up to prepare and serve your private tropical feast, and a lanai from which to savor the legendary Maui sunsets, or just relax to the rhythm of the ocean below. Permit-only guest parking.

The unit sleeps four in consummate style, with two nicely separated bedrooms; one upstairs, one down. The
neighborhood_overview: Maalaea
host_about:
Vacation-Maui is a top-rated vacation rental agency, representing clean, well-equipped beach condos in the sunny resort area of Kihei, Wailea, and Makena. With hundreds of online reviews, our focus is on the best possible guest experience. 

Our office is within a few minutes of all of our properties, and we respond immediately to guest issues. We’re partnered with the largest Real Estate brokerage in the country, Keller Williams; we advise on and sell Maui investment condos, based on the best possible ROI.

description:
ENJOY OCEAN VIEWS in a Stylish condo in a highly desirable location in Kona. The condo is a short walk to beaches, restaurants, shopping, and entertainment. The sliding glass door leads to a Juliette Balcony overlooking the Pacific Ocean and tree tops. No rental car is needed to get to town. This unit is on the ground floor(no long stairs to climb). Dedicated parking spot at no extra fee! Kitchen and bathroom newly renovated. NEW 65" SMART TV, AC, NEW QUEEN BED, & SOFA folds to 2nd bed.

The space
This condo features Amazing Views of the Pacific Ocean and the Islands' nightly Sunsets. It is situated a short walk to Honl's beach. Start your morning off with an enjoyable 5 to 7 min walk down the shoreline access path to Honl's beach where you can enjoy your morning coffee or partake in some morning yoga beach side. This is also a great place to relax seaside and enjoy nightly sunsets while listening to the ocean waves.🏖

The condo grounds feature
neighborhood_overview:
Lovely Condo Community with a shoreline access path right across the street. A 5 to 7 min walk to Honl's beach from the unit.

Kailua-Kona on the Big Island of Hawaii is an amazing vacation location. It has 8 of 13 world’s climate zones, 4 national parks, and 14 state parks. Snorkeling, surfing, fishing, golf, and hiking trails are all here to enjoy. It is about a 2-hour drive to Volcano National Park and 1.5 hours away from Mauna Kea visitor information center. The Big Island features white and black sand beaches, and there is even a green sand beach you can explore here. Host can provide more attraction information upon request.
host_about: I love helping others in creating their most memorable vacation moments. I believe the quality of our lifes is about those special shared experiences. I am a world traveler myself and I understand the importance of good support and communication while traveling somewhere new. I created a detailed online airbnb guidebook to help assist all our guests in getting the most out of their stays here in Kona. I am a huge lover of the Big Island of Hawaii and all the untouched beauty and magic it offers and want to share it with as many guests as I can.

description:
Experience your own piece of paradise less than 100 feet from the sparkling blue Pacific Ocean in this spacious, 1,700+ sq ft two-bedroom, two-bath suite located on the first floor.

***Air conditioning is available upon request for an extra fee.***

The space
This spectacular ocean front accommodation allows you to relax in splendor listening to the soothing sounds of the ocean where dolphins can be seen and whales too, when in season. Enjoy dreamy sunsets lounging on your spacious lanai complete with wet bar, refrigerator, island teak dining table and lounge chairs. Full-size kitchen and both bathrooms have granite countertops over rich Koa wood cabinetry.

The fully equipped kitchen has a stainless-steel double sink, dishwasher, electric range, large refrigerator, cookware and utensils. Both bedrooms have louvered windows that open to the sound of ocean waves to lull you to sleep after a day of island activities. The master bedroom is fur
host_about:
Kanaloa at Kona by Castle welcomes the hopeless romantics, the thrill-seekers, and those who just want to have fun. Our resort feels secluded, but is close to charming shops, restaurants, and sits upon the dramatic lava rock coast. You’ll enjoy year-round sailing, snorkeling, and fishing, dine among spectacular Kona sunsets, and fall asleep to the sound of crashing waves.

Since 1993, Castle Resorts & Hotels has specialized in innovative hotel and resort management. We manage properties throughout the Hawaiian Islands, including Kauai, Oahu, Maui, Molokai, and Hawaii Island, as well as Auckland, New Zealand. Accommodations range from full-service hotels to resort condominiums and combines value, convenience, and authentic experiences.

description:
YOU WILL BE AMAZED BY THE VIEW THIS DIRECT OCEANFRONT CONDO OFFERS. You come to Maui for the views – treat yourself and stay at our DIRECT ocean front unit PapakeaF205 - LuxVaca

Papakea Resort on the Kaanapali Coast is a relaxing paradise on 13 acres of expansive lawns and lush gardens. We offer a private spacious direct ocean front one bedroom condo on the 2rd floor overlooking the crystal blue Pacific. $165-$350 per night.

There is a $17/day daily resort fee payable directly to the resort

The space
We only accept booking on this site up to 3 months in advance. If you have interest in future dates, contact us.

This is a direct oceanfront unit in the "F" building at the Papakea Resort.

NOTE: The Papakea Resort implements a $17/day facilities use fee (10-day/$170 max. charge). The fee is collected by the front desk to maintain our wonderful property in paradise. The $17 dollar fee/day it is payable to the Papakea upo
host_about: We live in the bay area but love our travels to Maui and South Lake Tahoe.

description:
Make some memories at this unique and family-friendly place.

The space
6C is situated perfectly on the Waikoloa King's Golf Course with an ocean view. It features 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The master bedroom has lovely inspired decor with a King size bed and master en suite bathroom that includes a glass shower, an over-sized tub and dual vanity. The bright and colorful guest bedroom has 2 single beds, that can be converted to a King, upon request and detached quest bathroom with shower/tub combination. Both bedrooms have flat screen televisions for your viewing pleasure.
The fully equipped kitchen has countertops dressed in granite and all stainless steel appliances and everything you need for those perfect nights in to put your culinary skills to use! Condo is also furnished with a grill on the lanai, to bbq while the sun is setting in the background. Both indoor and outdoor dining accomodate 4 guests.
Relax in the comfy living room and cuddle u
host_about: AM Concierge is a Hawaii based On-island hosting services that caters to high end vacation rentals on the beautiful Big Island of Hawaii. We take pride in making your vacation the most memorable, from a well equipped and spotless clean rental with attention to every detail….digital, interactive guidebooks….keyless entries and a host available to guests for the entire trip!!

description:
Waikiki Sunset #1414 – 229 Paoakalani Ave. (3-Night Minimum)

Treat yourself to the best view of iconic Diamond Head, Hawaii's most recognized landmark! Perfect rental for a small family. Just a 5-minute walk to Waikiki Beach or the Honolulu Zoo!

The space
Enjoy a fabulous view of majestic Diamond Head from this 14th floor, two-bedroom, one-bath condo with central AC (604sf plus lanai with table and chairs). 6-person max!

LIVING AREA:
– 50" TV
– Queen sleeper sofa
– Writing Desk

FULL KITCHEN:
– All basic kitchen appliances (sorry, no dishwasher)

MAIN BEDROOM:

– Peek-a-boo Ocean view

GUEST BEDROOM:
– 2 Twin Beds (can be made as King upon request)
– TV

BATHROOM:
– Tub/shower combo (with handheld shower wand and safety grab bars)

YOUR RENTAL INCLUDES:

neighborhood_overview: The beaches in Waikiki are just a short walk away (just 5–10 minutes), and shopping, restaurants and entertainment venues in Waikiki are all easily accessible.
host_about:
ALOHA! E komo mai and mahalo for choosing to stay with Captain Cook Resorts!

Captain Cook Resorts proudly manages over 170 privately-owned vacation rentals in Waikiki (a district of Honolulu on the island of Oahu). Everyone on the fun and energetic CCR team works hard to offer great accommodations, great service, and has a passion for sharing all that Oahu has to offer our guests!

We appreciate that you're on vacation, and we ask that you let us know if there's anything we can do to make this visit stand out as one of your best!

ALL CAPTAIN COOK RESORTS RENTALS INCLUDE:
– Bath towels, Beach towels, Bed linens
– Dishes, Silverware, Cookware (including tea kettle & rice cooker)
– Beach chairs, Hair dryer, Iron/Ironing board
– Start-Up Supplies: coffee filters, laundry detergent, dish soap, dishwasher soap, bar soap, paper towels, toilet paper, tissue, basic cleaning supplies, and travel size (2 oz.) shampoo, conditioner, body wash, body lotion
– NOT PROVIDED: beach umbrellas, beach toys, aluminum foil, Ziploc bags, coffee, condiments/seasonings, cooking oil, fabric softener, or bleach. This private vacation rental does NOT include resort services such as daily housekeeping, replenishment of towels or toiletry supplies, or hotel front desk services.

Please let us know if you have any questions!

Mahalo!

description:
Vacation home with incredible views with space for 1-4 registered guests. Forget your worries in this quiet and serene space. Enjoy the beauties of nature, ocean views, singing bamboo and the Waikoloa breeze. Respectful, clean and organized visitors are welcome as this is in a residential neighborhood about a 15 minute drive from some of the best beaches in all of Hawaii! The home is in Waikoloa Village where vacation rentals have quiet hours from 8pm-8am, and encourage quiet hours all day.

The space
The vacation home looks out to incredible ocean views with an expansive lanai. Clean, comfortable and 15 minute drive to the best beaches on the island. The space has 2 bedrooms each with one queen size bed, closet and amenities. There is a older yet full kitchen. The master bedroom has a 3 piece bathroom. Additional space for a workstation is available. Wifi is included. Parking is free. A lovely yard full of fruit trees and native plants circles the house. Co
neighborhood_overview:
Waikoloa is the area of the Big Island with the most beautiful, accessible, and non-crowded beaches. It is a residential area and you must have a rental car. There is nothing besides a nice walk, within walking distance. When booking this vacation home you can have 1-2 cars parked in the driveway an no one on property who is not a registered guest. This is a residential neighborhood so only people who respect the working population of the island are welcome. The neighbors are teachers, nurses and tourism staff that work non traditional hours. Therefore we ask all guests to be respectful to keep all noise contained within the house; including simple gestures such as taking phone calls indoors as opposed to outside where neighbors will hear you. There are no parties allowed. The county regulated vacation homes to strict quiet hours during the dark.
That said a quiet community brings its own unique peaceful charm. Here you will find everything you need with a balance of beaut
host_about:
Duncan and Ranae have been married for over 20 years. Both have graduate degrees and both are educators in the public and private sectors. Duncan grew up in Canada, is a musician and has been to the Grammys for his musical contributions. Ranae is the primary photographer of EMotion Galleries and moonlights as a hula dancer. The couple enjoys traveling, SCUBA diving and are nature lovers.  You can follow our adventures on social media @EMotionGalleries 
Ranae hosts two popular AirBnB Experiences.  The first is the Epic Island PhotoShoot https://www.airbnb.com/experiences/213923 where your photo is captured in the beautiful Hawaiian landscape.  She also has an educational experience where you learn how to take photos as you walk through the environment of Hawaii https://www.airbnb.com/experiences/119780.

description:
Aloha! The Red 'Ohana (2 bedroom) is located above Mauna Kea and Hapuna Beaches on the beautifully scenic Kohala Mountain Ranch Road on the 'sunny side' of Waimea/Kamuela Hawai'i.

The ultimate in comfort and classic Hawaiian style, this impeccably restored large two Bedroom, one Bath island home has beautiful views of the Kohala Forest Reserve and Mauna Kea. The home comes equipped with designer furnishings & linens and all the best amenities.

Fully Permitted Hawaii Vacation Rental

The space
The Red 'Ohana - Waimea - Kamuela, Big Island of Hawaii, minutes some of the best beaches and adventures in all of the state of Hawaii.

The Red 'Ohana is the best in up country living located on the beautifully scenic Kohala Mountain Ranch Road on the 'sunny side' of Waimea/Kamuela, a cowboy town with breezes and milder temperatures that provide an idyllic Hawaiian environment.

The ultimate in comfort and classic Hawaiian style, th
neighborhood_overview: The Red 'Ohana is conveniently located 8 minutes above Hapuna and Mauna Kea Beach and only 2 miles to the quaint town of Waimea.  Hawaii Preparatory Academy is just across the street where you have access to tennis courts, pool and track.  We are located on the "sunny side" of town in the ideal Hawaiian climate.
host_about:
Red ‘Ohana Owner, Laura Monahan, has over 30 years experience in the luxury hotel industry. She is the ultimate host and never misses a detail when it comes to making your stay at the Red ‘Ohana memorable. You can find her most mornings paddling along Mauna Kea Beach or hiking through the beautiful Waimea hills with her two Australian Shepherds. Laura lives in Waimea with her husband and their 2 children. Come experience a piece of paradise here at the Red ‘Ohana! 

Red ‘Ohana Manager, Megan Peterson, has a background in business and hospitality. She has a passion for creating unique experiences for guests and can assist you with anything from planning a Mauna Kea Summit picnic under the stars, diving with manta rays, or a sunset sail along the Kohala Coast. Megan and her family have been on the Big Island for over 30 years and she and her husband are expecting their second daughter.

description:
Spacious beach-themed 2 story townhome with vaulted ceilings in Waikoloa Village.

Play golf at The Village Course at Waikoloa.

Enjoy the best beaches on the island - 15 mins drive - including ʻAnaehoʻomalu, Wailea & Hapuna.

☆ 3 Queen beds
☆ 2 full bathrooms
☆ Beach chairs, umbrella, cooler & towels

Community swimming pool with hot tub, gas BBQ grill, tennis courts & designated parking spot. Easy walk to breakfast, restaurants & Hawaiian grocery store.

The space
First level - fully stocked kitchen, dining table (seats 4), living room (comfy couch & Smart TV), closet with beach supplies & outdoor lanai (outdoor dining table - seats 6).

Second level - master bedroom (1 queen bed & Smart TV), attached master bathroom (2 sinks & shower), second bedroom (2 queen beds) & hallway bathroom (1 sink & shower/tub), laundry (wash & dry).

A pack-n-play travel crib is available!

Guest acce
neighborhood_overview: The Village Course at Waikoloa, Johnny’s Restaurant, Island Lava Java Waikōloa, Pueo's Osteria, Waikōloa Plaza, and KTA Super Stores are all within walking distance!
host_about: Hey hey!  We are Johnny & Alex, a couple of educators from Colorado.  We enjoy the outdoors and traveling with our homeschooled daughter. We have vacation homes in our favorite places - Hawaii, Cabo San Lucas and Colorado - that we love to share with fellow travel lovers. We look forward to hosting you and your family!

description:
Renovated 1 bedroom condo that sleeps 4, in the Waikiki Banyan, walk to the famous Waikiki Beach, shopping and restaurants. Free WiFi and parking. Beautiful mountain and city views from the bedroom and the balcony.

The space
You'll enjoy this extensively renovated 1-bedroom that sleeps up to 4 people, located in the heart of Waikiki at the family-friendly Waikiki Banyan (Tower 2). 

This cozy condo, is just the place you’ve been looking for to kick off your next tropical vacation. The apt on the 12th floor comes with mountain and city views from your living room, bedroom and balcony -- And have we already mentioned it's within walking distance to the beach? Talk about an embarrassment of riches!

For your convenience and comfort, this air-conditioned unit, new flooring, has an open floor plan and fully-equipped kitchen, along with a countertop with 4 chairs. The bedroom has brand new queen size memory foam mattress and one full-size bed, whil
neighborhood_overview: The Waikiki Banyan is located in world famous Waikiki, walking distance to the beach, restaurants and shopping centers.
host_about:
Aloha from Midway Vacations! We are a licensed, full-service vacation rental management company specializing in high-quality destination vacation rentals in Waikiki and South Maui.

 We love to help our guests create amazing vacations where you and your Ohana (family in Hawaiian) will make lasting memories!

Relax and rejuvenate in our stunning homes with confidence, knowing that the units are expertly maintained, thoroughly cleaned, and well stocked.

No surprises! We provide plenty of photos of each unit on our website, so you accurately know what to expect before you arrive.

All units are fully furnished and stocked with dishware, cookware, bed linens, towels, and initial start-up supplies (toiletries). Enjoy the comforts of home in paradise!

Enjoy the privacy of your vacation rental unit with the peace of mind that our dedicated team is always available to assist you if any problems or concerns arise during your stay.

We take great pride in maintaining our high standards of care and attention to details so you can enjoy superior rental properties.

description:
Your cabin features a ground level queen size bed, an optional queen size air mattress, a space heater, ceiling fan, floor fan, and lots of open space for yoga and stretching.

Relax before you start your day with a hot cup of coffee or tea on your lanai. You're also welcome to prepare and enjoy meals in our screened communal kitchen, where you'll feel close to nature with plenty of space for meal prep and dining.

The space
While you won't find a tv in your cabin, we do have cards, board games, books, and wifi. We have an incredible view of the Milky Way from our driveway, and are happy to let you stargaze with our telescope, weather permitting.

Amenities include private outdoor restroom with a sink, flushing toilet, and hot shower.

Optional add-ons include transportation, on-site laundry, and massage sessions with a Hawaii-licensed therapist.
neighborhood_overview:
Our place is perfect for adventurers, explorers, & travelers looking for a peaceful place to unwind & unplug, as well as those experimenting with converting to off-grid/tiny living!

Located 30 minutes from Hawaii Volcanoes National Park & Volcano Village, you'll be hosted on three acres in lush & remote Fern Forest, in a charming 200 square foot private cabin.

You'll sleep and reset to the sounds of rain, coqui frogs, & crickets. Our elevation is just over 1900 ft on Kilauea - it gets chilly.
host_about:
Aloha, I'm Misty!

I love adventures, swimming, and baking. I sell my baked goods at the Volcano Farmer's Market on Sundays.

My husband Tom and I built our home in Hawaii over the course of a few months in the summer of 2022 with the help of a professional builder, our friends, and neighbors. 

We are constantly improving our home, and growing magic where we can. 

Tom is a massage therapist, licensed in Hawaii, and is a UH Hilo certified Master Gardener. His passion for the land is evident from the moment you arrive at our place.

host_about:
At Maui Condo and Home, LLC we continue to serve our owners and guests with the same Aloha Spirit that we shared over 20 years ago. Though our business has changed through expansion and growth to include properties beyond Maui -- on the islands of Oahu, Hawaii and Kauai --  our values and sense of Aloha remain. We have implemented new business strategies and have remained at the top of the Property Management industry on Maui. We are excited to continue to serve our current owners and return guests, as well as welcome new owners and guests to Maui Condo and Home.

description:
Discover our charming Maui Airbnb! Ideal for families, friends, and couples, this cozy retreat guarantees endless fun. Stroll to world-famous beaches, shops, and delightful restaurants. Inside, enjoy two bedrooms, a spacious bathroom, fully equipped kitchen, washer and dryer, TV, Wi-Fi, ACs, and a comfy recliner sofa. With ground floor convenience, access the pool (closed 9/15/23-11/24/23 due to a remodeling) and parking easily. Experience the best of Maui at our welcoming getaway!

The space
-It is a comfortable and functionally furnished condo with a warm and welcoming atmosphere.

-Our generously sized bathroom that sets it apart from similar units.

-The living room is designed with a minimalistic aesthetic, featuring only essential furniture and decor to create a functional and inviting space.

-Our condo is situated in an ideal spot that's perfect for beach lovers and shoppers alike!
It's located in close proximity to the
neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to our incredible destination where you'll find yourself surrounded by the charm of world-famous beaches, an abundance of shops, and delightful dining options! Discover the unparalleled beauty of our location, as the renowned Charley Young Beach awaits just moments from the entrance of Pacific Shores. If that's not enough, the breathtaking Kamaole I Beach is also just a short stroll away!

Start your day with a leisurely walk to a charming local cafe, where you can indulge in aromatic coffee, delectable pastries, or treat yourself to refreshing and healthy smoothies and açaí bowls. For lunch and dinner, the options are endless with a diverse range of restaurants catering to every taste and preference.

And let's not forget about the stunning sunsets! Prepare to be mesmerized by the awe-inspiring views as you relax on the beach, creating unforgettable memories that will last a lifetime. The best part? All of these incredible experiences are conveniently withi
host_about:
Aloha, my name is Yumi! 
I'm a mom of 2 originally from Tokyo, now living in beautiful Maui. 
I love sharing my piece of paradise with people from around the world and helping them make the most out of their time here. 
As your host, I'm dedicated to providing you with the greatest hospitality during your stay so you can fully enjoy the beauty that Maui offers.
I look forward to hosting you in Paradise!!

description:
Direct Oceanfront top floor unit! Incredible views of the ocean and sunsets

*Please note - the complex will be resurfacing the North and South lobby floors from Jan 04, 2023 - Jan 23, 2024. This project will require some temporary detours, minimal noise and dust along with a project dumpster downstairs.*

After a 2-year Covid-break from listing properties on AirBnb, Kona Coast Vacations is once again offering professionally managed Vacation Rentals to travelers.

The space
Direct Oceanfront top floor unit! Incredible views of the ocean and sunsets can be enjoyed from living area and the fully equipped kitchen. The private extra large lanai offers a large table with chairs plus chaise lounges to relax and enjoy the views. Unit is equipped with air-conditioning in the living area and in order to save energy, is placed on a 4-hour timer. A washer/dryer add to comfort and convenience of this deluxe unit. The bedroom in this offers a King bed,
neighborhood_overview: Kona Alii Drive
host_about:
Kona Coast Vacations hosts over 5,400 reservations a year with the help of knowledgeable management, proficient team members and trusted home owners. Open 7 days a week, we strive to help with each visitors’ every need. Sharing Aloha from the first contact whether it is phone or email, we are here to assist by making the booking process as seamless as can be. We pride ourselves on providing hands on assistance whenever it is needed, whether it is reservation details, maintenance issues, or even booking activities!

host_about:
The Outrigger Way

Developed in 1993 with Hawaiian scholar and historian Dr. George Kanahele, the Ke 'Ano Wa'a process was designed to advance the company's corporate culture and fundamental business strategies. The values-based process intricately connected three core elements of the hospitality industry:

HOST + GUEST + PLACE

It also deepened Outrigger's understanding and appreciation of the local host culture, a distinct hospitality style that is recognized across the globe.

description:
This 2BR/2Bath ground-floor Palm Villas unit is private and secluded, surrounded by 6 acres of lush landscaping. As our guest you have full access to the Auberge/Mauna Lani Fitness Center, located across the street. Play tennis and pickleball, work out, or swim in the 25M pool. You also have access to the private Beach Club and Napua restaurant. A nature trail and ancient fishponds are also steps away. Nearby Foodland Farms offers a gourmet selection of meat, fish, baked goods, liquor and wine.

The space
Primary Bedroom has a Cal. King bed with Tempur-Pedic mattress, and an "en suite" bathroom with tub and shower. Guest Bedroom has two XL Twin Beds with memory foam mattresses. Fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances, and the fridge has filtered water and makes plenty of ice. The Living Room has a comfortable sofa and armchair to relax and plan your Big Island adventures. Beautiful, lush gardens are off the front and back lanais. Fast WiFi and a 64”
neighborhood_overview:
It's a 20 minute walk from the Palm Villas to the Residents Beach Club at Makaiwa Bay, on a paved trail which first wends through a Nature Preserve with petroglyphs and lava tubes, then goes on through ancient, shady fishponds where the Hawaiian's practiced aquaculture. As my Hawaiian friend says: "This is the heartbeat of the Island."

The Residents Beach Club at Makaiwa Bay offers easy entry, lounge chairs and cabanas and some of the best snorkeling on the island. As our guest you will also have access to the private parking lot right by the beach, which is only a few minutes drive from the condo.

The Mauna Lani Fitness Center and Tennis Garden, part of the exclusive Auberge hotel, are directly across the street. As our guest, you and your family will have complimentary access to the tennis and pickleball courts, weight room and work-out machines and 25M lap pool.

The Mauna Lani resort exudes understated elegance and truly lives up to its name:
host_about: I am a 59 year-old opera and theater director who loves stand-up paddle boarding and Scuba diving on the Big Island of Hawai'i. This private 2 BR, 2 Bath condo is located at the Palm Villas at Mauna Lani, a small complex with only 44 units in 9 buildings spread across 6 beautifully landscaped acres.  The Palm Villas is uniquely located within Mauna Lani resort, as you can walk to the beach in 20 minutes via a paved trail that wends through a nature preserve and ancient fishponds. You can also walk to the local market to pick up line-caught fresh fish or grass-fed  Big Island beef, local vegetables and tropical fruits.  I split my time between New York City and Hawai`i - the Big Island is the perfect antidote to the hustle and bustle of the Big City.  We would love to have you as our guest at Hale Malino, which means "Pacific House."  You are sure to have a calm and relaxing stay in our intimate condo as you enjoy all the beauty of Mauna Lani and the Kohala coast of the Big Island.

neighborhood_overview:
- Located in Poipu (South Shore).
- Luxury vacation rentals in a serene and sought after resort setting.

- Features mountain and/or ocean views, depending on the suite.
- An ideal location for golf enthusiasts and families, this resort is seated right on the Kiahuna Golf Course and within walking distance to famous beaches, dining and shopping.

The South Shore of Kauai is where locals go to find sun when it’s raining everywhere else. As one of the most popular and well-developed visitor areas on Kauai, sunny Poipu offers sophisticated shops and restaurants with stunning beaches, world-class golfing and exciting attractions. Swim, snorkel, surf and sunbathe at Poipu Beach, then check out Spouting Horn, Allerton Botanical Gardens and hikes along lithified sand dunes! From dawn to dusk, the South Shore of Kauai will satisfy your soul.

We have lots of fine restaurants, beach activities, snorkeling within the 4 pristine lagoons, tours that can take you out for snorkeling or dolphin watching, and golfing across the street on the famous Ted Robinson course just to name a few. It is centrally located on the island with ease to all the major highways. description:
Our ocean view cabins provide rustic comforts for lone travelers, couples, friends, and groups who want to experience the natural beauty and captivating adventure of off-grid, farm life on the Big Island.

As our guest, you also have access to Kulaniapia Falls, the largest privately accessible waterfall in the state of Hawaii, at 120 ft tall, as well as adventures like waterfall rappelling and lava tube exploration. While 100% off the grid, we are also only 15 minutes from town.

The space
The Farm is part of our larger Kulaniapia community, spanning 40 acres, operated by a passionate team that collaborates to share our off-the-grid lifestyle, and other unique experiences for our guests. In addition to cabins on the farm, we also operate a full service Inn with more traditional accommodations. Our private chef offer a “chef’s table” dinner overlooking the falls, and brakfast is availalbe for an additional charge. Cooking classes and farm tours are avail
neighborhood_overview: Our farm is one of many comprising the Puueo Farms district. Crop and pasture fields line the road, as well as ambling macadamia nut and lychee orchards.
host_about: Kulaniapia Farms cabins and experiences are hosted by a small team of collaborators who are passionate about sharing our sustainable lifestyle. One of us is always connected to communicate with you before your stay. Your experienced host lives on site and can answer questions about your stay and adventures on the island.

description:

The space

The vanity has a granite counter top and hardwood cabinet. The bathroom walls are tiled with travertine. We have a european style shower with ADA grab bars and clear glass divider. It is equipped with a dual out-flow valve system. In the living room, we have pull down shades for the windows and doors a
neighborhood_overview: We absolutely love this location!!  We purchased in 1986, and the reason is, there is no place like it in the whole island.  Before we bought, we scoured the entire island looking for the ideal place.  We found it at Napili Point.  It has not changed much since then, it still has that laid back, old Hawaiian feel to it.  Legend says, when the resort was first planned, no building could exceed the height of the nearest coconut tree.  It is still that way today, no high rises here.  And that's the way we like it!!

All appliances you need: Ninja Coffee maker, Black and Decker blender/food processor, electric tea water heater, GE microwave, dishwasher, disposal, full range of pots and pans and salad spinner makes the kitchen work for you. neighborhood_overview: This is building one of Kihei Kai Nani resort which has wonderfully mature tropical gardens and grounds. Built in 1970, It is close to one of the best casual pubs on the island, and many shops and restaurants are within short walking distance. Our favorites include Cafe Ole', The Monkey Pod, The Five Palms (closed for refurb:   2023) Hawaiian Moons Natural foods (for hot organic take-out!), Moose McGillicuddy's Pub, The Monkey Pod Restaurant, Ohana Bar and Grill for music night, the 808 Bistro. Bicycle, snorkel, paddleboard and trip planning are available locally. Maui Medical Group has a clinic next to the ABC store, in case you need extra help. There is a large Safeway a few miles away. Hit Costco or Whole Foods on your way from the airport, if you prefer, and load up before arriving in Kihei. Live music is also Azeka Plaza. The Whale Day parade is in February.
host_about:
My husband and I have lived in Seattle for the last 35 years, and then four years ago we moved to Bainbridge Island, just off the coast of Seattle. Semi-retired, Roxanne works per diem as a nurse and Nicholas is a writer. We have no children and no pets, so we can travel happily and have been vacationing in Hawaii for at least 20 years. We love the new booking freedom which is given by the companies like Air B and B, which give you back the feel of making your own bookings and making travel affordable!

We love mountains, the ocean, music, media, and great coffee. We adore getting away into nature, and appreciating beauty. We also really value cleanliness, order, and good design.

We have traveled to Scotland, Ireland, France, Germany, Mexico, and much of the United States. My husband was in the Peace Corps in Micronesia, and then was drafted out of the Peace Corps into the military in the late 60's. Then, he went back to school to achieve his master in architecture from Stanford University. Roxanne went to the University of Washington in the school of Nursing, and has been a nurse ever since: she has enjoyed Intensive care for 10 years, the Regional Trauma Center at Harborview for 18 years, and Interventional Radiology Nursing for 15 years after that. She still works in I.R. per diem.  Travel really refreshes us both, and we have come from our travels with deeper respect for the beauty of life each time.

We hope you have a wonderful stay with us!

description:
Situated in the heart of Waikiki and across from the Ala Wai Canal, this property is just minutes from the Waikiki Beach Walk. neighborhood_overview:
Waikoloa Beach is an area located on the South Kohala coast on the island of Hawaii. Approximately 25 minutes north of the Kona International Airport (KOA). The Waikoloa Beach Resort is very family and pedestrian friendly. Most properties are within a 10-15 minute walk (3-5minute drive with ample parking) to ʻAnaehoʻomalu Bay, also known as A-Bay. A-Bay is a shallow water bay located within the resort. ʻAnaehoʻomalu is best known for its sunsets, snorkeling and historic royal fishponds.
The Queens’ MarketPlace and Kings’ Shops provide convenient dining and shopping options.

description:
I moved to Hawaii and built my home after the loss of my husband over 11 years ago. At the time my sister and brother both lived here which was part of the draw to Hawaii. I love this little piece of property in paradise where my brother and I built this little bungalow. I believe you will be able to relax and enjoy the beauty of Hawaii. There is a lot to see here on the east side of Hawaii so come on over and enjoy!!

I have since moved back to the mainland because of my health.

The space
The Beach Road House is a stand alone house. There is plenty of parking for the guests on a concrete drive-way.

Guest access

neighborhood_overview:
Staying in my Guest Home, you will feel comfortable, safe, and somewhat secluded. You will be approximately 1 mile from the ocean. Travel south on Beach Road (away from Kaloli) 1/2 mile and go past Paradise Park Road and park where you can and watch the ocean take your cares away. Very nice overview of what my home has to offer you. Depending on the time of year you visit you might be able to catch a whale breach.

Of course, there are great areas in Hilo to visit.
host_about:
One day my dream is to travel to Ireland and Great Britain.  This is my heritage.  Until then, I decided to move to Hawaii after the loss of my late husband.  I have family here in Hawaii, so I came to heal.  Once I arrived, and with the help of my sister and brother, I decided to  remain in Hawaii and built my home.  I now want to share my home with you who want to come to one of the most beautiful places I've seen.  

What are the five things I can't live without.  

1.   My car.  I've never been without a car, except short periods of time.  I really don't like to depend on others to get me around. 
2.  Clean running water.  I  had never been where I couldn't have water, but know I wouldn't like it.
3.  Love.  I've been in a situation where I lost my love.  It is very lonely and uncomfortable, to say the least. 

My favorite place I've ever been is Athens, Greece.  I was fortunate enough to be able to visit two different times while stationed in Turkey.   It’s a beautiful place to visit.  I've often thought I would move there.  But it’s too far from where I need to be.  

I love to:  
  1.  read mysteries mostly written particularly by James Patterson.  
  2.  watch mysteries, romantic comedies, some drama.
  3.  listen to most any music.
  4.  eat almost any type food.  No pork though.

description:
Sit back and relax in this one-bedroom two-bath condo at Molokai Shores, offering amazing ocean views, a fully equipped kitchen, and private lanai. The west-facing location and island décor will have you relaxed in no time. Floor-to-ceiling glass sliders provide and abundance of natural light and the open-concept living and dining areas provides a great space for family and friends a like.

The space
Cherish every moment in this one-bedroom Oceanview condominium with breathtaking views of the Pacific. Feel like you’re floating while relaxing on your private lanai. Inside you’ll find a kitchen with a full-size oven/stovetop and refrigerator, beautiful cabinetry, and a dining area that seats 4.

The bedroom includes a plush King-sized bed, desk, and dresser. The unit also features a tastefully furnished living area with a flat screen TV and gorgeous views of the Pacific ocean!

Molokai is known for its wide open spaces, unspoiled land, remote b
host_about:
Experience the unspoiled natural beauty of Molokai, the Friendly Isle

The oceanfront Molokai Shores Resort is located on four acres of beautiful tropical landscaping, with an expansive lawn that leads to the beach and dramatic views of the Island of Lanai and the Kaloko'eli fishpond. Unwind in spacious one- or two-bedroom ocean view and oceanfront suites, and leave your worries behind. Take a dip in the ocean or the large oceanfront pool. Spend a lazy afternoon barbecuing and having a picnic in the grassy courtyard. Or, simply sit back and let the day pass by.

Molokai is known for its wide open spaces, unspoiled land, remote beaches, and smaller than "small town" lifestyle. In fact, you won’t even find a stoplight on Molokai. This is just one of many reasons why people are charmed by this tiny island in the sun. You’ll connect with the land and the people of Molokai instantly, as culture and history are carved into every inch of the island’s stunning landscapes.

Whether you seek refuge from modern life or you want an unforgettable adventure, you’ve come to the right place. Molokai Shores urges—no, begs—you to unwind. Our cozy condominiums feature one- and two-bedroom vacation homes that make life easy. Enjoy our oceanfront swimming pool, barbeque areas, Free parking, Free public WiFi, on-site hair salon, shuffleboard, and laundry facilities.

Castle Vacation Rentals Hawaii is a new brand providing management of individual vacation rental properties, backed by the power of Castle’s exclusive technology platform and vast distribution and customer reach.

Being a full service property management company originating and deeply rooted in the Hawaiian Islands, Castle Vacation Rentals knows Hawaii. In the course of our 25+ years in the property and rental management industry, we’ve revolutionized property management with easy to use services and systems that maximize the revenue for our homeowners. To do that, we coupled unmatched technology, marketing and revenue expertise within dedicated Hawaii-based support teams, resulting in our becoming the largest Vacation Rental Management company in the islands.

Guest access

host_about: Aloha! My name is Akalei. I’m a retired surfer from the North Shore of Oahu. I’ve also lived on Maui & Kauai. Most of my family now lives on Kauai so we travel there a lot to see them. I enjoy surfing, sailing, pilates, making jewelry, SCUBA diving, painting and time with family & friends. We enjoy making big meals & sharing them with those we love. It is our kuleana to malama our beautiful island home. Mahalo for doing that with us!

Address- 75-5961 Alii Drive Kailua-Kona, HI 96740
On the Big Island’s west coast, you’ll find this delightful retreat built to capture the natural wonder of Kailua-Kona. Beautifully designed to capture the charm of the 1930s, you’ll want for no modern amenity. Outdoor pools and the nearby beach are just the beginning of what’s within reach.
host_about: Hi, I'm Joy! I'm excited for you to check out my listings and discover all the places you can go! I would love to be a part of your travel journey, as its one of my favorite things in life! My parents had us on adventures starting at a very young age and I thankfully got to see and experience so many wonderful and breathtaking places! I love taking my family on those same adventures now and would be so excited to help you plan out some of yours! Please feel free to reach out with any questions you might have, I am representing owners of the underutilized timeshares that might be just perfect for your next journey! If there is anything you're looking for and don't see in the listings please let me know and a lot of times I can help track down exactly what you are looking for! Can't wait to start planning your next adventure with you! Happy Travels!

description:
Spacious and private apartment with large private Lanai, full kitchen, full bath, washer dryer, open loft bedroom, lounge and dining area. Conveniently located on Kauai's famous North Shore, near shops, beaches, and walking trails.

Registration number
540050030000, TA-188-596-0704-01
neighborhood_overview:
Princeville is a tastful planned residential and vacation neighbood on Kauai's North Shore. A park like atmosphere prevails with world class golf courses and walking trails winding throughout. Spectacular sea views and water falls all within easy walking distance of shopping center and restaurants.

Princeville is an amazingly convenient and beautiful community on the North Shore. We absolutely love it and here's why:

From our location it is easy to walk to the beach or the grocery store and the views in all around are spectacular, with ocean one direction and mountains and waterfalls the other. There is a network of fantastic walking and running trails all over Princeville, making it likely the safest and easiest of locations of the island to walk or take a run.

The coastline below Princeville provides some of the most pristine, clear water due to the lack of rivers and fresh water runoff. Because of these, Princeville has some amazing exploring to enj
host_about: Aloha! My name is Cameron. My family has deep roots in Kauai going back to the 1960's, with strong ties to the local community, I am uniquely equipped to help guest get the most out your Kauai experience. To us the Aloha spirit is the golden rule of Hawaii - treat people, and the land, with respect - how you would want to be treated yourself. We are proud of our home and love to share it with new people!

description:
The space
Pali Ke Kua 224

Enjoy the awe-inspiring views of the Pacific Ocean and the north end of Hanalei Bay with Mt. Makana in the background. The views from Pali Ke Kua 224 are indescribable. Sit on the lanai and enjoy the spectacular sunsets, relax and read a book, and watch the humpback whales go by in the winter. Guests can spot the endemic Hawaiian Nene geese as they wander through the grounds.

This condo is tastefully decorated with many of the comforts of home. This condo is perfect for a family or a small group of friends. The suite also has two updated bathrooms for guests' convenience. The kitchen boasts granite countertops and a well-equipped kitchen.

There is a large community pool and jacuzzi for your enjoyment. The on-site restaurant offers convenience when you don’t want to cook. This suite is also conveniently located on Kauai’s North Shore, close to the Princeville Shopping Center, the Princeville Hotel, and beaches
host_about:
Vacasa
Vacation Home Management

Vacasa unlocks the possibilities of how we enjoy vacation homes. We take care of managing our homeowners’ vacation houses so they can have peace of mind (and their home when they want to). And our guests book vacations confidently knowing they’re going to find exactly what they’re looking for without any surprises.

Each vacation home is always cared for by our professional local teams who implement our high cleanliness and maintenance values, while the hands-off tasks of vacation rental management--marketing, filing taxes, and maintaining a website--are handled by a specialized central support team. Our passion and focus remain true: to empower our homeowners, guests, and employees to invest in vacation.

Experience Hawaii country life and common conveniences all in one spot. Waialua is a residential beach community, just off of Haleiwa town. Still very North Shore living and close to several quiet beaches. We are nearby the world famous Matsumoto's and Haleiwa Beach Park, public busses, SUP rentals and Rainbow Bridge where you can go for a kayak ride or SUP, restaurants, markets, drug store - all within a 10 minute drive.

We are a laid back couple with a baby girl that work full-time but love to relax and enjoy the lifestyle on the North Shore whenever we are at home. We love just hanging out at the beach and enjoy all water activities. We love to travel, to meet new people and enjoy learning about new cultures. 
Our puppy is an incredibly happy and friendly dog which is still in training. Most people fall in love with her!

description:
