host_about:
Aloha,
Here at Punahoa Oceanfront Vacation Rental's in Kihei, Maui Hawaii.  We offer Studios, One bedrooms, Two bedrooms, and One Bedroom Penthouses that is Ocean front and located right on the beach!  The amenities we provide in Punahoa is FREE PARKING, FREE WIFI INTERNET ACCESS CODE, & FULLY EQUIPPED KITCHEN / KITCHENETTES.  
Inside the units additional amenities such as:

- Hair dryer, hair shampoo, hair conditioner, beach towels, and beach chairs

-Small cooler for your usage to take out and enjoy/travel beach or long drive around Maui.

-Beach chair & beach towels

On property we have two outside shower stalls to rinse off after enjoying your time at the beach.

We also have a gas barbecue grill on property.

Spectacular sunsets and perfect location for surfer's, stand up paddle boarding, and kayak.  Snorkeling from the Cove beach to Charley Young's beach is a must!  We frequently have visits from tired Honu's (Hawaiian sea turtles) resting on our shores / beach.  

***Please be respectful and DO NOT TOUCH/ FEED/ OR BOTHER THE HAWAIIAN SEA TURTLES & HAWAIIAN MONK SEALS!***

Send us a message or any inquires for additional information, we would love to welcome you to be our guest, stay with us here at Punahoa oceanfront vacation rentals, in Kihei Maui Hawaii!  Aloha nui loa!

- Zaldy 

Within walking distances from Fresh local farmers market and produces, outlets and little boutiques, variety of restaurants and bars, rent stand up paddle boards, boogie boards, and snorkeling gears.  Located right on the beach between Maui's famous Charley Young's beach & The Cove.  Close by Kalama beach park and playground.

description:
Maui No Ka’ Oi
🌺Month Special🌺
“Discounted Prices” for one of the best Maui travel times. (Hawaii Air prices are rock bottom if purchased soon for Sept/Oct. travel )

Location is key for our newly renovated 1 bedroom sunny South Kihei unit. Watch spectacular sunsets and whale watch from the comfort of your second story patio. Experience island life at its best! Shopping, dining, surf lessons, and great beaches are all within walking distance. Ideal home base to start your Maui adventures!

The space
The Shores of Maui is a quiet, well kept secret, 50 unit complex located directly across the street from the ocean. The complex itself is fully loaded with a swimming pool, jacuzzi, pool shower, BBQ's, outside seating by the pool, tennis courts, and pickle ball courts as well!

Aloha and welcome to our Newly renovated unit, The Modern Island Retreat. Step inside and immediately find your eyes staring straight out into the warm turquoise
neighborhood_overview: Directly across the street from The Cove Beach park, and one block away from Charley Young Beach.
host_about: Aloha and Thank you for your interest in booking our condo at The Shores of Maui in Sunny South Kihei. My name is Carol and my family and I would love to share our condo with you! This unit is near and dear to my heart as it has been in our family since the 90's. We have just completed renovations, including a full size designer kitchen and spa-like bath. The views from this condo are just spectacular and we would love for you to experience them as well! Our family still resides on Maui, however for most of your questions and comments you will be talking directly with our co-host Christy. Don't hesitate to reach out! We would love to share this treasure with you!

With space to stretch, relax and rejuvenate, this exclusive resort provides privacy, play and close proximity to Poipu Beach and town.

description: Spectacular natural beauty welcomes you the moment you arrive. Stay in spacious villas featuring private lanais with stunning views, then enjoy 18 holes of championship golf or watch the sea turtles at nearby Kahalu'u Beach Park.
host_about:
Husband and wife with two littles under the age of 8.  We love to travel, love the outdoors, and love to share other parts of the world and our country with our children.  

We both believe vacation and traveling is so important, and that carries over into how we take care of the people who book vacations with us!

description:
Keep it delightfully simple at this peaceful and centrally-located private space. Enjoy the oceanview from your private lanai in this fully equipped room at popular Kauai Eastside Resort. Your stay includes use of Resort's 5 pools, 2 hot tubs, Lava Rock water slide, and choice of pool -side Tiki Bar and 2 restaurants. Ideally located a 5 minute drive from the Lihue airport and equidistant drives from the North Shore, the South Side and 10 minutes in either direction to Kapaa or Lihue .

The space
King Bed with 2 bedside tables, Dining Table for 2 and comfy chair. Sliders to 2 chairs and a small table on the outdoor lanai with unobstructed ocean view to the South East. Full size apartment refrigerator and Keurig , 45 in TV. Bathroom with granite counter and tub. 2 Backpack Tommy Bahama Chairs and a Beach Umbrella and Beach Towels are available to tote to the beach, either just outside, or on your island adventures. And of course the Resort's five pools
neighborhood_overview:
Great Central East Side Island Location, 3 miles from the Airport, with all the benefits of Serenity, but equidistant drive distances to all points of interest island-wide !

Kauai Beach Resort is a self contained location about. 3 miles North of the Lihue Airport. It is full service resort, complete with on site restaurants and convenience shop, but not easy walking to any other island attractions. It sits on an East Facing Oceanfront Beach, and the grounds are stunningly beautiful, but a car is essential to explore attractions outside of the Hotel/Resort Grounds, and Resort charges $35 plus tax per night for parking.
host_about: Excited to meet you !  I am a Kaua'i enthusiast and local Realtor and I am looking forward to assisting in making your visit to this magical island as ideal as possible  by sharing my knowledge and aloha with you.  I love this island and all the beauty it has to offer!  Hike it, bike it, stroll the beaches, surf the waves, smile at everyone, and. enjoy.   We welcome you !

description:
Enjoy your Kauai beach getaway in Kapaa Sands 1 located right on the ocean. This property has been in our family for 50 years and it is our home away from home. It offers a quiet garden and pool and is within walking distance of dining, shopping, and activities. Many guests return year after year to the unique property.

It was built on the site of a former Shinto Shrine and consists of 24 units with the majority being studios. This unit is a 2 bedroom with 1.5 bathrooms.

The space
The living room has two comfy couches and opens up to the lanai that is right on the ocean front. The kitchen has granite counter tops, Koa wood cabinets and stainless steel appliances. The half bath is on the main floor just off the living. When you go up the stairs there is laminate flooring. The master bedroom has a queen size bed and has sliding glass doors that open to another lanai facing the ocean. There is a full bathroom with a shower. The second bedroom h

Hi there,

I am a Management professional that works at the Hydro company in British Columbia.  I have been skiing since I was a small child and love the outdoors.  The places that are for rent I use myself and are very special to me and my two daughters and my family.

description:

In-suite amenities include free WIFI, central air conditioning, washer and dryer and a fully equipped kitchen that lets you feel right at home. Hotel amenities and free valet parking are also included! You will love this place!

The space
Relax, unwind, and enjoy your stay in Waikiki in this stunning two bedroom, two bathroom suite, located just steps away from the famous Waikiki beach!

Featuring ample balcony space and views of the ocean, this is one place you cannot miss! Enjoy the modern decor and natural light, hang out with friends or family in the comfortable living room in the evening, after exploring this beautiful area during the day!

host_about:
A big nerd with a bit of edge. 
Self-Development Junky. Healthcare Professional. Artist. Entrepreneur. 

I get alot of joy from interacting and getting to know my guests. I'm honored to be a part of their Hawaii experience and I want it to be a life-long memory.

description:
Great room in a modern hotel with breathtaking ocean views. Spacious bedroom with a large balcony for you to enjoy the ocean view and fireworks on Fridays. Centrally located and adjacent to Ala Moana Mall (world's largest open-air mall) and across Ala Moana Beach Park. Also very convenient, across the street to the world-famous Hilton Village lagoon (Waikiki) and world class surf beach. Close to EVERYTHING YOU NEED when in vacation.

The space
Big room with two full beds and a private large lanai (balcony), where you can enjoy your morning coffee and appreciate the breathtaking ocean views. Very functional kitchen with mini fridge, coffee maker, toaster, for you to prepare your meals.
Amenities include pool, lounge area, gym, Starbucks, bar, restaurant, cafe,
shops and a spa.

Guest access
GUests can access all amenities

Other things to note
Upon check-in, the front desk will collect the following fees as a p
neighborhood_overview:
Ala Moana neighborhood is centrally located in the heart of Honolulu and boasts amazing shopping, dining, retail, parks, and entertainment options. Ala Moana is located right in between the Kakaako and Waikiki neighborhoods and features the best of both neighborhoods.

Beginning at the human-made, half-crescent beach known to locals as “Magic Island,” the sprawling Ala Moana Beach is a favorite Honolulu locale for afternoon picnics, sunset barbecues and celebrating special occasions with family and friends.

Amenities like public picnic sites, bathroom facilities, Hawaiian barbecue stands and shady monkeypod trees help make the beach an ideal place to gather for celebrations and weekend relaxation.

Drawing constant crowds of onlookers to the shoreline, the far end of Ala Moana Beach Park includes some of the most famous breaks on Oahu’s South Shore, namely Ala Moana Bowls and “Kewalos” (i.e., Kewalo Basin), which are coveted by locals and seasoned surfer
host_about:

description:
Enjoy tropical views and an exceptional level of luxury in our Poolside Villas. The Villas at Poipu Kai offers 3 bedroom poolside accommodations with large living areas, a dining room, and multiple suites with private baths. Villa D210 is perfect for any vacation! Beautiful ocean view from the main lanai and dining area. 

The space
Our luxury Poolside Villas were opened in December 2008 and offer all of the amenities that you could desire for convenience and comfort. Our gourmet kitchens are large with Wolf and Sub Zero appliances and fully stocked from cookware to service and tableware to make eating in a breeze. Beautiful ocean view from the main lanai and dining area. 

We have added designer furnishings throughout and have the rare amenity of central A/C for additional comfort in a tropical climate.  The Lanai extend your living area outdoors to enjoy the lush tropical island and breezes.

For those days you would like to relax by the pool
neighborhood_overview:
NEARBY (WITHIN TO 1 MILE)

Spa/Massage Facilities (Anara Spa at The Grand Hyatt Kauai)
Golf (Poipu Bay & Kiahuna)
Horseback Riding (CJM - Come Join Me - Country Stables)
Shopping (Poipu Shopping Village)
Snorkeling (Poipu Beach); Surfing/Body Boarding (Brenneke & Shipwreck Beaches); Stand-up Paddle Boarding (Kukui'ula Bay Harbor)
Restaurants (at nearby resorts, Poipu Shopping Village, and surrounding area. Please refer to your Dining Guide found in your Guest Book in your Villa).

GROCERY
 
The nearest grocery stores (about 7 minutes by car) are Big Save and Sueoka's in Old Koloa Town. Additional grocery and department stores are located in Lihue, including 24-hour Safeway, Costco, WalMart and Star Market.

description:
The ultimate Hawaii getaway awaits at this 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom vacation rental unit with sweeping views of the Pacific. Ideally located between Kona and Hilo, this home-away-from-home provides easy access to popular areas such as Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park and Punalu'u Black Sand Beach. Sit on the lanai while gazing at the Milky Way, and feel the ocean breeze on your skin. Embrace life on the Big Island and get some much-needed R&R at this home base.

The space
Outdoor Dining Area | 180-Degree View of the Pacific | Pet Friendly

Fall in love with island life with a stay at this tranquil retreat, ideal for small families looking to relax, explore, and create memories that will last a lifetime.

Bedroom 1: California King Bed, Twin Sleeper Sofa | Bedroom 2: 2 Twin Beds (w/ Adjustable Mattresses) | Additional Sleeping: 3x5 Kid's Air Mattress (available upon request), Queen Air Mattress

INDOOR LIVING: Ceiling fans, 6-person dinin
neighborhood_overview:
SAND & SUN: Whittington Beach Park (9.1 miles), Mahana Beach (12.3 miles), Papakōlea Green Sand Beach (12.3 miles), Punalu'u Black Sand Beach (14.1 miles), Ho’okena Beach Park (39.4 miles)
EXPLORE HAWAII: Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park (6.4 miles), South Point Park (7.5 miles), Kula Kai Caverns (15.4 miles), Nahuku - Thurston Lava Tube (42.7 miles), Kilauea Overlook (43.5 miles), Nāpō’opo’o Pier (46.2 miles)
GUIDED TOURS: SOMLALA, Big Island Bona Fide Tours & Adventures (13.7 miles), Horseback 2 the Sea (16.1 miles), Kilauea EcoGuides (43.1 miles), Adventures In Paradise Kayak & Snorkel (46.2 miles), Kailani Tours Hawaii (60.5 miles)
LOCAL DINING: Hana Hou Restaurant (5.5 miles), Punalu'u Bake Shop (5.5 miles), Ka Lae Garden Thai Food (11.6 miles), L&L Hawaiian Barbecue (12.8 miles), Ocean View Pizzaria (12.8 miles), Kai Loki's Restaurant (13.0 miles)
AIRPORTS: Kona International Airport (65.2 miles), Hilo International Airport (70.2 miles)
host_about:
Hi! We’re Evolve, the hospitality team that helps you rest easy when you rent a private, professionally cleaned home from us.

We promise your rental will be clean, safe, and true to what you saw on Airbnb or we'll make it right. Check-ins are always smooth, and we're here 24/7 to answer any questions or help you find the perfect property.

description:
Named for the tropical verdant hues and waterfalls that surround the naturalistic home, the Oma'oma'o house features organic beams and wood finishes. This brand-new Hawaiian home is furnished with comfortable amenities and airy yet minimalist decor.

Explore the magic of East Hawaii from our beautiful jungle sanctuary. The ascetic touches of bronze sinks, local art, and custom carpentry will surely drop you into the peaceful vacation you're looking for. You may access the spring-fed waterfall directly from the property and go for a swim.

Permits:
STVR-19-350887
NUC-19-552

You will love how open and bright this home is. Natural lighting fills every room. The construction of this home was designed with special attention to every detail. The sinks are made from beautiful copper, all of the cabinets were made by a local furniture maker with beautiful native woods.
There are so many cozy places throughout the home to lounge and rest and simpl
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the Reed's Island neighborhood and surrounded on both sides by rivers, streams, and waterfalls—walk through the area and admire the historic homes. Hilo town and beaches are nearby, and the Volcano National Park is 30 minutes away.
Hilo and East Hawaii is the perfect choice if you want to an authentic Hawaiian experience. You might also explore the world's most advanced telescopes on Mauna Kea and our gorgeous local brackish water black sand beaches.
host_about: Aloha I have lived in Hilo for over 10 years. I’m currently in California finishing my naturopathic doctoral studies.

description:
Sands of Kahana 264 is a two-bedroom, two-bathroom unit with panoramic views of the sunset, a premium seat for the whale show, and views of both neighboring Islands!

This unit has been updated with modern décor and furnishings. Both the master bedroom and second bedroom have a comfortable king-size bed with an ensuite bathroom, plenty of closet space, ceiling fan and Smart TVs!

You will find comfortable seating in the living room, including the Queen sleeper sofa, and a flat-screen TV for relaxing after a fun outdoor day! Take advantage of the free high-speed wireless internet, ceiling fans, and AC throughout the condo.

Enjoy cooking in this fully equipped kitchen that has cherry kitchen cabinets with granite countertops, optimal storage space, and stainless steel appliances.

Down the hallway, you’ll find the convenient washer and dryer. We also provide beach chairs, beach towels, and a cooler for your stay.

This unit is a 1690
host_about:
Aloha, 

Quam Properties Hawaii, Inc. is conveniently located in West Maui at Napili Plaza Shopping Center. We provide a variety of services to West Maui and the neighbor islands. We are a family owned and operated management company with over 30 years experience in Hawaii. We have a full service, dedicated, friendly staff, and attention to details are our primary concern. 

Our services include Luxury Vacation Rentals and Concierge Service, Property Management, Association and Project Management, Long Term Rentals, and Real Estate Sales. Our office is open Monday through Friday from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM and Saturday from 8:00 AM to 4:00 PM Hawaiian time. 

Quam Properties Hawaii requires a 50% credit card deposit.  We accept Visa, MasterCard and/or Discover. You may cancel outside the 60 days prior to your arrival for a refund of your deposit minus a $100 cancellation fee.	

Mahalo, Quam Properties Hawaii!

Fabulous snorkeling directly in front of the building, warm-water swimming, ideal for stand-up paddle boarding and kayaking: this location has it all for the ultimate Maui beach experience. Our office is within a few minutes of all of our properties, and we respond immediately to guest issues. We’re partnered with the largest Real Estate brokerage in the country, Keller Williams; we advise on and sell Maui investment condos, based on the best possible ROI.

description:
Escape to paradise and discover the ultimate retreat at Kaanapali Shores Unit 943. This top-floor penthouse-level 1-bedroom condo offers an enchanting getaway with stunning ocean views and the added allure of no one above you. Feel on top of the world as you take in the sweeping vistas of the sparkling ocean, witness breathtaking sunsets, and marvel at the playful dance of whales during winter, all from the comfort of your spacious 104 sq ft lanai.

The space
Ocean View Penthouse Condo with Upgraded Interior ~ Hosted By Maui Westside
● Stunning ocean views from the top-floor penthouse level
● No neighbors above you
● Spacious 104 sq ft lanai perfect for enjoying coffee or cocktails
● Thoughtfully remodeled with granite counters and new appliances
● Cozy sofa/sleeper with memory foam mattress
● Sleeps up to 4 guests, ideal for a romantic getaway or small family trip
● AC throughout the condo
● Resort amenities include tennis
neighborhood_overview:
Ka’anapali Shores is a favorite Maui beachfront resort on world-famous North Ka’anapali Beach. This popular 10-acre resort has tennis courts, two swimming pools, several spa pools, and a pool-side restaurant and lounge with sweeping ocean views and a weekly Polynesian show. Visit the beauty salon and spa with massage services, gift shops, and a privately owned fitness center on site. There are two barbecue areas on the resort’s property available to all guests.

This Resort is conveniently located within walking distance to supermarkets, restaurants, farmer’s market, shops, and Beach Park.
host_about: Live 'The Good Life' on Maui with Maui Westside! Our family-owned business is dedicated to making your island getaway unforgettable. With local expertise, friendly staff, & free concierge services, we're here to ensure you have a great stay. We are a fully licensed & legal property management & real estate brokerage firm - license #RB-21121. Please feel free to contact us via email, text, or call during your stay.

description:
Right on the water with a million dollar view of three islands (Molokini, Kahoolawe, and Lanai) from the lanai.

The space
Coffee on the lanai every morning is fabulous and the sunsets are spectacular. Watch for the green blip!. Couldn't have wish for a better place to enjoy the island at the beginning or end of the day. Comfortable condo with new appliances, Wi Fi and walk in shower.

Other things to note
Menehune Shores Resort is centrally-located in Kihei, one of south Maui's most popular destinations. It's prime location offers convenient access to other areas of Maui, such as the airport in Kahului, the charming town of Kihei, beautiful Wailea, historical Lahaina and Ma'alaea Bay, famous for whale watching, turtle sightings and The Maui Ocean Center.

Adjacent to the resort is the Hawaiian Islands Humpback Whale National Marine Sanctuary, along with the historical 16th Century Alii (Royal) Fish Pond of Kalepolepo. Protected b

description:
BEACHFRONT ON MAUI One bedroom one bath.
Located in West Maui between Lahaina and Kapalua. This is a ground floor, oceanfront condo in a small complex, two story building with only twelve units. A beautiful beach awaits just outside, literally 20 feet from the back slider door. You can experience amazing views of the ocean just steps away. One bedroom with king bed and a queen sofa bed in living room. This unit does not have air conditioning.

The space
In addition, you will be able to see the islands of Lana’I and Moloka’I, as well as truly spectacular sunsets. See sea turtles daily on the beach in front of condo and, of course, humpback whales during winter/early spring.
This condo also includes a king size bed, sofa sleeper and a fully-equipped kitchen. The beach in front of the condo is great bottom floor. No stairs to climb.
In addition, we provide an umbrella, beach chairs, boogie boards and snorkel gear with great snorkeling right in front

host_about:
Kona Coast Vacations hosts over 5,400 reservations a year with the help of knowledgeable management, proficient team members and trusted home owners. Open 7 days a week, we strive to help with each visitors’ every need. Sharing Aloha from the first contact whether it is phone or email, we are here to assist by making the booking process as seamless as can be. We pride ourselves on providing hands on assistance whenever it is needed, whether it is reservation details, maintenance issues, or even booking activities! 

Kona Coast Vacations is fortunate to team up with great property owners which is instrumental in providing exceptional homes for our new and returning guests. With over 240 vacation rentals from oceanfront homes, ocean view condos and private estates, we are here for your every need, open seven days a week to take care of our guests and owners. With two locations in Kailua Kona and Mauna Lani we have dedicated specialists in guest services managing reservations, maintenance, and property checks alongside our accounting, support and marketing specialists. We are proud to be Airbnb members since 2001 and now are Superhosts with over 1070 reviews.
We hope to host you Hawaii and help create a memory to last you a lifetime. We are your “’Ohana” (family) on the Big Island of Hawaii, please do not hesitate to utilize our listed resources and book activities thru Kona Concierge.

description:
Newly renovated Studio with private entrance. Easy access to the freeway. Walking distance to a local park. Unit comes with a refrigerator, a/c, and electrical cooktop. Shared washer/dryer located outside of unit.

Convenient central location close to Pearlridge shopping center, airport, downtown Honolulu, Tripler, Fort Shafter, Hickam, Pearl Harbor.

No pets allowed.

There are 4 other tenants and property owner lives on property in the back

host_about: I am a new mom with an adorable baby as of February 2023. In 2022 there was only two of us (me and my husband), 2023 we are now 3. I'm either always on the go and out or I'll be at home.

description:
Entire second floor of home with wrap around lanai. Comfortable Island Style decor with skylights. Located next to Waipio Lookout rich in Hawaiian history. Ten minute drive to Historical Honoka'a Town with restaurants, movie theatre, grocery stores, shopping, art galleries, post office and hospital. Horseback riding, hiking, ATV rentals and Waipio Valley tours are close by. Enjoy sunrise/sunsets, walks, whale watching and coastal waterfall views from Waipio Valley to Pololu Lighthouse and Maui.

The space
View like no where else in the world~very peaceful~ comfortable beds and couches and lots of natural lighting and airflow with skylines and many screen door and windows! nature calls, birds and whales sing! Coqui Frogs chirp at night

Guest access
entire first floor~private entrance with it's own Lanai'i ~ veranda with spectacular views~covered parking space in carport that may be shared from time to time .

Other things to note
neighborhood_overview: I live in a very quaint neighborhood with a country feel. There is a nice park 10 minutes away along with gallery and restaurants and a great fruit stand that serves fresh coconut water out of the coconut itself!. the town of Honokaa is a 10 minute drive with grocery stores , cafes, restaurants, cute shops, post office, grocery store, more galleries, ice cream and  homemade fudge shops! It has medical facilities, ER, fire and police station and to balance that out a 100% solar powered Movie theater with top notch live music, Really famous musicians play there! amazing to me to see Judy Collins, David Crosby(RIP)and so many~ecstatic Dance~etc.~ there is a sweet local park with a baseball field and park benches and tables a short walk from home! Not much traffic~the Waipio Valley shuttle is close by in front of Waipio Art Gallery. there are some lovely places to hike 10-20 miles away. Kalopa state park and then near Waimea town. Farmers markets in Honokaa and Waimea are lovely. Great caf
host_about: I sailed to Hawaii in 1985, after being lost at sea in a storm. The dolphins escorted me to refuge in Kealakekua Bay on the Big island. A feeling of gratitude is overwhelming. Finding a place of serenity while living a simple life is a gift. I feel a deep connection to this special Island rich in history and spiritual "Mana." I am a licensed massage therapist . I have been passionate about aromatherapy since 1980 and created a spa line called Hananaia-meaning "to have great love for the Hawaiian Spinner Dolphin." The feeling of Waipio is magical. I love meeting people and welcoming them with the Aloha spirit. These days many people need to feel a deeper connection to self , spirit and purpose. Waipio Hale Pinao (Home of the Dragonfly) offers a safe and sacred space for this journey. It also enhances creativity for artists, writers, musicians, and dreamers of all types. It has a heartfelt felling of joy that has a healing affect on one's spirit. It also satisfies the adventurer while nurturing the creative energies!

After living in Alaska for 17 years, my husband and I decided to make beautiful Kona our home. We fell in love with the Island, beaches & sun.

description:
With close proximity to the Waikiki shores and all the modern comfort you need from a vacation home, this third-floor oasis promises to make your Hawaiian holiday an unforgettable one. This recently painted and updated open concept floorplan in this cozy studio delights guests with its’ charming island aesthetic throughout, plus a kitchenette equipped for your basic cooking needs. Sleeps 3 in a queen bed and double sofa bed.

The space
Bamboo Waikiki Hotel unit #303: Recently painted and updated guests will feel welcomed upon entering this studio kitchenette. The space is tastefully decorated with pops of color and features an island theme.

Begin the day with a fresh tropical fruit smoothie blended in the Ninja Blender, and enjoy local coffee brewed in your space. The kitchenette has stainless-steel appliances, including a mini refrigerator, microwave, and electric stove-top. Prepare your home-cooked favorites with both new cooking and dining utensils.
host_about:
Bamboo Waikiki Hotel features a selection of moderately priced guest rooms, studios, and suites in a “tropical-urban Zen” atmosphere that makes you feel relaxed and refreshed. All accommodations offer a private lanai, WiFi access, air conditioning, flat screen LCD TV, iDock, laptop-compatible safe. While all rooms include at least a microwave, coffee maker, and mini-refrigerator, select rooms include a kitchenette or full kitchen.

You’ll love Bamboo Waikiki Hotel’s easy access to the golden sands of Waikiki Beach and the International Market Place. Embrace the action that makes Waikiki the world’s most famous urban resort. Then retreat to your tranquil oasis away to unplug and revive.

description:
Hamakua Sunrise Farm is not your regular BNB. We are primarily focused on Agri-Tourism, Spirituality & Art showcasing; regenerative farming, permaculture, sustainability & art in a spiritual, yogic & relaxing environment. Farm to Table meals, Sunrise over the Ocean & Shooting Stars at Night. We also offer farm tours & Art sessions for a richer Hawaiian Experience.
5 Min walk to Papaaloa Country Store.
35min from Hilo airport.

The space
IMPORTANT NOTE: We are not a sterile Resort. We are a working farm on a Tropical Island. We have all kinds of bugs, sounds of nature, roosters crowing all over the coast, Geckos, Animals & more animals!

If you want to experience Real Hawaii, this is your place!

THE FARM

We welcome all plant, nature, Art & spirituality enthusiasts on our farm and share our dream & knowledge with them. Our farm is only 4 years old but with our hard work and commitment we have achieved a lot and already pro
host_about: Helicopter Pilot by profession and farmer by choice, improving our little patch of Hawaii little by little, every day.

description:
Neighboring Condos, 4 Bedrooms + 2 Convertible Beds, 4 Baths, (Sleeps 8-12)

The space
This tandem package is comprised of two fantastic 4th floor two bedroom suites that are right across the hall from each other. Hokulani 448 offers delightful partial ocean views along with views of the West Maui Mountains and Hokulani 447 offers full ocean views along with views of the lush interior courtyard.

These suites provide a perfect opportunity to gather, reconnect, and celebrate. The combined suites offer 2200 sq ft of interior living space and can accommodate up to 12 guests in four king-sized beds and two queen-sized convertible sofa sleepers. For added flexibility each guest bedroom king-sized bed can be split into two XL twins at no charge. Get swept away into the lovely Maui sky after folding away the glass doors and allowing the interior to blend seamlessly with the outdoors.

Step outside onto the 570 sq ft of combined balcony space and enjoy
neighborhood_overview: With a prime beachfront location on West Maui's Ka'anapali North Beach, The Honua Kai Resort and Spa was recently recognized as one of the top resorts in Hawaii by Conde Nast Traveler for 2016. description:

Just steps from the beach, world-class shopping, restaurants, and attractions. One block from Royal Hawaiian. Enjoy a serene, sleek place to relax after the beach, travel adventures, or business meetings. Enjoy full kitchen with high-end appliances, travertine stone shower, 55" TV, digital cable, FREE WiFi, & FREE parking.

The space

Comfort is our priority - the apartment is newly equipped with a Scandinavian Ekornes reclining chair, new memory foam mattress with cooling gel technology, and high-back swivel stools. With digital cable, you have hundreds of channels to watch!

We also offer Free WiFi and Free Parking in an assigned spot. (Not
neighborhood_overview: We are in the heart of Waikiki, only a block away from famous Waikiki Beach near the Royal Hawaiian Hotel.  At the center of it all!  Nearby are restaurants, shopping, night clubs, weekly farmers markets.  Local retailers include Starbucks, Jamba Juice, and many more.  Although pricey, the closest grocery store, The Food Pantry, is 2 blocks away.  Since we are in the center of action in Waikiki, please expect urban noise including traffic and pedestrian activity.
host_about:
Aloha.  My name is Lia.
My family and I love fine living, fitness, sports, healthy eating (mainly me) and making people feel welcome and at ease.
 
Our journey to opening the doors to Aspire Perspire Nourish Lodging & Concierge began way back in the 1990's for me and my husband.  Our many travels to Hawaii kept us coming back for more aloha each year.  The healthy environment, active living, and plentiful local, fresh food make Hawaii a truly magical place for wellness and a great lifestyle.

As my passion for fitness and nutrition has grown, my desire to work in the field as grown as well.  In 2014 we made the move from Canada to Hawaii to start our new adventure.  At our lodging, I combine my client service expertise with my fitness and health expertise to make your stay healthy and comfortable.
 
At Aspire Perspire Nourish Lodging & Concierge, we aim to help you enjoy healthy living while away from home and in the comfort of our lodging.  We designed our suites so that you can cook fresh, healthy foods, and get the rest you deserve and need.  Through our concierge services, you can conveniently continue to pursue your athletic endeavors or recreational activities or kick start them with personal coaching.  We will make your travel and stay with us hassle-free by helping with your grocery purchases and airport transportation.
 
Come stay with us and experience the healthy, fit, nutritious life you love to live.

description:
The Volcano Cabins are located just outside Hawaii Volcanoes National Park. There are two A-frame cabins on site, each is self contained with its own loft bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, laundry and private deck. The shared deck has a hot tub and BBQ.

The space
The Volcano cabins are located just outside Hawaii Volcanoes National Park along what use to be the old access road to the Park. These two A-frame cabins are situated on a two acre parcel with ohia trees, redwoods, giant ferns, kahili ginger, and many other interesting plants. There are spectacular views of both Mauna Loa and Mauna Kea from the property. Each cabin is self contained with its own loft bedroom, a bathroom and a kitchen. Both units have their own laundry and private decks. The shared deck has a hot tub. These two cabins named Palila and Nene can be rented separately or together depending on your party size. Palila can sleep six and Nene can sleep four.

Guest access

Professional housekeepers clean and stock each home, and our customer care team is available around the clock—with a local property manager ready to show up and help out. Check out our listings, and get in touch if you have any questions. Your vacation is our full-time job, and we'd love to help you plan your perfect getaway.

This luxe, open-design corner suite features a furnished wrap-around lanai, roomy living area, flat screens, DVD, WiFi, air conditioning, ceiling fans, full laundry & upgraded master bath.

Friends & families embrace the space & amazing Pacific/Diamond Head panorama flowing from the wrap-around lanai into the open-style living area & gourmet kitchen for “at home” dining. Enjoy flat screens, DVD, WiFi, air conditioning, ceiling fans, full laundry, & master bath with glass-wall shower & separate soaking tub. Sleeps 6 in 4 double beds.

The only beachfront condominium in Waikiki, Waikiki Shore offers views of the Pacific, iconic Diamond Head and Fort DeRussy Park. You’re walking distance to the famous resort’s beach activities, fa

description:
Hawaii Tax of 14.42% is included in the price.

Our beautiful Island Style home in Heavenly Hana Hawaii is three hundred yards to a magical ocean pool and a one mile coastal walk to a magnificent beach. The house is open to nature, is fully screened, has hammocks and an ocean view. It sleeps six comfortably, is equipped with a full kitchen, and has an outdoor shower as well as a nice indoor shower and tub. The property is full of tropical fruits, flowers, bamboo, and palms

The space
In addition to the home, the grounds are a small botanical garden. We have almost twenty varieties of Palm, eight varieties of Bamboo, passion fruit, coconut, bananas, papaya, mango, avocado, ginger, turmeric, hibiscus, and cacao, and a seasonal vegetable garden.

host_about: I am an artist, my life is my canvas. I have traveled the world, hitchhiking, sailing and more conventional means as well. In Hawaii for now over 25 years I came to teach briefly at a Waldorf School and then developed a landscape and environmental design company. I teach yoga and meditation and have studied several alternative healing modalities. Hana is one home, I spend the summers living on a boat and running a sailing charter in the pacific northwest, between Seattle and Alaska. I have grown children and I love travel and travelers.

You'll be love waking up to the beautiful and calming views of the ocean and relax with a cocktail as the sun sets over the yacht harbor. This condo will comfortable sleep 4, with a King bed and sofa sleeper in the living area. The kitchen is fully stocked for you to have the comforts of home while on vacation. description:
This exquisite, air-conditioned, three bedroom executive home sits on the exclusive Makai Golf Course and is less than a thousand feet from the majestic Pacific. Featuring an oversized, covered lanai with sweeping ocean and mountain views, this home was designed to combine both indoor and outdoor living space, giving it a truly authentic, tropical vibe. This home expertly captures the spirit of Kauai with all the modern amenities of a luxury resort. Surfboards, SUP, kayak and bikes included!

The space
This single-story, wheelchair-friendly executive home appropriately named Hale Moli (house of the albatross) just finished a complete remodel in 2021 and not a single attention to detail was spared. Perched high on the cliffs of the picturesque sixth hole, the outer edges of the greens at Makai Golf Course are home to dozens of nesting albatross and the oversized lanai off the rear of this property is the perfect place to enjoy nature and beauty abound. Watch the su
neighborhood_overview: Our home is located in the Queen's Bath neighborhood of Princeville. We're walking distance to Happy Talk Bar and Restaurant, Hideaways Pizza, Princeville Resort and Makai Golf Club. We are only a 1/4 mile away from the first stop on the North Shore shuttle to Haena State Park.
host_about:
Aloha! We're Melissa and Ian and our family has deep roots in Hawai'i.  We love going to the beach, surfing, riding bikes, and enjoying our little beach town.  We have been managing vacation rentals for over decade.  

We know the business well and are extremely passionate about hospitality.  We bought this sweet, old house in April of 2018 and can’t wait to share it with you. The studio is lovely, bright, clean, private, and surrounded my mature tropical plants. 

We are independent contractors for Hawaii Life, one of the premier real estate brands in the state. We focus on providing concierge level experiences for every guest and treat each home we manage with the same level of care as our own. We look forward to hosting you!

E Komo Mai

description:
Our unit is a spacious 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom ground floor unit (C111) at the Villas at Poipu Kai. We are located near the pool with bifold doors that open to let the lanai become an extension of the living area. Poipu Beach is a short walk from the Villas.

OUR RATES INCLUDE ALL TAXES. We have a business license with the state of Hawaii and follow all applicable rules and filings. The Poipu Kai resort is a Vacation Rental zone and all properties are open to renting. Tax # TA-093-723-2384-01

The space
Our ground floor unit is located next to the pool, but still private due to landscaping screening the patio. The unit is well stocked and we provide all paper goods, dish and laundry soap, shampoo and conditioner to last your entire stay. Additionally we provide a beach wagon, beach chairs and an umbrella for your use. The entire unit is Air Conditioned, with new AC installed in Fall of 2019, as well as a new range and dishwasher in Spring of 2020.
neighborhood_overview: The Villas at Poipu Kai are the newest condo community in the Poipu Kai resort, built in 2008. This lovely boutique condo complex has just 23 units, with a beautiful pool and spa, BBQ's, and a gym. Located next to a greenbelt path, just short walk to Poipu Beach.

Hello ! I am a busy wife and mother who lives in Los Gatos Ca. I am also a graduate student at USC and an Airbnb host with a property in Kauai.

Our family travels often to Europe to visit family as well as visiting new places in the US. I enjoy hiking, yoga, tennis and skiing.

The space

This is a private, separate structure with a room and bathroom ONLY. There is no kitchen. There is a kitchen on property for the other rental units only.

Pets are on property. Dogs, cats, chickens and ducks. Dogs are outside. If this is an issue up
host_about:
As a full time rental host and tour guide, I take pride in providing people with the best experiences possible while on island. I have been doing lodging rentals since 2018 and tours since 2019. I genuinely love the “work” that I am privileged to do as well as the people I get to meet along the way! My training and experience has provided me with the skills and knowledge necessary to not just provide a safe experience, but also a fun one where you will enjoy the natural environment and learn about the culture and how to respect the land and kanaka while you are a visitor of the islands. 

Unlike many that move here and still surround themselves in their same culture, I have surrounded myself in Hawaiian culture and learned first hand of the Hawaiian deities (Kane, Kanaloa, Pele, Ku, Lono, Aila’au, etc), beliefs and customs directly from the people of the land. I have drive-in access to places like Namahoe, known popularly and incorrectly as the Mermaid Ponds as well as various other places on the island. Because of my respect for the land and culture, these things have been shared with me. I can tell you Hawaiian names for constellations, the stories behind them and what their placement in the sky means at certain times of the year. I can share information about Hawaiian sorcery, customs, beliefs, sayings. Things that other guides on here, unless they are from the islands, do not know. I provide a bridge to learn correct information about the land including the proper place names. Many people move here and search online for information which only leads to spreading misinformation. If you want a guide that can teach you accurate information, that wasn’t read online by a misleading article, but instead shared on the ha (breath) by people from the islands, which is the traditional way, look no further!

This isn’t just a job or way to make money for me. There are a plethora of ways to make money. I didn’t move here, decide I love it and search online for misinformation to capitalize off of the land that I say I love. What I have is a passion and reverence for the land. Which is evident in the time I have taken to acquire the knowledge that I have. 

In my spare time, my partner, who is from here, and I enjoy going on our own adventures, mostly in the water, snorkeling, free diving and scuba diving.

We are centrally located in Puna, 15 miles south of Hilo, a 5 miles outside of the quaint town of Pah
host_about: We are a fun loving, adventurous couple,  living in the jungles of east Hawaii.  We have traveled, and travel,  extensively. We love visiting exotic locations and meeting people from all over the world.    Connie is a semi- retired, celebrity wardrobe stylist originally from Hollywood.  Andrew, originally from Australia, is a building contractor and FEO Officer/tanker driver for the Hawaiian Paradise Park Volunteer Fire Department . Connie currently  is a yoga instructor who runs her own studio on a 40 acre permaculture farm in Pahoa and leads yoga retreats on the island of Paros, Greece during the summer. Choosing a simpler life, we moved to Pahoa in 2001 to fulfill our dream of off-grid, sustainable living.   Our home is  up the road from the Rainforest Hideaway on a separate property we developed ourselves with machetes and a lot of sweat.  We hand built our rammed earth home, made from volcanic cinder and inorganic soil from old sugar cane fields,  and grow most of own own food organically.

Green sand beach is 31 miles (45 mins) away.

Volcano National park is 1 hour and 15 minutes away.

Hilo town 1 hour and 30 minutes.

The space
Serenity Hale is completely off grid Tahitian pole home built in 2010 on 5.5 acres in Captain Cook. Water is collected from the rooftops and filtered 3 times before it reaches the house. Electricity is 100% photovoltaic generated by solar panels and stored in lithium Ferrous Phosphate batteries for use at night.
The view from guest quarters is of 20 miles of Kona coastline at 1000 ft elevation ( 5 to 10 degrees cooler than sea level) Comfortable king size bed plus a double bed ( extra sleeping mattresses available)
Mini fridge, dining table, desk and 42" flat scree

neighborhood_overview:
The Pool and Recreation-deck is on the 6th floor. Offers a Salt Water Heated Pool with lots of lounge chairs, 2 Jucuzzies, Sauna, Lots of BBQ’s & Picnic Tables & a Tennis/Basketball Court. Banyan Breeze coffee cafe is in the lobby on the first floor of Tower 1. Waikiki Beach is 1 & ½ blocks away for all the fun you can handle:)

There are all sorts of Restaurants, Shops and Grocery stores nearby too. Hanauma Bay is a must for those who like to snorkel they rent equipment there. You can drive if you have a car or Take bus 23 across the street. Safeway is bus 13 or 2, a couple of miles out of town on the Banyan side of the street. Chinatown is also bus 13 or 2. Farmers market, Saturday at the end of Kuhio Ave across from the Honolulu Zoo & Kapiolani Park. Drive up and look over the Pali Lookout for an incredible view! Polynesian Cultural Center is outstanding. It takes all day. Most of all, Have lots of fun.

host_about: We have lived on the Central Coast for over 25 years.  We are local business owners and have 3 teenagers we are very proud of. We are also fun loving and try to enjoy all that the Central Coast has to offer.  Some of our favorite things include walking on the beaches or hiking the many scenic trails. Also, taking part in local concerts, festivals and winery events.  We love hanging out in Avila Beach, checking out the down town SLO Farmers Market or visiting Solvang and Santa Barbara.  Weather permitting, we ride our motorcycle on the beautiful back roads all over the county. Our newest experience that we highly recommend is paddle boarding in Avila Beach with the seals and otters!!  But we also love our property.  You can often find us working in the barn or garden areas or sitting in the front porch rocking chairs enjoying the veiw.  We take alot of pride in the quality and craftsmanship of this home.  We hope you enjoy your visit!!

Master suite and full bath with an additional guest bath and shower. Sleeps 4 in 1 Queen and 1 sofa bed.

host_about:
Kaha Lani Resort vacation rentals in Lihue are one of Kauai’s best-kept secrets!

Our condominiums bring you prime views of Kauai’s oceanfront. Think swaying palm trees, fine white sand, and dreamy ocean blues. Spend your days sun-kissed at our heated swimming pool and sundeck or snorkel at Lydgate Beach Park. At Kaha Lani Resort you can sunbathe at the sandy beach, challenge a friend to a tennis match, and then summon your family for a barbeque as the sun goes down.

With these Lihue condo rentals, you get all the benefits of resort-style Kauai accommodations in a place as comfortable as home. We have laundry facilities, DVD rentals in the lobby, and free parking, making it easy to come and go as you please for as long as you like.

Since 1993, Castle Resorts & Hotels has specialized in innovative hotel and resort management. We manage properties throughout the Hawaiian Islands, including Kauai, Oahu, Maui, Molokai, and Hawaii Island, as well as Auckland, New Zealand. Accommodations range from full-service hotels to resort condominiums and combines value, convenience, and authentic experiences.

host_about:
We are an immigrant latino couple that love family and friends, enjoy diversity, admire the talent, and appreciate the music and arts. We now live between California and Hawaii. We have three kids married. Our family is now growing adding 5 beautiful grandchildren... by now.
I have been in the creative field all my life, producing ideas and marketing solutions for companies willing to grow their business within the US Hispanic market. I do appreciate and believe in talent. I have learned that one single human been can really change lives and make a big difference for good.
My wife and I, have been together for over 40 years devoted to compromise to help achieving a better life for our family and community for which we feel blessed and grateful every day. 
My picture?... I admire the magic of the music, specially the beauty of the guitar since I was a 13 years old kid. Since there, the music and the guitar is part of my life. That's why we enjoy getting together with family and friends to share, play, sing, laugh and dance (when possible). 
I am sure you will love the experience and feel home living  in this executive and artistic inspiring home.
Thank you for reading

neighborhood_overview:
There's really no shortage! The Haiku area is close to world class surfing, windsurfing, kitesurfing, hiking, and biking. Be sure to visit Donnie at Go Cycling Maui, located in Paia. They offer the ultimate cycling tour experience, treating you like a professional cyclist (sort of like a fantasy camp for cyclists). They are also a full service bike shop with high end rentals.
Haleakala Bike Company is also located in Haiku, and offer a very different service. They drive to the Haleakala park gate and provide a bike for you to cycle down at your own pace.
For a quick hike, be sure to visit Twin Falls (about 10-15 minutes by car from Seaview) and hike up the stream to the waterfalls. They're a bit chilly, but there's nothing like swimming under a waterfall.
If you want to soar over a gulch, the Piiholo Zipline is a short ten minute drive from Seaview.

We'd love to meet you.

Among the newest condo development additions to the exclusive Four Seasons Resort at Hualalai, this luxurious, ocean-view villa provides the perfect setting for a family getaway or a relaxing retreat to paradise with friends. The villa boasts over 2,600 square feet of interior space, with impeccable décor by local interior designer Monica Ament.

The space
Our guest suites enjoy ocean views, spectacular sunsets, lush tropical gardens, and the melody of bird songs. The villa’s lower level includes a luxurious primary suite with a private ocean-view lanai, king-size bed, work space, a walk-in closet, and a tranquil en suite bathroom with a deep soaking tub and separate shower, dual vanities, and access to a spectacular outdoor shower. A second stunning suite on the lower level, next to the primary suite, features a king bed, an ensuite bathroom, modern decor, and a flat-screen television. A third suite, situated on the other side of the villa for maximum privacy, ha

description:
Waikoloa Village is a unique oasis perfectly situated 10-15 minutes from the best ocean beaches on the gold coast of the Big Island and within easy reach of Kona, Waimea and Havi. It's a nice homey town with a shopping center, a great market, pharmacy, golf course, community pool, restaurants, gas station, shops - in short all you will need right there. The house is an easy walk to the center in the older part of the Village with great charm and friendly people. It's a hidden jewel.

The space
We are looking to rent to Snowbirds - people who are on the Big Island for a month or more for work, pleasure, to relocate or whatever and want a great home to live and relax in. Sunrise-Sunset obviously gives you both opportunities. Get up early and watch the sunrise over Mauna Kea or sit on the western lanai and watch the sunset out to the ocean over drinks and eats. We have landscaped to create privacy, but also interest in the many different plants, textures, colors
neighborhood_overview: Waikoloa Village was developed in the late 70's as a bedroom community to the Coastal resorts but has since turned into a place welcome to all sweetly located near all the best beaches and Island activities.  You'll find it a fun place to walk around and enjoy the vegetation and views; it's an oasis within the beautiful surrounding lava fields.  Within walking (and driving) distance there's a shopping center with a gas station, large supermarket, coffee shop, several places to eat. There's the community golf course (discount provided) and swimming pool should you wish to partake.
host_about:
I’ve led quite a life. After Williams College in the Berkshires I got on my white horse after law school @ Georgetown and hoped to solve the world’s problems ....  worked in VISTA, the Legal Services, and then the Federal Trade Commission in Seattle, NYC, and Boston. Eventually ended up in  Provincetown opening an Italian restaurant called Gallerani’s. Had quite a run there before entering my retired career. 
I enjoy running my rentals in the same way I enjoyed the restaurant. It’s a pleasure to give people that extra bit of enjoyment on their vacation thru the unique and special places I have created.

description:

The bathrooms have medium size tiles and the Lanai is tiled in stone. The wall hangings are sparse and colorful with a beautiful flower triptych in the master bedroom. D306 has a beautiful, broad view of the Pacific Ocean and Waipuilani Beach Park. You can See from the Ukumehame ridge in the West to

neighborhood_overview: Kihei
host_about: Mario and I run the front office of Luana Kai and handle all reservations in the rental pool. You can reserve your Maui condos in the sun with our Kihei vacation rentals. On the ocean and near to Maui's best beaches, golf, and everything else. Your home away from home. With a large pool, sauna, whirlpool, barbecues, tennis, and more.

description:
Aloha! Welcome to Hali'i Kai, recently named #1 resort on the Big Island, which is located in Waikoloa on Kohala's Gold Coast, so named because our 350 annual days of sunshine is the most in Hawai'i. Hali'i Kai, is the only gated resort on the west coast of the island with a private restaurant and bar -allowing you to enjoy the exclusive Ocean Club, pool, fitness center, tennis courts, and these amenities are all private to guests of the resort. Daily resort fee additional at check in.

The space
Welcome to paradise! Our villa is the perfect place to call hale ("home") while you relax and enjoy all the Big Island has to offer. Take in the views from the lanai, which is situated on the 9th hole of the Waikoloa Beach Golf Course, and offers views of the ocean, sunset, Kohala mountains, and the Hualalai volcano. Unwind and socialize while cooking in the fully-stocked open-concept kitchen or using the lanai's gas grill. Entertain yourself with a cabinet of books, boar
neighborhood_overview:
Waikoloa is the premier resort location on the Big Island of Hawaii (and gets more sun, 350 annual days, more than any place in Hawaii as I mentioned elsewhere). And our resort was recently named #1 resort on the Big Island of Hawai'i. A big reason why we bought here and why you will love every minute of your Hawaiian vacation is location.

Within Waikoloa Beach Resort, you'll find the world-class shopping and dining options of Kings' Shops and Queens' Marketplace, a farmers' market, and cultural workshops such as lei-making, 'ukulele class, hula shows and lessons, petroglyph tours, and concerts. A trolley travels throughout the Waikoloa Beach Resort if your feet need a little rest.

If you are want to decompress on the beach, you have come to the right place. Within walking distance of the villa are multiple white sand beaches and a black sand beach. Catch some rays and Z's while napping on your towel or grab our snorkel gear and boogie boards for a more active aft
host_about: My husband and I call the Big Island of Hawaii home. We live on the Hamakua coast where we own and operate an organic tea plantation, which hosts tours/tastings and events. We have a passion for growing vegetables, exotic flowers, and botanicals. Our condo in Hali'i Kai is our getaway on the other side of the island when we want to get out of the tea fields and enjoy resort living.

description:
Our unit 1002 at Kanaloa provides just the right blend of luxury and value, in an unsurpassed Hawaiian setting. This large (1500+ sq.ft.) and elegant condo is situated on the north edge of the Kanaloa complex, facing the Kona Country Club course about 100 yards off the ocean. It's an ideal setting for fun family vacations or tranquil getaways. If you have stayed at other condo complexes in Kona, you'll be struck by the large size of this unit, as well as the traffic-free environment.

The space
The Castle Kanaloa at Kona resort is famous for its gorgeous tropical landscaping and peaceful ambiance. Kanaloa features three swimming pools with spas, and lighted tennis courts. The 17-acre resort grounds are spacious and quiet, and the coastline is spectacular as Pacific waves break on black lava rock. The surrounding Keauhou Bay area is rich in Hawaiian history, and makes for pleasant walking. Here you are free from the traffic and congestion along Ali'i Drive, but sti
host_about: Writer, photographer, travel when I can!

host_about: iTrip Vacations - Maui offers many Maui home rentals, all beautifully situated on the sparkling beaches of Kaanapali, Napili, Kapalua, Lahaina, Kihei, Wailea and Maalaea. Our Maui home rentals are beachfront style, offering activities like snorkeling, surfing, whale watching, hiking, and relaxing by the beach or pool. Not far from many of our Maui home rentals is Haleakalā National Park, an amazing destination for beautiful views, complete with a visitor center for educational information. Also near all of our Maui home rentals are a number of great shops and delicious restaurants for refueling after a long day at the beach. All of our Maui home rentals offer you all the comforts of home with the addition of luxurious amenities. Book one of iTrip Vacations' many beautiful Maui home rentals today for the trip of a lifetime!

description:

Ilikai is just a hop, skip and jump to the beach. You want to surf? Well then, just head down the ramp. Oh, you like fireworks too, well then book the Ilikai on Friday night and BOOM! ‘Shopping’, you ask? Check out Ala Moana Center.

Guest access

neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is busy with smiling travelers and hospitality service workers. Easy walking to shops and the beaches. Bus stops conveniently located just outside the hotel. Restaurants surround the hotel.

description:
Hale Kanani is NEWLY renovated inside and out! With fresh paint, brand new cabinetry, vanities, quartz countertops and flooring throughout, as well as a new high-performance washer and dryer, on-demand water heater and dishwasher, this two-bedroom, two-bath home will make your time on Kaua'i a treat. Hale Kanani boasts spectacular mountain views, an airy floor plan with high ceilings, beautiful floors, and new furnishings.

The space
Nestled into a quiet cul-de-sac just a short walk from world-renowned Hanalei Bay, it provides the perfect, peaceful hideaway for your escape to paradise.

The large, open common area at Hale Kanani includes a bright and cheerful living space with plenty of comfortable seating, a well-appointed kitchen with an eat-in breakfast bar, and a lovely dining area. The primary bedroom features a king-size bed, an en suite full bath, and direct access to a covered lanai with breathtaking views of the mountains and the lush, tropical

description:
Just renovated: new kitchen cabinets, countertops & flooring. Minutes walk to Int'l Market Place & Waikiki beach. Numerous restaurants, shops, and entertainment all around. Minutes drive to the Zoo, Aquarium, Queen Kapiolani Park, Diamond Head, Ala Moana Shopping Center, Convention Center, & freeway. 24 hour security guard. Amazing canal view from the lanai. Panoramic view from the rooftop with pool, jacuzzi and BBQ grills. Best of all, price includes all Taxes and parking fee.

The space
The space is 723 sq.ft., and well laid out with a good floor plan. However, there is no room for a crib or wheelchair. The lanai is 151 sq.ft. for added enjoyment. Do not lean on the guard rail. You may also go to the rooftop for sun tan in the daytime, or to catch a breeze in the evening and watch the winter sunset. Don't miss the fireworks every Friday at Hilton Hotel after sunset, which you can view from the top deck.
There are lots of guest parking beside you
neighborhood_overview: The condo is situated in the middle stretch of Waikiki with easy stroll to most attractions:  Waikiki Beach, gift and amenity shops, restaurants, department stores, activities and nightlife, but located by the Ala Wai Canal, with beautiful canal and mountain view.  You may find it unnecessary to rent a car for the whole duration of your stay.
host_about: I am an active grandmother retired in paradise.  I am renting out our unit for my retirement income.  I hope you will enjoy your stay in my unit.

description:
The treehouse is a modern, plush and rustic place. It’s across from the water. Beautiful ocean view. Enjoy the ambiance from inside or outside on the lanai. It’s beautiful, comfortable and cozy. Large shower, small kitchenette. Comfy bed, ceiling fans, and TV and speaker for music. Kona coffee and grinder. Live like we do. It’s cool.
If this space is full, check out our other Treehouse on property. Treehouse 2. It’s beautiful.

The space

neighborhood_overview: This is directly on the waterfront road that is very popular. It’s a great location but there obviously is traffic. Live like a local during your stay.
host_about:
Aloha, I’m Mike in Kona. I moved here in 1994. Raised my sons here on this property. We started our family business called Ocean Safaris Adventures as soon as we moved here from San Luis Obispo county, Ca. Cambria to be specific. My company in Cambria was Kayak Central. I got tired of cold water so I found Kona and stayed. No regrets. The ocean here is clear and warm. 
I travel frequently as I’m able. I spend a great deal of time on the north shore of Kauai. When I’m away, my friend Alicia takes care of the property. 
This property consists of my main house, my residence, and a couple Ohana houses. We have preserved the trees and planted many new ones years ago. This is a welcoming and well known property. It’s full of Aloha, as I try to be as well. Enjoy

description:
1 Bedroom Deluxe City View on the 16th Floor!

Look no further, you've found PARADISE! This condo offers the comforts and conveniences of home. It is well maintained, reasonably priced and conveniently located in Waikiki. This spacious 1-bedroom condo has 500 sq ft of living space & a huge lanai of 120 sq ft. There is a comfy King bed and sofa sleeper in the living area. A sliding accordion divider separates the living area from the bedroom, providing extra privacy for those traveling with friends or families. Relax on the cooler side of the building and enjoy the tropical breezes from the mountain. There is a split AC system to cool down the condo on the warm summer nights. Cable TV & FREE high speed internet access with password protected WIFI, along with local, US and Canada phone service included.

Beach Access? The walkway ramp from the hotel lobby leads directly to the Duke Kahanamoku Lagoon & the famous Waikiki beach! You'll be on the beach and in t

Marina Hawaii Vacations' more than 300 privately-owned condominiums are located in the Ilikai Hotel, the Ilikai Marina and Discovery Bay - within easy walking distance to the heart of Waikiki and Hawaii's popular Ala Moana Shopping Center. description:
Visitors to the island welcome!

2 bedrooms
(1 w/ queen bed; other set up as an office with a twin daybed)

Fully furnished, bike to beach, off-street parking, private outdoor space as well as separate laundry area

Includes utilities, Fiber internet, & WiFi TV
A/C in bedroom

For stays 60+ days, price includes a ~monthly cleaning service

Absolutely NO ANIMALS of any kind (including service animals) are allowed on this property, due to severe allergies of other residents.

Mahalo!

The space
Pricing is flat rate for 30 days. If you choose to leave early or stay the full month, that is up to you. We offer discounts during off-season; we also have last minute cancellations on occasion, so calendar dates may vary. Please inquire for more info!

Guests have access to entire space.

We start your stay with some basic essentials for the week; but we do not provide toiletries, etc.
neighborhood_overview: Steps to Safeway and restaurants. Quick bike ride to Waikiki/Kaimana beaches and Honolulu Zoo. Close to Diamond Head for avid hikers and surfers.
host_about:
World Traveller; Love Good Food and Comfort

Big on communication! 
We have a general "before 10am" check-out and "after 3pm" check-in, but try to accommodate adjusted check-in/out times, based on each guest’s itinerary.

I offer contactless check-ins but am available 24/7, if you have any issues during your stay.

My homes are places I visit myself, but since I’m not there all the time, I appreciate any feedback on maintenance needed, to keep things running smoothly for future guests! 

Please no animals on site (pets or service animals); as my daughter and I are severely allergic and makes it hard to enjoy our vacations when that rule is not acknowledged. Please remember to follow the rule; and not expect to be the exception. Mahalo!

description:
Our 1 bedroom Ocean view cottage offers the maximum in privacy and convenience. Located in Sunny South Maui, just above the Wailea Resort, our cottage has everything you need to Maui Maui your Home. AC, WiFi, Fully equipped kitchen, covered carport and more...

We are a Maui County permited B&B and our quoted price will include Hawaii State and Maui County taxes of 17.42%. Be sure to always confirm if your rental is permitted and if tax is included in the price quoted.

The space
Our cottage is a fully contained separate house with its own driveway, carport, wraparound deck. Offering a very private accommodation.

Guest access
Our cottage guests have access to the entire cottage and landscaped grounds around it. They are also welcome to enjoy the ocean view deck located to the rear of the cottage.

Registration number
210140230000, TA-182-518-9888-01
neighborhood_overview: We are located in the neighborhood called Maui Meadows that is just above Wailea in close proximity to Maui’s best beaches and snorkeling. Shops and restaurants are all within a couple miles of our cottage.
host_about: Aloha we have been blessed to be living in Maui for more than 20 years. Sharing our love of these islands with our guests is our passion. Come stay with us for personal attention or complete privacy, any way you like. The Maui Meadows Bed and Breakfast is the place for clean comfortable affordable accommodations on Maui.

description:
Altho the fires of Lahiana are devastating, Maui businesses need your support. Please visit! The rest of the island is open & just as beautiful as always!!

Let your Hawaiian vacation begin.
Maui Vista is walking distance to all of your immediate needs and the Kihei weather can't be beat. Simply walk across the street and you will find Charlie Young Beach which is known for being one of the best & longest beaches in Kihei.

**Ask us about renting the condo right next door - perfect for families

The space
The health and safety of our guests, homeowners, and employees is our number one priority. Our vacation rentals minimize person-to-person contact with private amenities and entry via lockboxes. After each reservation, our condos are sanitized and disinfected with expert cleaning in line with current CDC guidelines.

The unit comes with FREE wifi, 2 flat screen smart TV's, cable, Keurig coffee maker/french press/tea kettle, a br
neighborhood_overview:
Nothing can beat this location! Walk to everything! If you want to get away from the high-priced Kaanapali area and get more of a local feel you have to try Kihei. The weather is known to be better than Kaanapali and there is plenty of shopping, snorkeling, sigh-seeing, golfing, water sports to go around! This area is laid back and affordable...not pretentious or high priced like other popular areas of Maui. Come check it out!!
Maui Vista is in the heart of Kihei. Wailea is a 5 minute drive. Lahaina a 30-45 minute drive depending on weekend traffic, walk outside your Lanai to the pool. Being a ground floor unit there is no need to carry groceries, luggage or kids very far. We are just steps away from parking and the main walking street along the beach. All that you need is steps away...
host_about:
I am a firefighter that LOVES to travel/vacation. After traveling the world I found Maui to be a little slice of heaven that I kept returning to again and again. With retirement on the horizon, I decided it was time to purchase a piece of paradise which I are happy to be sharing with all of you!
As a budget traveler, I have tried to provide you with all the comfort and requirements to make your vacation one to remember without busting the bank. I truly hope you love this place as much as I do. Mahalo

description:

neighborhood_overview: We are located in a small rural neighborhood in Ha'iku on Maui's North Shore. Away from the tourist centers and yet close to many site seeing attractions. Our neighborhood is safe for walking and you might be greeted by neighbor dog Aka who loves to welcome guests. There is an outside cat, Misha,  who loves to hang out on the lanai (we are feeding it). Across the street there are mini goats which are fun to watch.
host_about:
Born and raised in Germany, moved to Maui in 1990. Established my vacation rental business in 1991. I love to be a host and accommodate guests from all over the world. We moved recently our office from Paia town to  Haiku and are available by appointment Monday to Friday 9am - 4pm. We have a wonderful team working together for a long time.  AJ is our reservation manager, Terry manages the properties and you will find Margit mostly in the office.
My special interest is my family and pets,  Hawaiian Culture,  Hula, History, Music and Language, hiking, birds and plants of our islands.

IRONMAN SPECTATOR FRIENDLY!! ON ALII DRIVE. RUN COURSE!
Our 1 bed, 1 bath condo is near Kailua Village with access to coffee shops, restaurants, nightlife, retail shops, pier, museum, and many activities. You’ll love our condo because of the location, views, & ambiance. Our place is good for couples & families (max. of 4, preferably 2 adults and 2 small kids). You can see, hear & smell the ocean. The space
Masters bedroom has a king size bed and 42" TV that streams Netflix, Disney and Prime Video.

Living room has 52" Roku TV and is ready to stream Netflix, Disney and Prime Video. Has access to local cable channels as well.

Dining Area sits 4 people comfortably.

We have plenty
host_about: We love to travel!!  Our family find traveling to be the best way to experience culture, food and create memories.

description:
Waianapanapa State Park is reopened for camping!
YOU MUST OBTAIN YOUR CAMPING PERMIT ONLINE FOR WAI'ANAPANAPA STATE PARK BEFORE RESERVING OUR CAMPING GEAR!

Hana Camp Gear has just what you need for overnight camping at Wai'anapanapa State Park in Hana! The Basic Plus - 2 Person Package includes: Tent, 2 sleeping bags, 2 pillows, and LED lantern with batteries. The $65 rate excludes Hawaii taxes. We provide only the camping gear.

The space
Hana Camp Gear provides only the tent packages. To camp at Wai'anapanapa you must secure a camping permit online from the State of Hawaii. Search for Waianapanapa State Park Camping. When you open the site, click "Browse for Availability". At the bottom of the list you will see "Undesignated Campground". Search for the date on which you wish to camp and it will show the number of campsites available on that date. If you wish to secure a permit, click the "Reservation" tab and follow the procedures.

Af
host_about: Our family has lived on Maui for many years. We love living in Hana and enjoying the food from our gardens, fruit from our abundant banana, papaya, mango, lime, lemon, and avocado trees, and eggs from our hens. We look forward to your stay with us!

description:
Hawaii Life Rentals Presents Plantation Hale - On the Royal Coconut Coast, with it's central location on the East Side of Kauai. Steps to grocery shopping or walk to several restaurants and beaches nearby. Easy parking, AC, washer/dryer at each building.

The space
New Listing! Located right on the Royal Coconut Coast, you’re in a perfect central location at Plantation Hale, Kapaa. Walk across the street to the Coconut Plantation Marketplace to shop at any of the boutiques or pick up groceries. Walk 50 steps in a slightly different direction to award winning Hukilau Lanai for dinner, cocktails and live music or Spa Makaiwa for a massage or facial.

Enter the front door and you’ll immediately be drawn to the beautiful upgrades the owner has graciously offered. The kitchen is compact, but offers everything you need to create a simple snack or a lavish meal. Enjoy the stainless steel appliances and granite counters to create your masterpiece with bar seat
neighborhood_overview: Environmental Disclosure. Guest acknowledges that the State of Hawaii is exposed to environmental hazards including, but not limited to, tidal waves, hurricanes and floods. Please refer to the local phone book for information pertaining to evacuation procedures. In the event of an emergency, the State of Hawaii utilizes a warning alert system (emergency sirens are tested on the first working day of every month at 11:45 a.m.). Guest is responsible for using their best efforts to familiarize themselves with property, its location, and surroundings. Some of the properties are in a remote location. As such, what would be considered normal response time for public services in an urban area may not be available in this location, i.e., police, fire, and emergency services. Also, naturally dwelling animals, reptiles and fauna are different then might be encountered in an urban setting and some might be considered “pests” by some individuals, i.e., centipedes, geckos, roaches, spiders, rodents,
host_about: Hawaii Life Vacations is  a local real estate company offering vacation and long term rentals on all Hawaiian Islands.  We offer island hosts, property managers and offices statewide. Our rentals are professionally managed and each home comes with complimentary concierge services. We look forward to hosting you.

description:
Our family home is less than a mile right off of highway 11 located on our 1 acre orchard with fruiting trees for your eating pleasure! Just 25 minutes to the volcano, 15 minutes to Hilo town, and 1 minute to a store, cafe, and gas station, the location of our home is ideal! With a trampoline for the kids, covered swing for mom and dad, and covered porch for relaxing, this home is sure to suit your needs! Come and experience the beauty of our land and comfort of our home!

The space
Our home is ideal for families wanting to visit the volcano yet want to remain centrally located to Hilo town. For nature lovers as well as those wanting to remain indoors, our 3 bedroom plus bonus room and 3 bathroom home on one acre of land can meet all of your needs. With a fully fenced in yard, trampoline, fire pit, swing, flowering & fruiting trees as well as an outdoor lanai for eating, adults & children alike are sure to be pleased!

Guest access
Our g
neighborhood_overview: Our house is located just one minute from a gas station & convenience store as well as cafe & post office.  We live in a small neighborhood with just 6 neighbors each living on one acre parcels.
host_about: I am a teacher, married to a licensed massage therapist, and a mother of three beautiful girls.  Although I was born and raised on the West side of the island, I have made the East side my home for the past 13 years.

description:
Ailana Hale offers the perfect opportunity to experience life in a lovely, quiet Hawaiian neighborhood. Conveniently located in Princeville, it allows for easy access to the quaint town of Hanalei, along with stunning beaches, scenic hikes, and a variety of water sports. This three-bedroom, three-bath home is surrounded by tropical landscaping and decorated in a fun island style. Great for big families!

The space
On the main floor of Ailana Hale, the primary bedroom features a king bed with an en suite bath that has a tile shower and a soaking tub. Also on the main floor, the two guest bedrooms feature a king bed and its shared full bath. Upstairs, a loft with two additional king-size beds also has its own full bath, and its own small office area.

This Princeville home provides easy access to renowned north Kauai beaches such as Hanalei Bay and Lumahai. Just a short walk also takes guests to the Queen's Bath tide pools, Hideaways Beach, and the Prince
host_about: Gather with us! Gather Vacation Rentals is the leading luxury property manager in the US. Gather was founded in 2005 and our properties reflect our high standards of excellence. With over 400 professionally managed luxury homes available for vacation rentals, we are committed to making sure that our vacation clients experience the very best in quality, delivery, and outstanding service Our Vacation Rental Management Team reflects our high standards of excellence.
