description:
Amazing oceanview unit. Short Walking distance to Poipu Beach. Fully Air Conditioned. Free guest passes to Poipu Beach Athletic Club available. Access to a swimming pool with a water slide, gym, tennis courts and more (up to 9 guests at a time).

Multiple units in the same building provide flexibility for a large group. There are 4 full kitchens. AC in every bedroom. Clean and beautifully decorated. Professionally managed.

The space
This home consists of 4 units in the same building. We can accommodate groups from 1 to 20 guests. We also have another 8 bedroom home on Oahu in case you want to do some island hopping. Please inquire more details.

Unit 1 Oceanview: 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom, top floor unit in the front. It offers beautiful views of the ocean.

Unit 2 Aloha: It is right under Unit 1 Oceanview. It consists of 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms.

Unit 3 Royal Palm: It is another 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom unit behind the Oceanvi
neighborhood_overview:
We're conveniently located in the heart of Poipu Beach. This is a resort area with many restaurants, grocery stores and shopping located within a 1 mile radius.

Poipu Beach is consistently voted as one of the best beaches in the U.S and has sections for snorkeling, boogie boarding, beginner and intermediate surfing.

This is the drier part of the island. While the other parts of island may be raining and wet, Poipu Beach often remains sunny and dry.
host_about:
Hello! My name is Sri and I am the owner of several vacation rentals in both San Francisco and Hawaii. I am incredibly blessed to call these two beautiful places my home and to be able to share my properties with travelers from all over the world. 

I currently reside in San Francisco, but my second home is in Hawaii, where I spend a lot of time with my family. We are thankful to have the opportunity to experience the beauty and culture of both places, and I am excited to share this experience with our guests. 

Our vacation rental properties in San Francisco offer the perfect blend of city living and relaxation, with easy access to all the city has to offer, including popular attractions, restaurants, and shopping. 
Our Hawaii properties are located in some of the most beautiful spots on the island, allowing you to truly relax and enjoy the tropical paradise.

Being able to provide vacation rental properties in both San Francisco and Hawaii is truly a dream come true for me. 
I take great pride in ensuring that our guests have the best possible experience when staying in our properties and I am always available to help with anything they need. 
I believe that everyone should have the opportunity to experience the beauty and wonder of these two amazing places and I am grateful to be able to help make that happen. Thank you for considering our properties and I hope to welcome you soon!

description:
This bright and airy updated condo is the ideal place to stay in sunny Poʻipū for couples, honeymooners + small families. The open living space is clean and welcoming with a coastal boho vibe, and you'll enjoy beautiful ocean + garden views from the huge upper-level lanai. Location is the absolute best - from the beachfront property, you can walk to several of the best beaches on the south shore, local coffee, restaurants, shops, and the incredible pool within minutes. IG: @littlerainbowkauai

The space
The newly updated + refurnished living space has vaulted ceilings, a comfortable new queen-size sleeper sofa, a new Smart TV with access to multiple streaming platforms, contemporary dining furniture + beautiful locally-sourced decor. You will sleep great after days of adventuring or spending time in the sun on the new king size memory foam mattress, crisp cotton sheets + West Elm bedding. The kitchen is fully equipped to prepare meals and has new dinnerware + glas
neighborhood_overview: The Kiahuna Plantation grounds are incredibly well-maintained with huge lawns throughout, lush gardens, and well-kept buildings + facilities to include on-site laundry, BBQ grills + a beach hut for beach towels and activity options. You will have access to the Poipu Beach Athletic Club, just adjacent to the property, with an incredible pool complete with a slide + sand-bottom keiki pool, tennis/pickle ball courts, and great workout facilities. Located right in the heart Poʻipū, you can walk to just about everything you need…Little Fish Coffee and several restaurants + shopping options in the Poipu Shopping Village are just across the street. It’s less than a mile from The Shops at Kukui'ula, a short drive into Historic Koloa Town, and a great central spot on the island 45 mins away from the top of Waimea Canyon + an hour away from the North shore.
host_about:
Most of the time you can find our little fam at our local Denver neighborhood coffee shop, spending time with our two pups, or exploring the Colorado mountains…but probably wishing we were on the beach in Kauaʻi.

This island is our favorite place in the world and we’re so excited to share our home away from home with you! We want to help you have the best trip ever - please check out our guides + reach out for any specific recommendations!

description:

This multi-level 2bd-2ba condo is just steps from Poipu Beach. Ground level has fully equipped kitchen, dining, full bath, indoor laundry, guest bedroom with two twin beds. Access to two shared pools, hot tub, and tennis courts. The primary bedroom with king bed is upstairs, opens up to two lanais. Both bedrooms have a portable AC for your comfort.

This multi-level 2bd-2ba condo is just steps from Poipu Beach. The ground level has a fully equipped kitchen, dining area, full bathroom, indoor laundry W/D, and guest bedroom with two twin beds and a TV. The spacious living area leads out to an open air lanai and grassy lawn, perfect for a game of cornhole (provided). Access to two shared pools, hot tub, and tennis courts. The primary bedroom with king bed is upstairs, opens up to two lanais, with an office spa

Wall A/C located in both the living area & in the bedroom. A stacked set washer/dryer located in the kitchen. The kitchen is fully equipped with a cook top, full size refrigerator, toaster/convection oven (not full size), and a microwave.

The solar heated swimming pool is ideally situated at the ocean edge along with a sandy beach, picnic area, and gas barbecues. A unique salt water p
neighborhood_overview: Kona Alii Drive
host_about:
Kona Coast Vacations hosts over 5,400 reservations a year with the help of knowledgeable management, proficient team members and trusted home owners. Open 7 days a week, we strive to help with each visitors’ every need. Sharing Aloha from the first contact whether it is phone or email, we are here to assist by making the booking process as seamless as can be. We pride ourselves on providing hands on assistance whenever it is needed, whether it is reservation details, maintenance issues, or even booking activities! 

Kona Coast Vacations is fortunate to team up with great property owners which is instrumental in providing exceptional homes for our new and returning guests. With over 240 vacation rentals from oceanfront homes, ocean view condos and private estates, we are here for your every need, open seven days a week to take care of our guests and owners. With two locations in Kailua Kona and Mauna Lani we have dedicated specialists in guest services managing reservations, maintenance, and property checks alongside our accounting, support and marketing specialists. We are proud to be Airbnb members since 2001 and now are Superhosts with over 1070 reviews.
We hope to host you Hawaii and help create a memory to last you a lifetime. We are your “’Ohana” (family) on the Big Island of Hawaii, please do not hesitate to utilize our listed resources and book activities thru Kona Concierge.

description:
Amazing Views !!! Exhilarating OCEAN, SKY & LANDSCAPE VIEWs from inside & out of every room, lanai, yard of bluff-top "HOME of the OPENING FLOWER" (Hale MAKALAPUA - BLOSSOM FORTH) situated on a lovely neighborhood cul-de-sac, within the resort community of Princeville, Kauai.
A/C & heat, accommodating furniture, appliances, bathrooms, kitchen-ware, bedding, linens, Haiku fans, outdoor shower, BQ grill, broadband WiFi, 3 HDTVs, bikes, beach chairs, towels, canopies, snorkel gear, boogie boards.

The space
JOYFUL home and setting. Situated in the lovely, very walkable and bike-able community of Princeville, Kauai. HOME of the OPENING FLOWER is located on a bluff, setback from the ocean, on a large private property, overlooking a serene valley, and the blue ocean.
This open plan home has AMAZING VIEWS spectacular ocean views from the entry hall, kitchen, dining room, 20-ft tall living/great room, and from three of the four bedrooms, plus from the lanais, a
neighborhood_overview: Lovely, well-kept neighborhood
host_about: I moved to Kauai in 2000 and opened two restaurants. We closed the restaurants 11 years later; too much hassle...even though we were often cited as one of the best dining experiences on Kauai. I enjoyed the customer side of the restaurant business, just did not enjoy managing the employees. Based on my people skills, I was asked by home owners to play host to their visiting guests at vacation rentals. It is something I really enjoy.

description:
One of the best locations on Kauai’s lush North Shore fronting the white sands of Hanalei Bay with amazing views of tropical sunsets, lush green mountains and the sparkling blue waters of the Pacific Ocean.

The space
These Kauai condos are located on over 22 acres of Hawaiian paradise, featuring mature tropical gardens with endless flowers, trees and other flora, cascading pools and lava rock waterfalls, and is steps to one of Hawaii’s most beautiful white sand beaches.

Not only is the Hanalei Bay Resorts’ pool one of the best on Kauai, the views from the one, two and three bedroom condo suites are amazing. Beautiful sunsets, Hanalei Bay, the Na Pali Coast and Bali Hai are just some of the views that the individually owned condos can provide. Our guests enjoy full access to all of the resort amenities, including the two swimming pools, eight tennis courts, bell & shuttle service as needed, resort concierge, front desk and more.

Hanalei B
host_about:
Jonathan Parrish, or "JP" as he is referred to by friends, family, and colleagues, is actively involved with the day to day activities of The Parrish Collection Kauai.  

My personal goal is to ensure that we are exceeding the expectations of all our guests! 

Explore our unique collections of extraordinary Kauai vacation rentals, then match your style with the largest variety of properties available including the Kauai’s most popular resorts and widest selection of oceanfront homes in Poipu Beach.

description:
For evacuees of wildfires, this apartment is available at a discounted price. Please PM me. Thank you!

This apartment is available for 30 days or more. Let the laid-back Hawaiian lifestyle embrace you in this comfortable studio apartment. Completely renovated in 2021, this bright and spacious studio offers all the modern amenities a digital nomad requires including fast Wi-Fi, a 50-inch Roku TV, and sink, fridge, and hot plate. host_about: Hello, I’m Kate!   My husband, Brett, and I work full time, regular 9-5 jobs, but love hosting people in our home.  We love to travel, see the world, and experience new cultures.  We are so happy that you have chosen to stay with us.  If there is anything we can do for, please do not hesitate to reach out.

description:
The space
Hale Hapu'u

Nestled on five acres of rainforest, Hale Hapu'u is a serene two-bedroom, three-bath hideaway home in Volcano Village. This family-friendly home has a lodge-like feel with a wood-burning fireplace, a spacious lounge area, and an idyllic lanai. Intricate details adorn the interior, including imported woodwork and fine glass and stone finishes. Take in the relaxing ambiance of the tropical foliage while lounging on the lanai, or simply enjoy an alfresco meal with a view. Nearby attractions include local art galleries, a golf course, and Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park. Unwind in the open living area on a sleeper sectional and two armchairs. A lounge area features a sleeper sofa, large window seats, and a flat-screen TV. At the center of the home is a large wood-burning fireplace, allowing you to enjoy the warm glow from all living spaces. Tucked under the stairs is a kid-friendly hideaway, stocked with books and cozy decor. Whip up meals in th
host_about:
Vacasa
Vacation Home Management

Vacasa unlocks the possibilities of how we enjoy vacation homes. We take care of managing our homeowners’ vacation houses so they can have peace of mind (and their home when they want to). And our guests book vacations confidently knowing they’re going to find exactly what they’re looking for without any surprises.

Each vacation home is always cared for by our professional local teams who implement our high cleanliness and maintenance values, while the hands-off tasks of vacation rental management--marketing, filing taxes, and maintaining a website--are handled by a specialized central support team. Our passion and focus remain true: to empower our homeowners, guests, and employees to invest in vacation.

description:
Journey to The Palm Retreat for a relaxing stay! Our home was renovated in 2017 by my husband Ekolu, myself and our 3 year old (at the time) son Kainalu. It is a 3 bedroom/2 bathroom house that offers a large backyard for you to pop a chair up and relax with the grass beneath your feet and the wind blowing in your hair.

The space
The home is very cozy inside and outside. 3 bedrooms/2Bathrooms. There is a large variety of palms in the yard to pull up a chair and catch the fresh island breeze while enjoying a book or just to relax. The living area is very clean and comfortable. Minutes away from Pahoa town if in need of something to eat or would like to wonder the shops for that hidden treasure! Please note internet is spotty due to being in such a rural area. We are patiently waiting for high speed internet to become available to the area. We thank you for your patience.

For 2 guests you choose which room you would like access to.

For 3 guest
neighborhood_overview: The island offers plenty of hiking adventures to choose from including ones in the National Park in Volcano town. The house is located roughly 30minutes from Hilo town.  Hilo town offers numerous beaches to choose from Onekahakaha Beach park offers shallow waters great for the Keiki (children) to play. Otherwise Carlsmith Beach Park is great for those who enjoy a sandy ocean bottom and a beautiful grassy area for a lovely picnic. Here freshwater springs circulate up from the ocean floor and mix with salt water for a refreshing swim on a hot sunny day. Sea turtles frequent the area often and can be seen while snorkeling or just floating around. There are also showers available to rinse off after your swim and bathrooms to change in. After a swim we recommend heading to downtown Hilo for a shave ice(Hawaiian version of a snow cone) or an ice cream treat(Kula Shave Ice is our favorite spot for local organic shave ice!). Lots of cute local stores to look at for souvenirs/gifts to bring hom
host_about: Aloha my name is Lindsay. My husband Ekolu and I have been hosts since 2017. We live on the Big Island of Hawaii. We enjoy hosting people from all over the world and hope you enjoy one of our two homes. Either home offers a relaxing place to unwind after a day of adventuring. In our spare time we enjoy taking our three sons to the beach, teaching them to surf, fish, dive and enjoy the island life. We also organic garden and value our family time.

description:
This private house is 1/2 of a duplex and is perfect for families or groups. It is located adjacent to the river and you will enjoy the relaxing sounds of the water from the house. This house includes a full private kitchen and a private bathroom.

The space
This house is off-the-grid. Being off-the-grid means that we get all of our electricity from the sun and all of our water is collected from the rain. We are not connected to the island's grid power system. Our solar panels charge a large bank of deep cycle batteries all day in order for us to have power around the clock. Guests are asked not to use any appliances that generate heat from electricity (such as toasters, hair dryers, curling irons, etc...) as they consume too much energy for an off-grid power system.

Guest access
Private Kitchen, Private Living Room, Private Dining Room, Private Bathroom, Shared Waterfall Swimming Area, Shared Gill Area, and Grounds

Other
neighborhood_overview: We are easily accessible to all the Big Island attractions such as Volcanoes National Park (1 hour South), Waipio Valley (1 hour North), and the countless sights and adventures along the Hamakua Coast, the Hamakua House is the perfect location to base your Big Island adventure vacation. The legendary Akaka Falls State Park is only 4 miles away from the Hamakua House.  Onomea Bay is only 4 miles away, which is the home of the Hawaii Botanical Gardens. It is an unforgettable drive to get there and the bay is a wonderful place to have a picnic. We are only 1 mile (easily walkable) from the quaint main street of Honomu, HI.  This town was established in the sugar cane plantation era and remains today boasting some wonderful gift shops, two restaurants, a coffee house, and the Island's best Zip Line Tours.
host_about: I'm an outgoing type who values the experience of travel.  Airbnb helps me to afford to travel more.  I love meeting new people.  I grew up in a Bed & Breakfast so hosting comes naturally to me.

description:

Sands amenities, including tennis courts, putting green, barbecues, adult and children’s pools, and an onsite restaurant and cocktail bar. Welcome to paradise!

host_about:
Superhost: Aloha! I love to help families and friends travel-to the Hawaiian Islands, California, Utah, Florida and more. description:
Oceanfront Condo home with comforts of home and views of paradise. Ideal location for catching the sunsets and relaxing in the south pacific. Total kitchen and bathroom renovation makes this the place to be.

The space
Its a lovely day in Maui! Interior set up for Maui living, tile flooring and ocean views from kitchen/living room. Sit back and relax in condo B-315. Resort property located on the ocean front in sunny Kihei, you can watch it all unfold from your lanai view deck.

Large private condominium apartment at the resort condominium complex on the beach in sunny Kihei, Maui, Hawaii. 2 Bedroom with private attached bathroom, 2nd bathroom down the hall with shower, large living area, dining area, kitchen with breakfast bar. PLUS large private view deck looking out towards ocean. Beach chairs, pool towels, full size appliances including air conditioning and washer dryer. Really, just hit the grocery store and you are set for the week
host_about: Aloha!   We are a family owned and operated vacation rental and management company.   Maui Sunset is an oceanfront condominium resort complex located in sunny Kihei on the island of Maui.    Please reach out if you have any questions or need help finding the best condo for your trip.

description:
Upscale remodel (Dec 2022) with high-end furnishings 2br oasis situated directly across from Kameole Beach. Fantastic lanai with direct ocean views. Experience the resorts many amenities such as tennis courts, pool and jacuzzi and grills. We provide everything from beach towels, chairs, umbrellas, and a cooler within our fully stocked designer condos. A complete kitchen, ensuite washer and dryer, and luxury touches await. Complimentary coffee, detergent, and a pillow bar are a few of the perks.

The space
With an ocean view, open kitchen, and living/ dining space, guests will feel at home while gazing at the waves. This unit sleeps six. It has a master bedroom with a king-sized bed, a foldout sofa in the living room, as well as a separate studio connection. The studio has its own secure entrance, front door, full bathroom, and kitchenette area with a King size bed. This configuration is perfect for couples and families looking for connected space. Contemporary des
neighborhood_overview: The Maui Banyan Resort offers the perfect combination of beach access and resort amenities for your next vacation. On-site pools, jet spas, tennis courts, and barbecue grills are yours to enjoy along with the world-famous Kameole Beach directly across the road. Easily stroll to a wide variety of exciting retail and delicious food options, all within a quick distance. This is the most visitor-friendly location on South Maui, with everything a guest needs just moments away- including high-end shopping in Wailea, all along sunny beachy South Kihei Road.
host_about: Traveling on company business trips five days a week for eighteen years has taught us what is important to guests. This inspired us to create the ideal environment and provide the right amenities for the perfect stay.  Happiness can be about the journey that produces it and we found it on Maui, the “ valley island”.  After visiting Maui for many years on vacation for a break from business travel, we moved here permanently a few years ago. We chose Kihei, a relaxed ocean front surfing community that thrives with the aloha spirit! We welcome you into our Ohana.

description:
Beautiful newly remodeled unit with lots of amenities. Enjoy gorgeous views of the water and mountains while relaxing on the lanai. Just half a block from Kihei Road where the top beaches on Maui are located. Stroll down the street to Charley Young Park to snorkel with the turtles or learn to surf or paddleboard at the Cove, the best spot on Maui and just one block away. All new appliances in a fully stocked kitchen with gourmet gas stove and dishwasher. Property has pool, grills and laundry.

The space
You'll enjoy cooling ocean breezes and beautiful views from this new unit. One of only 4 units with ocean and mountain views. Just completely remodeled in February of 2020. During the months of November- April you can view whale spouts from the lanai. We have counted as many as 12 at a time. Unit has reserved off street parking, cable and high speed internet. Bathroom features a large massaging shower. Shampoo/conditioner and body wash are provided. Kit
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is in the heart of Kihei's beach zone, with wonderful parks featuring showers, restrooms, great views, snorkeling, swimming, surfing and paddle boarding.  You will rave about our locally owned restaurants within walking distance specializing in cuisine from around the world.  There are places within blocks for booking tours, renting bikes, or signing up for lessons.  The bus stops half a block from the apartment.  You will find turtles on our beaches and during the winter months spot whales from the shore.
host_about:
We have traveled extensively and lived many places around the world, but call Hawaii home.  We love meeting new people and our goal is to make your stay magical!  We want you to love these islands and the people as much as we do.
As we welcome you to our island, we are committed to providing you with a safe environment by following AirBnb and CDC expert protocols working to defeat COVID-19, including cleaning your unit 48 hours before you arrive.

host_about:
Meeting various people is one key reason why we started to host. We thought that meeting and interacting with them would give us first-hand information about their culture and their country.  

When we were in Europe, we were pampered by all our Airbnb hosts, so here in Hawaii, we will do our best to provide the same (or more) hospitality to all our guests as well.

Looking forward to accommodating you here in our cozy & contemporary studio !!!

Much Aloha,

Ssen

Less than fifteen minutes from Lahaina, this condominium’s location is the perfect mix of resort life and local vibe. It’s ideal for a romantic getaway, as well as the family looking for kid-friendly beaches and all the comforts of home amenities.

The space

This condo recently had new portable AC units installed in each bedroom, and can accommodate up to six guests. Dine outside on your private lanai, a great place to enjoy your coffee or Mai Tai! Step inside to the open concept main living area; the perfect place to relax after a long day in the sun. The bright and airy kitchen features bright white cabinets, stainless steel applian

This condo has been upgraded in the rich, bright colors of the Polynesian and Asian Pacific isles. Wood furnishings, and bright tropical-themed art, combined with high-beamed ceilings and p
neighborhood_overview: This condominium complex is located on Northern Kaanapali Beach and is surrounded by abundant activities and dining options. Some beaches nearby that are favorites among locals are Kahekili Beach (fronting property), Kaanapali Beach, and D.T. Flemings Beach Park. Take a small drive to Kaanapali Parkway for some shopping and dining options. Popular choices among locals and visitors alike are Leilani's on the Beach, Hula Grill, and Monkeypod Kitchen by Merriman at the Whaler's Village Shopping Center. A short distance away from there, you can find Safeway, Starbucks, and Long's Drugs at the Lahaina Cannery Mall.
host_about:
At Maui Condo and Home, LLC we continue to serve our owners and guests with the same Aloha Spirit that we shared over 20 years ago. Though our business has changed through expansion and growth to include properties beyond Maui -- on the islands of Oahu, Hawaii and Kauai --  our values and sense of Aloha remain. We have implemented new business strategies and have remained at the top of the Property Management industry on Maui. We are excited to continue to serve our current owners and return guests, as well as welcome new owners and guests to Maui Condo and Home.
Click here to view all  of our listings: www.airbnb.com/p/mauicondo

description:
3 bedroom, 2 bath home in lush, tropical gardens of a spacious, private estate is just steps from Maui's best beach. Full kitchen, laundry, dining, living room and large lanai with ceiling fans complete the traditional Hawaiian feel. Tax additional.

The space
Welcome to your home in Paradise! Wake up to sweet orange blossom breezes and tropical bird calls.

This is a fully updated, Old-Hawaii style home with three bedrooms and two baths in a private estate of four cottages surrounded by a mature, tropical landscape of seasonal mangoes, bananas, oranges, ginger, and birds of paradise. Walk across the broad lawn to the private tennis/pickleball court; play to your hearts content or escape the midday sun in the shade of mature mango trees.

The home has a well equipped kitchen, living room, lanai with BBQ, full laundry room and a delightful outdoor shower. The living/dining/kitchen area is air conditioned (as of July 2021) and ceiling fan
neighborhood_overview: Location, location, location.  Our private compound is along the best stretch of Keawakapu Beach, cited by Conde' Nast Traveller magazine as one of the best beaches in the world with clean, white sand, family-friendly surf and a great tiki bar a short walk up the beach.  Sitting on the boarder of posh Wailea and funky Kihei, you are close enough to walk to either and peacefully distant from each. The location accommodates all interests and a wide variety of food, entertainment and recreational activities including  surf, snorkel, dive, boating, hiking, golf, free private tennis & pickle ball court and much more.  Wailea sports world class resorts, glitzy shopping and restaurants, manicured lawns and boardwalks, and 2 world-class golf courses.  In Kihei you'll find tropical fish shacks, great local restaurants & bars, surf shops, grocery, drug and hardware stores, a muni golf course and the freshest poke sashimi made fresh throughout the day in many varieties at several local vendors in
host_about: Married, 4 adult children ages 22 - 29, life long Seattle resident.   Avid outdoorsman, hiking the desert southwest: Canyonlands, Zion, Bryce, Arches, Mesa Verde, Yosemite NP, Glacier NP, RainierNP, Olympic NP, etc.  Mont Blanc.   Travel: W. Europe, Africa, & Asia: S. Korea, Japan, China, Hong Kong, Indonesia, Thailand, Burma (Myanmar), Sri Lanka, India, Nepal.  Skiing, racket sports,  sailing, paddling, food & vino. description:
Vineyard Village Aloha House is your vibrant and cozy Maui home away from home. Perfect for remote work and extended stays. High speed internet, workspace with desk, kitchen, built in breakfast nook, sparkling waterfall tile design shower with river rock stone floor are all sure to make you comfortable and feel a sense of place and Aloha! Wailuku is a historic, walkable town at your doorstep filled with hip boutiques, coffee shops, bistros, island food trucks and colorful murals. Live Aloha!

host_about: I grew up in Hawaii on the island of Maui.  I enjoy hosting guests and strive for them to experience a truly one of a kind  perspective of the charming island I call home!

description:
The Kapalua Golf Villas are one of the most esteemed resort communities in West Maui. Located in the center of the Kapalua Resort with sweeping views of Molokai and Lanai, these elegant one and two-bedroom condominiums neighbor two of Hawaii's most famed championship golf courses.

Scenic ocean and Lanai island views are why west facing vista ("V" or top level) units are some of the most desirable places to stay while in Kapalua.

The space
This contemporary one-bedroom Golf Villa unit is the perfect place for a couple to getaway and have a well-deserved romantic vacation.

The Parrish Collection is a locally owned and based real estate management company that specializes in vacation rentals on Maui and Kauai. Our collections of rentals are professionally managed by in-house staff with a commitment to personalized service, fine attention to detail and a true sense of Aloha. Our team looks forward to hosting you soon.

RESORT FEATUR
host_about:
Hawaii-based and locally operated out of Kapalua Resort, The Parrish Collection Maui is a full-service vacation rental management company proudly overseeing 50 privately owned homes in the Bay Villas, Golf Villas and The Ridge Villas.  

Originally formed in 2007, Aloha Vacation Villas is now part of The Parrish Collection group of companies.  Based on Kauai, The Parrish Collection LLC manages over 350 properties on both Maui and Kauai.

JP Parrish is the Owner and Principal Broker of The Parrish Collection LLC, originally formed in 1984 that is now the largest independently owned vacation rental company on Kauai.  

Headquartered at Poipu Beach, Kauai and operating owner and guest services’ desks at three major Kauai resorts, The Parrish Collection LLC offers easy access to owners and guests. 

Its dedicated team has worked together for many years and offers an unequaled commitment to personal and professional service, attention to detail, and the highest quality standards all balanced with a true sense of Aloha.

description:
Located on the magnificent, 22,000-acre Kapalua Resort, these upscale accommodations are some of Maui’s best vacation condos. The units feature spacious, one- to three-bedroom with full kitchens, washers/dryers, A/C, and stunning views. Relax at one of the 3 beautiful white sand beaches, just steps away from many shops and restaurants, Enjoy a game of golf at Kapalua's Bay course. Plan an adventure to our near by hiking/biking trails.

The space
• Villa closest to Oneloa Beach
• 1st floor villa accessible by 13 stairs down from parking lot
• Travertine floors throughout
• Updated kitchen with granite counters and stainless steel appliances includes – fridge with ice maker, stove/oven, microwave, dishwasher, cookware, tableware and unique chef’s table counter
• Large oceanfront lanai off of living and dining room with direct lawn access, dining table and lounge chairs
• Master bedroom with 1 king bed, lanai, ceiling fan and private bathroom
neighborhood_overview: Located on the northwestern tip of Maui, the Kapalua Resort boasts three beautiful beaches and 36 holes of championship golf. Kapalua Bay Villas are closest to Oneloa and Kapalua Beaches, with one- and two-bedroom ocean view and ocean front villas available. The Ridge at Kapalua is perched high above the ocean with many one- and two-bedroom villas having magnificent ocean and Molokai views. Kapalua Golf Villas one- and two-bedroom condos are situated along Kapalua’s Bay Course fairway, where guests may watch golfers and may enjoy distant views of the ocean.
host_about:
The Outrigger Way

Developed in 1993 with Hawaiian scholar and historian Dr. George Kanahele, the Ke 'Ano Wa'a process was designed to advance the company's corporate culture and fundamental business strategies. The values-based process intricately connected three core elements of the hospitality industry:

HOST + GUEST + PLACE

It also deepened Outrigger's understanding and appreciation of the local host culture, a distinct hospitality style that is recognized across the globe.

description:
Located in the heart of Princeville. My place is close to some of the most amazing beaches, parks, restaurants and dining, and best activities on island. You’ll love my home because it's light and airy, plenty of space (though you'll be exploring the island mostly!), soaking tub, and the high ceilings. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), big groups, pretty much anyone!

The space
My home has everything you would want in a vacation rental! Fully loaded kitchen, large dining table for plenty of room for six people, super comfy couches with AppleTv, Netflix, and other streaming services. An office space area. Large backyard to run around and play. Large sized washer & dryer. Plenty of beach necessities such as boogie boards, umbrella, beach chairs, beach toys (for kids & adults), snorkel gear, beach towels, etc. There is also a gym located in the garage. We also provide bikes to use at your leisure!

I
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is very quiet and peaceful. The neighbors are all really friendly and will strike up a conversation if you bump into each other. You're in a cul-de-sac so the location is private. You are right in the heart of Princeville and are located near the best beaches, restaurants, and activities on island.
host_about:
I am a world traveler. Love exploring new places and seeing new things. I have lots of family in Portugal, so I visit often and stay for several months at a time (It's a heck of a flight!). I currently live in Princeville, HI. Of all the places I've visited, this one is the most magical and that's why I made it my home. I'm a real estate agent on island and have been in the real estate business since 2007. 
Airbnb is such a great way to meet new people and I've used it almost every time on my travels and am excited to now start hosting here in Kauai.

description:
You’ll love our luxury condo at beautiful Kaanapali Beach Club near Lahaina. Perfect for couples or families looking for an affordable, carefree getaway that includes a kitchenette to prepare meals in. This scenic view suite sleeps up to 4 guests (if you use the sofa bed). Large bathroom w/full tub. From the full lanai balcony, enjoy the refreshing tropical breeze & sound of the tide lapping the Ka'anapali shore. Awesome pool area, beach, exercise room, laundry facilities & restaurant on site.

The space
Enjoy a week at the BEAUTIFUL Kaanapali Beach Club ("KBC") Resort at this scenic view 1-BEDROOM SUITE that includes kitchenette! Comfortably Sleeps 4-5 adults or children (there is a King bed, Sofa bed, plus a single roll-away bed may be available for a 5th person if requested at booking).

Current 2020 availability for Scenic View units:
7 NIGHTS, JULY 18th - 25th
7 NIGHTS, JULY 23rd - 30th
7 NIGHTS, JULY 27th - AUGUST 3rd

neighborhood_overview: Located on one of the last properties on Kaanapali where building was allowed really close to the beach!  So close that even in one of the units set further back, you will still hear the crashing waves if you open your balcony door. Kaanapali Beach Club has an amazing pool complex with lots of loungers to sit on and enjoy the sunshine! Plenty of restaurants nearby, even within walking distance, if you're up for a stroll.
host_about:
We're a happy couple living in an amazing large estate in Seattle. We visit Hawaii a couple times a year, sometimes with our kids and grandkids. Our beautiful timeshares in Kaanapali, Maui (near Lahaina) are The WESTIN KAANAPALI OCEAN RESORT (STUDIO, 1-BRM or 2-BRM)  and The KAANAPALI BEACH CLUB (1-BRM OCEAN VIEW or 1-BRM OCEAN FRONT). 

We have lifetime 5-Star Elite Platinum status with Starwood/WESTIN (the highest possible) as well as similar lifetime Elite Centum Platinum status  with Diamond Resorts/KAANAPALI BEACH CLUB.  As a result, if you book any of our MAUI timeshares, you share in the many special perks we have as owners at both Resorts including (subject to availability) early check-in, late check-out, best possible room locations plus there are no resort fees and parking is always free.

If you do not find the dates you would like on our MAUI listings, please email us and tell us the dates you would prefer (but try to do so at least 8-13 months in advance to be certain of availability (since West Maui is so much in demand now days).

In addition, in Seattle we have two very popular Airbnb units at our large Estate Home both with sunset views:  
#1 SEATTLE LUXURY ESTATE ROMANTIC SEAVIEW 1-BRM GUESTHOUSE
#2 SEATTLE LUXURY ESTATE ROMANTIC SEAVIEW SUITE
 
Contact me ASAP with any questions or to book!

description:
Beachfront Lagoons! Experience a world-class lifestyle and elegance in Ko Olina. Championship 18 hole golf course, stunning sunsets, and pristine lagoons are steps away! Lanai overlooks the lush tropical gardens, salt water/heated lap pool, KOI ponds, and beautiful landscaping. Steps away from shops, galleries, and eateries. Extensive gym, saunas and courteous staff await your arrival. Come join us today and experience the Aloha we have to offer!

The space
Property description
(MINIMUM 6 NIGHT STAY)

Aloha! Our beautiful luxury Beach Villa is located in Ko Olina which is centrally located on the island of Oahu! Our fully equipped central AC 2nd floor villa, unit #201, is located in the Ocean Tower on Lagoon 2, the least crowded of the four amazing lagoons. No waiting for an elevator when you want to go to the beach or enjoy the many resort amenities. We offer LOCATION and VALUE! This is our home, not a hotel or timeshare property, that we would li
neighborhood_overview:
Aloha and welcome to Ko Olina, our “Place of Joy.”

At Ko Olina, we are committed to the land, the sea and our rich history of cultural traditions. We embrace the philosophy of “living pono,” living in harmony with nature and preserving what we love. Ko Olina is in Wai’anae, a lush, green oceanfront retreat on the calm leeward coast of Oahu, Hawaii.

Guests travel from around the world to be immersed within the abundant diversity of Hawaii’s ecosystems, the ocean, the earth, the winds, our heritage. Born of fire and blessed by the gods, our islands have become famous for their beauty, hospitality and traditions.

Ko Olina encompasses 642 acres with sweeping ocean and mountain views and a string of jewel-like lagoons connected by more than a mile and a half of seaside pathways. The resort is edged to the north by the pristine nature preserve of Lanikuhonua (“where heaven meets the earth”) and to the south by four lovely beach coves.

Ko Olina con
host_about:
Our family consists of myself, my wife Julia and my two-year-old little girl Aubree. My wife and I were born and raised in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada - we are Canadians at heart! 
Our work brought us to beautiful British Columbia for 10 years now.
We always dreamed of living in Hawaii, especially at a 5 star luxurious condo like this! We hope you enjoy this condo as much as we enjoyed setting it up.

description:
Experience Hawaii in this condo located in the heart of downtown, guests are welcomed to share the many amenities in the same building managed by the Aqua Aston Hotel. Tasty eateries, 24 hour fitness, department stores and open markets are all within walking distance. Whether you're here for business or on vacation, this is a stay you won't forget.

The space
This 1 bedroom suite located in the Executive Centre. FREE parking in a reserved stall is included! It is 15 minutes to Waikiki or the airport. It entire condo has central AC, free wifi. On-site laundry room is on the 3rd floor. If you don’t have a car, no problem, there are bus stops right outside and bikes you can rent. The kitchen has stove, microwave (with convection oven), refrigerator/freezer, pots/pans, dishes, utensils, coffee pot, etc.
The bedroom has a very comfortable memory foam Queen bed and sofa couch (folded down to small bed). The sofa couch could sleep 2 kids or one adult. The sm
neighborhood_overview: This is in the heart of downtown Honolulu, in the middle of the business district and is surrounded by many delicious eateries and stores.  Starbucks, Jamba Juice, Ross, 24 hour fitness and UPS are only a block away.   It’s about 5 minutes to the state capital, Iolani Palace, Aloha tower, Chinatown.

I enjoy traveling, exercising, and spending time with my 1 year old and husband.  
When I travel I always stay in Airbnbs :)

description:
Enjoy a peaceful retreat when you stay at this charming, unique space. Private entrance, expansive ocean views and salt water pool. On the first floor the living room couch opens to a twin size bed and a kitchenette with most amenities. A spiral staircase leads to a second floor with a queen size bed and private bath. Both floors have private lanais. We strive for chemical free organic living spaces. South Maui location five minutes to premium beaches and restaurants.

Registration number
390360060000, TA-004-622-1312-01
neighborhood_overview: Quiet residential neighborhood.  Low traffic street.
host_about: My husband Lee and I opened began our Airbnb in February 2022.   After retiring from a thirty year career as a psychologist on Maui,  I now enjoy being a host to our guests and grandma to our two grandchildren.  We purchased our home about nine years ago.  In addition to the main house,  it had two apartment size spaces with their own entrances and what looked like a motel sized swimming pool.   It was the pool that most attracted me as I love to swim. The house was to take work to restore it to its great potential.  We put our heart and soul into this project for three years.  The two independent units which are now our rental  suites were given the same care and attention as our living space.  My passion is to create natural and beautiful interiors that are as much as possible toxin free. We use natural, organic materials and furnishings, and quality art which gives a lovely ambiance.

description:
Nestled on ½ acres of native forest, The Singing Forest Cottage celebrates Hawai’i’s scenic beauty. This completely private cottage features a contemporary design, soaring ceilings and a steaming hot tub. Wake up to the song of native birds and explore Volcanoes National Park, just 2 miles away. Enjoy the romantic feel of a forest cottage with a full complement of amenities including a king sized bed, luxury linens and a cozy fireplace.

STVR 19-351259

The space
This contemporary space was designed specifically with guest comfort in mind. With a spacious interior, generous bathroom, privacy and tranquility. It is everything that we all want in our vacation. If you decide to stay in for a meal, the cottage features a fully equipped kitchen with quartz counters, stainless steel appliances and a full sized refrigerator. The expansive bath features a custom vanity, large walk-in shower and huge corner windows to take in the view from the wood soaking tub
neighborhood_overview: Located in a forested neighborhood directly across from Volcano Village, where you will find restaurants and stores. We are just 2 miles to the entrance of Volcanoes National Park. The Singing Forest Cottage is in the perfect location for convenience and natural beauty during your stay. Our Sunday farmer's market features only locally made goods and is beloved island-wide. Volcano Village is known as an artist's community with many workshops and studios. While you are here, take the opportunity to check out our wonderful local artisans or have a tasting at our local Volcano Winery.
host_about: The world is a magical place and Hawai'i most of all! After visiting the islands I fell in love with this beautiful tropical paradise. My family lives in the Volcano area and as an artist and a lover of plants and nature, being here is the greatest gift.  I am a mother of one adorable little boy. I rent my cottages part time and also work with breast cancer survivors. We would love to welcome you to our favorite place on the planet! I am partnered with a team of experts so that we can offer you an unforgettable Hawai'i  experience.

description:
The space
Mana Kai Maui Resort 501A

Spectacular ocean and mountain vistas are yours to enjoy from the private balcony of this Hawaiian beachside condo! Whether you're visiting to walk along the shore, go snorkeling or scuba diving, or discover the many local parks and other nearby attractions, this single-level vacation rental is the perfect home base for the ultimate Hawaiian escape!

Inside, you'll find a well-equipped, full kitchen with stainless steel appliances to make meal prep a breeze! Dine together indoors at the table for four or indulge in an alfresco experience on the balcony. On rainy days or relaxing evenings, settle into the living area to stream your favorite channels.

On-site, you and your guests will have access to a host of resort amenities including a heated pool and fitness room.

RESORT AMENITIES
- Heated outdoor pool
- Fitness room
- Shared grills
- Business center

THI
host_about: Hi, we’re Vacasa, North America’s largest vacation rental management company. Owners of vacation homes around the world trust us to deliver exceptional service throughout your entire vacation. Professional housekeepers clean and stock each home, and our customer care team is available around the clock—with a local property manager ready to show up and help out. We like to think we offer the best of both worlds: you can enjoy a one-of-a-kind vacation experience in a unique property, without compromising on service and convenience. neighborhood_overview:
Here are some local tips and recommendations for your Airbnb guests staying in Kealakekua:

Restaurants:
Korner Pocket: This local favorite is known for its delicious burgers made with grass-fed beef and fresh ingredients.
Keei Cafe: This charming cafe serves up delicious breakfast and lunch items, including local favorites like loco moco and macadamia nut pancakes.
Mi's Italian Bistro: If you're in the mood for Italian food, check out Mi's Italian Bistro. Their pizzas and pastas are made from scratch and cooked to perfection.
Manago Hotel & Restaurant: This historic restaurant has been serving up traditional Hawaiian dishes since 1917. Don't miss their famous pork chops!

Activities:
Kealakekua Bay: Take a snorkeling tour or rent a kayak to explore the beautiful waters of Kealakekua Bay, which is home to an abundance of marine life.
Pu'uhonua o Honaunau National Historical Park: This historical park is home to an ancient Hawaiian place

host_about:
KBM Resorts caters to those who appreciate the size and comfort of a fully equipped property but don't want to sacrifice the convenience and amenities of a 5 star hotel. KBM Resorts blends these two worlds together by providing beautiful, full-size residences with hotel-style features and amenities you have come to expect from the finest hotel resorts. Each KBM Resort property features Fully-equipped kitchens, complimentary L'Occitane bath and body lotions, housekeeping and concierge teams, personal grocery delivery, personal greeters and more.

Each KBM Resorts location is fully-staffed with local Guest Ambassadors, Concierge Agents, Activities Desk, Maintenance and Housekeeping teams, Quality Control Inspectors, Laundry facilities and more. If your family ever needs assistance or service our staff is just steps away and ready to help. We employ only dedicated local professionals who believe in our community, deeply care for our Homeowners and Guests, and are genuinely excited to share local expertise to deliver your family a dream vacation.

All KBM Resort locations feature beautiful distinctive residences, professional cleaning and sanitization, fully-equipped kitchens, 24/7 Guest Support teams, complimentary high-speed WiFi, and a seamless checkin process. You and your family are always a call, click, or text away from our local Guest Ambassadors whose sole mission is to deliver your dream vacation.

neighborhood_overview:
Princeville is a quiet neighborhood. Nature paved paths wind through Princeville alongside the golf course perfect for the walkers and runners alike. There is a kids playground and field within walking distance (near the Princeville entrance fountain), as well as a weekly Saturday am Farmers Market.

The Westin hotel is next door, which has a Starbucks cafe inside.
Hotel 1 resort is a 5 minutes drive and has 1 Kitchen, Welina Terrace as well as The Sandbox and The Juice Bar for different food and drink options.
Princeville Makai Golf Course is 3 minute drive and has the Makai Grill.

Hanalei & Hanalei Bay as well as Anini Beach Park is just a 10 minute drive from the unit.

This spacious and comfortable home is located in the charming town of Honomū, just a 20 minute drive north from Hilo and a 5 min drive from Akaka Falls State Park. Relax on the screened in patio overlooking a tropical yard with fruit trees and native Hawaiian plants. The space
Aloha! Thank you for viewing our listing and we look forward to hosting you at our home.

Honomū Haven is located in the quaint & charming town of Honomū, just 13 miles north of Hilo and 3 miles from 'Akaka Falls on the Big Island of Hawaii. This 5 bedroom, 2 bathroom, 1.5 kitchen home was meticulously restored and renovated by one of the owners, a builder trained in Historic Preservation. Special care was taken to maintain the comfort and craftsmans
neighborhood_overview: Honomū Haven is situated at the quiet end of town near a couple of homes and churches. Honomū Park is directly across the street with a playground and fully equipped sports gym - great for keeping your keiki (children) entertained. Take a quick stroll down the street and visit Mr. Ed's Bakery and Hawaii Zipline Adventures as well as several boutiques & gift shops. Pick up delicious food and fresh island fruits & veggies and enjoy live music at the Hakalau Farmers Market, open Tuesdays 3:00 - 5:30pm at the Hakalau Veteran's Park.
host_about: Aloha! I'm a lifelong resident of the beautiful Big Island of Hawaii. I live with my husband Devin and two young children on the Hāmākua coast.  My favorite place to be is in the ocean. I love surfing, diving, swimming, kayaking, you name it! I also love to travel, hike, read and learn new languages. Please feel free to contact me with any questions about Honomū Haven or visiting the Big Island. I look forward to welcoming you to our island home.

Aloha! We're nature lovers immigrated from Europe & Asia: our childhoods were filled with recollections around alpine mountains & tropical island breezes. Now that we have a family of our own, we found a special place where we can build memories together.
Maui is our happy place that offers the best of both worlds: striking spectrum of landscape & stunning beaches that bring us back home. We look forward to sharing our piece of paradise with you!

description:
Our one bedroom condo (note: some lofted studios identify as 1Br units) on Molokai, is beautifully appointed. It's siting affords amazing sunsets, ocean views & privacy. Just a short walk to the seaside pool and beaches. Molokai is a place that magically slows you down. Wake to the serenade of birds and drift off to the wind in the palm trees and crashing waves of the ocean. Read, hike, swim, rest and explore. Updated and fully equipped kitchen, linens & bedding. We'd love to host your visit!

The space
We love our little piece of paradise and so do our guests. Our condo is our second home and we have furnished it with the quality we enjoy in bedding, cookware, towels, etc. without too much personal, distracting "stuff." Our dishware is ceramic, stainless cookware by Emeril, not mismatched low quality rental ware. We also have an air popcorn maker, blender, slow cooker and mixer. There is a full size refrigerator, microwave and dishwasher. Four burner rang
neighborhood_overview: Kepuhi Beach Resort is one of 3 condominium resorts on the west end of Molokai.  It is a quiet, peaceful setting with a lot of space to roam.  There are great hiking trails to secluded beaches.  Restaurants are not aplenty on Molokai.  Paddlers Inn, in Kaunakakai offers live music most nights and has great burgers and other fare.  The Cookhouse in Kualapuu is a favorite of the locals.  The recent addition of Hiro's Grill at Hotel Molokai is by far the best on the island.  The ambience is wonderful.  Most of our guests prefer to grill their dinner on our resort gas grills.  Great organic produce can be found at Kumu Farms which is just west of the airport.  Look for their sign on the road.  (Closed weekends and Mondays.)
host_about: Tom and I love Molokai and have been visiting since 1995.  We are retired after careers in fundraising (me) and teaching (him).  As new grandparents we are enjoying our two charming granddaughters a lot!  And we are pursuing our interests.  Tom competes internationally in Masters Championships as an elite race walker and I volunteer to help reverse climate change.  We are healthy and active and love to hike, kayak and travel to see other parts of the world, knowing we can always head to Molokai to recharge!

Take a small drive to Kaanapali Parkway for some shopping and dining options. A short distance away from there, you can find Safeway, Starbucks, and Long's Drugs at the Lahaina Cannery Mall.

neighborhood_overview:
Location! Location! Location! Pacific Shores is located in desirable South Kihei, across the street from beautiful Kamaole I / Charley Young beaches. The nearby cove is renowned for it's gentle surf for beginners. Stand-up paddle and surf boards can be rented. Lessons are available.

To the south, a variety of white sandy beaches stretch from Pacific Shores to Makena, along with many, many restaurants within walking distance. To the north you will find more restaurants, as well as Kalama Park which offers volleyball, basketball, tennis courts, rollerblading, a walking path, and a playground for children. Don't miss out on across-the-street Hawaiian Shaved Ice, an island favorite!

There are a variety of nearby shops for t-shirts and souvenirs, or the Shops of Wailea are a short drive away.

Nearby grocery stores are Foodland, Hawaiian Moons Health food, Times Market, and Safeway.
host_about: We(Ed & Cherie) have been married for 47 years and have 3 children and 12 grandchildren. We grew up and were married in Southern California, and after Ed's graduation from UCLA, we move to Grants Pass, OR in 1976. Ed was a teacher at Hidden Valley High School for 32 years; Cherie was a daycare provider and monitor for the USDA. After several visits to the Hawaiian Islands, we moved to Kihei, HI, where we lived for nearly 5 years, then moved back to Oregon to  spend more time with our 3 children and 12 grandchildren.

description:
Get in vacation mode in this one-bedroom one-bathroom ocean view suite in Waikiki! Take in views of the Pacific while relaxing on your furnished lanai, cook your own meals in the full size kitchen, and entertain in the spacious living area.

The space
Unwind in this one-bedroom one-bathroom deluxe suite with views of the Pacific Ocean, which you can enjoy from your furnished lanai. This unit’s decor is reminiscent of iconic Waikiki charm. You’ll love the wicker furnishings, wide-leaf paddle fan, and vibrant colors. Cook your own meals in the full-size kitchen and spend quality time with friends and family in the spacious living area. This suite also offers an open floor plan with a dining area for four, and bedroom with two single beds and a spacious mirrored closet.

This comfy unit also has a washer/dryer, shower/tub, ceiling fans, air conditioning, a flat screen television, and WiFi. Waikiki Shore is the only beachfront condominium in Waikiki, offer

description:
A step inside this jaw-dropping penthouse set on the coastline near Poipu Beach, and you will be ready to call it home. The sophisticated design blends seamlessly with modern function so you can relax, revive, and socialize on your dream Hawaii getaway. Guests can enjoy on-site resort amenities like a heated freshwater pool, two BBQ areas, and free parking. This suite sleeps six guests in one king, a queen, and two twin beds. Guests can enjoy the Pacific Breeze or A/C at an extra nightly fee.

The space
Poipu Shores - #406A: This luxurious upper level, 1960 square-foot, the three-bedroom penthouse will have everyone ready to call Kauai their second home. Expansive ceilings highlight the ocean views and natural sunlight with central air-conditioning and five ceiling fans to keep the temperature at your preferred level in each room.

The sprawling living room area provides plenty of space to lounge in style, with tropical-inspired furnishings, including tw
host_about:
Fall in love with the Garden Isle’s unspoiled coastline, radiant sunsets, and magical valleys during your stay at Kauai’s Poipu Shores. Our oceanfront vacation condos are the epitome of individuality, style, and comfort. 

Poipu Shores condos have a prime oceanfront location near Poipu Beach, which "Travel Channel" once named America's Best Beach. Our hotel is also within walking distance to striking Keoniloa Bay, Shipwreck, and Brennecke beaches, and a short drive to historic Koloa Town.

Our condos offer laid-back island living with stunning Pacific Ocean views, upgraded room features, and resort amenities. Our beachfront resort has two barbeque areas and a heated freshwater swimming pool that’s home to "The Hut" - an open-air lounge area where you can unwind in the year-round Poipu sun. We also provide Free Parking for guests so you explore Kauai and return with ease.

Whether you’re into relaxing beachside or venturing through Kauai’s rainforests, there’s something for everyone at Poipu Shores.

- Stay fit at nearby Poipu Athletic Club
- Tee off at at Poipu's championship golf courses
- Horseback ride along a secret beach
- Take a mountain bike excursion
- Shop Poipu’s fantastic art galleries
- Dine on fresh caught seafood
- All the Comforts of Home

Poipu Shores not only has great resort features, but each condo also comes with amenities that will make your stay feel just like home. Cook your own meals in your full-size kitchen and dine on your large private lanai/balcony while the sun sets into the deep blue Pacific. And don’t worry—every room is oceanfront! We also have Free WiFi, an in-room washer/dryer, and cable TV.

Since 1993, Castle Resorts & Hotels has specialized in innovative hotel and resort management. We manage properties throughout the Hawaiian Islands, including Kauai, Oahu, Maui, Molokai, and Hawaii Island, as well as Auckland, New Zealand. Accommodations range from full-service hotels to resort condominiums and combines value, convenience, and authentic experiences.

neighborhood_overview:
The condo is located in the heart of Kaanapali beach resort area framed by Kaanapali Golf Course, flowering plumeria trees and palm trees. Next door starts the ocean boardwalk – enjoy sunset walks or morning strolls along the boardwalk. Enjoy a short walk (12 mins) to Whaler’s Village shops, restaurants and major hotels from the Hyatt to Sheraton. The Kaanapali Trolley stops by our hotel and services the major hotels in the Kaanapali Beach Resort area.
Walk to Kaanapali Beach or our exclusive beachfront clubhouse with full kitchen, 2 outdoor showers, beach towels, chairs, recliners and ice machine. Or if you don’t want to walk to Kaanapali beach, enjoy a courtesy golf cart ride to from Front Desk to beachfront clubhouse, getting to beach never got easier or quicker – how easy is that!
Grocery store is a few miles either direction from the resort. Downtown Lahaina is a 5 minute drive heading east and Kapalua is 10 minute drive heading west.
host_about:
Raising the Standards at the Maui Eldorado for Over 20 Years

We're world travelers who first visited Maui over 20 years ago and have been in love with this special island ever since. As hospitality specialists, we have international experience at top hotels and restaurants in Asia. Beginning as condo owners at the Maui Eldorado, we were the first company to raise the standards, invest in quality, and begin upgrading condos. Since then, we’ve grown naturally to suit the needs of our owners and our guests. 

Pride in Everything We Do

From our background in food services, where we’ve won numerous awards, we know how to take care of our guests. We take pride in everything we do. Kaanapali Beach, and the west side of Maui, holds a special place in our hearts and we look forward to sharing our passion with you. 

Personal Guest Service - From Beginning to End
Based on-island, right in West Maui, we offer complete customer service throughout your Hawaiian vacation. From the moment you begin planning your trip to the time you leave, we’re here to help. We’ll be sure you find the perfect condo for your group and connect you with Maui’s top activities and attractions. 

Offering  privately-owned studios,  1 and 2 bedrooms at the Maui Eldorado Resort located on Kaanapali beach surrounded by Kaanapali golf course. Exclusive beachfront clubhouse with full kitchen on the beach!

As a host, customer satisfaction is our #1 priority, as we know you have choices. Let us help make MAUI memories last!!

description:
Relax in the heart of South Kona, in a beautifully located hillside beach community. We are one hour south of the Kona airport. This 3 bedroom, 2 bath home offers a picturesque ocean view from a very large lanai to relax on after a nice day of activities.

The space
Home is where the heart is and this home is exactly that! This simple and spacious country home has your basic amenities and is off of the beaten path in the lush tropical country of the Big Island. If you are looking for a quiet and peaceful place to get away from it all, look no further!

This house has plenty of space for family and friends to enjoy country living on the Big Island and watch incredible sunsets from the spacious lanai. Country living on the Big Island is unique because it embodies the self-sufficient and off-grid ways of living. The house's water supply is obtained by a catchment system which means we catch rain water from the roof that feeds into a 10,000 gallon storage
neighborhood_overview: Kona Paradise is a family, friendly, comfortable, safe quiet neighborhood. We are very close with each other and have many dinners, BBQ's and celebrations together.  There is always someone available if a helping hand is needed or and questions need to be answered.
host_about: Aloha, If your reading this it means you decided to stay in my beautiful Hale (home in Hawaiian). My property manager Amanda has been the one who has been answering your questions and in communication with you.  She takes care of my home and bookings while I am away at sea for work.  It is strange to write about myself but here goes.   I am a bit of everything, but at heart I'm a sailor. By being a sailor I can do the things that I love the most. I like to travel the world on my time off. To see, smell, feel and experience what I don't know and sometimes don't understand .  I am an avid reader and a complete science fiction freak, I actually subscribe to sci fi/fantasy magazine. Reading is my zen to chill and relax. I love exotic and different food while drinking yummy wine.  It helps loving the outdoors because I can burn off what I eat. I enjoy, hiking, camping, surfing, snorkeling, diving. Anything that is on or surrounded by ocean or forest makes me happiest.  I make friends easily and love spending time with cool and interesting people.  What drives me, is moving forward and always learning something new.  "you can never cross the ocean unless you have courage to lose sight of the shore."

neighborhood_overview:
Waikoloa Beach is an area located on the South Kohala coast on the island of Hawaii. Approximately 25 minutes north of the Kona International Airport (KOA). The Waikoloa Beach Resort is very family and pedestrian friendly. Most properties are within a 10-15 minute walk (3-5minute drive with ample parking) to ʻAnaehoʻomalu Bay, also known as A-Bay. A-Bay is a shallow water bay located within the resort. ʻAnaehoʻomalu is best known for its sunsets, snorkeling and historic royal fishponds.
The Queens’ MarketPlace and Kings’ Shops provide convenient dining and shopping options.

description:
Welcome to our large, spacious home in Princeville, Kauai. Perfect for families, couples, or anyone who loves to spread out, this 2200 sq ft luxury home has been painstakingly remodeled with luxury finishes throughout.

Located in a quiet, stunning neighborhood just a short walk from world famous Anini Beach. We are also under 10 minutes from Hanalei!

Nestled in the most luxurious neighborhood of Princeville, we are walking distance to Princeville shopping center, restaurants, and parks.

The space
This is a newly remodeled, spacious, modern home in the heart of
Princeville at Hanalei in Kauai. Just 2 minutes drive from Anini Beach, a 10 minute drive from World Famous Hanalei Bay, and dozens of fantastic shopping and restaurant options. We furnished this space with luxury and comfort in mind and it is truly one of a kind in this area.

Our home is two stories with three bedrooms and three bathrooms, and can sleep up to 12 gu
neighborhood_overview:
The 9,000-acre resort town of Princeville lies in the northernmost tip of Kauai, about 45 minutes from Lihue, the island’s capital. The sleepy community of Kalihiwai borders Princeville to the east and the hip neighborhood of Hanalei to the west.

Its northern end sits on the edge of the Pacific Ocean, where you’ll find stunning views of the boundless blue sea, fringed on one side by a reddish-gold sandy coast, towering verdant cliffs and dense emerald rainforests. Due to the lush vegetation and exotic scenery, Princeville and its surrounding areas have been featured in numerous films, including Jurassic Park, George of the Jungle, and the Raiders of the Lost Ark.
host_about: Born and raised on the island! I love hosting people in my home. Please don't be shy if you have any questions.

description:
This is a beautiful newer build with great attention to detail. This includes a private bedroom, bathroom and gourmet kitchen with everything you could possibly need for a perfect vacation. This property is 10 blocks from high-cliff ocean, on the dead-end side of the street, with very little traffic. The lanai overlooks our 1-acre avocado orchard with 60 avocado trees, lychee, papaya, mango, banana, pineapple, mandarin, spinach and lemongrass. Please ask my husband, Jason, what is ripe.

The space
There are no added fees or hidden costs!!!! We include everything so that there are no surprises!! However, please note that AirBnB does add a fee to all bookings, over which I have absolutely no control. We have stayed in AirBnBs and wanted this to simply be the best, most thoughtful place you could ever wish for. We have picked only the finest quality mattresses, sheets and pillows for your comfort. There is no need to lug a crib or highchair as we supply both. We also
neighborhood_overview: This is a very quiet neighborhood on the dead-end side of the street. If you are from the city, this area will feel rural to you. Lots are 1 acre and not all are built on. There are no street lights so it can be quite dark at night. You will rarely hear cars, only coqui frogs and birds. There are amenities such as sit-down restaurants, grocery store, post office, gas station, McDonald's, Subway, hardware store, laudromat, fruit stand and coffee house in nearby Keaau. There are also amenities in nearby Pahoa. If you are here on Sunday, the Maku’u Market is a must-see/must-experience!!! Drive on 130 towards Pahoa and it’s on the left (it’s quite close to Avocado Acre). You pay a couple of bucks to get in, but it’s so worth it- plenty of different vendors and lunch choices. Lots of locals hang out with their families all day. This is an island experience not to be missed!! Make sure you take cash to get in and buy...some vendors don’t take credit cards.
host_about: Hi. I’m a veterinarian and a registered nurse. My husband, Jason, is a dive instructor from Fiji, who is now a commercial truck driver. We have 5 kids, 2 of whom are still at home. We love animals and have 6 rescued dogs and 3 rescued chickens. We look forward to retiring in Hawaii in 2024!!!!

description:

Condo has a fully-equipped kitchen, lux queen bed, and spacious lanai. Also features in-unit washer & dryer, free WiFi, and a brand new queen size sofa sleeper (2023). Complex has a beautiful 60ft swimming pool, multiple BBQs, and a large pavilion. Cool inside thanks to the ground floor. Free parking. Sleeps 4.

The space
The condo is located in Kihei Kai Nani building 12, adjacent to the swimming pool. Being on the ground floor, the condo is shielded from the heat from direct strong sunlights. It's quite cool inside the condo throughout the day, making your stay more enjoyable.

The bedroom has 1 queen-sized bed, a portable A/C, a ceiling fan, and a TV. The living room has a queen-sized sofa bed (new 2023), a window A/C unit, a ceiling fan, and a flat-screen TV. The bat
neighborhood_overview: Kihei Kai Nani is located in the charming neighborhood of South Kihei, Maui. The surrounding blocks are filled with a variety of restaurants, cafes, and shops, providing plenty of options for dining and shopping. Just a short walk away is the stunning Kamaole Beach, where guests can enjoy swimming, sunbathing, and unforgettable sunsets. Kihei Kai Nani itself features beautifully landscaped grounds with a freshwater swimming pool, six gas BBQs for outdoor grilling, and a coin-operated laundry facility. With its convenient location and abundance of local amenities, Kihei Kai Nani is the perfect home base for your Maui adventure.

You're also just a short distance to many great restaurants and shopping including a great natural foods store and juice bar. If you don't want to rent a car, you can catch a bus to many places on the island for just $2. The bus stops on S Kihei Rd just a block from the condo.

The atmosphere is both tranquil and invigorating with some of Maui's best beaches just across the
neighborhood_overview: Welcome to Kalama Terrace - right across the street from Charley Young Beach and the Cove in the middle of everything Kihei has to offer! The best beaches, restaurants, shopping and night life are all close by.

If anything comes up that needs our assistance, before, during or after your arrival and stay, please contact us at once and we'll be there to support you. 

We are proud to be Airbnb SuperHosts and our places exemplify pride of ownership. We are hands-on owners and embrace the Japanese concept of 'kaizen' - constant improvement, so we're always striving to make our places and your stay more enjoyable. Plus, our team of Bryan in Portland and Marie on Maui are also available to assist us to promptly attend to your needs!

description:

Located on the sixth floor in the Kahana Villa resort condo complex, the elevator makes accessibility easy and ensures ocean breezes with breathtaking views. This fabulous location provides plenty of free on-site parking and is within walking distance of shops, boutiques, and fine dining establishments. Watch the surfers on famous 'S Turns' (Pohaku Park) Beach from the lanai. Take the two-minute walk to the shore and dip in your toes.

Spend your days at the beach soaking up the sunshine, building sandcastles, and looking for turtles. Play in the waves or go snorkeling
host_about:
Vacasa
Vacation Home Management

Vacasa unlocks the possibilities of how we enjoy vacation homes. We take care of managing our homeowners’ vacation houses so they can have peace of mind (and their home when they want to). And our guests book vacations confidently knowing they’re going to find exactly what they’re looking for without any surprises.

Each vacation home is always cared for by our professional local teams who implement our high cleanliness and maintenance values, while the hands-off tasks of vacation rental management--marketing, filing taxes, and maintaining a website--are handled by a specialized central support team. Our passion and focus remain true: to empower our homeowners, guests, and employees to invest in vacation.

description:
WELCOME TO HANA, MAUI ~ THE LAST HAWAIIAN PLACE

HANA KAI MAUI welcomes you to our beautiful oceanfront vacation rentals on Hana Bay at Waikaloa Beach.

The space
Partial Oceanview 1BR/1BA Unit #107 Kama is a 1 bedroom partial oceanview unit located in the Mauka (upper) building. This is a ground floor, corner unit with a King size bed in the bedroom a Full size futon and a Single futon chair that converts into an 'almost' Twin sized bed in the living room suitable for a younger child. There is a pass-thru window from the kitchen to the spacious covered lanai and a large table and comfy chairs for dining and relaxing. There are tile floors throughout, glass block shower and a writing desk. There is a 2nd covered lanai off the bedroom.

Our oceanfront property features exquisite grounds, beachside barbeque, fully equipped kitchens, private lanais, and free wireless internet service. Many of our units have panoramic oceanfront views where you can
neighborhood_overview: Hana is known as the last Hawaiian place. Our community is still predominantly Hawaiian. Hana has a rich history and the Hawaiian population in this area once numbered in the hundreds of thousands. Today Hana's population is under 2000, from Keanae to Kaupo, a 40 mile coastal radius. Hana Kai is centrally located and easily accessible. The property is nestled along the North side of Hana Bay at the entrance to Waikaloa Beach. Although we do not recommend swimming, Waikaloa Beach is wonderful to explore and you can actually walk for several miles on the coastal trail to Waianapanapa State park. Hana Bay is a precious resource to the community and you may see fisherman netting Akule, keiki swimming in the gentle shore break at Hana Bay, dolphins and sometimes whales, turtles along the rocks or canoe paddlers practicing for an upcoming regatta.
host_about: I am the General Manager for Hana Kai. I originally came to Hana in 1978 and have made Hana and Hawaii my home ever since. We have a 16 member staff including front desk, housekeeping, grounds and maintenance personnel. We are all Hana residents and the majority of our staff is of Hawaiian ancestry. Our staff is very friendly and always willing to assist our guests as needed with services and information about the Hana area.

Gorgeously remodeled and elegantly appointed, the oceanfront penthouse vantage point of residence 3-1106 boasts breathtaking Pacific Ocean views that stretch from Maui's neighbor islands of Lanai to Molokai and beyond. Enjoy
neighborhood_overview:
The Ka’anapali Ali’i is West Maui’s premier destination for your family vacation. The resort offers a top shelf experience across the board, from its perfect location amidst famed Ka’anapali Beach and Whalers Village, to the impeccably maintained grounds.

Furthermore, the Ali’i poolside common area recently underwent an extensive renovation that provides a relaxing environment to barbecue, meet new friends for an epic sunset, or unwind with your family by the pool. Also, there is a newly constructed state of the art fitness & spa on property, as well as tennis courts for your volleying recreation. If golf is your passion, the resort is located within a short walk to the clubhouse of two championship golf courses in Ka’anapali.
host_about:
The Ohana (Family) at Maui Resort Rentals has been helping vacationers "Make Maui Reality" for over 50 cumulative years on the shores of West Maui.  Inspired by the Maui lifestyle, we aim to provide incredible vacation experiences at a curated collection of premier resort residences.

For your convenience, our warehouse and offices are located in Kaanapali North Beach, just minutes from all of the West Maui resorts.

Our Ritz-Carlton and Marriott trained staff are here to serve. Your guest experience is our highest priority. The privilege to host your precious Maui vacation is ours. 

As an added benefit, our exclusive Maui Resort Rentals courtesy shuttle offers free guest transportation between our West Maui resorts a number of West Maui locations - including Lahaina, Kapalua, and Whaler's Village.

host_about:
My name is Tiare Dutcher (RB-22030).  My main profile picture shows the Tiare Tahiti, a flower also called the Tahitian Gardenia.  It smells great...   One of my favorite flowers

I'm an artist with an MFA from the University of Hawai`i, but I became a real estate broker in order to support my disabled husband of 60 years, who passed away in July 2022.

I manage thirteen one bedroom condos in the Waikiki Skytower (three short blocks from the beach), one two bedroom, two bath condo in the Fairway Villa,just three blocks from Waikiki beach and one block to the International Marketplace, and one legal vacation rental studio at the Waikiki Grand Hotel, just a half block from the beach. I own a small real estate company, DW Realty LLC (RB-22573), located at 1123 11th Avenue #403, Honolulu, HI 96816, so if you want to buy something here on Oahu, I can help with that too.  My son is also a real estate broker and property manager, and we have helped a lot of people find their special place.  

My son and I both love helping people find a great place to stay on their vacation.

I love living in Hawai`i, and I live in Waikiki, so I'm close to the rentals I manage.  I'm almost always  available...

For three years, in the 1960s, before GPS, my husband and I sailed around the South Pacific on our 38' sailboat--no kids then, just our cat.  Finally, we came to Hawai`i, and we have pretty much been here ever since.  Both our kids were born here.  All of us are Hawaiians at heart.
