neighborhood_overview:
Ala Moana neighborhood is centrally located in the heart of Honolulu and boasts amazing shopping, dining, retail, parks, and entertainment options. Ala Moana is located right in between the Kakaako and Waikiki neighborhoods and features the best of both neighborhoods.

Beginning at the human-made, half-crescent beach known to locals as “Magic Island,” the sprawling Ala Moana Beach is a favorite Honolulu locale for afternoon picnics, sunset barbecues and celebrating special occasions with family and friends.

Amenities like public picnic sites, bathroom facilities, Hawaiian barbecue stands and shady monkeypod trees help make the beach an ideal place to gather for celebrations and weekend relaxation.

Drawing constant crowds of onlookers to the shoreline, the far end of Ala Moana Beach Park includes some of the most famous breaks on Oahu’s South Shore, namely Ala Moana Bowls and “Kewalos” (i.e., Kewalo Basin), which are coveted by locals and seasoned surfer

neighborhood_overview:
Waikoloa Beach is an area located on the South Kohala coast on the island of Hawaii. Approximately 25 minutes north of the Kona International Airport (KOA). The Waikoloa Beach Resort is very family and pedestrian friendly. Most properties are within a 10-15 minute walk (3-5minute drive with ample parking) to ʻAnaehoʻomalu Bay, also known as A-Bay. A-Bay is a shallow water bay located within the resort. ʻAnaehoʻomalu is best known for its sunsets, snorkeling and historic royal fishponds.
The Queens’ MarketPlace and Kings’ Shops provide convenient dining and shopping options.

host_about:
My name is Tiare Dutcher (RB-22030).  My main profile picture shows the Tiare Tahiti, a flower also called the Tahitian Gardenia.  It smells great...   One of my favorite flowers

I'm an artist with an MFA from the University of Hawai`i, but I became a real estate broker in order to support my disabled husband of 60 years, who passed away in July 2022.

I manage thirteen one bedroom condos in the Waikiki Skytower (three short blocks from the beach), one two bedroom, two bath condo in the Fairway Villa,just three blocks from Waikiki beach and one block to the International Marketplace, and one legal vacation rental studio at the Waikiki Grand Hotel, just a half block from the beach. I own a small real estate company, DW Realty LLC (RB-22573), located at 1123 11th Avenue #403, Honolulu, HI 96816, so if you want to buy something here on Oahu, I can help with that too.  My son is also a real estate broker and property manager, and we have helped a lot of people find their special place.  

My son and I both love helping people find a great place to stay on their vacation.

I love living in Hawai`i, and I live in Waikiki, so I'm close to the rentals I manage.  I'm almost always  available...

For three years, in the 1960s, before GPS, my husband and I sailed around the South Pacific on our 38' sailboat--no kids then, just our cat.  Finally, we came to Hawai`i, and we have pretty much been here ever since.  Both our kids were born here.  All of us are Hawaiians at heart.

neighborhood_overview: The Royal Coconut Coast is aptly named, not just because of the amazing stands of large coconut trees that cover the landscape, but also because much of the area was originally reserved only for the Ali’i or royalty in the Hawaiian kingdom. Today, beautiful white sandy beaches, lush green mountains and valleys, and consistently warm weather all year round attract travelers from all over the world. The Royal Coconut Coast has become a popular tourist destination because of its central location, beauty, rich history and culture, and variety of activities available for the whole family. From Wailua to Kealia, the east side of Kauai offers accommodations for both the budget traveler and those wanting a more full-service resort experience. The whole family can find something to do here, from a leisurely day at the beach or spa, to biking, hiking, kayaking, or golfing, there are many options of how to spend your time on Kauai’s Royal Coconut Coast.

host_about:
The complex is located directly across from Kamaole III State Beach Park, which is known as one of the most beautiful and safest beaches in the Islands.  It is perfect for swimming, snorkeling, sunning, jogging, picnicking, kite flying, and especially enjoying amazing sunsets and whale watching.

Each unit has a private lanai that faces the interior of the complex, offering views of the expansive lawns, pools, and lush tropical landscape of palm trees, hibiscus, birds of paradise and plumeria trees.  Most lanais also offer views of the beautiful Pacific Ocean and spectacular sunsets.  

There are two pools, a covered pavilion, and a full size tennis court on the property.  Every evening the outdoor barbecue area is a popular spot to socialize while grilling the perfect dinner and watching as the Hale Kamaole conch shell band performs their nightly sunset ritual.

You will find world class golf courses, fantastic snorkeling and diving, many Maui activities, abundant shopping and delicious fine and family dining all within minutes of Hale Kamaole.

host_about:
At Maui Condo and Home, LLC we continue to serve our owners and guests with the same Aloha Spirit that we shared over 20 years ago. Though our business has changed through expansion and growth to include properties beyond Maui -- on the islands of Oahu, Hawaii and Kauai --  our values and sense of Aloha remain. We have implemented new business strategies and have remained at the top of the Property Management industry on Maui. We are excited to continue to serve our current owners and return guests, as well as welcome new owners and guests to Maui Condo and Home.
Click here to view all  of our listings: www.airbnb.com/p/mauicondo

description:

It sleep 4 comfortably with a King Size Bed and sleeper sofa in the living room. Amenities included are the split system A/C and ceiling fans in both the bedroom and living room. Parking is complimentary and WIFI is unlimited. Condo #19 is part of the Kihei Kai Rental Association which has an on-site office and an after-hour phone number for your convenience.

neighborhood_overview: North Kihei
host_about: On the sunny South Shore of Maui, Sugar Beach wraps all the way from Maalaea to North Kihei. It is Maui’s longest stretch of sandy beach and can be found steps away from Kihei Kai Oceanfront Condos. In the fall and winter Humpback whales can be seen frolicking right off the shore. Year-round, sun and gentle trade winds provide the perfect beach going weather.

description:
Watch Rain Fall Inside Your Home Into The Indoor Water Feature. Amazing Entry Across An Indoor Pond. Expansive Unfettered Ocean Views

The space
Beautiful high-end home with views directly to the ocean below. Have your own private retreat within a secure, gated community in an expansive open home. Stay in perhaps one of the most unique homes in Hawaii where it rains into the house, filling the entry waterway. Walk under the copper rainfall screen, across the pond with seemingly floating carved rock steps. This home is all about celebrating the Hawaiian outdoors/indoors lifestyle. The living room and master bedrooms feature huge sliders opening up to the pool and hot tub area and astounding views of the ocean. Water features surround the home with waterfalls cascading into multiple coy ponds. Water is the reason you come to Hawaii, and the main reason to rent this home. You'll be surrounded by water from the moment you enter the home, from the entry pond, to the in
neighborhood_overview:
One of the best neighborhoods in all of Kona. And the home is located on the west side of the subdivision; meaning uninterrupted, direct, ocean views. Very secure with 24-hour gate guards. The Keahou center is just below and south of the home which provides a grocery store, movie theatre, and many great restaurants. Alli drive is the main road to connect you to the downtown area, and you can access it just below the home. Alli drive is where you'll find most of the restaurants, shopping, and activities. This home provides you quick access while keeping you away from the noise and the crowds.
Please note that this home is in one of the more upscale neighborhoods in Kona, and full-time residents live next to you. At sunset, many of the neighbors on the western side head to their patios to experience one of the best sunsets in the world. It's a beautiful, quite neighborhood, full of serenity, views, and great star watching. As such, we ask that you please be courteous and respectful
host_about: Moab Lodging Vacation Rentals is one of the biggest short term rental providers in the beautiful area of Moab, Utah. We provide privately owned homes and condominiums ranging from 1 Bedroom to 4 Bedrooms in any price class. We are fortunate enough to work and live in between Arches and Canyonlands National Parks with the La Sal Mountain range in the background.

description:
Green pastures with native flora and fauna await your visit to a quiet and private ranch on 10 acres of land. This getaway is a recently renovated ranch house with expansive views from every window. Watch farm animals graze, listen for native bird songs and enjoy spectacular star gazing. The house is just a short drive to Hawaii Volcano National Park and the village with restaurants and art galleries. Plus a nearby lush and secluded trail with old growth of rain forest vegetation.

The space
This unique home is one of the kind that will enchant you and make your vacation experience in the Hawaii Volcano National Park even more memorable. Custom-built in 1969 with real solid wood from top to bottom, this country house was recently renovated and upgraded without losing its original charm. On the ground floor there are 2 private cozy bedrooms with comfortable queen beds, a semi-private room between the garage and kitchen (separated from the bathroom by curtains) with
neighborhood_overview: This property is surrounded by farm land with wide open spaces, green pastures, horses and cattle scattered throughout the neighborhood which is tucked away in the back of Volcano Village. There is a working vegetable farm and  another farm with a petting zoo (The Lili House Farm) across the street and the road in front of the house will lead you to an endless rain forest trail. Every Sunday there is a farmer market at the Cooper Center, 3 miles down the road from the property, where the Volcano Village community gathers together to enjoy food, local produce and art crafts. The Volcano National Park is only 10 minutes away, Volcano Winery 15 minutes, Black Sand Beach 40 minutes and Green Sand Beach about 70 minutes.
host_about: I’ve lived in Hawaii for > 25 years and instantly fell in love with the Volcano area when I took my first hike in the National Park. I could feel Pele’s presence (Hawaiian Goddess of volcanoes) everywhere and needed to come back here again and again to feel one with nature, God and the Universe. Pele has also helped me to overcome obstacles over the years and I’m grateful for the opportunity to host guests in this beautiful home, which she meant for me to do.

description:
Wahi Malu at KaMilo is a gorgeous 3 bedroom/bath home, with two master suites. It is the perfect setting for your Hawaii getaway and is designed for large groups of up to 8 people. The airy open concept main floor includes a well-equipped kitchen, dining area, great room, and large covered lanai with grill. Whether you’re celebrating a birthday, anniversary, a new job, retirement, or simply celebrating the sunshine, Wahi Malu will provide the perfect setting for creating lasting memories.

The space
Wahi Malu, which means Secret Place in Hawaiian, provides a perfect setting for your Hawaii getaway and is designed for large groups of up to 8 people and is an inviting, welcoming, relaxing, luxurious home for your Hawaiian vacation.

Fast WiFi with great coverage included!

We love friends & families!

Big Island is such a wonderful place to spend with your friends, family, children and grandchildren. Vacations create such wonderful memo
neighborhood_overview: KaMilo is a wonderful gated community with a 2 acre recreation complex including a quiet adult lap pool and a large family pool along with a fitness center and 2 spa hot tub pools.  Also enjoy free access to the private Mauna Lani Beach club.
host_about: Jeff & Suzanne have been hosting guests in their luxury vacation rentals on the Big Island of Hawaii for the past several years.   Their company Paradise in Hawaii Luxury Homes consists of a large team of passionate, dedicated individuals focused on helping guests have amazing holidays.    From the initial three homes to now over forty (40) homes all equipped to the same high standards they have never lost their attention to detail.     While they have added team members they remain directly involved with each and every guest.    They treat every guest like their trip to Hawaii is their life long dream fulfilled.   They love being part of helping families create amazing memories.  Come try the Paradise in Hawaii experience!

description:
Charming pink historic ranching-era estate. Magical Kona views. Close to everything Kona offers. Large open lanais, ocean and coastal views, 4 bedroom, 3 bath, fully appointed kitchen.

Featured in the coffee table book, The Hawaiian House Now, the home is an historic 1895 structure, modified in the 1940s and retaining the charm of old Hawaii with architecture, finishes and furnishings of the day, while satisfying the needs and aesthetic of today's lifestyle.

TA-193-208-5248-01

The space
Sleeps nine. Three doubles, one king, and one twin bed, plus two twin-size pull-outs.

Two bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms on main floor. Main floor has two lanai sitting areas, living and dining rooms, kitchen, and laundry area/butler's pantry.

One room downstairs w TV room and french doors open to the garden.

Master suite upstairs on the third floor, with a king and one twin, two window seats that sleep young children, a

host_about: I enjoy meeting my guests and sharing what our community and Island has to offer as well as it's history. I'm as helpful as needed and respectfully away as wanted.

description:
Located in the upscale Poipu Beach Estates neighborhood this new home is 2600 square feet of pure enjoyment and relaxation. The layout of a 2 bedroom main home and a detached guest cottage offers all the room and privacy for a trip of a lifetime. The large heated lap pool will keep you comfortable while enjoying the large covered lanai with additional seating for lounging and dining.

The space
Enjoy sumptuous meals created in the gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances, including a chef oven, warming draw microwave, and Thermador gas stove. With its central Poipu location you are just a short distance from Kiahuna Beach and Poipu Beach State park and also superbly located to great shopping and dining at the two most visited shopping areas in Poipu.

The Parrish Collection is a locally owned and based real estate management company that specializes in vacation rentals on Kauai and Maui. Our collections of rentals are professionally managed by in

My personal goal is to ensure that we are exceeding the expectations of all our guests! 

Explore our unique collections of extraordinary Kauai vacation rentals, then match your style with the largest variety of properties available including the Kauai’s most popular resorts and widest selection of oceanfront homes in Poipu Beach.

The guest bedroom is furnished with 2 twin beds with memory foam mattress pads that are convertible to a king bed upon request, ceiling fan, alarm clock, and full bathroom. host_about:

We currently manage over 300 properties in South Maui, which is also where our office is located, making it convenient should guests need assistance day or night.

description:
Poipu Joy, our two-story home, is nestled in a private community of villas in 7 acres of lush gardens. It's just a short walk to two of the island's most beautiful beaches. Our home is private, quiet and surrounded by palms and tropical flowers, sharing a wall with just one neighboring home and no one above or below.

Located near Poipu Beach and the Grand Hyatt resort, you are in one of the best spots for water activities -- swimming, snorkeling, surfing, and paddle boarding.

The space
The 2-bedroom, 2-bath home sleeps 4, and has additional space for 2 on the queen sleeper sofa.

A private sidewalk entrance leads to the main floor with living room, dining area, a full size and well-equipped kitchen, and guest bedroom with queen bed, and full bath. The entire upstairs is a master bedroom suite with king bed and bathroom.

Ceiling fans are located in every room and both bedrooms have A/C. There is WIFI and two flatscreen tvs (
neighborhood_overview: Poipu is a spectacular beach community on the south shore of Kaua'i.  Our home is located in a private community of duplex villas called "Poipu Crater".  It is a beautiful tropical setting with lush gardens, a large pool, tennis court and putting green.  A short walk to Poipu's finest beaches!
host_about: I have lived in Hawai'i for nearly 30 years (20 years full-time and 10 years part-time) and am committed to ensuring you have a wonderful stay in my vacation home.  Kaua'i is a very special place, and I want to be sure you enjoy it as much as I do.

description: Take a break and unwind at this peaceful oasis.  On the Big Island’s west coast, you’ll find this delightful retreat built to capture the natural wonder of Kailua-Kona.
host_about: Highly experienced vacation specialist with an emphasis on vacation ownership properties.  Based out of our Myrtle Beach, SC office, let us help you put together your dream vacation.

description:
The space
Aloha! Welcome to Hawaii!

Come stay in this beautiful and relaxing three bedroom with spectacular ocean views. The place comes fully furnished, complete with a full kitchen, living room, two master bedrooms, one guest bedroom and two bathrooms.

Amenities Include:

*Restaurant - Monsoon India

*The Pool - Located next to the beach, the pool is open from 8:30am til 8:30pm.

*The Fish Pond - Located directly in front of the building. The historically important 16th century Alii (Royal) Fish Pond of Kalepolepo. Protected by offshore reefs, the Pond provides safe swimming for children and those wishing to avoid heavy surf. The Hawaiians still fish in the Pond, on occasion, using the old "throw net" method and occasionally use torches at night to attract the fish.

*Free Parking - On grounds free parking is provided in the center of the building which is patroled by security regularly.

*The Roo

description:
Come and enjoy this beautifully remodeled 3-bedroom home in Princeville. Close proximity to Princeville shopping center with premier boutiques, eateries & grocery store, Princeville Park & Library and Makai Golf Course.

The space
Come and enjoy this beautifully remodeled 3-bedroom home in Princeville. Close proximity to Princeville shopping center with boutiques, eateries, and grocery store, Princeville Park and Library, and Makai Golf Course. Minutes from Kenomene Outlook, Hanalei Bay, 'Anini Beach, Napali Coast tours, and more! The perfect island getaway for couples, family, and friends, you will love this cozy modern home away from home in the heart of Princeville!

Step into Keanu where you will find the bright and airy living area with high, vaulted ceilings and modern island coastal decor. The living and dining area offers plenty of comfortable seating for you to enjoy meals with family and friends, to cozy up with a book after a day at the beach
host_about: We are a professional property management company located in Princeville, on Kauai's north shore.  We have been specializing in vacation rentals on Kauai for 30+ years.  Our offices are open 7 days a week, and we have an after-hours emergency number should you need to reach us for any reason.  We pride ourselves on being prompt, friendly, and professional, and providing excellent customer service to all our guests.  We look forward to hosting you on Kauai.

description:
Live like a local in this roomy 1-bedroom condo! The condo has full kitchen and fully furnished for your comfort. Condo has a King bed, sofa sleeper FREE WIFI, cable TV and central AC. There is a sliding divider between the living area & bedroom to provide privacy if you're traveling with friends, or with children. As you stand on the lanai of this condo, you look straight out to see the Ala Wai Yacht Harbor below and turquoise ocean waters beyond.

host_about: Since 1965, Marina Hawaii Vacations has offered the best places to stay on the island of Oahu. Marina Hawaii Vacations' more than 300 privately-owned condominiums are located in the Ilikai Hotel, the Ilikai Marina and Discovery Bay - within easy walking distance to the heart of Waikiki and Hawaii's popular Ala Moana Shopping Center. Repeat visitors from the U.S. mainland, Canada, Europe and Asia trust Marina Hawaii Vacations for convenience, great quality and prices. Many of our guests are annual visitors who have stayed with us for the past 30 years. Check out the other properties that we manage at www.marinahawaiivacations.com

description:
A private property secluded from a neighborhood in the lively town of Kailua Kona. Surrounded by palms except makai where the ocean greets you. Plenty of off street private parking.
Two beautifully appointed bedrooms, one with a queen bed the other with two twins that can be made into king upon request.
Full sized, fully equipped kitchen.
You are walking distance to Honl's beach and to downtown Kailua Kona.
The unit is the downstairs of a duplex, so no stairs.
Infants are considered guests.

The space
Each bedroom has a closet with hangers and shelves. There are also luggage racks.

Guest access
Parking for two cars (ask about any other cars) right outside your door.
neighborhood_overview: The duplex is in a residential neighborhood.
host_about:
Aloha.  This is Jim Petersen, a semi retired  wholesale nursery salesman and coffee farmer from the San Francisco Bay area.  I have been on the Big Island for 15 years.  I love the warm soft air in Hawaii and the equally warm ocean.
I am excited to have guests to enjoy my newer 2/1 apartment on the ground floor of my duplex with stunning ocean views and endless lovely ocean breezes.
